name: Self contained garden/artist studio
summary: A sunny garden studio, self contained with secured parking. Easy access to Chatswood and the city. Very close to neighbourhood shopping and restaurants. 2 nights minimum stay. Unsuitable for children. Absolutely no smoking anywhere on the property. 15 - 20 minutes via M40 bus to city.
space: Close to all amenities and your chance to connect with nature, numerous bird and fish life.
description: A sunny garden studio, self contained with secured parking. Easy access to Chatswood and the city. Very close to neighbourhood shopping and restaurants. 2 nights minimum stay. Unsuitable for children. Absolutely no smoking anywhere on the property. 15 - 20 minutes via M40 bus to city. Close to all amenities and your chance to connect with nature, numerous bird and fish life. Use of garden and BBQ. We welcome interaction with guest if we are present. Very friendly neighbours and great facilities. You are within walking distance to buses to the city, 350 metres to Penhurst St buses to city, Balmoral beach and Manly. 300 metres to Eastern Valley buses 10 minutes to city. Chatswood is within walking distance (15 mins). 343 bus service every 10 minutes to Central. M40 express prepaid to city and Bondi every 15 to 20 minutes. Extensive bush walks in the Willoughby bushland area close by. Local shops, cafes & restaurants within easy, flat walking distance. Strong cafe culture. Undercover secu
neighborhood_overview: Very friendly neighbours and great facilities.
notes: Extensive bush walks in the Willoughby bushland area close by. Local shops, cafes & restaurants within easy, flat walking distance. Strong cafe culture. Undercover secure parking for small to medium cars.
transit: You are within walking distance to buses to the city, 350 metres to Penhurst St buses to city, Balmoral beach and Manly. 300 metres to Eastern Valley buses 10 minutes to city. Chatswood is within walking distance (15 mins). 343 bus service every 10 minutes to Central. M40 express prepaid to city and Bondi every 15 to 20 minutes.
access: Use of garden and BBQ.
interaction: We welcome interaction with guest if we are present.
house_rules: Dear Guests Thanks for choosing our studio. We hope you will enjoy your stay. This is a NON SMOKING HOUSEHOLD, no exceptions. Please help us to keep our prices low by leaving the place as clean as it was when you arrived, even if you are only staying 2 nights. You will find cleaning products in both the kitchen and bathroom cupboards, as well as a vacuum and a floor mop. If you would prefer not to take care of the cleaning, you can pay $50.00 on arrival. If you do decide the second option, the only favour we will ask is to strip the bed and place bedding along with towels so that they can be laundered. Fresh bedlinen, towels will be provided on the 4th day if your booking is 7 days or longer. Behave as if it was your place you are staying in and respect neighbours. Two night minimum stay. Unsuitable for children or more than two adults.

host.host_about:
Retired.
Extensive travel through Europe and Australia since retiring.

reviews.comments: Greg is so helpful all through our stay. They are how the perfect hosts should be.

Fantastic experience at Greg's place! I highly recommend
Thanks

Very clean studio with beautiful view,nice garden.good location.Greg was so nice and gave us many useful information.highly recommend!
Greg的小屋给我们留下很深的印象｡小屋子距离chatswood 火车站很近｡附近还有快速公交,10多分钟到市中心｡房东很热情,提前跟我们确定到达时间｡小屋不大,但很干净｡花园很美,有个金鱼池,主人还有只可爱的猫,屋主非常热心,经常问询是否需要帮忙的,给了很多信息｡小屋性价比也不错｡推荐!

Very friendly host with a beautiful apartment surrounded by a nice garden and lovely neighborhood. Host even prepared a bottle of wine and some stuff to eat for us! He also has a nice cat! Thanks again!
Warm, comfortable, great location and great communication from Greg and Maggie.
Very clean, homely, inviting and hosts are very welcoming and helpful
Greg and Maggie's place was perfect for us. Greg was a very welcoming host. Thanks for a great stay!

It was a pleasure to stay in Greg's beautifully kept cabin. It overlooked a lovely garden and we enjoyed sitting in the little patio. We enjoyed the fruit and yoghurt and the home made marmalade and cereals mix. Wish the cat was less aloof!

Greg & Maggie were friendly and helpful - even helping me take my bags from and to my car.
There's secure off-street parking and the bungalow overlooks a pleasant garden. I appreciated the strawberries, yoghurt, loaf of sourdough bread and jams in the fridge. 
This place is close to the city and northern beaches - very convenient.

We had a wonderful stay at Greg and Maggie's place. The studio is spacious and contains everything you need. Greg and Maggie are more than accommodating and always ready to offer some help or advice. Although it is a little far from the center, public transport is readily available.

I enjoyed my stay at this place very much.  The studio was clean and my hosts couldn't have been more thoughtful.  The place is set in a lovely garden and when you enter the studio you will see that Greg and Maggie have thought of everything that you might need.  Millie the resident pussycat and the visiting  parrots and magpie were surprise bonuses!  I shall certainly recommend this studio to my friends who wish to visit Sydney.

What a wonderful place to stay. Our stay was over a week long and we thoroughly enjoyed every aspect. The location was in easy walking distance to everywhere we needed to go and close to public transport for everywhere else. The studio itself is lovely! Very clean and tidy and has everything you need. Greg and Maggie are wonderful hosts - extremely kind and helpful. We will definitely stay again if we are back in Sydney. Highly recommended! :) :) :)
Great quiet spot - walking distance to chatswood. Lovely little granny flat with everything you need. Clean and tidy. Friendly hosts.

Great self contained space accessed through a lovely garden. Greg and Maggie were very helpful hosts and provided information about surrounding area. We enjoyed the bush walk down to Middle Cove. The secure parking was also appreciated. We look forward to staying again.
G&M's place has everything that you need, plus super clean, neat and tidy. Quick to reply, plus very clear instructions given.  Great place to stay!

Greg & Maggie are amazing hosts who are very friendly and accommodating. Their place is just right for a couple. It also came with nice little touches like food in the pantry. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with them.

Cosy and great location , easy walk to some good restaurants. 10 minutes drive to Crows Nest which made getting to my work location convenient. Clean ! Great extras provided and very much appreciated after a long drive.
Will be back highly recommend!
Thanks Greg and Maggie for you quick responses and hospitality
No regrets, nice, clean, quiet & reasonably priced and to top it up fantastic host

This is the perfect place to stay & explore the north areas of Sydney. Greg & Maggie were so kind and welcoming. The place was a beautifully cosy and perfect for my mid week getaway. A lovely outdoor seating area with a view gave it that country getaway feel. Great coffee machine & artworks throughout the place. Thanks for the wonderful stay :)
Place is clean and location is quiet. All good.
Very quiet location in walking distance to Chatswood. I had a nice stay and looking forward to staying again sometime soon
Greg and Maggie’s studio was great, couldn’t fault it :)

Cleaning, Friendly
Full equipment
Lovely secret garden
Communication

Greg and Maggie were fantastic hosts.  The studio was presented exactly as the photos and was spotlessly clean with beautiful linen and towels.  The breakfast supplies were a  wonderful surprise and so thoughtful.  Perfect location to visit my daughter in Castlecrag private hospital.
Greg and Maggie are very caring and informative and the place is private, extremely well appointed, clean and comfortable. We’d go back in a heartbeat.
Beautiful place, easily accessible. The breakfast supplies were a thoughtful and personal touch that contributed towards a really wonderful and relaxing stay. Definitely recommended!

Greg&Maggie are very friendly and fantastic hosts. The studio is located quiet residential area, very clean and tidy self- contained apartment. I would recommend this place, I really enjoyed my stay. Thank you

TOP 1 choice is you want to stay in Sydney no matter travel or work , you can have tranquil life in here with adorable cat and energetic frogs,. Also you can meditate in imposing garden and grab a cup of coffee. Greg and Maggie can give you plentiful information about transportation.

Greg and Maggie are great, they were super chill and their space was amazing. The studio was really clean and had everything I needed for the weekend. Will definitely stay again on my next trip to Sydney.

Greg & Maggie were the best hosts one could ask for. Their space was a home away from home peaceful, clean, comfortable and welcoming. Situated close to shops, public transport and just enough distance from the bustling city. We will be back for sure!

We really enjoying staying at this cozy studio! Place was sparkling clean, had a fully equipped kitchen n toilet/bathroom, comfortable bed, fast internet etc! Greg and Maggie are excellent hosts, very discreet and gave us some great tips. 
Studio is close to everything, i would recommend it even if you have no vehicle. 
See you next time Greg and Maggie☺️
Value for money - super location - will stay again - many thanks

Greg and Maggie are very kind and welcoming host. I got the best Airbnb experience here. The place was very clean and there are everything I need and more. There are food and drink. Also I could enjoy Netflix. 

Checking out day, he drove me to bus stop so I didn’t need to walk with my suit case. And he helped me when I left my stuff at the place. 

They are very great host. I super recommend this place 

Thank you very much

name: V4旺角地鐵公交近在咫尺/乾淨舒適/精裝修/購物首選/獨立衛浴/雙人房
summary: ❤️Royal Hotel位于香港九龍旺角最繁榮的彌敦道上｡處與旺角中心位置,距離旺角地鐵站和太子站步行3分鐘｡地點適中,離九龍法國醫院及浸會醫院只需十分钟車程｡附近生活條件豐富,鄰近5分鐘步程就有香港聞名的旺区通菜街(女人街)､西洋菜街(电器街)､洗衣街(波鞋街)､先達廣場､朗豪坊及多個潮流購物商場等｡附近更有很多各國餐厅､银行､找換店､便利店等生活設施,絕對是你来港尋求美食､觀光､娛樂及公幹的必須高性價比宾馆民宿｡另外,3分鐘可至中港巴士站､粵港通巴士站､機場巴士站､而且治安良好沒有閒雜人等,酒店內裝修精緻新穎整潔,令您住得安心舒適!
space: ❤️Royal Hotel have 7 rooms and all they have the priviate bathroom. Our staff clean the rooms before check in(only clean before check in not everyday) to guarantee each guest a clean and comfortable accommodation. We aim at giving the most valuable service to our guests. We handle tons of problem so everything just contact us you will get a satisfactory answer.   皇室共有7個帶獨立衛生間的房間,為了住戶能有一個乾淨舒適的環境, 每次入住前(入住前進行一次深度清潔,但不是每一天)都會有工作人員進行清潔｡且為了保證空氣的清新和流通,每間房間都安裝了排氣通風設備｡此外各项設施都運作良好,房間清潔舒適｡所有用品,毛巾,盥洗用具及設備都洁白如新,适合對住房環境及舒適度具要求的旅客｡在入主後有任何問題,歡迎您與我們聯繫,我們將盡力給您最滿意的答案｡ This room's Special Part  1.Room includes private bathroom&toilet.  2.A double bed(140cm*190cm)  3.The home area is about 6-7 square meters(Because of the premium in Hong Kong ,both the house prices and rentzs are expensive,rooms are generally small,our rooms was no exception)  4.Free WIFI is provided.  5.TV with rich tv programs.  6.24 hours hot water.  1.此房間有獨立浴室和洗手間  2.一張雙人床140cm*190cm  3.房間大小約為6-7平方米(因香港地少人多,昂貴的房價和租金導致人均居住普遍很小,我們的房間也不例
description: ❤️Royal Hotel位于香港九龍旺角最繁榮的彌敦道上｡處與旺角中心位置,距離旺角地鐵站和太子站步行3分鐘｡地點適中,離九龍法國醫院及浸會醫院只需十分钟車程｡附近生活條件豐富,鄰近5分鐘步程就有香港聞名的旺区通菜街(女人街)､西洋菜街(电器街)､洗衣街(波鞋街)､先達廣場､朗豪坊及多個潮流購物商場等｡附近更有很多各國餐厅､银行､找換店､便利店等生活設施,絕對是你来港尋求美食､觀光､娛樂及公幹的必須高性價比宾馆民宿｡另外,3分鐘可至中港巴士站､粵港通巴士站､機場巴士站､而且治安良好沒有閒雜人等,酒店內裝修精緻新穎整潔,令您住得安心舒適! ❤️Royal Hotel have 7 rooms and all they have the priviate bathroom. neighborhood_overview: ❤️Amazing location next to Mongkok MRT. You can go anywhere with convenience;8 minutes walk to MRT,neighborhood is full of famous tourist attractions and shopping areas such as ladies' Market(Tung Choi street),Electrical Street (Sai Yeung Choi Street),Sportwear Street(Fa Yuen Street)and many giant shopping malls.Also,there is many famous different restaurant,banks,shops and convenience stores within walking distance of the hostal making it a prime location to stay. 緊鄰旺角/太子地鐵站(三分鐘),出行十分方便｡周邊是香港著名的旅遊景點和購物熱點,女人街(通菜街)､電子街(西洋菜街)､波鞋街(花園街)還有很多的大型購物商場,例如新城市廣場,朗豪坊｡除此之外,還有很多很多不同的出名的餐廳､銀行､商店都可步行到達｡
notes: ❤️1.Please switch off the powers before leaving. 2.Smoking in anywhere inside the hotel can activate the fire extinguishing system and subject to a penalty of $1500 for this accidental activation of the system.  3.All the things in the room are belong to the hotel pls don't take away. 4.Please take care of your own personal belongings.  5.Please keep quiet and clean.  6. Check in :15:00pm     Check out: 12:00pm  If need to deposit your luggage pls contact with the host.  1.外出前請關閉所有電器(拔出房卡).  2.在走廊,部分房間嚴禁吸煙,如觸動消防系統,該住客會被罰款1500元｡  3.請照顧好個人財務｡ 4.店內所有用品均為本店所有,請勿帶走｡  5.請保持安靜和地方清潔｡  6.Check in :15:00pm  Check out: 12:00pm  若需要寄存行李可與房東協商
transit: ❤️地鐵路線: 1.地鐵九龍線旺角地鐵站A1出口(快富街)左邊向太子方向步行3分钟即可达｡  2.地鐵路線:地鐵九龍線旺角地鐵站A2出口往右手邊方向步行3分钟即可达｡  3.地鐵路線:地鐵九龍線太子地鐵站c1出口往右手邊方向步行3分钟即可达｡  機場路线:從機場乘巴士A21,E21及N21(通宵班次)-旺角維景酒店站下車(步行3分钟)｡ MTR: 1.Get out from Mongkok A1 exit (Fife street) turn left and go straight along Prince Edward.(3 minutes) 2.Get out from Mongkok A2 exit go straight along right side.(3 minutes) 3. Get out from Prince Edward C1 exit go straight along right side.(3 minutes) Airport line: Take the airport bus A21/E21/N21(24 hours) drop at Mongkok METROPARK HOTEL ,3 minutes walk to our apartment.
access: ❤️INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY  All bedding,cotton linen and fresh towels in room air conditioning  Unlimited high speed Wi-Fi Internet  Hairdryer available in the living room Shampoo and body lotion are provided in the bathroom.  Iron and water machine available in the corridor.  Adapter for charger is in the room. Toothbrush and toothpaste need to prepare by yourself.  所有床上用品､毛巾等都保證乾淨  無限制WIFi使用 電吹風在房間的抽屜裡  洗髮水和沐浴露在洗手間裡 插頭轉換器在房間裡 牙膏牙刷需要自己準備  You will received your own privacy in our apartment and will be able to come and go as you need to ,there are no curfews,only complete flexibility.  我們沒有門禁,您可自由出入｡出門時請隨身帶好房卡｡ Detail check in and check out fingerpost will send you after booking. 詳細的入住信息待您確認入住後會發送給你｡
interaction: ❤️SERVICE PROMISE  1. Cleanliness  2. Shower room and Toliets ､Bedroom will be deeply cleaned on your check-in date as well as on a weekly basis during your stay.  3. Communication All SMS will be replied within 30 minutes maximum,for urgent situation please call directly.  服務承諾 1.住户入住前保证房间干净整洁,所有床上用品已更换｡  2.浴室和洗手间,睡房都会在您入住前整理完毕｡  3.所有的资讯都会在三十分钟内得到回复｡
house_rules: -請好好愛惜公寓物品,保持房間清潔,如發現有公寓物品被損壞,損壞的成本將會由住客承擔｡ -請必須妥善保管自己的貴重財物,我們不會對遺失的財物負責及賠償｡ -我們希望每名住客都能有個舒適寧靜的睡眠環境,所以請住客於晚上10時後,盡量把聲浪降低｡ -請保管好匙卡,出門前拔出房卡,保持所有電器為關閉狀態｡

address.street: 旺角, 旺角, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 挺喜欢,估计下次也会直接订这家了
交通便利,出行便捷
我和朋友两个人找不到酒店位置,是房东来接我们的,然后告诉我们地铁站在哪边,离地铁站真的很近,房间也给我们换了个有窗户的,里面设施也很完善,真的很不错,如果下一次来,就还定这一家!
附近的交通很方便,房东也特别热情,我们早到还允许我们提前入住,并且热情地提供游览路线,超nice~
離車站真的很近~老闆老闆娘很貼心!!
位置很好找,也很繁华,房东人很好,中途因为更改日期麻烦了房东几次但房东态度都很友善,在香港这个寸土寸金的地方花这个价钱定到这个住宿特别满意,会推荐给来香港的朋友｡
环境不错,比较安静
一般
房东姐姐很好沟通､很周全~
真的很感谢房东为我们提供这么干净舒适的环境,我们入住四天,房东还为我们倒垃圾桶,以便于我们更加舒适的居住,总之这家酒店很值得入住,下次来香港一定还会过来这边住｡
從旺角A2出口出站三四分鐘就可以到酒店,非常方便,房間簡單乾淨住得舒適,下次來仲會去!
Good location and the host was very friendly.But the sound-proofing is not good.
真的超好的!房間裡物品很齊全!交通方便!總之棒!
房子很乾淨非常棒

The room is perfect location in Mong Kok. The airport bus stop is right in front of the apartment building. The room is small but has everything I need. Everything that I need is right downstairs - restaurants, massage, grocery store, etc. Unfortunately the room smells of mold, perhaps due to the fact that it has no windows.
房东人很好很耐心 虽然房间比想象中要小不过也还不错 就是潮味太大了 就算开空调和排风扇还是很大潮味 难闻 天花板有长霉 然后就是不要在里面洗衣服因为晾不干会馊掉 其他都挺好 很安静 离地铁和朗豪坊也很近 去哪里都方便 也很便宜 这个价格很不错了
環境整潔,離地鐵很近,房東友善,會幫忙不清楚的地方,但希望能提供有房可提早入住,或寄放行李的服務,以便旅行之人!
Host热情,地理位置优越,房间整洁安全｡不错的体验,下次需要会继续考虑｡

It's a very nice experience. The landlord is kind and (Website hidden by Airbnb) we oenjoy our trip ,thanks to you ,Royal .
The room is (Website hidden by Airbnb) is enough for us.

擁有良好的地點的房源,身處旺角市中心,離MRT走路不到5分鐘｡
離旺角有名的華欣和金華距離很近,要吃早餐都非常的方便｡
房源大樓出口有直達機場的公交站牌｡
附近有二間超市可以買到生活上所需的物品｡

但有些小缺點,房間有些小異味但不影響生活品質｡房源的隔音不是很好,有需要加強的必要｡
Ok
great
great
房間是滿乾淨的~~~但浴室太潮濕 地上都會一直濕濕的 算是美中不足吧~

Stayed here for 8d7n not very hard to find ... checking in was so convinient if you are hungry there is a restaurant nearby a lot of groceries nearby room was okay aside from the room not being sound proof 1 block away from nearest mtr station
Good value of money
在香港来说,地理位置很好,性价比很高｡一个人差不多了,两个人稍微有些挤了｡牙刷洗面奶护发素需要自备,但是转换器都有很贴心｡房子地理位置有些不好找,在马路对面被一个棚子盖住了,大家可以先找边上的小吃店｡
不错

Great location super close to 3 metro lines and in the real heart of the city. Room and bathroom are tiny but it's fine for one person or a young couple. a bit tricky to understand where the entrance is, so it helps having some street views to recognize it once you're there. Comfortable bed, clean sheets and towels, 2 pairs of slipper provided. Aircondition and ventilation work fine.
地理位置很好,不过有一些小缺陷就是隔音较差,还有建议不要在房间内挂湿衣服,比较难干
还不错
在老城区附近,吃喝玩乐都很方便｡
Value for money, easy to find according to the location given by host. Room abit small but still acceptable. Bedsheet abit dirty. There is noise in midnight, not sure what happen.
The location is great for travel. The room is abit small but worth the money since the hk land is small. The only problem is The room doesn’t sound proof
地点不错,旺角地铁站过去大概10分钟左右,性价比很高,附近女人街庙街这些都很近,中港通稍微远点,建议福田过来直接坐地铁,房屋一如既往的小,但是全香港旅店基本都这样,还是很推荐
装修不错 royal人很nice!
地理位置很便利,入住方便,就是房间很小,不过在香港应该也是正常,两个人有点挤,一个人刚刚好
位置很好,周围吃喝比较方便,离地铁公交站都很近,1-3分钟路程｡
挺好的 就是没有木梳
大家都是来香港旅游的,夜里两三点回来吹风机开最大声,声音也很大,房间隔音效果又不行,睡不好
房屋隔音不太好,屋里有些潮,里面有些味道,可能跟选的房间没有窗户有关｡因为潮湿墙纸脱落,并掉东西,房东及时叫人来修理了｡
性价比高,就这个价钱来说在香港算很便宜的了｡
很棒 推荐
能在五一期间订到这个位置和价位的房子,已经很开心啦,地段很好,买买买最适合啦｡原本以为金轮大厦四个大字会大大的写在整栋楼上,其实就是入口超级小的一牌子,大家还是提前看看地图比较好｡房东人很好,第一天晚上迷路了,他都有耐心告诉我怎么走｡有熨斗 我还熨了衣服｡最后一天是把行李寄存在那,晚上买完去取的~
还可以吧,就是还有没有很大,上下铺,下铺太矮了
香港这个地方寸土寸金 房间真的好小 其他的就还好
很好
地段很好!去购物和乘地铁都很方便!
房源的位置在旺角,地铁站出来没有多远｡房间在一栋大厦里,虽然有点窄,但是该有的都有了｡关键是步行到弥敦道,百老汇,女人街,朗豪坊都很近｡楼下有711,药店,麦当劳,小吃茶餐厅,虽然老旧了一点,但是性价比真的很高｡入住全自助的,很适合外出的年轻人,更自由｡入大厅门有密码,吹风机,充电板都有提供｡追求具有本身的推荐居住,毕竟寸土寸金

This was a great stay. Hong Kong is a crowded place so most homes are quite small. Everything was self check in and the room was like a hotel room. Right next to a shopping mall and near ladies street.
不错的
床上有只小蜘蛛,不过好像是死了的……除此还挺干净的……还有只小蟑螂,不过踩死了……虽然小但是这个价钱已经不错了
还行挺好的就是有点小
房间位置不错,在旺角地区,非常适合购物的朋友,房间整体还不错,就是偏小,香港的小酒店宾馆应该都是这样,总体来说住的还算舒心!
非常滿意的酒店 酒店出來 就有巴士可以到達機場 走幾分鐘就到旺角地鐵 走去太子zha站也蠻靠近 去shopping也靠近(剛好都是我要去的shopping)所以有機會再dao到香港 還是會選擇住這間
Cozy place, a bit noisy, good location.
房間不錯 房東也很迅速回覆
價格很實惠,靠近地鐵站出行非常方便,房間太小太小了,行李箱放下很難走路,床也有點小,被子也有點小,晚上好冷,因為房間很小沒窗戶,所以被子有點潮濕,房間走廊有監控,所以可以放行李箱很安全,總體來說是不錯的

We had to fight with several issues and we cannot recommend this place. First of all our booking was not found in their system and several international phone calls where required to receive a mail with the key code for the house and room. At the apartment we figured out they have sent the wrong code. The room was somehow as expected, but only cold water was available. The worst thing was a pipe ending in our bathroom filling our floor regularly with foreign water (perhaps from neighbor room). Since the room doesn’t had any window the entire room was always wet which also would explain the mold at the wall.
房间位置好 交通方便 就是比预期要小

1.很小,有点闷
2.热水不用的时候开关要关上冷却,否则你下次用的时候是冷水……
3.前台一般都没有人,通过Airbnb发消息联系
地方交通便利,但墙纸发霉,被单有污迹
Same as seen in photos, good for 2 persons. Great location, easily accessible via MTR.
一般吧,入住期间房间没有主动打扫过
房间地理位置很好 交通便利 不过真的很小很小 香港寸土寸金的地方可以理解 那一栋楼都是迷你小酒店 晚上洗澡热水很少 洗着洗着就冷了

name: SINGLE room (Furnished) KennedyTown (MTR ExitB)
summary: My place is good for HKU exchange students, interns, expatriates, solo adventurers, and business travelers for short-term or long-term stay.  Our building (walk-up i.e. no elevator) is conveniently located just 2-3 mins walking distance away from Kennedy Town MTR station Exit B meaning that just minutes (2~15 mins) away from HKU, Sai Ying Pun, Sheung Wan, Central (<10 mins), Admiralty, Wan Chai, Causeway Bay, Tsim Sha Tsui, etc..
space: The single room in a 5-bedroom shared flat (with shared laundry and simple kitchen facilities, shower room, toilet room, and roof terrace) is furnished with a loft bed with mattress and mattress cover only, a dresser, a desk with table lamp and a chair, power extension cord, an air-conditioner and a compact shoes cabinet.
description: My place is good for HKU exchange students, interns, expatriates, solo adventurers, and business travelers for short-term or long-term stay.  Our building (walk-up i.e. no elevator) is conveniently located just 2-3 mins walking distance away from Kennedy Town MTR station Exit B meaning that just minutes (2~15 mins) away from HKU, Sai Ying Pun, Sheung Wan, Central (<10 mins), Admiralty, Wan Chai, Causeway Bay, Tsim Sha Tsui, etc.. The single room in a 5-bedroom shared flat (with shared laundry and simple kitchen facilities, shower room, toilet room, and roof terrace) is furnished with a loft bed with mattress and mattress cover only, a dresser, a desk with table lamp and a chair, power extension cord, an air-conditioner and a compact shoes cabinet. 2-3 minutes away (walking distance) from the nearby MTR Station Exit B (Kennedy Town).
transit: 2-3 minutes away (walking distance) from the nearby MTR Station Exit B (Kennedy Town).
house_rules: - No visitor is allowed to stay overnight.   No visitor is allowed between 10pm to 8am.   Quiet time after 11pm. - No drugs - Keep the apartment clean - Be considerate when using the shared facility including open kitchen, pantry area, washer & dryer, bathroom, toilet room, roof terrace, etc.. - You are responsible to take out your trash to the gargabe collection bin outside the apartment on a daily basis to avoid unpleasant odors and insect problem. - Loss of room key / main door access card (if any) shall be subject to a charge of $500 per key / card.  You are not allowed to duplicate key / card.  If you lock yourself, you need to contact me to arrange opening door for you at a charge of $500 per incident. - You will be charged for electricity consumed inside your room at $1.45 per kWH which is measured by a separate meter specifically for your room. - $100 charge for check in after 6pm till 12 midnight - Details of the housing regulations can be provided upon request

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Apartment is very small but clean. Nice location and is very close to the MTR so it's convenient. However, I did have to pay a insurance fee to which he promised a refund before I move, which is ok. But the host is not replying to my emails asking about the refund so it's a bit troublesome.
Good place for 1/2 weeks stay. Nice neighborhood with so many good restaurants/bars, close to MTR. Also Raymond was good and helpful host.
would definitely go again. great place
Good place for solo travellers

name: Sao Bento Studio 1 A, Porto
summary: Great Studio in the center of Porto. Self check in with codes. Easy access to any location within or out of the city with Sao Bento Train station and Metro/Subway station just 3 minutes of walking distance.
space: Its a 30 square meter Studio, T0, with bed, sofa that can convert to bed, kitchenette and a bathroom with shower.
description: Great Studio in the center of Porto. Self check in with codes. Easy access to any location within or out of the city with Sao Bento Train station and Metro/Subway station just 3 minutes of walking distance. Its a 30 square meter Studio, T0, with bed, sofa that can convert to bed, kitchenette and a bathroom with shower. Full access. You can contact me through the Airbnb app if you need something i will try my best to help.  I won't be there in person. The best way to arrive from airport to the apartment is by using Metro. You go into Purple Line in direction to Aliados, when you reach Aliados you change to Yellow Line then you get out at Sao Bento. After leaving the Metro you are 350 meters from apartment which is located at Rua Cimo de Vila 9, Porto.
transit: The best way to arrive from airport to the apartment is by using Metro. You go into Purple Line in direction to Aliados, when you reach Aliados you change to Yellow Line then you get out at Sao Bento. After leaving the Metro you are 350 meters from apartment which is located at Rua Cimo de Vila 9, Porto.
access: Full access.
interaction: You can contact me through the Airbnb app if you need something i will try my best to help.  I won't be there in person.
house_rules: - Keep quiet after 23:00

host.host_about:
Hello everyone, 
my name is Quanjin Jin i am chinese, i have lived in Portugal for over 25 years and im planning to continue for many more.
Portugal is a amazing place to visit and live, people are friendly, the weather is great, theres a lot to see and experience.
What i like the most is when we are visiting a new place we like to taste the local dishes and if you haven't visited Portugal yet you will most likely love its food.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
A clean and brand new studio (was told I was the first one to stay there since refurbishment) located close to the Ribeira and not far from centre of town (no more than 10 mins walk).
Would stay there again if I go back to Porto

El apartamento está muy bien situado, al lado de la catedral y todo el casco antiguo. Nosotros hemos aparcado siempre en la puerta y los fines de semana no hay que pagar el parking. 
El apartamento es muy silencioso y cómodo. Es un tipo loft no muy grande pero para una pareja o una pareja con niños está bien. Es un primero sin ascensor.
Todo está muy limpio y muy nuevo. Las fotos hacen referencia a lo que se ve realmente. 
Si volvemos a Oporto sin duda repetiremos!!!!

I stayed alone in this studio but it would be also perfect for a couple. Enough space, small cooking area and bar table with 3 bar chairs. Great location as well. Communication 10/10
Comfortable bed with 4 pillows (!!!) like in hotels.
There is a water heater in the kitchen.
The location is great, nearby supermarket and station. The apartment feels like new and clean, comfortable. Check in and check out was easy.

Séjour très agréable dans cette appartement, très bien situé et très bien aménagé ! 
Je recommande vivement !
A casa bem decorada conforme as fotos e bem apetrechada com todos os utensílios de cozinha necessários. A localização é central servindo de um bom ponto de apoio para as nossas visitas no Porto.

Apartment was clean, new, and well equipped. The bed and futon are only separated by a curtain, but the bed was very comfortable! We didn't get a chance to try out the futon, but it looked brand new. The bathroom was small but new. Overall, our stay was great! Very central, very quiet, close to everything.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez quanjin! L appartement est très bien situé pour visiter porto , très propre, et confortable. Ce pourrait être agréable d avoir à disposition quelques trucs comme du sel , du poivre , une cafetière... et ce serait parfait! Merci

We had a great stay at Quanjin's place! When we came in the apartment had not been cleaned, but we communicated well with Quanjin and it was all sorted quickly. The centre of Porto is walkable, and the place is literally 3 minutes from Rua das Flores, super!
O apartamento fica perto de tudo. É  muito novo e tem o equipamento necessário para uma boa estadia. A cama é  muito boa e o ap silencioso. Indicaria para meus amigos com certeza!
Apto muito bem localizado, limpo equipado , e com excelente atendimento do Quanjin.Recpmendo.
We had a lovely stay, good location, very clean and comfortable and easy check in/check out.
The host is very nice and friendly! The apartment is really cool and have a good location in city centre. Thank you!

L'appartement est bien situé pour visiter à pieds la ville de Porto. Le logement est petit mais bien équipé et l'espace est optimisé. Le système de serrure connectée est très pratique. 
Nous recommandons!
非常好的住宿推荐,离圣本图火车站5分钟的步行距离,离路易斯一世大桥3分钟步行距离｡市内景点基本上都是步行到达｡ 公寓很干净也很安全,房东人特别好,因为是晚上8点的飞机,退房的那天他都让我们放行李,我们玩到4点多回来取行李坐地铁直接去机场｡ 非常推荐!
Great location, easy check-in and check-out. I would repeat without doubt.

We really enjoyed staying in Quanjin's flat. It is PERFECTLY located! Close to everything, easily accessible. It was perfect for our 4 days trip to Porto! Also we really liked the fact that it is situated on the first floor, so much easier when we arrived with all our heavy luggages! 
It is really nice and clean and had everything we needed. It has a small kitchen area, probably not suited for cooking extensive meals but that's not what we were there for, and it was perfect for storing and preparing breakfasts and snacks. 
Quanjin was very nice and super accessible before and during our stay and offered to help with any question we may have. 
I would definitely recommend this studio for anyone visiting Porto!
Genial localización y comodidad! Muy recomendable
Este piso es muy bueno, limpio y ordenado.
We had a great stay at Quanjin's place. Fantastic location, clean, and comfortable, quick and easy check in, and great communication from Quanjin. Definitely recommend, we would stay again.

The studio is in the middle of the city centre, clean and cozy.
Quanjin is a very good host, you can easily communicate with him quickly and efficiently.
Great apartment, very clean and modern. The location is absolutely perfect. I strongly recommend staying here!

Simply: perfect to stay in Porto.
Clean, close to everything and Quenjing was very friendly. 
Happy I chose that place.
We didn't meet Quanjin but he gave us a code for the apartment to enter. The apartment was very clean and central in porto. We really enjoyed the stay and will recommend the apartment.
Inmejorable. El apartamento es nuevo y está en la mejor zona de oporto. Sin duda, muy recomendable.

Casa céntrica, muy cómoda para desplazarse.
Con facilidad para aparcar. Fines de semana gratuito en zona azul.
Nos encontramos la casa con sábanas y toallas sucias y el piso sin limpiar.
Buena calidad de apartamento.
Volvería a alquilar el apartamento pensando que el incidente fue solo eso, un incidente aislado.
Great stay in Porto. All is close by and easy for walking. Public transport is less than 5 minutes walk. Would for sure stay here again. Communication also great.

Boa localização, próxima a estação de comboios e metro. Anfitrião prestativo, respondendo prontamente a mensagens e dificuldades. Sistema de check-in e checkout eficiente, com as informações necessárias disponibilizadas com antecedência suficiente.

Quanjin has quite a neat place! It's newly renovated, with a perfect amount of room, ample kitchen wares, and a great shower to boot! Location couldn't be better- it's around everything! I'd definitely stay there again
This apartment is good located. It's really close to all most interesting landmarks.
Very nice apartment right close to the heart of Porto. We really enjoyed our stay.
Super appartement. Très bien situé, très propre et propriétaire très avenant. Je recommande fortement!

Todo perfecto.
Cada tal como se muestra en las fotos.
Muy muy limpia.

Excellent communication. So easy to get to from the train station. Easy walk to the river and most sights. Very clean and comfortable!  Nice to be able to do laundry and hang it out to dry outside on a drying rack on the deck. We loved our stay there and would definitely recommend this place!!

위치가 동루이스 다리 근처라서  주요관광지로 이동하기에  
아주편한곳입니다
화장실은 조금 작은것이 흠이지만 대체로 만족한  숙소입니다
다른분들께도 권하고 싶은   좋은 숙소입니다
만족합니다
체크인을 늦게 했는데 비밀번호 눌러서 들어갈 수 있어서 좋았어요. 상벤투역이랑 가까워요.
Perfect. A great self-contained studio apartment in a very convenient position. It will be the first place I try to book when I return to Porto.
Great location in downtown Porto. Near so many places to see and explore. Very nice studio for a great price. Would definitely stay there again if I’m back in Porto.

Geweldige locatie in het centrum van Porto. Enkele probleempjes bij aankomst werden snel opgelost. Prima communicatie. Appartement erg privé mede door unique toegangscode. Centrum en openbaar vervoer op korte afstand. Veel horeca in de buurt; supermarktje aan de overkant. Uitstekende locatie en prima gastheer; van harte aanbevolen.
Great apartment for short stay. Owner was helpful with answers. Apartment was very clean and tidy.
I loved the locations. This flat was perfect for my stay and very reasonable. I would definitely stay again.

Quanjin의 집은 모든 곳을 걸어갈 수 있는 최적의 위치에 있습니다. 하지만 주택가에 있기 때문에 매우 조용합니다. 체크인은 비밀번호로 할 수 있기 때문에 호스트와 만날 일은 없습니다. 
숙소 청소가 안되어있는 문제가 발생해서 다소 기다리긴 했지만, Quanjin은 빠르게 문제를 해결해주었고 적극적으로 커뮤니케이션을 해주었습니다. 매우 친절한 호스트입니다.

Recomendo a todos, tudo muito novo e arrumado, cama muito boa, localização perfeita perto de tudo, metro, comboio, pontos turísticos. Voltaria com toda certeza!
Muito obrigado

Nice and modern studio, in an excellent location, next to the train/metro station and very close to the turistic sights. Very easy and fast self check in-out. Fully furnished studio with all the kitchen equipment if you´re planning to eat in. Comfy bed, hot shower, great value for the money. Super fast and easy communication with the owner. The only problem was, that it was quite cold. Staying in december we couldn´t warm up, the heater was on, but not giving much heat.

Quanjin's apartment is a really good option due to its quality and location (very nearby of São Bento's train and metro station and Av. dos Aliados). Quanjin was a very great host, always available. We've had a problem with the automatic check in system, but Quanjin quickly got other solution and solved the problem later. No worries at all. Short version: the host and the apartment added value to our experience at Porto. Just one note: although it was revealed quiet, the block it's not prety and we only realized it when we've arrived.
O espaço é agradável, bem localizado, muito limpo. Perfeita relação custo-benefício.

Studio refait à neuf très bien situé près de la gare dans un immeuble très calme, bien agencé avec une literie excellente et toute neuve.
Bonne communication avec Quanjin
On reviendra sans problème
Tivemos uma boa estadia. Espaço agradável para passar uns dias no centro do Porto

The flat is really great quality and comfortable. It's easy to access from the airport and close to the old town, which is a very touristic place if that's what you're into.
Quanjin is a really helpful and discreet host.

L'appartement est vraiment agréable. Sa situation géographique idéale : petits commerces de dépannage en bas, restaurant à 5 min (je recommande d'aller à Batalha à 5 min de l'appart, quand on arrive le temps de prendre ses marques, il y a plein de petits resto sympa qui font à emporter aussi) , métro également à 300m). Le système d'ouverture par code est top (pas besoin d'avoir RV avec l'hôte, ni à l arrivée ce qui est pratique quand on arrive tard comme nous,  ni au départ et pas de stress de perdre les clés) . Il est également très calme, au 1er étage, il ne donne pas sur la rue (vue sur des toits des habitations voisines..) la déco est sympa, la literie impeccable, la propreté irréprochable, les serviettes fournies, les équipements pour manger sont ok (mais attention pas de sel sucre , trucs de base non fourni) , le wi-fi fonctionne nickel. Le seul mini bémol est le chauffage un peu léger en hiver. J'y retournerai volontiers (mais pas en hiver). Un très bon plan.

I had a great time in Porto staying here. It’s conveniently located just a short walk away from lots of restaurants, shops, and landmarks. The check-in was super easy and the stay was very comfortable!

The Apartment is in the very center of Porto, you need 2 minutes by foot to Sao Bento(metro, bus, train). Also there are 2 Supermarkets around 5 minutes away. Overall you get a nice 1 room apartment plus a bath. The host is very helpful and replied in minutes.

Thanks for the good time, Quanjin.
Remek elhelyezkedés, tiszta és praktikus szálláshely.
집이 조금 추웠지만 샹벤투역 근처에 있고 방이 넓어서 좋았습니다.

Quanjin's bnb has everything needed for a short stay in Porto. Easy accesses with the codes, it's quiet, clean and the beds are super confortable. Real close to train station & metro bolhao. Quanjin responds quickly and efficiently. Thanks Quanjin!

Não poderíamos ter ficado em um espaço melhor. Muito perto dos pontos turísticos principais. Fizemos todos os passeios a pé. Bem próximo da Estação de comboios São Bento. Excelente para quem quer ir a Guimarães, Aveiro, Braga, Coimbra e Lisboa. O metrô também é bem perto. O espaço é muito limpo, organizado e silencioso. Voltando a Porto, certamente ficaríamos lá de novo.
Appartment is plenty spacious for 2 and is just as beautiful in person as in photos. Super well located at walking distance of everything!

Stay at Quanjin's apartment was great. The place has a great location, just a couple of minutes from Sao Bento train station and Ponte de Dom Luis I, and at the same time, it is quiet and cozy, clean and spacious. Small shops and food places all around. Highly recommend.

This place is exactly the same as photos, even bigger than I expected, WiFi is fast, shower is hot enough, self check in way is super convenient! The location is fantastic, so close to all the spots that we didnt really need to take any transportation to explore the city. 

P.s we would only suggest the place to add a bigger mirror that we can see the whole outfit. ;) 

Thanks Quanjin for providing such a good flat for us travelers.

Great location (only 5 min. walk from the central station, close to all touristic attractions). It has all you need for a short city trip (blankets, towels, small kitchen with a fridge, wi-fi, hot shower). Very comfortable acces via acces codes, no need to worry about picking up and giving back the key or loosing it. Ideal if you want to walk around and don't need a car. Woud come again.
We’re good place &  close to everything.
호텔 처럼 깨끗하고 상벤투 역과도 가까워요 강추합니다
Perfect location, clean and access to get in is easy. I definitely recommend staying here.
Great place in great location. Cosy and clean, close to the train station and city centre. Had everything we needed and Quanjin was a great host and easy to communicate with.

This location was wonderful- it was quiet, neat, and within walking distance of everything. We really appreciated how easy it was to communicate with our host and how thoughtfully the room was prepared for us. It was a wonderful place to stay during our trip!
Apartamento recomendable y ubicación inmejorable
everything was fine. checkin with the number lock is perfect. pretty clean and a neat rool in the heart of porto. would book again...
kleines aber sehr feines Einzimmerappartement mit überragender Lage zum erkunden der Stadt.Supermarkt gegenüber, sehr saubere und gute Ausstattung!!

We had a great stay at Quanjin’s place. Our flight arrived much earlier than check in time and he allowed us to drop off our bags while our room was being cleaned. Quick communication with host. Very good location to all areas while still being quiet. Would recommend people visiting Porto to stay here

We spent a very nice week in Porto thanks to this appartement. It’s very well located and a confortable place. 
I recommand this appartement for a trip in Porto.

Quanjin’s place was very clean and in super convenient location, very close to transportation and all the main sites were walking distance. 
Check in was very easy. 
The room is on the first floor, and the first apartment you reach when you go up the stairs, so after a day of traveling up and down the hills of Porto, you don't have to climb any further when you get home.  
The place was much larger than the pictures but still cosy. Definitely a lot of room for 2 people. 
Highly recommend this home!
Great location, close to everything. Nice accommodation. Quanjin is quick to respond to any questions. Check-In was very easy.   Would definately recommend.
The place was great, very nice and very clean. Loved the location, it was so close to everything we wanted to do! I definitely recommend this place.

Absolutely great value for the location!. Close to everything! With the windows open it’s bright & was super clean. Bed was comfy. Soap for washing machine would be a good addition. Would recommend for solo or couple for sure!
lovely appartment, very easily accessible to metro and within walking distance of all tourist attractions.  bed comfortable and very comfortable pillows which is paramount  in my view.

Quanjin's place is really well situated and an open loft style place with original exposed granite wall. Everthing you need is in the apartment including a washing machine which we appreciated after a week in Portugal. Very clean and close to everything and very quiet depite its central location. 

There's also a convenience store right across the street that sells delicious spicy home made samosas for one euro;)

Would definitely stay here again.
Nice location. Nice place.
We had pleasant holidays at Quanjin flat. We recommand .

name: CBD 2 Rooms Midlevel HKIsland
summary: Mid-level Central Great For business  Caine Road Near SOHO
description: Mid-level Central Great For business  Caine Road Near SOHO
