reviews.comments: 我全部给了五分,没有到住处之前,房东早早的就在等候,热情的房东!这个房间很大,在香港住过很多次了,这次非常满意,在香港住这么干净这么大的房间是很舒服的｡下次还会来｡
The host canceled this reservation 49 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
good
Great location in Soho!
Zen的房間非常舒適,適合一家人居住~雖然在半山,但可以坐半山扶梯到達｡Zen也很熱心的解答問題｡推薦入住
Very nice location n good place n a very cooperative host . Thanks for the lovely stay
The apartment was small and well located. Clean and tidy - a good bolt hole to explore HK from
房间挺好,空间算大,挺干净,房东人很好,出去交通也方便
very good place!

房屋的大小非常适合一家人住,能做饭,但是缺乏电饭煲,如果多一张餐桌就更居家了｡卫生间很小,但是热水器的喷头出水足,洗澡很舒服｡
房屋的位置在中环半山,非常靠近香港种植物公园,旁边就是孙中山纪念馆,距离中环地铁不远,但是垂直高度差超过100米｡出行一定要找到半山自动扶梯,否则拖着行李箱登山的体验就不完美了｡
附近外国人多,酒吧多,网红景点多,值得慢慢品味和搜寻｡

name: Cozy w/ Yard & Walking Distance to Waikiki - BROC
summary: Cozy apartment offering home-style living near all the fun Waikiki has to offer. Very close to shopping, food and beaches. Unit is a short walk from the famous Rainbows Drive-inn for the authentic local food experience. Family friendly unit in a family friendly location.
space: Unit is very close to everything you'd want from Waikiki with the quiet you'd get outside of it. Full-size kitchen with gas stove and cookware included. Sofa bed in the living room is perfect for additional guests and kids.  Yard is available for outside enjoyment as well.
description: Cozy apartment offering home-style living near all the fun Waikiki has to offer. Very close to shopping, food and beaches. Unit is a short walk from the famous Rainbows Drive-inn for the authentic local food experience. Family friendly unit in a family friendly location. Unit is very close to everything you'd want from Waikiki with the quiet you'd get outside of it. Full-size kitchen with gas stove and cookware included. Sofa bed in the living room is perfect for additional guests and kids.  Yard is available for outside enjoyment as well. Unlimited Wi-fi Internet.  Full kitchen with cookware. This apartment has comfort of home with the fun of Waikiki.  Beaches, boats, surfing, canoe surfing, biking, skating, food, drinks, diners, restaurants & a whole lot more just a 15min stroll away. Walking, bike, moped, bus, Uber, Lyft & Taxi This property has multiple Airbnb units side-by-side. Ask about the option to rent multiple units for a great family getaway!!!
neighborhood_overview: This apartment has comfort of home with the fun of Waikiki.  Beaches, boats, surfing, canoe surfing, biking, skating, food, drinks, diners, restaurants & a whole lot more just a 15min stroll away.
notes: This property has multiple Airbnb units side-by-side. Ask about the option to rent multiple units for a great family getaway!!!
transit: Walking, bike, moped, bus, Uber, Lyft & Taxi
access: Unlimited Wi-fi Internet.  Full kitchen with cookware.
house_rules: 1. Quiet hours are from 10pm-8am.  2. No more than 5 people allowed.  3. NO SMOKING anywhere onsite. Smoking only allowed 20ft off property line.  4. No drugs. 5. No parties. 6. No hanging any clothing on landing railings. Clothes lines provided behind unit. 7.  Please lock all bikes and mopeds to metal gate between buildings.

host.host_about: Realtor and Property Manager.  Always interested to hear how I can make your experience better.  Safe travels.

reviews.comments: Clean and adorable, loved it!! Small and perfect for us!!! Claude gets right back to you if you have questions!  Would definitely stay again.
Excellent small apartment.

My family and I went to Hawaii for a quick trip and had the opportunity to stay the night at Claude's place and it was very nice. We had a bumpy start but Claude was very quick to respond and resolve the issue. I really cannot wait to come back and stay again. Thank you for letting us stay there.

I loved this place,its perfect and the value it's awesome! 
I will be coming back for sure

Thank you for allowing me to stay in your home. I really enjoyed my stay. Your home was very comfortable and offered everything and more that I needed. Conveniently close to all attraction and main freeway.The entire layout of your home was perfect. Parking, check in and check out had very easy instructions. When and if I return, I will definitely stay in your home again. I definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay in Honolulu. Thank you.

We stayed here for a week and had a lovely time with no problems. The apartment was comfortable and had everything we needed. Not knowing the area we were pleasantly surprised at how many restaurants were nearby and how easy it was to access Waikiki on foot.
This was a cute, cozy, and modern apartment! We loved the decor and were very comfortable. Claude responded almost immediately to any questions we had and was a fantastic host.

Claude's place has an excellent location. You're within walking distance (15-20 min) to Waikiki beach, which is great as you can leave your car rental at the place. The parking spot was great too- never having to worry about finding parking is a luxury. The place itself was a good size for 2- would be really tight for 4. The bed was fairly comfortable, decor was warming and tasteful, and the kitchen amenities are minimal but you can definitely prep meals and cook. There is oil, pepper, salt -- nice not having to purchase those types of things. There were also 2 beach towels which is amazing. 

Claude was a really good host - there were admittedly a few minor hiccups in our first couple nights, but Claude was very quick to respond (literally within an hour) and on top of it! I would recommend staying at his place if visiting Oahu, it's a great spot to make trips out to various beaches along the coast and offers a comfortable and safe stay!

Great location! Easy to walk to Waikiki beach, close to diamond head. Clean, cute apartment. The shower is small, think European size. There are basic kitchen supplies and utensils. We had an issue with the fridge, but Claude had it fixed quickly. Would stay here again!

This one bedroom apartment was perfect for my mom and I for six days in Oahu. The location was just near Waikiki, had free parking, great air conditioning, easy check-in/checkout, and very cleanly. Definitely would recommend!

Good stay in July 2017. It's more like a 30-40 minute walk to Waikiki - the good part of the beach and strip. 20 min walk to the sheltered baby area. Amenities like shampoo/conditioner amd dish soap were good, but missing things like kleenex and laundry soap. I feel laundry soap shoukd be provided especially wheb only one kitchen cloth was provided and we stayed for 7 days. At checkin  we didn't know where to park the car. The checkin instructions just had entry instructions and wifi pass. Literally nothing else, so our 11pm checkin wasn't awesome. Had to wake up the Host.  I wouldn't reccomend this place for more than 2 people. It's too small for more. Perfect for 2 though. The bathroom door is more like like a closet door, it's a sliding for with not much noise protection. May bother some shy people. Also a very tiny bathroom so if you're a heavy person you'll have trouble getting in and it of shower and up off the toilet. Air conditioning was good. Two units. However it's useless when cooking.  the oven/stove throws so much heat it's instantly 90 degrees in the living room. But we enjoyed our stay overall and I'd recommend staying here.
Our family of four had a great stay in Claude's listing! All household necessities were provided, parking was convenient, and the unit itself is adorable and comfortable. Would definitely recommend!

My girlfriend and I really enjoyed this spot. It was a perfect place for just the 2 of us. Clause was very quick to respond to any questions we had. Parking was a plus because we had the whole driveway to ourselves. Claude provided everything you would need for a getaway like towels, beach towels, hair dryer, iron, shampoo/conditioner and body wash. We didn't plan on cooking at our Airbnb but there were a handful of popular local restaurants that were walking distance like Side Street Inn and Uncle Bo's which was a plus and also Waikiki was less than a 5 minute drive. The place was also very clean and furniture was up to date. The A/C definitely came in handy and I would definitely recommend staying here if you're looking for a place near Waikiki.
Loved Claude's place! Very nice location for what we were looking to do and check in and check out was easy.

Claude's place was excellent. It was cozy but our basic needs were met rather comfortably. The parking spot right outsude of the place and the washer dryer behind the unit made our experience even more delightful. You can't beat the location of this property, only 10 mins walk to Waikiki beach and right in the vicinity of great food scene, yet calm and secluded.  Claude was curtious and responsive. Property was better than described.

This is a quaint, clean, easily-accessed hideaway well worth it's price.  It is close to the freeway entrances for driving purposes and yet offers full amenities for walkers too, including the ocean, the zoo, the natatorium, the Ala Wai, and ample eateries.  Claude is quick to respond to questions and very friendly overall.
Great location in a quiet neighborhood.This place is close to Waikiki Beach and Diamond Head.Lots of places to eat near by. The free parking was a bonus.Would recommend this place.
Great place, central to a lot of attractions. Easy communication with the host.
Great host. Took time to help my boys. Thanks

Claude's home was very simple and cozy. It was just the right amount of space for my boyfriend and I and provided all the necessities we needed and for such a great value also! It was also very central between a lot of beaches and spots we wanted to check out and a lot of food spots as well. If you're looking for a simple little place to relax in this is the perfect spot.

Staying here made our stay! First off, check in was a breeze ! My boyfriend and I walked into a super cute, very clean and pristine little place with the ac already on and blasting for us ! I previously lived on the the island close to Claude's residence and I can tell you that it is top of the line ! Guaranteed you will not find anything better for the price, cleanliness, amenities and location. Yes, the bathroom is a little small but it gets the job done. You shouldn't come all the way to Hawaii to hangout in a bathroom anyways. Now if you rented a car you have a prime parking spot (AMEN) which saves you not only a headache but money as well (parking in Waikiki can be stressful and expensive). Parking is key people !!!! The residence is tucked away towards the back of he units, we didn't run into any of our neighbors nor did we hear them either. You have a great kitchen with plenty of utensils but I would check in first and then hit the Safeway that is conveniently located down the street (in case you need something not provided). The TV with the Roku was a super nice extra to have. After being in the sun all day, put your feet up, blast that AC and turn on the Hulu and you're in for a relaxing evening. Unless, you were looking to take a short walk to Waikiki to hit the restaurants and bars (which is also what we did frequently). Coffee was provided but there is a Starbucks around the corner too if you want that instead ! Also, provided for us was detergent for the washer and dryer. Such a nice touch we felt so spoiled. I thanked Claude after check in and reached out to him at check out and always got a quick response. There were zero issues to report to him so we didn't get to chat as much but really isn't that a good thing while your on vacay? A nice, reliable place to stay? I'm gonna be sad if I forget anything but this is already long enough! Claude thank you again! This is our new go to spot to stay on the island, we appreciated our stay and host so much !

This was a small place but in an excellent location to get to Waikiki Beach and all the things to do in Honolulu. We used the bus and walked so did not need a car. Also tours will pick you up at nearby hotels or at the beach. It was clean and Claude responded immediately  to our few requests.
Claude was very nice. He responded very fast and considerable. His place is close to Waikiki beach and some restaurants. Clean and convenient.

This home away from home was the right size for my small family and the few days we were there. The house is all the way to the end of the second building. It’s very private and very quiet. The house was very clean and it’s so bright and airy. There were more than enough towels provided as well as blankets. If you do have a car try to park as close as you can to the wood fence, so you don’t block the way of the other tenants. We were walking distance from the beach and the zoo. There is also the famous rainbow diner just down the street. It’s true that location is key. This was an amazing home to stay in and wouldn’t mind staying here again.

Awesome small pad. Perfect for Hawaii. I don’t spend much time at the places I book since I like being out and about but this place gave a comfy cool vibe for when I changed my mind and decided to chill.

Great location: walked to Diamond Head, Waikiki, and multiple restaurants along Kapahulu. Well-decorated & clean little suite, perfect for 2 guests. We made use of amenities such as the coffee machine, well-stocked condiments, and dishes.

We really enjoyed our stay here. It was so nice and breezy and cool that we didn't even have to use our a.c. it was so nice to have a parking stall and a kitchen. The bed sheets and pillows were super soft and the bed was comfy. The only complaint was that the couch bed was super hard ( maybe could use a topper?) But other than that, this place is ideal!

徒歩圏内に好きなﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやﾄﾞﾗｲﾌﾞｲﾝ､ｶﾋﾟｵﾗﾆ公園やﾘｶｰｼｮｯﾌﾟもありとても便利でした｡
また目の前のﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞがありがたかったです!
次回は長期で滞在したいです｡
ありがとうございました!
Thanks for sharing your space with us. It was the perfect honeymoon bungalow!

The apartment was cozy and lovely on the inside. It was not a looker from the outside, however. The neighborhood was a bit sketchy and I was surprised to see two homeless people sleeping on the street quite near to the unit. Claude was very communicative and responsive. He was a great host. The lock box made our arrival and departure very easy.
Great communication, clean place, close to rainbow drive in!

Very cosy one bedroom apartment. Perfect for 2-3 guests.  Walking distant to the beach and many restaurants.  Nice to have your own private parking when you’re in hawaii.  Good thing there’s a washer and dryer. The only downside is that the restroom is tiny.  Our host Claude is great in responding to any questions we had.  Overall we enjoyed our stayed here and it was our first time doing air BnB.  Highly recommend.

This place did the trick. Small but efficient with AC. We were walking distance from a lot of food options and a short driving distance from some great vegan options, parks, about a two mile walk from Waikiki. Claude was very responsive to my questions. I would definitely stay here again.

Claude’s house was beautiful! 8minute walk to Waikiki beach, useful amenities, easy and simple check in and check out. Close to bus stops, food places and the main area of Waikiki without the hussle and bustle of being in the centre. Would stay there again! Thank you.

With a young infant and preschooler in tow, this place worked perfectly for our little family!  Super accessible to the bus line and a reasonable walk to the beach/Waikiki.  We also rented a car for several days and appreciated the parking space.  The kitchen was conveniently stocked.  The close proximity to Rainbow Drive-In (with Shimazu shave ice around the corner) and Leonard’s were a nice treat! 

Be careful not to overload the washer and dryer- even after varying our laundry load several times, the washer would rumble against the wall during the final spin cycle, and we resorted to hang drying even after a small load being put in the dryer for over an hour.

Claude was super responsive with all questions and requests.  If you are laidback travelers, we would definitely recommend his place!

After a long flight, it was great how easy it was to park in the designated parking space, follow the directions to the unit and let ourselves in. It was a hot day so the Brita with cold water  was much appreciated.

A great base of operations for a truly special visit to Oahu.  Clean, secure, great natural light, with a parking spot! (A great boon if you plan on renting a car and visiting other parts of the island). 
Located away from the craze of Waikiki but still a 15-minute walk to the beach.  I really enjoyed the location which was close to great food (Tonkatsu Tamafuji [1.5 blocks - best Katsu], Sunrise [2 Blocks - great miso and udon], Hawaii Sushi [15 minute walk & affordable], Sweet E [Amazing breakfast - 5 minute drive], Nanding's Bakery [1.5 blocks]), a market for provisions, and accessible to the highway for easy access to Oahu. 
Craterhead Hike is close and gives great views of Honolulu and the rest of the island. We really enjoyed taking day trips around the island and coming back for great food and leisurely strolls to the beach.

We had a very comfortable stay in this clean apartment. Highlights are: ceiling fans, off street parking, washer/dryer, and proximity to Waikiki. Claude responded quickly to messages, supplying extra sheets.

I stayed 4 nights at Claude's place. It is cozy and has all the amenities one would need, especially parking!! You can easily walk to Waikiki, about 20 mins, drive 5-10 mins, or Uber. The neighborhood is quiet and is a great location to explore the island, close to the freeway, close to Waikiki, close to Diamond Head. You can also walk to some nice local restaurants: Sunrise (Okinawan), Rainbow Drive In, Tonkatsu Tamafuji (Pork Katsu), Tokkuri Tei (Sushi & Tapas), Da Cove Health Food, the list goes on. This is fantastic little place in a fantastic location. Claude is a great host and was super quick responding to my questions, Mahalo Claude!
Great location! Claude was very responsive!

This is a great place to stay.   It’s a great location and easy walking to distance Waikiki and Kapiolani part.

It’s clean and has good amenities.  Claude is very helpful and response quickly.  I recommend staying at Claude’s place.
The place is reale cute. Perfect location for all things to do in Honolulu. We can highly recogment the place. Everything worked out perfect for us.
We loved this cozy home. Quaint and has everything you need. Claude was very responsive and helpful throughout the trip. Would return!
It is a great location.  Very small...
Great location close to food and beach. Would recommend for 2-3 people max.
It’s really nice
Great place to stay! Claude responds very quickly and fixes any issues you have right away. About 10-15 min walk away from the Main Street. Lots of amenities. Good for people not staying home a lot!

The place is just OK. I don’t recommend it for 4 people specially if traveling with friends. Pictures were accurate. Bedsheets and kitchen utensils were dirty. No barbecue nor cooler. Though it has a lot of beach stuff available. We found to cosckroach on different days.
Very quiet and very well located. Beautiful 10 minute walk to Waikiki. View of Diamond Head crater outside. Host is very responsive to requests for assistance. Will be back!
Cozy spot with a great location.
Great place if you need to be central without being in the city.
Claude’s place is great! Check in, parking and facilities were all as described and very easy to deal with. We would absolutely stay at Claude’s place again during a future trip to Honolulu!

Claude's place was great!  We really enjoyed our stay.  The power went out twice, maybe for having too many things plugged in at once, but we were able to find the breaker on the outside of the house.
The unit is located in a good location close to shops and restaurants.

This place is a little small but a great place to stay if you have 2-3 adults. It was really clean & loved the 2 A/C Window Units & Parking Spot for our Unit C. Had the necessities of a Fridge, Microwave, Stove & Coffee Maker. My Wife & I would love to stay here again.

In general, this is a good value considering the price and location. The internet was slow, and the dishes could have been cleaner. But we might care more about that than others because we were working from home for the week. The bathroom was small, but you can see that in the pictures. The AC was good. The location is as advertised—you can walk to Waikiki. The host was also responsive. I imagine this AirBnB is good option in its price range.

Claude was a great host and the place was very cute and cozy! I think 4 people are allowed to stay, but would only recommend 3. Location is prefect with everything you need nearby. Not far from Waikiki beach and diamond head. Check-in was simple and parking is provided, which is a plus for the area. Would stay here again.

Claude was very accommodating and communicative. Place was as advertised. Only snafu was parking. We parked in the most inner spot as directed but one morning as we were heading out we found another car was blocking us in the drive way. Had to wake up the neighbors to find out who the owner was and ask them to move the vehicle. Hair dryer also blows the fuse in the bedroom, but other than that, no issues. I left a cable at the house after check out and Claude was super helpful in helping me get it back.

Claude’s place was perfect for my family of 4 (wife, 2 children). 

We spent most of the time out and this unit is located close to area attractions. 

It offered everything we needed and Claude was very responsive during check in. 

We would stay here again.

We stayed at Claude’s place for 8 fun days. Place was very small but cozy. Perfect for a couple or if you have small children. We had an almost 2 yr old with us and she had enough space for herself to run around. Bathroom was smaller than I expected and the shower was even smaller than that lol. But nevertheless for how close we were to everything it’s a great value. Reminded me of a the show tiny home. There was a parking slot right in the driveway in front of the place but it was sort of annoying cause someone was always “visiting” people in the front units that a car was always there. They had no issues moving at all every time but when you have a toddler asleep and just wanna get them inside it gets tedious after the first couple of times. Very basic inside no table to sit and eat at but we didn’t mind as we didn’t eat much there anyway. We did have an issue with some people next door they came in yelling and loud around 11:30 pm I messaged Claude that night and woke up to him letting me know it was taken care of and apologized which was great. Don’t know if I could’ve dealt with them for multiple days next door. Overall I’d def stay here again, the value is there for how close you are to everything around town
Very convenient location to go to Ala Wai golf course, Diamond Head, local foods, and grocery shopping.

Great location, very clean, loved cooking breakfast every morning, but not a private parking spot and the power goes out if you have more than two things plugged in. Our neighbors got robbed and spooked us a little bit overall a good first air BNB experience

最悪
二度と借りません!

予約をして…説明文､写真が来ましたが…
道路入り口のﾍﾟｲﾝﾄは茶色 実際は 青でした｡
その為 かなりの時間迷いました｡

専用ｹﾞｰﾄに続く庭は いつも誰かが入られた形跡が有り大変怖かった｡

毎日 椅子やﾃｰﾌﾞﾙが移動し､ｹﾞｰﾄも開いていて 芝が刈られた時も有りました｡

専用の駐車場は 毎日 色々な方､また後ﾎｽﾄの方だと思いますが自身でﾘﾌｫｰﾑして毎日駐車場を占領されて気分悪かった｡

あのｱﾊﾟｰﾄは ﾎｽﾄさんのｱﾊﾟｰﾄだと思いますが 他の人が断りもなく使われていたのも理解出来ません｡
恐らくﾎｽﾄの方も見て見ぬふり｡

朝夜関係無くﾘﾌｫｰﾑしていましたので
騒音も出てました｡

また､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑと記載有りましたので借りましたが ｸﾘｰﾆﾝｸﾞしていない狭くて汚いｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑだったので驚きました｡
身体を拭いていると 洗面台に身体が当たり
毎日青ﾀﾝ出来ました｡

また､ﾊﾞｽﾏｯﾄ､ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙもﾌｪｰｽﾀｵﾙも
雑巾の様な色合いに変色した穴空きでしたので 驚きでした｡

匂いも 古びた匂いで 気持ち悪かった｡
ｼｰﾂ､枕ｶﾊﾞｰも年配者の頭皮の匂いがしていました｡

ﾃﾚﾋﾞもｽｲｯﾁを押しても観れず
ﾎｽﾄにﾒｯｾｰｼﾞを入れましたが
 ﾏｲｺｰﾄﾞが無いと観れ無い｡との返答が来ました｡
おかしな話です｡
普通電源を押せばTVは見れますが
ﾎｽﾄにﾒｯｾｰｼﾞを入れても
見れる様にはしてくれずｺｰﾄﾞﾅﾝﾊﾞｰは
教えられないし ﾅﾝﾊﾞｰを持っていないのか?とも言われてしまいました｡

20回ﾊﾜｲに来てますが
TVを観れ無いのは始めてでした｡

ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞも 有りません｡

柔らかいﾏｯﾄﾚｽが三段になっていただけで 腰痛になり 1番下のﾏｯﾄﾚｽは汚れ防止か
ﾋﾞﾆｰﾙにおおわれて蒸れてﾀﾞﾆが発生しているのか寝ていて痒みが出て また､柔らかいﾏｯﾄﾚｽの重ねが原因で痛み止めを飲み湿布をしての滞在で帰国してから病院に通っています｡

Wi-Fiも充電するｹｰﾌﾞﾙもどこに有るのか結局教えてもらえず探すのに3日かかりました｡
仕方ないのでTVに繋がってますｹｰﾌﾞﾙを抜いて使いました｡

それも教えてもらえませんでした｡

24時間乾燥機が部屋の裏で回っていて
大変煩く 寝室の窓ｶﾞﾗｽも一枚無く 毎晩寝る際は紙のｶｰﾃﾝが風で煩かった(><)｡
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの住人の深夜2時の大喧嘩や 喋り声に  ﾘﾌｫｰﾑの騒音も 夜まで有りました｡
記載事項と違い過ぎます｡

ｷｯﾁﾝには 油､塩ｺｼｮｳが有ると事前に記載事項を読みましたが…
全部有りません｡
換気扇も無いなら記載するべきです｡
ﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰ出来る様な記載が有りましたが…ﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰ用の器具も無かったです｡
切れない包丁に 汚いｵｰﾌﾞﾝ
茶渋の付いた ｶｯﾌﾟ



･ｺﾞﾐ捨て場の説明も無く
･洗濯機の説明も場所も記載無く
全てにおいて 部屋には記載事項がｾﾞﾛでした｡


こんなのは 日本でも海外でも始めてです｡

記載事項嘘ばかり｡
これなら 他のﾎｽﾄの部屋をかりるべきでした｡

ｼｮｯｸばかりです｡

こちらのﾎｽﾄは 沢山似た様な部屋を貸している様です｡
(似た様な 部屋で こちらのﾎｽﾄの名前が有りましたから)

良いｺﾒﾝﾄが沢山有りましたので
借りましたが…私は今後絶対借りたく無いです｡

部屋もﾎｽﾄの態度も意地悪で 横柄で
二度と借りません!

最悪な日々でした｡
皆さん慎重に｡
Overall very nice place. It is a fairly short walk to the Waikiki strip.

The apartment looks better on the fotos. Then in reality. 

Walking distance to the closest beach is more than 15 minutes.

 One window could not be entirely closed in the sleeping room. We had strong wind during our stay and the shades bang against the windows so that we had to leave them up, with day light coming in from early in the morning.

I enjoyed staying at your airbnb. it was cozy and comfortable. The location was perfect for for me and the internet was fast. Parking made my stay all the better, not having to worry If there was going to be parking for my return. The price was too good for what was offered. I definitely would refer other airbnb clients to your place.

name: Magical Hobbit Loft
summary: Our magical hobbit loft is the perfect place for writing your first novel. This tiny-house style space is cozy, bright and peaceful—a little piece of heaven in Montreal's French Plateau!  The kitchen is compact and fully equipped with a small electric range, mini-fridge and sink.  The bathroom is spa-like with natural products, exposed brick and dried flowers.  Enjoy climbing up to sleep on the mezzanine bed and waking up as sun pours in from the skylight. The hobbit would be happy here.
space: Nestled in the back of a century old family home in Le Plateau Mont-Royal, this custom loft is located minutes away from the classic Montréal street, Duluth, on a small alley back street in this popular neighbourhood. The small, sunny space overlooks serene tree and vine filled backyards of local residents and is ideal for anyone hoping to explore the city with a comfortable, peaceful space to retire in.
description: Our magical hobbit loft is the perfect place for writing your first novel. This tiny-house style space is cozy, bright and peaceful—a little piece of heaven in Montreal's French Plateau!  The kitchen is compact and fully equipped with a small electric range, mini-fridge and sink.  The bathroom is spa-like with natural products, exposed brick and dried flowers.  Enjoy climbing up to sleep on the mezzanine bed and waking up as sun pours in from the skylight. The hobbit would be happy here. Nestled in the back of a century old family home in Le Plateau Mont-Royal, this custom loft is located minutes away from the classic Montréal street, Duluth, on a small alley back street in this popular neighbourhood. The small, sunny space overlooks serene tree and vine filled backyards of local residents and is ideal for anyone hoping to explore the city with a comfortable, peaceful space to retire in. Washroom with shower and small, full kitchen complete with mini fridge and built in mini-range are
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau Mont-Royal is one of Montréal's most popular neighbourhoods. Minutes away from Mont Royal metro, cheap groceries, interesting and unique spaces such as bars, art galleries, concert venues and boutiques line the streets of Le Plateau. Located in a small alleyway street, Le Plateau is filled with beautiful, classic Montréal architecture.
notes: The unit is located on top of a spiral fire escape-style staircase, and the bed is accessible only by a wooden ladder. You must be in good physical condition to access this space.  It is ideal for a single individual, or mature couple looking for a unique, serene environment that is centrally located to the attractions and neighborhoods of Montréal.
transit: In addition to the conveniently located Mont Royal & Sherbrooke Metros as well as STM bus lines, the plateau is filled with Bixie (hourly/trip rental) bike stands and Car2Go parking.  Additionally a small cycle shop a 10 minute walk away provides affordable bike rentals for day or week-long trips.
access: Washroom with shower and small, full kitchen complete with mini fridge and built in mini-range are directly in the loft. The fire escape from the backyard leads to the front door, and a gated back yard provides privacy and safety for guests. As the unit is located in the back of a family home, noise must be kept to a minimum in the evenings.
interaction: We have a lock-box so you can let yourself in at your convenience on check-in, or if you prefer we can provide a welcoming visit for guests in the event they'd like to learn a bit more about the neighbourhood or space.  Up to you!
house_rules: Quiet, respectful guests only.  This is a private space attached to a family home, please respect the privacy of the family in the home, they aren't the hosts!  Please do not go to them if you have questions, call us instead.  The yard behind the house is off limits.   Absolutely no smoking, parties, or loud noise in the apartment. Unfortunately the property is not suitable for pets and they are not allowed. The property is solely for the party booked in. Any booking obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of advance payment, deposit and/or rental money, and the party will not be permitted to check-in. (Copy of Passport  may be required). We are not responsible for any loss of valuables or property during your stay or left after departure. Should you forget something we will do our best to get it back to you, once you let us know how you wish this to be done at your risk. Cost of repair of property as a result of Guest negligence will be charged to guests. We want

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Laurel's loft is indeed magical. I loved every minute of my stay there. Comfy sleeping area; comfy desk and chair for working; beautiful view of the backyard garden through a big window; skylight to gently wake you in the morning; nice, clean bathroom; kitchen with two stove tops (no oven) where one can do decent cooking--- it was all that I was looking for. The loft is quite compact but very functional and beautiful, it worked perfectly for me. PLUS the location - Duluth Avenue, St. Denis Street, La Fontaine Park, Mont Royal Park, etc, are all steps away or within easy reach. PLUS the host - Laurel was so thoughtful, responsive, helpful, and kind. I recommend this place with no hesitation.

I loved staying here. It's super cozy and the location is fantastic, just one street away from a bunch of bars and restaurants!
Laurel, even though I didn't get to meet her face to face, was highly available, accommodating and very friendly.

Keep in mind this place is tiny!! I do not recommend it for people who like to hang out in the appartment too much. I would highly recommend it for people like me who spend most of there time out and about and just need a nice cosy place to lay there head down for the night.

If I go back to Montreal I hope to stay there again.

Cosy and quiet little place! Laurel was flexible with the checkin time and responsive when having questions. The location is fantastic, close to cafés, restaurants and shops, ten minute walk to metro Mt Royal.
Très douillet et super bien situer. Laurel fut disponible pour repondre a toutes mes questions.

We absolutely loved Laurel's space! It is homey, clean, well-decorated, and had everything we needed and more for our stay. The location is great and Laurel was a very communicative and accommodating host. We would love to stay here again. She also recommended some wonderful spots to check out during our stay - so make sure to check those out! This was definitely one of our best vacation accommodations ever.
The Hobbit loft is excellently located and close to all amenities.
Tiny place as advertised but cozy and well setup

Laurel's place is great! She's very responsive, and the place is convenient, located near restaurants/bar/supermarkets/metro and in a cool area.
I much recommend this place!

This was a great spot!  I arrived late, so the lockbox made check-in really easy.  The location was ideal; I walked everywhere and only took the Metro/bus to and from the airport, plus the neighborhood is adorable with lots of cute houses and fun murals nearby, as well as tons of restaurants and bars.
Very nice place, everything was perfect
A very sweet little spot, well located and private. Check-in is very flexible and Laurel always responded promptly to communications. A great spot for a weekend getaway.

Lovely paradise close to everything !!!
Laurel will receive you in this hidden tiny loft, in a quiet street next to everything around.

Wonderful location right in the Plateau filled with nice bars and restaurants. Yet the B&B is super quiet, convenient for exploring Montreal on foot, with tube station close-by.  Highly recommended for single traveller or couple!
The hobbit loft is a cute quirky place and finds itself in a fantastic location for all things Plateau. You won't find better self contained value than this.

Location!! Great for walking and close to Metro.
Close to many great restaurants for evening dining and morning walks for pâtisserie and café.
Laurel is an excellent host and responds quickly to messages.
There was a small issue that Laurel addressed immediately and resolved very generously.  
I would recommend this accommodation ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Laural was super nice and helpful. She went out of her way to make delayed baggage arrive at the flat late at night (~ 1 am) as I didn't have a local phone number. This was super helpful. Only drawback was the loud fridge which got better once I place some paper towels on top. Otherwise I slept like a baby. The place is cute and nicely located and has everything you need. I would def come again. Thanks!
Great location in the Plateau, cozy and peaceful space.  Good place to stay in Montreal!
Excellent location. Easy and flexible check in and check out process and time.

I had a nice time at Laurels place! It is indeed a small hobbit loft, cosy and well equiped, just the fridge was a bit noisy and in summertime it can get really hot upstairs. I recommend this apartement for a short trip! Laurel was really easy with Check in and check out and welcoming! Thanks!

L’appartement de Laurel est identique aux photos. Il est d’une propreté irréprochable. Laurel a été très disponible pour répondre à mes questions. L’appartement est bien situé, à quelques stations du centre. J’ai vraiment apprécié ce séjour à Montréal ! Merci Laurel

The best choice I could have made for my first days in Montreal! Laurel was the best hostess and Hobbit's place the best airbnb ever! The location is perfect, the apartment is magical, inspiring, full of loving details. Many trees around and a ceiling where you can sleep looking at the moon and talking to the stars. Laurel was really nice and helped me a lot. Everything was clean and a lovely welcome message with some coffee were waiting for my arrival. Thank you for opening your home for me! It was really special.
A cute spot in an amazing location! Laurel was a lovely lovely host. I was fortunate to stay here for a month and thoroughly enjoyed all my moments.

name: Clean Private Room in East Village
summary: Bright and spacious private room with ample storage space & private balcony in East Village! Steps away from hip and chic restaurants, grocery stores and subway station F, M, J trains. 15 minutes from LaGuardia Airport. Shared living space and a full kitchen!
space: The room is fully furnished with: One set of clean sheets, iron, Free WIFI, reading chair, closet with shelf, a large sunny window. The apartment is furnished with: a TV, coffee/dining table, full kitchen.
description: Bright and spacious private room with ample storage space & private balcony in East Village! Steps away from hip and chic restaurants, grocery stores and subway station F, M, J trains. 15 minutes from LaGuardia Airport. Shared living space and a full kitchen! The room is fully furnished with: One set of clean sheets, iron, Free WIFI, reading chair, closet with shelf, a large sunny window. The apartment is furnished with: a TV, coffee/dining table, full kitchen. Free wi-fi. Shared kitchen, bathroom, living room. Explore amazing restaurants, bars, shops, clubs and things to do, a foodie's delight with a variety of cuisines and multicultural residents in this safe neighborhood! The East Village is easy to get to from just about ANYWHERE in Manhattan and Brooklyn. Laguardia airport is 15 minutes away by car! For subways take the F, M, J trains.
neighborhood_overview: Explore amazing restaurants, bars, shops, clubs and things to do, a foodie's delight with a variety of cuisines and multicultural residents in this safe neighborhood!
transit: The East Village is easy to get to from just about ANYWHERE in Manhattan and Brooklyn. Laguardia airport is 15 minutes away by car! For subways take the F, M, J trains.
access: Free wi-fi. Shared kitchen, bathroom, living room.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a philanthropy consultant living in New York.  I enjoy traveling, meeting new people and good food.

reviews.comments: Great place shared with nice people. Manisha wasn't here but the check-in has been very well organized.
Хорошее расположение
Great opportunity to stay in East Village, roommate very kind and hospitable.

Great location lots of restaurants and bars close by. Easy and quick communication with Manisha and the check in process was super easy. We also had the place to ourselves the entire time which was nice. 
Only a couple of minor issues. Nearest subway stop is quite far, 10-15 minute walk. If you have lot of luggage and you are using transit or if you don't want to walk, this could be an issue, we walked everywhere so not an issue for us. Also the heating system in the bedroom makes a rattling noise so we had to get earplugs to be able to sleep through, I expect this would only be an issue if you are visiting in winter. 
Overall I would recommend this place.
Enjoyable stay!

Manisha’s place is fantastic. The place is clean, homey, well-sized, and looks fantastic. Manisha was very responsive, accommodating,  and quick about any questions that I had. This is a must-stay if you are visiting the city.

The neighborhood was clean, fun, and safe. There was always something to do or see. Tompkins square park was a short walk away. It’s a great place to sip on some coffee, watch the interactions in the dog park, people watch, and relax.

I would definitely return again. This stay made me love the city.
Good value in a great area of NYC.

La chambre de Manisha est agréable et propre. L'appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier sympa et bien desservi. Manisha est toujours très réactive et à l'écoute même si nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de nous rencontrer directement.

name: Heart of the City-Cozy Room Private Sunny Balcony!
summary: A cozy double bedroom with a private balcony in a fully furnished apartment with two terraces, kitchen, utensils, WiFi internet, etc. The apartment is very central with lots of light and in the charming neighborhood of Gracia with many bars and restaurants. Located near the beautiful Placa del Sol and Placa Villa de Gracia, many other major attractions are within 5 to 25 mins walk. Can’t wait to host you. Cheers!
space: The apartment is a duplex on the 4th floor and has a spacious living room, a kitchen and 2 bathrooms. Your room will be on the top floor.
description: A cozy double bedroom with a private balcony in a fully furnished apartment with two terraces, kitchen, utensils, WiFi internet, etc. The apartment is very central with lots of light and in the charming neighborhood of Gracia with many bars and restaurants. Located near the beautiful Placa del Sol and Placa Villa de Gracia, many other major attractions are within 5 to 25 mins walk. Can’t wait to host you. Cheers! The apartment is a duplex on the 4th floor and has a spacious living room, a kitchen and 2 bathrooms. Your room will be on the top floor. Apart from your private room and private balcony, you can access all other shared spaces - living room, both the terraces, kitchen and the 2 bathrooms We've lived in Barcelona for 5 years, so please feel free to ask us for local tips or let us know if we can help you in any other way to make your stay here better. Gracia neighborhood is a vibrant and diverse enclave of Catalonian life. Gràcia’s intimate, close-packed streets and predominatel
neighborhood_overview: Gracia neighborhood is a vibrant and diverse enclave of Catalonian life. Gràcia’s intimate, close-packed streets and predominately low-rise, Mediterranean architecture give it a distinct feel. It’s one-way streets are organized around a series of plazas, including the Plaça del Sol, Plaça de Rius i Taulet and Plaça de la Virreina. “Old-world charm” abounds. Nearby: 1. Placa De La Vila De Gracia - 1 min walk 2. Place Del Sol - 4 min walk
notes: 1. Smoking only in your balcony or the 2 terraces. Please do not smoke indoors. 2. The apartment is on the 5th floor with no lift - good way to burn some calories with all the beer ;) 3. While your room and balcony are always private only for you, the other spaces in the house are likely shared depending on our availability & travel schedules. 4. If you stay more than 20 days you have to share the utility (electricity, water, gas and internet) bills, based on the last/latest bills received. We will show you the bills for calculation.
transit: You can walk to many major attractions within 5 to 25 mins. Additionally bus, metro and long-distance train stations are at a few minutes walking distance. Metros: 1. Diagonal - 4 min walk (L3,L5) 2. Provenca long distance train/FGC - 6 min walk (L6,L7, ES, S1, S2, S5, S6, S7) 2. Fontana - 8 min walk (L3) Plenty of bus stops close by within 2-5 mins walk which connect you to all parts of Barcelona.
access: Apart from your private room and private balcony, you can access all other shared spaces - living room, both the terraces, kitchen and the 2 bathrooms
interaction: We've lived in Barcelona for 5 years, so please feel free to ask us for local tips or let us know if we can help you in any other way to make your stay here better.
house_rules: If you stay more than 20 days you have to share the utility (electricity, water, gas and internet) bills, based on the last/latest bills we have received. Bills will be shown to you.

name: Old School Hospitality
summary: This spacious ground-floor apartment can sleep four very comfortably.  It has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living room, dining area, an indoor waterfall, and stocked kitchen, There is a beautiful lanai that overlooks a large koi pond and spacious, manicured grounds. We call the property Old School Hospitality because it was built from recycled materials from the old Hakalau School. Much of the house's charm comes from the unique materials used in construction.
space: This charming apartment has an indoor waterfall that immerses you in a tropical setting. The unit has many custom features; the shower has lava and granite features and opens to the outdoors.
description: This spacious ground-floor apartment can sleep four very comfortably.  It has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living room, dining area, an indoor waterfall, and stocked kitchen, There is a beautiful lanai that overlooks a large koi pond and spacious, manicured grounds. We call the property Old School Hospitality because it was built from recycled materials from the old Hakalau School. Much of the house's charm comes from the unique materials used in construction. This charming apartment has an indoor waterfall that immerses you in a tropical setting. The unit has many custom features; the shower has lava and granite features and opens to the outdoors. Guests have access to all rooms in the unit. We live on-site and will be available as desired or needed. The neighborhood is semi-rural and neighbors are very respectful of privacy. While there is some bus service, you will be needing personal transportation to access the many nearby attractions. It is possible to walk and bike in the area, h
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is semi-rural and neighbors are very respectful of privacy.
notes: The one acre is fully landscaped and has fruit trees and many palms.
transit: While there is some bus service, you will be needing personal transportation to access the many nearby attractions. It is possible to walk and bike in the area, however there are no dedicated paths and the roads are narrow.
access: Guests have access to all rooms in the unit.
interaction: We live on-site and will be available as desired or needed.

reviews.comments: Old Schoolhouse Hospitality is a dream stay. Everything had attention to detail and was very comfortable. I especially loved the peaceful feel inside and outside. I encourage everyone to stay here.

This is an awesome place, new modified level with an incredible art design from every room. The  beautiful indoor pond with water fall and outdoor pond, tastefully decorated with every need thought of, well supplied  kitchen made cooking at home easy. The area is not in a common location but if you are looking for a quiet area to relax, enjoy the typical scenery out of the traffic. This house was a pleasure to stay in, the host Jim and Ted are very welcome to their gussets  and made every thing easy.

The hosts, house and grounds were truly amazing.  It  is what one images Hawaii to be beautiful and  relaxing.  It is about 16 miles into Hilo but I was looking for a  private getaway and found it at their home.  The hosts had built this home  and the attention  to details are to be appreciated.    The lava rock fireplace, kitchen area where you can enjoy a meal while looking out to  their private oasis and many other personal touches that will make your stay a true pleasure.

A beautiful and peaceful property. This home is a gem! Family friendly environment and "hip" enough for the singles. Jim was a very friendly host and provided us will all the amenities that we needed! We were able to cook dinner and breakfast due to the fully loaded kitchen. The back yard was defiantly one of the highlights of this Gem. The home has a great character to it and we will be back to stay for another weekend in the future!

Jim and Ted were amazing hosts! They go above and beyond in making a stay with them enjoyable. They provided valuable feedback and answered our questions before and during our stay. The accommodations are beautiful and comfortable. They undoubtedly made our trip to Hawaii the best possible experience possible for our family. They encapsulate what Airbnb is all about. We hope to host them on the mainland some time. ;)
Beautiful self built house and thoughtful host! Perfect for exploring this side of the island and the volcano! Thanks Jim!
Jim location is a must go if you are in the area such a wonderful and caring host and also his home is a great experience in its own. Loved and enjoyed every minute and the history is just amazing.

Jim's place is a tropical paradise. Beautiful koi pond in the backyard that my 2 kids (10 and 9 y.o) could not get enough of the tadpoles, micro frogs, toads, variety of fish. He also has a variety of great games that my kids enjoyed, did not miss having a TV. Place is clean and lovely, and fans provided nice breeze since no AC. Also no dryer but clothes line with the fans dried our clothes well. Location of the house is terrific for all locations near Hilo, and going to Akaka falls, botanical gardens, and volcano national park. Couldn't have asked for a better location and stay, Jim even provided fresh fruits and veggies and sent us off with freshly baked blueberry scones. Thanks again Jim!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and certainly plan to return if Jim will have us back.  The Old School Hospitality is a paradise within the paradise of Hilo/Keaau and was so comfortable.  We absolutely loved the indoor waterfall and the fabulous spacious bathroom and outdoor shower!  Though there was no kitchen oven, only a gas stove top and microwave, we found it very easy to work around it.  As the setting is so serene, one of our favorite things were waking up each morning and enjoying our coffee and/or mimosa's on the patio while taking in the wildlife and beautiful fruit trees and soft breezes.  We seriously can't to book again! ❤️

We really enjoyed our stay. Beautiful home and landscaping. Jim was an excellent host and we enjoyed learning about the local history of the house. The space is large and has all kinds of extras - everything you might need.

Before reserving, Jim promptly answered all my questions. His property is lovely and the space is clean, comfortable, and quiet, just as described. The bathroom is wonderful. What made the experience special was the aloha hospitalty. Felt welcomed as a friend, was invited to share a few meals and he helped with questions about the local area. At the same time, there was plenty of privacy. If you want to be in this area, this is a terrific choice.
Loved every aspect of our experience with Jim.  The scenery was breathtaking and accommodations were over the top! There's no other place we want to stay except right here!!  Amazing time!!

This is a remarkable place. We were overwhelmed by Jim's hospitality and the charming house itself. Our three days were way too short to enjoy all the cozy corners of the apartment and its surroundings. It's a good place to stay clear but still close enough to Hilo. Volcano National Park is only a 40 minutes drive away. If you want to have a relaxed place to stay in the Hilo area outside of town - stay at Jim's!
Beautiful scenery, quite place, lovely cats, great host :)

Your villa is a fashion, beautiful, clean. The garden in front of the is very sweet to grow a lot of fruit. We have just arrived at the villa, the landlord sent all kinds of fruit, kinds; papaya; banana ; hu you;oranges and so on. Everything needs to be satisfied. All of them are first-class. We really enjoyed the time here. We`ll come if we have time. Thank you for bringing us good memories. Thank you for your own cake. It`s very delicious.

Merry Christmas!

This place is AMAZING! Jim and Ted are amazing hosts who went above and beyond with their generosity. The rooms were spacious and charming as seen in the pictures and the house was clean and welcoming. The pool table was really fun and we loved the view of the backyard (watching the koi and neighborhood chickens). This is the perfect place to relax and unwind. My only regret is that our time there passed so quickly. Out of our whole trip in Hawaii, this place was the family's favorite. Will book again :)

We had an amazing stay at Old School Hospitality. The house is beautiful and rich in history. The backyard is well kept and allowed for exploring. The kitchen had everything we needed including fresh fruit and flowers from the yard. The shower was a highlight, you could look up and see the trees and sky.  We felt secluded but were close to all things volcano and to the black sand beaches. Jim went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

This place is a gem in the jungle!  It's is spacious, stylish, clean, quiet and simply beautiful.  The hosts, Jim and Ted, are fantastic and very prompt in communication.  I would recommend this place to anyone travels to the Big Island.

Irene

A bit out of the way if staying to see the Volcanic National Park, 30-45 minutes, but the back yard is so lush and beautiful. They allowed us to stay one night and we made our reservations rather last minute. A most unique place with lovely colors, wood floors, pool table and the bathroom is to die for especially the shower.

Jim is a very kind host with true aloha spirit. His place is truly unique with the indoor waterfall and waterfall like shower.  It is in a semi rural setting and at night you will be serenaded by the tree frogs and birds.  Thank you again for your hospitality!
This is a great place to stay for a couple of nights or more. The grounds are beautiful. The inside is well constructed, beautiful, spacious & super clean. The shower was a pleasure.

Прекрасная база для тех, кто хочет исследовать восточную часть острова. Огромные апартаменты с прудом и двором, невероятно гостеприимные хозяева и дом с уникальной историей. Рекомендую.

I would recommend to stay in Jim&Todd’s place for everyone who wants to explore East side of Big Island. 

It was unforgettable to live in their unique house. There are plenty of space, huge backyard with a fish pond, lots of nice and sweet details like fresh fruits and flowers, coffee and tea in the kitchen, classy furniture and floors and a unique bathroom made of lava. And there are orchids blooming right on your backyard (Website hidden by Airbnb) 
Jim and Todd hospitality exceeds any expectations. Jim did all to make us feel very welcomed, he gave us lots of recommendations and even took us to the local event with Hawaiian music. Thank you so much guys, we hope to see you again! Masha, Kosta and Max.

Amazing surroundings, postcard location, gorgeous accommodation. We have stayed in the same estate previously and Jim’s place offers everything you could want. We travelled with our 3yo and he loved he place also. Thx Jim

We had a lovely stay at Old Hospitality.  The place is very big - two full bedrooms, living room, large dining table under the sun/rain room, kitchen, and the amazing bathroom.  It rained every day we were there and the fountain would trickle water whenever the pond above got full enough.  We ate breakfast looking out over the lawns at the large pond, eating fresh fruits grown on the property.  It was lovely.
Wonderful host and a beautiful home!

My wife, myself, and one of our friends stayed here for two nights and loved it. It was close to Kalapana and the Lava, easy to get to Hilo. The place is great, well decorated and clean, nice kitchen that was easy to cook in, and we enjoyed the pool table and stereo for some light music. Shower was beautiful, and the indoor waterfall/pond thing was very cool. Loved the outdoor koi pond. Beautiful place and we’d highly recommend it! The kind of place we took plenty of pictures of, to remember the great place we stayed during our trip! Jim was also very nice and responsive. Went above and beyond to help us enjoy our stay

What a fabulous experience at Jim’s Old School Hospitality Airbnb. The accommodations are unique & absolutely stunning. Everything you need and more at this place. It was so relaxing! We felt like we were in our own tropical paradise. Highly recommend!

This place is awesome! 
I highly recommend this place

Old hospitality is just as advertised. The space was absolutely beautiful. You feel cocooned away in your own little paradise. It was a central location to all the place we went and to our friends who lived on the island. Jim was a great host. He made sure we checked in and had everything we needed. The waterfall is an awesome feature, and the shower was so nice. He even gave us some lemons. We will definitely be back soon. Thank you Jim and Ted.

Jim’s old school hospitality lived up to is name! Wonderful hosts, a lovely apartment, lots of space to hangout In the back yard and enjoy the koi pond. 
Should the Puna area be what you are looking for this is the place to stay. Hilo is 20 minuets away, Pahoa is 15 minuets in the other direction. lots of good food in both areas. Loved the time we spent here!

We have nothing but great things to say about our brief stay at Jims place.  It's better than advertised.   So serene.  It's like a mystical jungle with great , very clean amenities.  The indoor waterfall is great and the open air shower is fun too.  Book for sure, you will not be disappointed.

Magical...  what an incredible place to stay and an absolutely fabulous host.  Thank you Jim!  :)  Words cannot express how amazing of an experience it was for all of us to stay here.  Our only regret is that we didn't get to stay longer.  If you want a true "aloha" experience - this is a place you will find it.    
Mahalo nui loa ~
What a beautiful home! Jim and his partner built an extraordinary home. Jim’s hospitality is second to none. You are surrounded by tropical life and sounds and beauty. Amazing experience!

Jim’s place is gorgeous, it really is a special place, very tropical and lush. The home is immaculate, the shower is awesome and if you forgot anything, it’s probably already there! One thing to note is that the WiFi is not the strongest - enough to spot check weather and email but probably wouldn’t work if you were doing business. Fortunately for us we left work at home. Oh and Jim made us delicious scones on our last day!

We were a group of 3 friend staying at this wonderful property for 4 nights and loved every moment of it! The host was very responsive from the very beginning of the booking and arranged for his kind neighbour to check us in on our first day. The property is incredibly spacious (even bigger than it looks in the pictures), spotlessly clean and full of lovely details, you will feel like home in no time. The location is ideal for exploring around Hilo and secluded for a peaceful rest after a day out hiking and enjoying the area. The garden with the pond was a great touch and we enjoyed all the night sounds from the surrounding nature. Jim was very welcoming and offered to help with anything we may need for our stay. We loved it and would surely return!
Highly recommended! Two large bedrooms, lovely living room and a very beautiful garden with a pond. Pretty clean. I wish I could spend a whole day there without going out.

This is a piece of paradise! You can hear birdsong and enjoy the great scenery from any room!  Bright and airy.  Kids loved the huge backyard where they could feed koi and tadpole in the morning.  Board games and the pool table were a hit at night!  Host was quick to respond to any questions and requests.  Close to the tidepools and the Maku'u market (love it!).  It's a bit far from restaurants and shops (30 min each way) but the kitchen has everything you need to make an easy meal.  It's a huge place for the 4 of us!  Just note that they don't have a dryer.  But they have a clothes line ropes and most of our items dried within a day.

Jim's place is such a serene tropical paradise. This place stimulates all senses like scents of the flowers around , sounds of birds,  animals, rain and thunder, sight of chickens and birds, lush green tropical, koi pond and the well lit backyard by lightning, touch the hard and porous lava rocks, feel the velvety backyard .  We couldn't spend much time as planned but we took lots of pictures , had some fun playing pool table and sitting in the sun/rain room. Loved the shower with all amenities. Thank You for sharing such a serene space with travelers like us !
Jim is a wonderful host with a very comfortable, beautiful AirBnB. Definitely worth staying at Old School Hospitality!
Perfect place to kick back and unwind. Jim is very helpful if you need anything or have any questions.
자연속에 멋진집이 최고였어요

This is a beautiful and unique place in a very rural community.  I LOVED falling asleep to the sound of the frogs (but the frogs are loud, so if you're sensitive to noise that may be a problem. They come out only at night). The indoor/outdoor shower was amazing. Jim let us feed the koi fish in the backyard and that was a treat. No TV and very little cell phone reception out there, but I didn't mind. House was clean and quiet. Jim was a great host.

The accommodations were beautiful. We enjoyed the pool table and the Koi pond. The grounds are meticulously well maintained. Jim is a very gracious host. The location is close to Hilo providing a good selection of excellent restaurants should you decide not to use the kitchen facilities. At night you can hear the coquis, frogs and toads that in habit the Koi pond.  Though having most of the modern conveniences it maintains a certain amount of rusticity.

We stayed at this rental for 10 nights.  Jim's place truly lives up to its name, Old School Hospitality. There are plenty of resources and amenities. The kitchen is well stocked with everything you need to cook a decent meal (gas cooking, too).  The bed linens are soft, beds comfortable; sparkling clean everywhere. We didn't have to buy shampoo and soap like in other rentals, because a generous amount was provided for the four of us. The fish pond with waterlilies in front of the patio is gorgeous, and one can hear the coqui and bull frogs at night with their enchanting concerto. 
 A good place for snorkeling nearby is Richardson Beach Park. The beach is rocky, but there is live coral reef close to shore with a decent amount of fish, including schools of yellow tangs.  We have also seen sea turtles galore at the same place. For places to shop and dine, you can either look online or use Jim's  info for guests (look for a blue binder) which includes very useful local tips. 
Overall, we were very pleased with this rental and would stay there again. Thank you Jim and Ted!
Not many tourists make it out here, which is awesome. Loved Pahoa and some great drives around the coast. The house is immaculate, comfortable, and the grounds gorgeous. Highly recommended!
The place was amazing, especially the tropical garden with the pond - we loved to hear the sound of the coquis at night. Had a great time there!

This airbnb is a beautiful surprise.  Jim and Ted have created a gorgeous and spacious apartment that provides a very comfortable and relaxing space.  It offers all the conveniences and more.  You will lve your stay in their home!
Jim's place has everything you need if you need to get away from the hustle and bustle, beautiful setting and love the indoor water feature and 'out-door' shower...
Jim’s place was wonderful. Clean, beautiful and peaceful .  I loved the waterfall and pond in the back yard.

amazing place! if you're looking for a unique Hawaii experience that is also very comfortable and clean this is the place! felt like living in the rain forest, lots of nature with a magical indoor space which includes a waterfall and pond.
Hermoso lugar rodeado de vegetación, baño muy amplio y espacios generosos en las alcobas! La casa está muy bien dotada. Su anfitrión siempre pendiente.
位在農村小鎮,雖然附近不是特別熱鬧,但是開車前往pahoa並不遠,Jim的家有一座很棒的撞球檯,讓我們渡過非常開心的兩個夜晚,除此之外,也非常感謝Jim告訴我們附近的旅遊資訊,讓我們不會白跑一趟火山,這裡一切都非常的棒,除了比較潮濕一點,其他真的很推薦,應有盡有的airbnb!

the only problem with staying here is it will spoil you for other places. this house was hand built by jim and ted, who are professional builders and there is so much attention to detail. it’s important to note that those pictures are for your private space, not common areas. it’s huge, has an internal water feature, great kitchen, pool table, and glassed in dining nook which is great for experiencing rain storms without getting wet. jim and ted were so generous with their time but left us to our own devices when needed. it’s like staying with family but without any emotional baggage . really hoping our paths cross again

Beautiful and peaceful space with easy access to Volcano National Park, Hilo and the Big Island's fantastic scenery. Jim was a great host who always made us feel welcome and gave great tips to explore the area. We would definitely stay here again when we come back to the Big Island.

Jim & Ted's house was wonderful and fantastic.And they were always kind to us. Their villa was cool and fantastic, too.
I was lucky to meet Jim and Ted in Big Island.
Place was amazing inside and out, and we had the place to ourselves most of the time.

We absolutely loved staying here. The house is so well done, cozy and relaxing and the location was great, in between all things we wanted to explore. I unfortunately had to work a few days but the wifi worked perfectly. Jim was also so kind and wonderful. It was such a pleasure to meet him. He even brought us a cake for my mom's bday. Hope we can come back and visit again.

Jim and Ted's guest suite is a delightful place to stay. We enjoyed it greatly. The creativity and fine craftsmanship everywhere were a joy to see. As hosts, Jim and Ted are definitely 5 star, very thoughtful and helpful. We would highly recommend a stay in their suite, for a chance to spend time in a truly unique setting. Beautiful gardens and surroundings, and wonderful touches in décor everywhere make the experience rate far above a hotel stay. Mahalo nui loa to both of you.

The stay at Jim's was wonderful. He and his family were generous and thoughtful in preparing a beautiful guest apartment. It was comfortable, clean, cheerful, and of course, exotic, with a beautiful back yard, with chickens and frogs to add to the soundtrack. Highly recommend a stay here. Mahalo!
Jim and Ted's guest suite was amazing!  It was incredibly spacious, and it seemed like they had thought through every detail.  It was a perfect first place to stay during our visit to Hawaii.
Tropical paradise! We had a great time. Jim is a super nice host!

name: Super clean and cosy
summary: The location of the apartment is one of its best features. Mascot train station 5 minute walk which will take you directly to the city, 2 stops ( 9 minutes ) to central station. The train then joins the city circle line and will take you to all the major stations. Circular Quay 3 stops after central.  Coogee beach is the closest beach ( 12-15 minute drive and less than 20$ in an uber.  Surry Hills where all the popular bars and restaurants is 5 km away ( $15-20 uber ride ).
space: Pretty much everything you can think of we have. We have all the entertainment requirements you could need. TV, foxtel, stan, ps4, kodi, home theatre, 65 inch sony smart tv and of course wireless internet. The place is really open and well lit, a very positive and clean environment north facing with good light all throughout the day. The apartment is 1 year old and is super clean with everything working.  Great for entertaining, we would prefer no party but of course having people over for dinner is fine. We have all the things required to cater for dinner guests. The BBQ works great for these occasions.

The train then joins the city circle line and will take you to all the major stations. Circular Quay 3 stops after central. Pretty much everything you can think of we have. We have all the entertainment requirements you could need.
