The place is really open and well lit, a very positive and clean environment north facing with good light all throughout the day. The apartment is 1 year old and is super clean with everything working.  Great for entertaining, we would prefer no party but of course having people over for dinner is fine. We have al

reviews.comments: Highly recommended apartment. It's spacious, clean, stylish and very easily accessible from the mascot subway and buses. Near the airport as well. Evan is also very prompt in responding so we really appreciated that. Thanks, we enjoyed our stay!
Thanks Evan for a fantastic place to stay. Brand new, walking distance to train station, cafes and IGA. Only two train stops from Central. Couldn’t fault it
Good place to stay for a good value
Evan's place is fabulous, the apartment is exactly same as pictures as prefect as clean. It's worth to choose Evan's place, my parents and I are love it.

Execellent apartment in a great location, shops, trains etc all located within 5 minutes walk. Train only 8-10 minutes to city centre and all the main spots.
Uber cheap to any beaches - bondi/coogee or even to cbd. 
Apartment was immaculate with everything you would need. Much better than any hotel.
Any advice or help Evan had replied within minutes.
Excellent stay, didn’t want to leave so got our own apartment across the road!
Wonderful stay- would come back at any time & can totally refer to everybody. Thanks Evan for your all time quick responses & your local tips as well as your ongoing support. He is such a great host.
It was exactly as advertised. There was a small issue with the dryer not working but it sounded like it had just stopped working so no big deal. Overall it was a great deal.
Thank you so much Evan, you were an excellent host, always helpful and quick to reply, your apartment is wonderful (facilities and location)!
Very good location and equitment. I will recomend this apartment to my friends if they will travel to Sydney.

This is a great place to stay.  $15 Uber from airport recommended as a lot of road works happening but if no luggage Mascot is a 5 min walk. The apartment is very well appointed and if it hadn't rained so much the deck would have been brilliant. Easiest check in ever, very well appointed and Evan responded  immediately to any query. Highly recommended and I'm hard to please!

Amazing apartment with a nice view, great way to experience Sydney, Evan is really friendly and also really easy to communicate with, I can highly recommend the apartment to anyone who wants to visit Sydney
Great location. Five minutes to train,restaurants, and shopping

Place was as per picture! Really awesome place to stay in, we wished we had the chance to stay longer! Surrounding area is still under some construction, but it wasn’t any major issue. Place is very accessible; only 5mins from the airport and cost between $15-$18 by Uber. There is also a petrol kiosk abt 2-3mins walk with a 24hr convenience store which was good if you need to get stuff urgently. Mascot train station is barely 5mins walk from the apartment and it takes you everywhere into the city which is abt 3 stops away. There are plenty of eateries outside the train station you can choose from, and there’s a Halal Thai eatery serving good food as well as a Kebab store and also an Indian cuisine place, to name a few, which was a plus for us considering we are Muslim. There’s also a big Woolsworth for you to shop across the station. Evan’s place is huge, very comfortable and very clean! Great to relax after a long day out on the huge and comfy sofa! Thank you Evan!

Evans’s place is nice and clean and
Beautiful!
Has everything you need I stood there 
With my friend she had her space and I had mine two beds and two bathroom
The place is nice and clean with plenty of sun lights. And Evan was really helpful about check-in/out, he even offered a late check out for us, that was really sweet. Recommended to all!
Evan’s is a great host. Easy to contact and has a clean apartment to stay.
Very clean and spacious! Lots of amenities included. Evan is wonderful with communication! Great price! Definitely recommend this place!
Beautiful apartment in a great location!

Die Wohnung von Evan war sehr großzügig, modern eingerichtet und geräumig. Sie lag einige Gehminuten von der Metro entfernt, die direkt in die Stadt fuhr. Zum Flughafen eine Station. In die Stadt - je nachdem, wo man aussteigen wollte - 2-4 Stationen. Alles in allem ist die Unterkunft von Evan empfehlenswert und die Kommunikation lief auch sehr gut. Er hat uns auch Eier und Mangos im Kühlschrank hinterlassen, an denen wir uns bedienen konnten. Die Wohnung an sich ist echt toll mit einer echt schönen Aussicht. Man kann auch sehr gut auf dem Balkon sitzen.
The house was really nice and spacious. I liked the two storied house. Two bathrooms were clean and nice. The location was also very nice but little bit noisy at night

Stayed here over New Years and it was great. Close to public transport, shops and the airport. Also, the place feels modern and had everything we needed. Would recommend.
Cheers, Oliver
u want value for money every thing is a 2 minute walk 5 too train station absolutely amazing place

Everything was neat and tidy. I liked the airy style of the loft a lot. Close to the city, close to the airport, trainstation nearby. A lot of working process in this area, it is not silent there! Keep this in mind. But after all, it’s a great apartment and Evan is a perfect host. Would like to stay here again if I am ever been to Sydney again :)

Great place that is accurately captured in the pictures. Ample room for a family with a good living room, kitchen, and two bathrooms. Everything was clean. Close to the train station and a supermarket as well. Evan's response time made the whole experience hassle-free.

The apartment is almost new. Everything works perfect. It is nice, confortable, and very well equipped. So the stay is very cozy. We really enjoyed the time there. 
It is close to the airport and to the Mascot train station so you are in very few minutes to the city and to the airport. It gives you plenty of freedom to move. In 10 minutes you are in Circular Quay or in less than an hour in Bondi Beach.
Really enjoyed our stay at Evans place. Clean and stylish, great location and close by to the station. Communication was fast and helpful. We'll definitely come back in the future!
The host canceled this reservation 137 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It is near the airport. only 10 mins to central city. 
nice and tidy place.

name: Opimo
summary: Localizado no centro da cidade, perto de espaços de arte e cultura, parques, belas paisagens, da estação do metro Carolina Michaelis e os encantos da ribeira do Porto.  Espaço Adorável, devido ao seu conforto e privacidade!
space: Estúdio Privado , com toilete completa e kitchenet.  2 camas individuais.
description: Localizado no centro da cidade, perto de espaços de arte e cultura, parques, belas paisagens, da estação do metro Carolina Michaelis e os encantos da ribeira do Porto.  Espaço Adorável, devido ao seu conforto e privacidade! Estúdio Privado , com toilete completa e kitchenet.  2 camas individuais. Um grande terraço muito agradável , com jardim. Sempre ao dispor.  Por telefone,  por watsap,  por email. Pessoalmente quando estou em casa. A rua em frente à casa tem estacionamento gratuito. A casa tem soalho em madeira,  manter o silêncio.
notes: A casa tem soalho em madeira,  manter o silêncio.
transit: A rua em frente à casa tem estacionamento gratuito.
access: Um grande terraço muito agradável , com jardim.
interaction: Sempre ao dispor.  Por telefone,  por watsap,  por email. Pessoalmente quando estou em casa.

host.host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Maria ist super nett und sehr bemüht es ihren Mietern recht zu machen. Check in war super flexible. Für einen kurzen Aufenthalt zu zweit super. Leider war eine Baustelle im Haus, sodass es tagsüber recht laut war. Die Lage war super, in 10 bis 15 Minuten hat man alles "wichtige" zu Fuß erreicht.
Great, clean room for two persons just outside the city center of Porto, which is just a 20 minute walk away from the apartment. Maria turned out to be a very nice and welcoming host!
muy bonito  acogedor y aseado  el sitio , esta muy bien ubicado es centrico y facilidad de transporte. la anfitriona muy amable y pendienten de sus huespedes.

The appartement is small but well organized and very clean. Perfect for two. We had everything we needed there. However during summer since it is under the roof it may be warm inside even at night. Maria is a welcoming and and accomodating person.
Accueil très sympathique, logement très propre et bien situé. Merci!
Studio au calme indépendant à proximité du centr

Logement très propos et très soigné et bien équipé.  Idéal pour deux personnes.
Situé dans quartier plutôt populaire mais très agréable avec commerces proches.
Une superbe boulangerie avec des gâteaux maison qui sont exceptionnels tant en goût que prix.
Idéal pour marcheur car à  20 mns à pieds des premiers  centres d intérêts. 
Très  proche aussi du métro. 
Rien à  dire.
Maria is very kind and helpful! The room is really cleaned and nice! Very good experience!!

The place is great to walk to the centre, only 10-15 mins. There are many restaurants and shop nearby to eat and supermarket. We book the room on the top which is excellent as we can cook and have our own bathroom. The only downside is internet. We hardly got wifi signal up there and need to come down for using it. The place is very clean, we didn't meet Maria but her son was there to show us our room and he was nice. After that we never saw anyone.

María tiene un apartamento fabuloso en una zona tranquila y cercana al centro (apenas 15 minutos andando cuesta abajo). La comunicación con el metro del aeropuerto es directa y el propio barrio tiene varios sitios interesantes donde tomar algo, amén de vida de barrio no excesivamente turístico. 

Muy recomendable, un acierto.
Maria est très sympathique, le studio est mignon. Situé sous les toits, il fait vite chaud lors de fortes chaleur mais le ventilateur aide bien !
Le logement de Maria est parfait pour un petit séjour sur Porto à quelques dizaines de minutes à pied du centre historique. Maria est vraiment sympathique et chaleureuse. Encore merci à elle

Maria is a great host. We came a little earlier than planed. No problem for her. She is flexible and 
made us feel very welcome. The room was clean and cosy. Like in the pictures. Perfect place to explore the city by walking.

Maria was really nice and welcoming! Her son talked to us to explain everything as we don't speak Portuguese. The doorbell didn't work, but after an email Maria quickly opened, so there was no problem! The room is very new and really clean. The kitchen in the room is not that well equipped, but there is another kitchen downstairs if anything is needed.

O espaço da Maria é excelente. Trata-se de uma casa com arquitetura antiga, mas totalmente reformada. O quarto é limpo, organizado e bonito. A localização é muito boa, pois fica a uns 5 minutos de uma estação de metro e a uns 10 minutos da rua principal da cidade. Porém, a melhor característica do local é a própria Maria. Ela é responsável, rápida em responder as mensagens, extremamente educada e gentil. Mesmo quando precisamos fazer um chekin tardio, ela nos esperou com toda a boa vontade. Recomendamos o local para quem quer conhecer a bela cidade de Porto, mas sem abrir mão de um espaço confortável, próximo ao centro da cidade e por um preço justo.
Thanks for a wonderful stay!

The room is nice, especially the fact that you have a private bathroom! Check in went smoothly (although our plane was delayed and we came super late, Maria's son was welcoming us! Thanks again!!) It's 10-15 Minute Walk to the Center which is really fine. You can hear the noises of the other guests but they were quiet at night so that was no problem!
Thanks again Maria!

El lugar es muy bien ubicado, está muy cerca la escuela de música, por ende el transporte público no es un problema, cerca del lugar hay restaurantes y tiendas, la anfitriona muy amable y ayuda en todo momento, sin duda es una gran idea llegar aquí.

Emplacement idéal pour marcheur sinon métro à proximité. Maria a été très arrangeante pour l'heure d'arrivée et départ (ne pas hésiter à communiquer). Chambre et salle de bain privée très propre je recommande. Petit déjeuner délicieux et copieux au pied de la chambre pour une modique somme, surtout ne pas se priver. En résumé excellent rapport qualité prix.
Merci Maria

Sylvain, Hervé

Der Check-in war problemlos, obwohl mein Freund und ich ziemlich spät ankamen hat Maria uns freundlich empfangen. Das Zimmer sah wie auf den Bildern aus, nur leider war es eiskalt. Wir würden niemandem empfehlen, Marias Zimmer im Winter zu bewohnen. Maria war sehr zuvorkommend und hat uns noch mehr Decken und eine Heizung gebracht, doch leider hat das nichts an der Kälte geändert. Als zweite Option hatte sie uns ein anderes Zimmer geben wollen, das aber eher als Notlösung wirkte. Durch den Stress und die Verärgerung die dadurch entstanden sind, mussten mein Freund und ich uns nach einer anderen Möglichkeit umsehen. Wie gesagt, im Sommer kann es sicher eine nette Unterkunft sein, aber im Winter sollte man die Finger davon lassen.
War Klasse!

le logement que nous a proposez Maria correspondait à nos attentes. 
très bon rapport qualité-prix. Pas très grand, mais propre, pratique avec la vaisselle et le frigo pour déjeuner le matin ou sinon une cuisine commune à disposition.
il est également bien placé à 15 mn à pieds du centre de Porto,  et également d'une station de métro qui peut nous amener à l'aéroport.

très important le numéro de l'immeuble est 766.  il n'apparaît pas sur le site.

Maria est très accueillante, réactive, et serviable. La maison est bien placée, à 15 min du centre et 5 min de la station de métro, dans une rue tranquille. Le studio est propre et fonctionnel, en hiver il fait un peu froid, il y a juste un petit chauffage d’appoint. Sinon bon séjour à Porto :)

A Maria recebeu-nos super bem e foi muito flexível com o check-in pois chegámos um pouco tarde.
O espaço era limpo e cómodo.
Obrigada
Maria is very friendly and her place is in a great location for exploring Porto.
Excelente lugar, super recomendo, nosso melhor lugar que ficamos.

O apartamento é a cerca de 5-10m de uma estação de Metro, tem pastelarias e supermercados perto, fomos muito bem recebidos (tanto a Maria quanto a Manuela foram muito atenciosas e sempre prestativas), o preço é ótimo, o quarto tem uma pequena cozinha e uma pequena casa de banho, mas deu perfeitamente para três pessoas, as camas são confortáveis, tudo muito limpo, a casa toda foi remodelada e muito bem remodelada, o chão de madeira era ótimo, não fazia barulho. Ficamos três dias em Abril, ou seja, em temperatura amena, mas pareceu-nos que no Verão deve fazer calor neste quarto (o de cima), vimos que tinha ventoinhas mas não sei se será suficiente ou não.

Great room in a good location! Room very cosy and clean, to reach the city centre you have two option: less than 20 minutes walking form the principal attraction (and in the meantime you can find a lot of pubs and services.. A very pleasant walk) or with the metro! Maria is super kind, highly recommended! Thank you Maria!
Maria was amazing host, very friendly and helpful. The place was great, with private bathroom and small, fully equipped kitchen. I would highly recommend!

Un logement conforme à l'annonce, proche du metro Avec supérette et cafés juste à côté.
Toujours à l'écoute, Maria sait se rendre disponible et n'hesite pas à rendre service en cas de besoin.
Je recommande vivement cet hébergement

Agradable y tranquilo. El patio es acojedor y la habitación también.
Estuvimos en el altillo y seguramente en verano sea muy caluroso si no se dispone de aire acondicionado.
Sehr angenehme Unterkunft mit allem was man für einen Kurztrip in Porto braucht! Reisezeit war im Mai.

Maria e Manoela são excelentes pessoas, nos recepcionaram maravilhosamente bem. A casa é muito bem localizada, ha todo tipo de comércio proximo. O quarto é limpo e iluminado, chuveiro ótimo. Senti um pouco de falta de janelas (só há basculantes) mas para uma estadia rápida não há problema. Não recomendo o quarto para crianças pequenas pois há uma escada muito ingrime e um acesso para o telhado que pode ser perigoso.

Confortable . Pas trop loin de Baixa et de la Casa da Musica, proche de stations de métro et de bus. Quelques spots sympas pour le petit déjeuner . Ne pas hésiter a partir a la découverte des rues du quartier. Maria est une hôte fort sympathique et attentionnée . Une rencontre agréable .

Nos ha gustado mucho la estancia,  es una guardilla muy bonita y además hay una terraza y una cocina completa común.  Las camas són cómodas y se puede cocinar correctamente en la cocina de cada habitación.
Muy buena estancia. Maria es una mujer muy agradable y se preocupa por sus huéspedes! Si tuviera que volver a Porto, le volvería a escribir
Room was really beautiful and most of all clean. Maria was really kind.
Falta de informações exatas do quarto e problemas no check in , não tivemos uma boa recepção inicial e expectativa em relação a acomodação.
Todo bien!

El alojamiento de María está bien ubicado , se puede ver el centro de la ciudad sin mover el coche. María es amable y educada 
 El alojamiento no nos ha resultado cómodo, hacía mucho calor, es cierto que han sido días de temperatura elevada, pero creo que es una habitación mal aislada. Además, no tiene armario, no puedes sacar la ropa de la maleta.

Notre séjour à porto s'est super bien passé. Nous remercions maria pour son accueil et sa gentillesse. Maria est très arrangeante pour les heures d'arrivées, nous sommes arrivés à 23h30 et elle était présente pour nous accueillir et nous présenter les lieux. Le studio au dernier étage est très propre, très bien agencé et très bien équipé. La maison est très bien située, à 15 Minutes à pieds du centre historique de porto, avec des petits restos et magasins sur le chemin. 
Nous remercions encore maria et nous recommandons vraiment cet hébergement.

The location is really amazing, you can reach the city center easily by feet walking through a pleasant street.
Maria is super kind, flexible and quickly answered to our requests.
The room we rented is located on top of the house, it’s clean and comfy. We heard some other guests a bit too loud late in the night on one occasion, but we think it’s only a case.
Well suggested for your stay in Porto!

We stayed at Maria’s place for 9 nights. It is well located and the flat has a kitchen and a bathroom included. It was very clean and Maria was very friendly although communication was a bit difficult. A bit disappointing was the lack of a proper knife, board or soap. Also the pots and pans were a bit small. The kitchen is included but you can’t cook that much with these utilities. Nonetheless it was a great stay especially for the price and the great location.
Muy amables
staying at Maria's place was great, it was clean and maria was very friendly and nice. room was big and very well equiped. would very much recommend!

Die Unterkunft ist sehr klein und süß. Für zwei Personen hat es gereicht. Die Lage ist perfekt, es ist alles fussläufig zu erreichen. In ca. 10 min erreicht man den Torre dos Clérigos, Livraria Lello, sowie etliche Bars und Lokale ( Galeria de Paris).

O espaço da Maria é próximo de metro, o que facilita o viajante que está sem condução própria. Não a conheci pessoalmente, mas ela foi solícita e simpática em todas as nossas solicitações. O espaço que ficamos só não é adequado para as pessoas que estão com malas grandes, pois a escada é estreita e dificulta subir com malas.

neighborhood_overview: Ipanema é um bairro nobre da cidade brasileira do Rio de Janeiro, fundado, em 1894, por José Antônio Moreira, conde de Ipanema. Faz divisa com os bairros de Copacabana, Leblon e Lagoa. Etimologia O nome dado pelos índios Ipanema significa "água ruim, rio sem peixes" em tupi-guarani. O nome faz referência a uma região em Sorocaba, onde José Antônio Moreira Filho ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)), feito segundo barão de Ipanema em 1847 (e conde em 1868), tinha uma metalúrgica. Nessa mesma região, havia a Real Fábrica de Ferro São João do Ipanema, aos pés do Morro de Ipanema. Era um minerador e comprou as terras onde hoje está localizado o bairro carioca e decidiu homenagear seu local de nascimento, a vila de São João de Ipanema, hoje pertencente a cidade de Iperó. História O desenvolvimento da Zona Sul foi forçado pela chegada da corte portuguesa no século XIX, quando a população da cidade (capital na ocasião) passou de sessenta mil para quinhentos mil habitantes. A corte preferiu seguir rumo nort
notes: - Porteiro 24 horas diariamente. - Cameras de segurança por todo o prédio. - Próximo ao Metrô, pontos de ônibus e taxis  - Proximo aos supermercados do bairro.
transit: A Estação Nossa Senhora da Paz e General Osório são estações de metrô situadas no bairro de Ipanema, na cidade do Rio de Janeiro. Antes de sua inauguração, a estação Gal Osorio, cogitou-se que se chamaria Tom Jobim.  Near the station 4, and the subway street - Gal Osorio station, which greatly facilitates the movement! You will love my space because the location is special!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Falar de nós mesmo soa falso....Corremos o risco de exagerar as virtudes e minorar os defeitos.....Porém para que os nossos amigos tenham uma idéia da nossa personalidade, tentaremos de alguma forma falar de nós por nós mesmos......Independentes sempre....Prezamos a capacidade do ser humano de ir além dos seus limites, reconhecer um erro pedir perdão e perdoar.....Oferecer alento estender a mão, compartilhar o bom e o belo, aprender constantemente com quem tem muito a ensinar...Ser o Sol da nossa família isto sim nos dá prazer e orgulho, estarmos e sermos para eles e por eles acima de tudo, Renunciarmos o que nos causa dor o que nos faz mal, não gostamos do desgaste da teimosia diante do incontestável, mas vamos adiante em nossos propósitos se eles realmente valerem a pena, raramente voltamos atrás em nossas decisões, pois pensamos muito antes de (Website hidden by Airbnb) conseqüências são assumidas com a maturidade adquirida. Amar e sermos amado, pois o amor é fundamental em nossas vidas.

 (Hidden by Airbnb) : @verofabris

reviews.comments:
This duplex is in an amazing location in Ipanema - safe and quiet, yet close to restaurants, bars and shops. The flat is actually two complete separate flats joined by an internal staircase - so unless you need that, you are paying for space (eg 2 kitchens) you don't use... Two nice bedrooms, good WiFi, and importantly good air con! Nice with the common pool downstairs but not suited for sunbathing. A bit run down apart hotel but overall a good though expensive option.
(And genius old school tape recorder on the sound deck - wish I knew, would have brought some of my old mix tapes that I can't listen to any more!)
Veronic is so nice and very helpful!

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay in the apartment. It is very central, calm and you can walk everywhere by foot. Everything was clean, the kitchen is well equipped and the bed is really comfortable! The only negative thing was that we had two electrical power outages while we were cooking. This wouldn't have been a big problem if we would have known that there is a second fuse box in the corridor. Nevertheless the communication and service was great and the problem got fixed quickly. All in all we can really recommend this apartment, it is perfect even for a short or long vacation in Porto!

Our was globally good: the studio is new and clean, very central and there's everything you need for a nice stay in Porto (nice bathroom, little kitchen, tv, all kinds of housewares ... The localization is great in heart of the city and 5-10 minutes by walk from the historic centre. We just had the problem that the cleaning was not done when we arrived, but all got ok when it was fixed. We may had that the bed and the pillows were a bit hard but it's ok for the price. The neighbourhood is a bit noisy due to nightlife activities (restaurant and bars, w Except that, everything was good and we enjoyed our stay.
Ubicación perfecta. El piso es menos bonito que las fotos, pero todo ok.

I think the water heater, broken floor and the electricity facility is old(We got the black out during we lived there) should be informed first. Because I think those are big problems.
Except those problems others were good. The location and the surrounding are good. Near the supermarket and the subway.
Exatamente como nas fotos, ótima localização. Muito bom!
Céntrico, perfecto para ir caminando a todo sitio. Ideal para pareja. Pequeño pero idealmente funcional. Limpio y cidado. Atención inmejorable!
Very cute little apartment ideally situated in beautiful Porto. Easy to get to from the airport and then you can simply walk everywhere you like! Service and communications with the host were great.

Были вынуждены выехать ранее, вернули стоимость за эти дни. Предложили сами. Спасибо! 
Рекомендую.
Le logement est propre et très bien situé mais il est très sombre, la seule fenêtre du logement donne sur un mur (agrémenté de climatiseur donc plutôt bruyant!). Je ne le recommanderai pas...

The location is great and the communication with the host was excellent! However, the place does not look as nice as it does on the photos, especially the bathroom. There were some broken tiles and humidity on the ceiling. Also, there's a lot of noise coming from an air conditioning right outside the window. We stayed in room 1E I believe.

El apartamento está bien. Es tal cual se ven en las fotos. Hay poca luz, pero eso también se deduce cuando miras las fotos. Está bastante limpio todo, menos el baño que huele un poco mal (a tuberías). Tuvimos un desencuentro en la llegada y han tardado mucho (una hora y un poquito) en llevarnos las llaves, esto fue lo más incómodo de todo el viaje! Pero en general está bien, la ubicación es perfecta para recorrer la ciudad andando y conocer los principales puntos turísticos.
L’appartement était moins bien que ce que l’on attendais .. mais ça a fait l’affaire. Proche de tous et climatisé nous avons passé un bon voyage !

It's a very good location and Isidro the host generally was very good at responding to my questions in a timely manner. There was a bottle of wine when we arrived which was a very nice gesture. And the apartment has air conditioning which was really handy for this time of year. It does work and does a good job at cooling down the apartment especially for sleeping. It was quite noisy around there - people running up and down the stairs at night and there was a large air conditioning unit outside the window that made a lot of noise. I use ear plugs so it was ok - but light sleepers might struggle without. If you want an apartment which is near everything and use it mainly for sleeping then this is a good option. The kitchen is very basic - we didnt cook anything in there as it was quite limited. The restaurant right next door (Pedro dos frangos) is affordable and very tasty food - although be prepared for not the best service. But it was a unique experience!

Worst communication ever. Not recommended. I arrived on Fri, 17 to Porto. Since last Tuesday I didn't have any answer to my mails. I had to call them by phone and after some excuses they told me I had been told the check in time, what is not true. Furthermore, at last they told me to be there at 5pm and even then they were late. The room is darker than in the pictures and the air conditioning is very loud. Also the neighbors arrived late in the night and they were so loud we woke up because it seemed they were opening our door.

The place was tidy, accessible and very central as we were able to basically walk pretty much everywhere. The host met us personally, gave us some recommendations and city maps for travelling around. Overall, we would recommend this place to anyone :-)
Todo bastante bien,había humedades en el baño y el fregadero no tragaba bien,pero no me interfirió porque hice todas la comidas fuera de casa no  tuve que cocinar
appartement parfaitement situé, tout est faisable à pied. l'appartement dispose d'une cuisine, de l'air conditionné tout ceci dans un état convenable. merci :)

The location of the apartment is perfect to explore Porto as you can walk everywhere.
The apartment itself is dark and not as nice as on the photos, but definitely good enough if you plan on spending most of your time outside !

Hormis le vollet roulant defayant de la fenêtre, la fenêtre qui ne ferme pas à clé, le bruit des clim la nuit et la chaise de la table (déjà réparée mais qui n'est pas stable), l appartement est propre et tres bien situé. Accueil très chaleureux.
Right in the heart of Porto! We were surprised how Central the location was, and it made it easy to move around the city. Room was very clean and very well priced. Would definitely stay here again!

super emplacement. Très bon séjour, studio très propre et bien équipé.  Il est vrai qu il y a du bruit mais cela ne nous a pas posé de problème. 
Je recommande ce studio

The place was nice, very well located in the city center and clean . The only problem was that the locker in the one window that existed was broken and we couldn’t lock it. Besides that the location was great and the communication with the host was very fast and helpful.

Very kind and polite person. The apartment is very clean and according to description. I highly recommend it.

This bnb is everything that is described & more. The host(s) are very wonderful, friendly & informative & accommodating. It is very close to the subway, grocery store & even downtown. I would surly recommend staying here if you are going to stay overnight in Montréal.
Noémie was a great host and her home is absolutely lovely, it has a very classic and comfortable feel to it. I'd definitely come back!

Personne tres acceuillante rien a redire

A great place, would definitely recommend. 
Conveniently close to transit and a grocery store, but far enough away from the city to be peaceful and relaxing. 
Noémie is a wonderful host, and is eager to share info on what to do in Montréal. 

A prodigious amount of pillows were also supplied.
Be aware: the room is cuter in real life than the photo. Such a pretty place. Couldn't ask for more. Thank you for everything !

Host was very welcoming and very friendly. The place was very accessible and very clean. Also the bedroom was unexpectedly huge! Host also provided lots of information and guidance. Overall the experience is very positive. I also had great night sleeps at her place!!

Noémie is an exceptionally dedicated host. She made us feel at home right away and asked several times if there was anything we needed. I told her it would be nice if we could sleep on separate beds, and when we arrived she had prepared an extra bed for us! We had access to all common spaces and amenities, and I have to say this apartment is SO charming and welcoming! The kitchen was my big favorite. The apartment is not in the center of town but very conveniently located: in a quiet residential area just 5 min away from a subway station and a supermarket. And also from that subway station is at the beginning of the gay village, on St Catherine street (the one with the rainbow), where there are many bars and restaurants. Noémie provided us with lots of tips about the surrounding areas. I just wish we had more time to hang out with her! Bottom line is: don't hesitate, this listing is what all Airbnb rentals should be like.
Very nice place and friendly host, close to downtown, tidy, clean and quiet

Comfy couch that converts into a double bed, TV with netflix, etc.. Our hosts were so friendly and accommodation, it actually felt sad to leave! We live just over the bridge, so we're happy we'll be able to make our stays at Ian's place a more regular thing!

summary: The flat is very close to Taksim square and İstiklal street. Flat is also very close to metro station(şişhane station). Flat is close to Karaköy and Eminönü. Karaköy is 15 minutes to walk or 7-8 liras to taxi. Eminönü 20 minutes to walk and 10 liras to taxi. The flat is full furnished and hitorical architecture.
description: The flat is very close to Taksim square and İstiklal street. Flat is also very close to metro station(şişhane station). Flat is close to Karaköy and Eminönü. Karaköy is 15 minutes to walk or 7-8 liras to taxi. Eminönü 20 minutes to walk and 10 liras to taxi. The flat is full furnished and hitorical architecture.

reviews.comments: Perfect location. Perfect staff and communication. The apartment is very nice situated in a very beautiful building. The street is very calm, full of cats and it gives one a very local experience. At the same time it's literally a 5 minute walking distance to either Istiklal str. and Galata tower. The place offers peaceful stay in a nice spacious apartment that has everything one could ask for. The price is very good for an area that is basically composed of 4 and 5 star hotels. So we definitely recommend Vural's place.
Vural is a great host. Super friendly. I felt like home here with him. He even cooked omelette for me, it was delicious.

Good location, accesible location near Galata Tower, in front of the Galatasarai FC stadium.

Well equipped kitchen.

Vural was a friendly host, always easy to contact and helped us with what we needed.

Internet works good although wifi signal is not the best in the bedroom.

If you are good with some bohemian style, will feel very confortable at his place.

The location is just perfect. From here you could very well discover Isanbul. The house and the apartment are typical similar to Central European post-war buildings. The apartment is clean. the room is large and the bed is very large and comfortable. Vural and his friend are very nice, helpful.
Vural is a very welcoming host, we had a great time in Istanbul in a clean and cozy apartment. Vural has kindly offered to drive us to the airport on the day of departure. Highly recommended!
Very nice room near istiklal city , and other cool places in beyoglū

Vural is a very nice and hospitable person and always offered to help.  At the same time he very much respected my privacy. The location is superb. The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars for the location is, that it is not directly in galata. But it is just a 2min walk. So still super!
Vural was nice and helping.

Vural is a really kind chap, the room was perfect and in a brilliant location. I wanted to be near the bars and restaurants and it’s literally a 2minute walk from the buzz, but you get a nice quiet street to sleep in. 

He was helpful right throughout my trip in Istanbul even after leaving the house. Helping with booking a balloon in Capadoccia and good clubs to go to.

We had great chats about football in the evening and he kindly offered to find me tickets to games. When I left, he told me to wait and then gave me a Turkish football scarf as a gift. Such a nice gesture. 

I also met his girlfriend who is lovely and very helpful. 

All in all a great experience. Thanks

being with Vural in his house was really a pleasure, I was welcomed as a friend since day one. the room was nice, comfy and clean so the rest of the house. the location is the best location you can ask for, if you are visiting istanbul and really want to be in the heart of the city. it is near by metro stations, thou you can walk to many places like taskim sq, karakoy, the spice market and the istabul museum of moder art. apart from this, the area is near by a nice street full of cafes, restaurants, shops and the area is very characteristic  and vibrant. it is very safe i walked back home buy myself everyday and never felt in danger. vural is a very great host, we had really nice conversations about the city and its culture, truly recommend this space to all
Everything great!
Great location to İstiklal Street and public transportation. I loved being close to many places to walk to and experience.

Vural is a friendly and helpful host. His place was located very close to Taksim area, one of the most happening locations of the city. The room was nice and clean. However, the room might not be suitable if you want more privacy. I recommend the place to other travellers.

Best airbnb place i stayed so far in istanbul. Centrally placed,  historical apartment in a quite neigbourhood. High ceilings, stylish decoration, sparkling clean, comfortable room, outstanding hospitality...

name: Unit close to CBD available for Christmas & NYE!
summary: Welcome to our bright and cosy home, located in a quiet area which is a short train ride directly to the famous Sydney NYE Fireworks!
space: The apartment is in a small, secure,  building on the first floor.  Our home has a big combined living/dining room, fully equipped kitchen, two good sized bedrooms, a clean bathroom and a balcony.  The living room is spacious and bright with cosy chase sofa, foldable dining table and large space for Yoga. The balcony is accessible from the living room.  The main bedroom is large and airy with a comfy queen bed, huge built-in wardrobe, drawer chest and drawers under the bed.  The second bedroom has a comfy single bed with drawers and a baby cot, plus a double wardrobe. The cot will remain in the room and if you have a baby you are welcome to use the  cot free of charge and we can leave the toys as well.  All kitchen necessities, as well towels and linnen are provided.  Please remember, this is our home, so be respectful and keep it clean and safe. Please be polite and quite, this is a family building, so no parties. Sorry no pets. Smoking only on the balcony. Please note we do not have
description: Welcome to our bright and cosy home, located in a quiet area which is a short train ride directly to the famous Sydney NYE Fireworks! The apartment is in a small, secure,  building on the first floor.  Our home has a big combined living/dining room, fully equipped kitchen, two good sized bedrooms, a clean bathroom and a balcony.  The living room is spacious and bright with cosy chase sofa, foldable dining table and large space for Yoga. The balcony is accessible from the living room.  The main bedroom is large and airy with a comfy queen bed, huge built-in wardrobe, drawer chest and drawers under the bed.  The second bedroom has a comfy single bed with drawers and a baby cot, plus a double wardrobe. The cot will remain in the room and if you have a baby you are welcome to use the  cot free of charge and we can leave the toys as well.  All kitchen necessities, as well towels and linnen are provided.  Please remember, this is our home, so be respectful and keep it clean and safe. Please
neighborhood_overview: Hurlstone park is a great, safe and quiet family neighbourhood with wide, shady streets and lots of parking, big park and lots of playgrounds. There are few playgrounds close to our home, one is just up the street and there is one enclosed playground just opposite the excellent bakery café on the main street. The Cooks river walk/bike path and the big park is just 5 minutes walk. The park is right next to the Cooks river pat and has big grassy areas with shades and covered tables for picnics, kids playground and football field. To the west you can walk down to Aldi/Woolworths in Canterbury and to the South/East towards Marrickville.
notes: $300 fully refundable key deposit is required.
transit: Our place is on the Bankstown line which takes you directly to Sydney CBD or Circular Quay (home of the Sydney Opera house and the famous NYE firework). These are approximate distances t o important places from our place: - 2 minutes walk to the train station & bus stop - 10 min walk or 1 train stop to the light rail that takes you to Darling Harbour - 25 min train ride to Sydney CBD - 2 min walk to the main street where you can find a supermarket, Asian shops, a bakery, excellent bakery café, few hairdresser and beauty salons, news agent, ATM, laundry & dry cleaners  - 5 min walk to the great Cooks river bike/walking pathway - 5 min drive/15 min walk/1 train stop with the Bankstown line to Aldi/Woolworths supermarkets -  10 min drive to Ashfield shopping mall or 15 min on the bus 406 (bus stop in front of the train station) - 2 min walk to the bus stop (in front of the train station) where you can take route 418 which will take you to Bondi Junction (1hr ride)  - Sydneham junction tra
access: Our entire home is at your disposal.
interaction: You can contact us via email, or viber and we will also leave contact numbers from our friends/neighbours.
house_rules: - Quiet hours 10pm - 8am

host.host_about:
Hello fellow travellers! We are a young family of three that enjoys traveling, exploring new places, meeting new people and sharing knowledge and experiences.
Pre-baby we travelled a lot and our favorite destinations so far are Amsterdam and Thaliand. 

Our travel experiences enriched our lives and enhaced our firm belief in sharing, nurturing and respect for human relationships and Nature. 

We believe that people are people, and they have more or less same issues or life questions and strive for happiness no matter what their socioeconomic, religious or cultural background is. After all, we are all made of the same material - Star dust, all other differences are just shades on the canvas called life.

reviews.comments: 非常好

Appartement parfait pour trois personnes ou couple + 1 enfant. Littéralement à deux pas de la station de train Hurlstone Park sur la ligne T3 qui amène au cœur de Sydney donc très pratique pour visiter la ville tout en étant au calme. Quartier résidentiel très calme avec petits commerces dans la rue adjacente et parc pas loin. Bref idéal pour aller découvrir Sydney en étant dans un petit coin calme. Rien à redire sur la propreté des lieux. Nous ne nous sommes pas croisés avec Angelina mais elle a su répondre à toutes nos demandes. Merci à elle et sa famille pour ce séjour.

name: Cute Tiny Room Family Home by LGA NO CLEANING FEE
summary: Come shower, rest, WIFI! Cute Tiny room in family home.  No Cleaning Fee. Shared bathroom, 1 flight up. *LATE CHECK-INS WELCOME!  SELF CHECK IN/OUT. Best Suited For: Layovers, Flight Crew, Solo Adventurers, Business Travelers  *WALK to/from LGA (approx. 20 mins) *15 minute (7) EXPRESS TRAIN to TIMESQUARE *1-3 nights max stay for guests who will be out & about during the day. *NOT FOR: -Lite Sleepers (periodic steps/barking) -Those who are CLAUSTROPHOBIC -Rude &/or Entitled people

Be sure to follow the detailed instructions provided in the “check in message” I send.  *There may be periodic cleaning in the room for guests who stay longer than 3 days. This does not mean you should leave messes.  *All stains on towels, rugs & bedding are subject to extra cleaning fee or replacement fee.  *Guests who checkout late without permission will incur extra charges including an admin fee for wasting everyone’s time. *We use fragrances in our home, the room & linens - note for those who h

reviews.comments: Thank you!!! Everything went smoothly and it was a great way to start my trip! Danielle was very easy to communicate with and she made sure I felt right at home!
Great value

Danielle's place is a wonderful little room for anyone! It was close to all public transportation and restaurants. The room was super clean and very comfortable. A perfect place to stay! I personally took the subway everyday into  Manhattan to explore the city even more and although I loved it, I found I loved coming back into the queens because I was welcomed by this little cute house. Definitely would recommend this house for all types of different activities whether it be for business or just to get to know the city, it's definitely a good place to stay!
Another great stay - clean, comfortable and quiet!
Danielle is such a great host and very accomodating. The place is exactly the way it is pictured. A very cozy and warm place to stay. Two thumbs up!

Location - Less than $4 from Junction Station in Uber pool, $7 direct. 15 minute express train to Grand Central station. $6 Uber to LGA or several local bus stops will get you there within 20 minutes. Perfect location, perfect commute, and great find. Shea Stadium...oh yeah, Citi stadium now is 5-10 minutes away for all you METS fans. 
House - totally renovated home, gorgeous interior, high-end atmosphere. Home sits in middle of a quiet block.
Room - As described but pictures do not do justice for the interior. Really. The room is downstairs along with another room where host stays. Totally private and quiet...perfect for me to work in the room. High-end bedding and everything you need for your stay...even an iron. Wifi was (Website hidden by Airbnb) issues at all.
Bathroom - upstairs, small with shower. Again, very nicely updated. Gorgeous home.
Overall - highly recommend.
Absolutely fantastic :)
Danielle was very kind! The room was so clean and comfortable. Great location if you are arriving at LGA!
Once again another good stay.  Great airbnb! Can't wait to come back!

Danielle was an excellent host and keeps a superbly cozy room for all travelers. Strong wifi, effortless parking, yummy tacos a few blocks down, and I slept more than comfortably. Would definitely stay again.
Cute cozy and tidy room! Nice and friendly host. The room has everything you might need. Very close to LGA. I would highly recommend it.
Danielle is wonderful! I have stayed in a couple of her rooms and they have all been wonderful! She is wonderful host!!!
Danielle is a friendly and warm host. Her attention to detail doesn't go unnoticed, and is deeply appreciated. I would absolutely recommend her place to anyone.

This place is cozy and comfy and wonderful! It's a wonderful home away from home! And the family is so nice! Definitely would recommend this place! It's super clean too and smells lovely! I love the flowers everywhere!
So clean, so many amenities, and such an all-around comfortable stay. Can't wait to stay here in NY again!
Repeat customer. Can't say enough about the cleanliness, comfort and hospitality offered. Will be back
The room is very cozy. The cats are friendly. Just a nice place to chill before a flight. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful.
Another great stay with Danielle!  Her rooms are comfortable, clean, and quiet.  Danielle's rooms are my favorite place to stay near LGA.
great stay. thoroughly enjoyed it
Beautiful in and out, charming host and attention to small details !
Danielle has a very cozy place and she is very helpful.  I plan to return and highly recommend her place.
A very beautiful house, from inside and outside. Very clean!!! The room is in the basement, so you dont hear the airplanes. In the room, you have AC.
Danielle's place is a haven of tranquility. Everything is immaculately clean. I had a very early flight from Laguardia and I walked there in 20 minutes. I had a very restful night
Definitely a great and comfortable place to stay at. Good neighborhood and very convenient location near LGA. Would definitely stay at again in the future.
Danielle is a great host! Very friendly and provides a clean, comfortable room. The neighborhood is quite, with restaurants and shops near by
Yet again, Danielle's place was a great place to stay.  Her rooms should be on the top of the list for those who need to be near LGA.  5 stars!

Danielle and her family give a warm welcome in their beautiful home. They have 3 lovely dogs and 2 cute cats. The pets also give a warm welcome. If I am going to NYC again, i am definitely staying at her place again!

This is one the best hosts in New York. The house is clean and the private room is perfect. It was a pleasure to stay there. It is a very good value for the money you spent. The host is very helpful and hospitable. Recommend this host for others when visiting New York for a short trip.

Very clean, professional, laid out everything I could possibly need. House was incredibly clean. Laid out earplugs - didn't need them. Room is in basement 1st floor, no windows, very quiet, perfect for sleeping. Host stayed up late to accommodate me, despite 30 minutes late.
I really can recommend staying at Danielles place.

Really close to LGA. 
The room is cute and clean. And Danielle is so kind.
The house is easy to find and danielle is really friendly and accommodating . It's perfect for travellers. Room was really cozy and clean.

Nicest of 4 rooms I've tried that I consider walkable to LGA, although this one I'd Uber next time as it is a 20 minute brisk walk to Terminal C via 94th St. Bridge.  Danielle's place definitely seems more like you are staying with her family in their primary residence since there is no separate (Website hidden by Airbnb) Danielle escorted me in through the living room to the basement stairs, her sweet Mom was cooking a nice meal in the kitchen which is where the downstairs door and guest bathroom both are situated....again a more personal interaction than most AirBnBs but a nice human element.  The home is impeccably decorated throughout...very beautiful.

The bedroom is the comfiest stay I've had with a small but good quality bed and a ducted a/c unit that cooled it down nicely.  Great touches like nice iron/board, snacks/water, maps, etc.  Only caveat is that when Danielle puts the adjective "small" in her listing title she isn't being conservative....this room is quite tiny and not a place you can do much than fall into bed, but it's a great cool quiet rest environment!  WiFi is very fast....bathroom upstairs is nice but small with no counter space but again lots of nice touches like complimentary soaps, shampoos and even shave cream, aftershave, qtips, etc.
In total, Danielle has put much thought and personal pride into this (Website hidden by Airbnb) was by far the nicest quality room and overall home I've tried in the close-to-LGA Astoria listings.  If you don't need much room space and just a nice sleep environment, this listing can't be beat!

Danielle and her family were so lovely and welcoming. I thoroughly enjoyed my short stay, and would highly recommend Danielle's place! Everything was exceptionally clean and tidy. Hope to be back in NYC very soon :)

The whole apartment was absolutely clean and through a number code at the entrance door always accessible.  We could use the kitchen as well as the living room. The ride to Manhattan may take 45-60 minutes each way, bus Q49 runs frequently (Q19 less), also through the night. Danielle and her parents were very friendly and I especially liked the presence of the 2 cats and 3 little dogs. Personally I was less happy to have received for my second stay a room without a window (basically for the same price as a room with window), which made me feel a bit claustrophobic. I would have preferred one of the other three rooms having been rented. The Middle East restaurants at Steinway Street in Q are reached within a 10-minute bus ride, so is bustling Flushing. All in all I gladly would like to return to this place.
Cozy, clean, and pet-friendly  space. Danielle was such a wonderful hostess; you can tell she put a lot of thought and care in the room. Thanks for a great stay, Danielle!

Such a beautiful home to stay in with a great host to assist every step of the way. I felt as if I was at a hotel because not only was the home so clean, but the host even provided items for guest during their stay which was very kind and generous. If I'm ever in New York City again this is where I'll be staying! Thank you!
Danielle's place is definitely a home away from home and she is a great host.
Great place. Very close to LGA.
It was my first time to try air bnb and definitely I'd recommend Danielle's place to everyone!   Cozy, clean, comfortable!  I'd like to come back for my next visit to NY!
Literally the best Airbnb I have ever had the pleasure of staying in!!
Just as described.
Great location, 20 minutes' walk from LaGuardia. Danielle was very responsive and good at communicating. The room was  nice and clean/tidy with all the facilities necessary. Would recommend!
The room is very cosy and clean and conveniently located next to La Guardia airport, Danielle is very nice and well-organized!
Highly recommended for cool calm relaxed folks. This family is one in a billion. Thanks
A perfect place! Especially for those flying out of LGA. A short walk from public transit and to the airport; great for those with an early flight! I would definitely use again!
Danielle's place,as always,  is amazing! Nice cozy room and friendly family. I love staying here!

If you're fresh off of the plane and tired, this is one of the best places to rest your head. It's cozy, quiet, FULL of amenities, and so pretty! Danielle is such a sweet and wonderful host who deserves all of the stars. I highly recommend her place!

This experience was way better then any 5 star hotel experience. I work for hospitality industry, I can guarantee that space management is better then any big hotel chain. Very simple and friendly people. Best part it "FEELS LIKE HOME".  I slept like a baby, very quiet and peaceful. Thanks for making my stay so great.

I only stayed for one night, but my stay was blissful: It was easy to contact Danielle, she was very helpful with everything, the room was cute and clean, relaxed atmosphere, all and all felt like home. The location was great before my early flight out of LGA. I highly recommend!

It is a great place to stay for on person who is flying into LA Guardia. Right next to great little family owned restaurants. Lovely home, the host and her parents and pets are very nice and the room is very comfortable with your very own fan and air conditioner.
It was fantastic staying. She and her parents were really kind for guests. Thank u so much for great staying.

Danielle's place was very clean and tidy and also home-like. It had all of the amenities one could want. I only got to spend about 7 hours there as I had a delay in transportation, Danielle was easily able to accomodate my very late check in time, which I really appreciated. In the morning I was actually able to walk to LaGuardia and the entrance lead right up to American Airlines gate, which was fantastic! 5/5 for everything and I'd love to stay again!
quite good
Very friendly host, close to public transportation, everything was very convenient. The decoration is beautiful, highly recommended!!
Pretty nice room. And super friendly

This location is an excellent spot for those needing a stay near LaGuardia. The room is clean, neat, and packed with everything you could imagine that you need. The check-in time is flexible, and Danielle is incredibly helpful and hospitable!
A very cute place and very clean. Danielle thought of everything to make the stay comfortable. I definitely recommend!

It was such a nice room! Very clean and very beautiful. They put some sweets and water into the room, which was perfect because after a long trip you need this stuff! Danielle parents were so lovely and helpful! Thank you very much!!!

Danielle was awesome though we never met. Accommodated me with my 2AM checkin, gave super clear instructions and gave me free chocolate! Couldn't ask for more from an Airbnb host.
The location for LaGuardia is amazing. I walked it in just over 15 minutes. Easy access to Manhattan via train or uber. This was a really nice family home and you could tell it was really well looked after. The room was excellent.
Would stay again if in NYC.
Great room, Great host
Very friendly family and cozy place right next to LaGuardia airport!
A lovely clean and comfortable room. Great for a one night stopover, much nicer than an airport hotel.  Thank you Danielle!
She & her family were so nice. Everything was decorated very pretty. The bed was comfortable & everything was very clean.
Danielle exceeded my expectations as a host ! She really thought of every detail!  Her place was clean and the room was perfect for me :) And it's super close to the airport !
Thank you Danielle for a short but sweet stay. All your thoughtful amenities were so convenient and comfortable after a late flight.

A little cumbersome for check in, but overall great place!! Great location! Close to both airports and VERY close to LGA.
Danielle was very kind to help with showing me how to get to the city. Would def recommend this place
It was a wonderful stay! Thank you for everything, Danielle! I felt really at home with your family. The area is perfect and convenient for a connection flight from LaGuardia.

I chose to book a room with Danielle because of her home's proximity to the airport (very early flight to catch). Danielle was very communicative via email before my arrival, which I greatly appreciated; I didn't end up meeting her in-person though because I arrived late in the evening and left before sunrise the following day. The room I stayed in was cute and clean, but being in the basement and having no air circulation prior to my arrival meant that the room felt stuffy and a little claustrophobic. This didn't really make my stay an unpleasant experience though, as I was only there for a few hours. I would have felt differently had I slept there for multiple nights. Overall, it was not a luxurious stay, but perfect for what I was looking for. If I had another early flight out of LaGuardia in the future, I would consider booking with Danielle again.
Very clean and accomodating
The room was perfect with everything you need.

Danielle was a great host. The place was clean, orderly, and had a cozy feel. Fast internet, close by grocery store. Playful cat. Over all a great first Airbnb experience. Hope to have more like them in the future.
Solid place! Nice family and very clean:) I felt very welcome and comfortable

Danielle's place was perfect for me, clean and comfortable and a 10-minute ride from LaGuardia airport. I really appreciated her flexibility at check-in and communication before and during my stay. 10/10 would recommend.
Everything was perfect and well-organized. Thank you!
The host and her family were very accommodating. The place was really nice and clean as the same on photos. Recommended!

Danielle and her family are extremely warm, helpful, and responsive. The place was exactly as advertised. Very close to the airport; every amenity provided; cozy, clean, and comfortable bedroom. I got in a bit late to Laguardia, and this was exactly what I needed. Thank you so much, Danielle!
Clean and super cute room. Friendly and helpful host. Exactly what I needed!

Perfect 
Nice
Clean 
Comfort
Absolutely perfect! It's super clean and extraordinarily peaceful. It's the perfect place to rest after a day of conquering Manhattan. You'll love it! ❤️

Every detail considered and room exactly as described. Immaculately clean and very comfortable. Very clear detail for check in and check out and helped me with directions from JFK. Would highly recommend staying here and will definitely be back again.

Danielle's apartment was clean and Just great to stay if you have a flight going out from LGA. You can actually walk all the way to the Airport (about 20min.) but there are also bus lines from 94th street.

Danielle was very attentive and understanding of my schedule. Even though we did not get to meet she made sure everything was in order and exactly as described. The location was wonderful and made my trip so much easier! For a single person, the location, price and space cannot be beat! I really enjoyed my stay. Thanks Danielle!

I booked sooo last minute due to some unseen circumstances during my stay in New York. Luckily I found this place around 8pm and was allowed to do a late check-in (I arrived around 10pm). The description of the place was spot on and Danielle gave amazing late night check-in directions making everything extremely easy. Although I did not get to meet Danielle personally, her messages were extremely thorough and she even helped me figure out how to use the subway to get to the place. It was quiet, cozy, and everything I needed for one night. I would HIGHLY recommend it. Thanks for the hospitality Danielle! It's possible I might stay again during my next visit!
Incredible stay. So easy and convenient. Wonderful host, super clean home and LOVE the pets in this house! Definitely staying again when I'm back.
Great room! Danielle is an excelent host. Amazing location with easy access into the city. Perfect for a short stopover.

There were no surprises, and that was a good thin; the accommodations were exactly as described. Danielle was very helpful and timely with her communication. The room is down narrow steps; if you are staying one night, pack a small bag and ask Danielle if you can leave your larger luggage on the main floor. She was kind enough to allow me to drop my luggage and change clothes before check-in time. I would stay at Danielle's again, especially if I needed to be near LGA.

I was just looking for a place to stay close to the USTA tennis center for one night, and Danielle's listing was ideal for it. Perfect for one person. The listing is accurately described on the site. It was very clean and i had everything that i needed. Although the room didn't have a window, Danielle made sure that there was sufficient ventilation and air conditioning. The room is down a narrow staircase, so if you have a large or heavy suitcase, you might want to leave it in the living room above. Danielle took care of every small detail and was very prompt with her replies. The check-in instructions were unambiguous and very easy to follow. My stay was very comfortable and I wouldn't hesitate to come back, if I went visiting the queens area again.

A perfect place to stay with a great deal! Perfect location (nearby Laguardia airport and bus station).
Super clean! And Danielle is so helpful for providing information! It was a wonderful stay. Will definitely stay here again if I come back to NYC and will recommend it to all!

What can I say about this place? It is clean, it is cozy, it is a home away from home. this place is absolutely amazing especially for the price. Not included in the price are 2 very cute and social cats that you can pet and play with. The shower and bedroom are immaculate and it cannot be stated how just charming and clean it is.  I would love to have stayed here more but alas there was only one night available and the location was fairly far away from where I needed to be. But if given the chance I would totally stay here again.

Clean and convenient 
thank you
Best of the best. Cozy and comfortable

Danielle's place is clean, stylish, and very accessible from the airport.  The pictures are incredibly accurate and the room is also super comfortable.  She's communicative about her expectations and her instructions for checking in are also helpful and detailed.  I would definitely recommend Danielle's place for future travelers!
Great stay as always!
Amazing. Top 10 list for sure.
Clean, quiet, private.  5 star value.
A cozy little place :) it’s small but you have everything (and even more) that you need, public transportation is at the end of the street
Such a charming little room and very tidy
Danielle's place was great! She is really quick to answer all messages which was incredibly helpful. Her place was a short 5 minute ride from LGA which was nice. Highly recommend!
Outstanding!  I will definitely stay here again!
Danielle’s house is very beautiful as it is a picture .If I go to LGA airport someday ,I’m sure that I will stay Danielle’s house again!Cats are very cute and I didn’t want to check out.Thank you!
Great!
A very clean, well decorated b-n-b. It is very close to the airport and the host is very friendly.
Great place to stay near LGA. I was able to check-in after midnight which was awesome.

Danielle's place is super clean and cozy. It's in the basement but because she keeps the air condition/air purifier, the air was really fresh. It's about 6-7 min drive to LGA and it's a safe neighbourhood. There's a dog in another room of the same lower level but s/he had been super quiet and friendly. There are another two cats hanging around on the first floor of the house which I met when using the bathroom and they are the most lovely ones. Danielle sent a super detailed instruction beforehead so the check-in and check-out was easy and clear. 
All in all, five stars in all the perspectives!
Great Place every time!
A tiny roomcute owner
Excellent, clean, friendly place to stay at a great value!

The small room was very clean and nicely decorated. Check in and check out were very clear. I would not recommend walking to this place alone from Junction Station (metro) at night (around 20 minutes). It was a little sketchy. However, it was very convenient being able to walk to LGA in the morning (15 minutes) to catch the purple shuttle to my terminal. The cats are very sweet and love to be played with. Danielle was a very good host.
very good
It's so cozy and clean, also easy to get to Manhattan.

Amazing decor, neat, and clean. clean towels, soap, shampoos, fresh sheets and pillow covers...everything was there. all the amenities of a hotel room but homey and personal. i even took decorations idea from this place....would stay again when i am in NY again. Also, only $10 Uber ride to LGA.
Danielle’s place is superb! Very clean, excellent communication, great location. Perfect place to stay
Great for commuting crew members.  Quick Uber away with a nice clean room.
Always great!
Convenient location and good value for the price. strongly recommended.
This is a super cute, private room very close to LGA. You have control over your heating/cooling and the WiFi is excellent. I felt right at home!
Great stay, cute cozy room w/ Superb finishing touches. Great amenities such as charger, toiletries and decor. Had a peaceful nice stay.
Great little room for a quick night in the city!
Danielle rents a great room in Queens! I was an out of town guest staying an extra day in Queens before flying back to California, and greatly enjoyed the rest I got while here.
I’ve stayed here several times, a very good spot for access to LGA.
Clean, comfortable room :) It was very nice to stay this place!!
Danielle’s place is comfortable and clean and feels like a home away from home
Always a great place to stay. Clean and convenient.
Great place great host
Had a wonderful very peaceful and quiet rest and perfect stay for a single traveller especially if you have a flight connection and need a restful overnight stay. Jeff.
Very clean and convenient to LGA
Check-in and out is easy as pie, everything is very clean and tidy. Great for a person traveling on their own.

Private and cozy space. I slept like a baby. Awesome personal touches ...this place has everything you may need.  Awesome shower. The home is spotless and the resident cats were around to say hello at the perfect moments.
Danielle’s place was very clean, and beautifully decorated! She is a wonderful host.
Wonderful and quite, that’s what I really need. The host’s cat is so Q and the doggies are lovely. Next time I will rent the house again if I have chance to NY again:)Thanks host!
Great little space to sleep. Extremely, extremely clean and well kept!
Awesome place! Clean and very stylish.
Wonderful choice for LaGuardia airport!
とても居心地の良い空間でした｡ ﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰがなかったのが残念です｡

Great space in a sweet family home. I felt very comfortable and welcome. The sweet cats there reminded me of my own sweet babies waiting on me at home . I stayed just for a long layover had dinner there, a pleasant shower, and a good rest. Thank you Danielle for the enjoyable stay!

My stay at Danielle’s house was exactly what one hopes for when using a this service. I was pleasantly surprised at how well-appointed and comfortable the space was. Danielle is a terrific host and communicator and her home is beautiful. Even though it’s listed as being “tiny” I am quite tall and was more than comfortable with the room and the bed. This is one of my best experiences ever with AirBnB and I plan on staying here again. 

Thanks Danielle!!!

I stayed a weekend at Danielle’s and the space was exactly as described. Super close to the airport in a great neighborhood, so very convenient getting to and from with a quick/cheap Uber trip. Sparkling clean and the bed was super comfortable. The space is small but perfect for a solo traveler who intends to spend their time exploring. The room includes towels, q-tips, lotion, tissues, iron/board, hangers, and a super convenient bedside charger that charges all types of phones. There was also a fan and a/c unit in the room that I was glad for, as I like to sleep in the cold. The room is also decorated beautifully, so it felt like staying in a space that was my own. Bonus: there are adorable pups and cats at this house! Would highly recommend this place to the solo traveler and would stay again if I’m in NY again soon!
Great place!

So perfectly clean. No weird smells you sometimes get in the multiple Airbnb places. The space was exactly as described. Included lots of nice touches like hangers to hang coats and bottle of water next to the bed. The WiFi code in the frame is so helpful! Easy check in and very clear instructions on which room to take.
It's a wonderful place at a great price. Highly recommend.

I had a great experience and everything was exactly how it was described. I'm a local and know the area, but this us a great location for visitors (and locals that need a clean nice place to stay too). 
Clean, comfortable, well and decorated place. Highly recommended and will book again for sure when needed!

Danielle's place is great. Only 40min from Manhattan, but calm and quiet - almost feels like a getaway from all the hustles. 
The room and the bathroom was super clean, the bed was comfortable for night's sleep. Danielle's parents are super nice, they helped me navigating helping with the transit nearby. All in all it was a great stay. Highly recommended.

Perfect room for LGA line holder commuters. Uber less than $10 and about 10min walk from Q72 stop. Ironing board for uniform, air con appliances to make it a hot or cold as you want and plenty charger space. Was allowed to use fridge/freezer in kitchen for my travel snacks. Will be booking again for next LGA trip.
Great host
Danielle’s B&B is my go to place in East Elmhurst. Never disappointed.
A wonderful stay, as usual! My go-to for a comfortable and restful stay near LGA.
Lots of nice touches. Elegant decor.  Very clean
A very good place for one person in New York!

This was my 2nd time staying here, and I will 100% always choose this airbnb when flying into LGA. Both times I've had a late flight and had no problem getting to or into the house, had an amazing and restful night of sleep, amazing shower, and felt incredibly comfortable the entire time. If you're flying into or out of LGA, you need to stay here!
Way beyond my expectation, the host is great and the cat is so cute, everything is wonderful here.
Danielle is an amazing host!
Clean place, great location, easy check in
Excellent experience. Great place to stay if you're in the area looking for one. Very close to the LGA airport.
Loved it as usual
Had a perfect stay at Danielle’s place. Great location, decoration and hospitality. Everything is clean. The kittens and pups are super cute as well.
Don’t come here, UNLESS YOU WANT to have A VERY GOOD nights rest AND GREAT HOSPITALITY.
Danielle is always an amazing host and really makes you feel at home. I highly recommend her place!
As always, my go-to for stays near LGA. Clean, comfortable.. becoming home away from home.
Danielle's place was just what I needed when my flight out of LGA got cancelled and I needed to stay overnight. Close to airport, clean, quick response. I recommend it!
The room was cute, clean and exactly as described. I had everything I needed for a good nights sleep while traveling. Thank you, Danielle!

Danielle keeps a well maintained space with some nice cats to say hi to you as you walk in. She’s very quick to respond to questions in the app. The room itself is down some narrow stairs which she warns you about  but the room itself is very nice. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice place to stay for a night or two.
Great Place !
You may not be downtown but it is so clean and neat and they are so kind and such great hosts very peaceful place to stay
Great Service!
Highly recommend this place.
Perfect place for a layover.
Comfortable, clean and quiet! I always love staying at Danielle's.
Great Place!!!
Excelente
I stay at Danielle's when I'm in NY for work. Close to LGA. Wonderful family and cute fur babies!
Very nice place to stay. Thank you so much!

Cute little space close to the airport. Just know that there are cats and dogs in the home. 
And the room is in the basement with no window, but very bright and clean.

Right off the bat, you get the strong sense that Danielle’s home is full of love and care. As I approached the door outside, a cat came right up to me to greet me. The communication leading up to my stay was thorough and clear. As I walked into the home, I was greeted with a smile and assisted to my room. The bed was very comfortable and the location is very convenient to LGA! Less than a mile away! She has thought out everything one may need and prepared/provided it. A+ stay for the value!
espaço super delicado, muito cuidado nos detalhes, limpeza impecável e ótima localização próxima ao aeroporto LGA.
Great!
Excellent stay! Danielle has thought of everything, soaps, toothpaste, you name it. Very convenient, clean and comfortable.
Daniell’s place was easy to access quiet and clean.  Thanks for a great experience!!

name: Papakea A108
summary: This GROUND FLOOR, OCEANFRONT condo is just feet from ocean access. Completely remodeled kitchen, bathroom and living room, with queen size bed in the bedroom, and queen size convertible sofa bed in the living room. Relax with the 55" SMART blue ray DVD, cable, and free WiFi. With ceiling fans in each room and trade winds, this condo rarely need the air conditioning unit in the living room. Airbnb charges a reservation fee to all guests at the time of booking. Please see "Other Things to Note"
space: Hawaii State  GET: GE-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). TAT: TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Papakea Resort has 2 pools, jacuzzis, putting greens, tennis courts, shuffleboard and koi ponds. This stunning totally renovated condo is truly directly on the ocean. You awake to the sites and sounds of the beautiful surf, dine on your lanai while enjoying the whales and breathtaking sunsets, or simply relax with a refreshing cocktail and enjoy the views of the ocean, Moloka'i and Lana'i. Walk 25 feet to take a dip in the ocean or snorkel with the fish. You really can enjoy paradise without leaving the resort. The Papakea Resort is located on North Kaanapali Beach. Papakea has 13 acres of lush tropical gardens with foot bridges and koi ponds. The tennis courts, putting greens, shuffleboard and 2 pools/ 2 hot tubs make your time as relaxing or as busy as you choose. Children especially enjoy swimming in the pools and ocean in front of the condo. You have the option of dining in or barbecuing poolside or heading
