neighborhood_overview: There is a grocery store across the street.  We are located 10 minutes from Whalers Village (shops and restaurants) and 15 minutes from downtown Lahaina (shops, shops & more shops as well as many restaurants)
notes: In addition there is a resort facilities fee of $17.00 per day (up to 10 days in any 30 day period) that will be collected by the front desk at the time of checkout. We collect the taxes of 14.42% and also the damage insurance fee of $57.21 or a $3,000 security deposit charged to credit card (refundable after stay providing no damage)
transit: This complex is located in West Maui (Honokawai), 45 minute drive from Kahului Airport.  We suggest a rental car to get to and from airport, into town and to various grocery stores, restaurants and sightseeing.
access: You have total access to the condo with the exception of any locked cabinets or closets which belong to the owners.
interaction: There is an on site concierge and the front desk is available to answer any questions.  For unit emergencies, please contact our on island manager, Tina Marshall at ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

host.host_about:
The Islands are home for us and we love that we are able to be a part of vacations, memories, and true aloha for visitors from all over the world. 

Managing vacation rentals is our great joy and the owners have become our dear and cherished ohana (Hawaiian for family) throughout the years. 

We look forward to meeting you and welcoming you to what we think is true paradise!! :)

reviews.comments: Had an amazing stay at this place. Definitely recommend!

Our stay at Tina's place was awesome. The views are wonderful and we found that we had a lot of privacy on our lanai and were able to watch the sunset daily.  The resort is very child friendly and cozy with 2 swimming pools and a concierge to help plan our stay.

Great stay over a long weekend in June. The condo was updated nicely and had everything we needed. Pros: updated space, close to restaurants and grocery, unbeatable view of Molokai from the lanai. Cons: more foot traffic than we expected out back in front our lanai and the air conditioner was pretty loud, but nothing that would prevent me from staying here again.

We experienced great snorkeling from right outside the back door! We saw Moray eels, Giant sea turtles, pufferfish, spotted box fish, unicorn fish, parrot fish, butterfly fish, Christmas wrasse, trigger fish (Humu Humu Nuku Nuku Apua’a), yellowstripe goatfish, convict tang, yellow tang, moorish idols, knife fish, trumpet fish, sea cucumber, Pencil sea urchin, sand dabs and so many others, just 10 feet from the steps of the sea wall.  There were beautiful sunsets every night, setting right over Molokai. We enjoyed our breakfasts on the patio every morning. There are free yoga classes on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday mornings and free Mai tais on Thursday afternoon's by the pool. You can also see a free hula show next door at the pink hotel on Wednesday evenings. The location was great, very near Black Rock and Lahaina. The condo was beautifully remodeled and very well equipped. We were extremely comfortable.  I really loved being on the ground floor, it felt like the whole lawn outside of the  condo was our personal lounging area and so close to the snorkeling!!!  Loved it. ( I would like to see the extra fees included in the price on the Airbnb website.  One of the things I like about Airbnb is that it is usually extremely concise and straightforward when renting a spot. Printing, signing and sending the rental agreement seemed like an unnecessary hassle, as one is already a component of renting on Airbnb.)
The host canceled this reservation 125 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Perfect if you are looking for a home away from home. The view from the room is beautiful - sun sets every day from your door step. It was very comfortable and everything in the home looks modern and new. Also the facilities pool, spa, BBQ area is great. Tina was so helpful from booking right through to after our stay. Highly recommended!!
This place is exactly how it’s advertised! A quiet resort that is relaxing and close to everything you need! Friendly staff, amazing views from the condo with beautiful sunsets!

This place was exactly what we expected and as advertised! Great place!

Only issue was no assigned parking so you may have to walk some if you come in at night!
The unit was clean, modern and so convenient. Highly recommend to anyone wanting a private, oceanfront condo in Maui.

Tina's condo is fantastic, and both my wife and I loved our time staying there.  The back door opens to a small lawn and a seawall, and you can watch the ocean and see Molokai while having a cup of coffee in the kitchen.  It's centrally located, with easy access to Kaanapali and Lahaina, and several great local spots within walking distance.  Staff and concierge at the resort itself were friendly and welcoming.

Place was great!  Very nicely updated and the (nearly) end unit is quiet and private.  Great views and sounds of ocean from patio.  

Be prepared to drive about 5-7 minutes to the “central” Kaanapali beach - there is very limited beach access onsite.

Such a great location. Far enough away from the touristy areas to feel private, but close enough to get to everything quickly. Right on the water, safe, and super clean facilities. Such a great place!

Very happy as our first trip to Maui. Loved the welcome bag and the macadamia nuts. Unit is very modern and clean. The snorkeling outside the unit is great- made friends with a sea turtle who just wants to chill during the day under a falling palm tree. Parking was great and included with resort fee. The Fish Market is within walking distance and delicious. Uber was our best friends and took us everywhere for 30$ approximately round trip- highly recommend Monkeypod and Feast at LeLe. A trip to Costco & Target when you land is a must especially with the fridge and freezer at the condo. So many turtles and so little time. I recommend the 30 minute drive to the blowhole followed by lunch at the SeaHouse and then snorkeling at the beach to the right of it- chilled with 3 turtles that day! The condo has beach chairs, boogeyboards, and a cooler. When we went to target we got a bag of ice and some of the lunch box coolers we love growing up to put in our cooler. We would book this again for sure and recommend you do too.

Such a wonderful place to stay for an entire week on this magical island!  The location is superb in that it is more secluded and quieter than the hustle and bustle of Ka'anapali but that area is still only a 5-10 minute walk away.  The kitchen was well appointed and the place is as stylish as the pictures indicate.  The view speaks for itself and the grounds of the resort were gorgeous.  Hope to stay here again!

This place was just perfect for me and my husband looking to have a balance of relaxation and exploration. Its location is perfect with beautiful sunsets every night. It had everything we needed with easy parking and it is conveniently located to delicious takeout and a convenience store. Having a glass of wine at the end of the day while watching the sunset was just the best.
We had the BEST time in Maui and our condo was perfect for me, my husband and our 15 month old!

A108 lived up to our expectations and more.  The location is perfectly located just a few minutes from General stores such as ABC store and Times supermarket, good restaurants such as The Fish Market and Ono Kau Kau, driving distance to famous landmarks such as Black Rock Beach and Dragons teeth (to name a few)  and of course the beautiful beach just outside out lanai. Tina even provided a portable crib and a high chair for our daughter.  We would recommend this place to both family and friends.  We will come back again!

My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon and we highly recommend it! The location is perfect; the condo is basically an end unit, right on the water, and just a short drive away from any westside activities, attractions, and restaurants. Tina goes the extra mile by setting up the condo with everything you can imagine, including a starter set of everything you’ll need for laundry/dishes, boogie boards and other water necessities, and anything you’ll need for cooking. You also get a welcome gift and beautiful flowers upon arrival!

While the weather was pretty hot during our stay, the window unit in the living room quickly cooled down the entire unit. The only slight downsides were some grouchy long-term residents/board members who seemed a bit unwelcoming to those of us renting and a bit of a walk back to the condo if you park later at night (but no longer than if you stayed at a hotel and parked in their garage).

Overall, the gorgeous space, convenient location, and tons of amenities in the unit easily make this a five star, highly recommended rental!
Great condo in the perfect location. I would highly recommend this place. Would stay here again over a 5 star resort.

A fabulous resort and 5 star location smack between Napili and downtown Lahaina/Front Street. This unit offers one of the best locations in the complex on the ground floor - private, pristine and quaint. Nothing beats the ocean view location and the sound of waves. We saw several whales from our patio table. The unit offers rare upgrades recently completed like flooring, kitchen and amazing shower. Furnishings are attractive, but not as comfy as we expected. A/C keeps the main Great Room cool but bedroom stays warmer.  Loved the laundry, coffee pot, cooler and beach towels. We’ll be back!
The views really are amazing, and the unit is relatively secluded compared to others on the property. It was a relaxing and peaceful stay right on the ocean.

Tina’s place is wonderful! Very clean and great location. We could walk to dinner or take a short drive to the town. The food trucks that are close by were delicious! We were sad to leave this space. The ocean was right there! It was so nice to just relax and listen to the waves crash. We could see the humpback whales from the back porch. The sun rises and sunsets were unforgettable. Everyone around was friendly. We would stay here again if we make the trip again! Would give more than 5 stars if I could!
What a great and updated condo and the location is great the best views. The ocean right outside your door. Convenient to grocery store and restaurants

name: bel appartement ensoleillé.
summary: Charmant appartement situé au troisième étage d'un triplex. Quartier vivant et authentique, plein de bons petits restaurants et d'épiceries à proximité. Proche du Mile-Ex, du Parc Jarry, de transports en commun, station de métro Parc et Acadie et bus 80.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It has been a very pleasant stay. In an apartment with all services and in a very interesting neighborhood. Perfect hostess. If I go back to Montréal, I'll go back to Faustine's house. Thanks for everything.

name: Room in just-refurbished, classic brownstone flat.
summary: Park Slope is many different neighborhoods in one - diverse music options that bring hipster kids from Williamsburg and people from all over the burroughs. Prospect Park is the people's park, with a welcoming feel and a place where it's clear people from all the half dozen distinct neighborhoods that ring the park come together, enjoy the outdoors, and mix. Chains of any sort are hard to find, and if you like walking, there's no better area for exploring and being surprised with what you find.
space: Park Slope is a family neighborhood. In summers there's always one block cordoned off for a neighorhood street party and BBQ. You feel safe, relaxed, and at home. The traditional flickering gas lamps in front of many residences remain; fireflies and sounds of children remind you that this the real experience of living in New York; and the area's many advantages - excellent restaurants, quirky shopping boulevards, central proximity to multiple subway lines, and adjacent favorite neighborhoods of Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn Heights, Gowanus and Red Hook - all help explain why the women of "Sex and the City" wound up here in the end!
description: Park Slope is many different neighborhoods in one - diverse music options that bring hipster kids from Williamsburg and people from all over the burroughs. Prospect Park is the people's park, with a welcoming feel and a place where it's clear people from all the half dozen distinct neighborhoods that ring the park come together, enjoy the outdoors, and mix. Chains of any sort are hard to find, and if you like walking, there's no better area for exploring and being surprised with what you find. Park Slope is a family neighborhood. In summers there's always one block cordoned off for a neighorhood street party and BBQ. You feel safe, relaxed, and at home. The traditional flickering gas lamps in front of many residences remain; fireflies and sounds of children remind you that this the real experience of living in New York; and the area's many advantages - excellent restaurants, quirky shopping boulevards, central proximity to multiple subway lines, and adjacent favorite neighborhoods of C
neighborhood_overview: Located squarely in the middle of beautiful, historic brownstone Brooklyn, in Park Slope (the literary center of Brooklyn and named because of its gentle sloping from Prospect Park (designed by Olmsted, like Central Park)), you'll have a truly local experience. Few tourists are seen but always welcomed, this is a real neighborhood with elements of its older "Berkeley vibe" past, and adjacent to other charming neighborhoods.  Stay where New Yorkers live, not work!
notes: Since this is a self-managed, historic/classic 4 story brownstone (meaning not big and consideration to neighbors is important), this is not a place for partying, or other disruptive, noisy, or rude behavior. Neighbors have toddlers.
transit: Center in Park Slope Proper, the apartment is equally close to the four main stops, giving lots of flexibility. 10 minutes & $7 from the Navy Yard (and much of BK shy of Bay Ridge (south) and Williamsburg (north) by hired car.
access: Get up early enough, hit the YMCA gym a few blocks away around 7 am, and odds are high you'll bump into (or deliberately give a wide birth to) hizzoner our great mayor exercising at the same modest place as always, along with throngs of kids learning to swim or kung fu. A Park Slope local, it's clear he loves every chance he gets to come back.  Otherwise, you get what you get in the city, but w/o the crowds, mostly just locals. During summer, it's the perfect doorway to Coney Island, and just a little further along, Little Moscow and then the ultra trendy but still mellow new destination surf scene in the Rockaways. Experience real ethnic neighborhoods if you want some variety - just be prepared to be the only one at the nightclub not speaking Ukrainian.  Stay where normal New Yorkers live - not where they work. Steven Buscemi and other low-profile celebs live here too, but as neighbors trying to be norms like the rest of us :). No Trump types, no mystery zillionaire buildings here. If
interaction: I am very quiet and tend to work cloistered in a corner.  Love to hike, and have spent years hiking almost every inch of the Hudson Valley, finding my own hidden oases when I want an escape, including the Adirondacks when I can. But you don't have to travel far for a recharge: one of the most spectacular scrambles is hidden in plain site just across the Hudson in the Palisades - the original home of America's film industry before Southern California became irresistible.  Also a beach bum and kayaker - if you like either, I've got penty of suggestions.
house_rules: This is a neighborhood, street and building with families and children. My neighbors have toddlers. I am only looking for people who are quiet, respectful and considerate of others. I will be largely to entirely out of the way, and it would be most helpful if you are mindful of my neighbors. No shoes in the house as well. Any food, wine, etc. please feel free to enjoy.

name: Nice appartment in Ahuntsic Montreal
summary: Appartement acceuillant et bien situé dans un quartier tranquille de Montréal, très accessible par transports en commun.
space: Nous laissons à votre disposition un projecteur, un climatiseur, tout l'équipement de cuisine et les produits de base de cuisine, de toilette et de nettoyage.
description: Appartement acceuillant et bien situé dans un quartier tranquille de Montréal, très accessible par transports en commun. Nous laissons à votre disposition un projecteur, un climatiseur, tout l'équipement de cuisine et les produits de base de cuisine, de toilette et de nettoyage. Vous avez accès à une petite terrasse à l'avant de l'appartement. L'appartement compte un salon, un coin dinette, une cuisine, une salle de bain avec douche-bain et une grande chambre avec laveuse et secheuse. Il est strictement interdit de fumer à l'intérieur. Nous serons ravis de répondre à vos questions et de vous indiquer les meilleurs endroits du coin! Grand parc, épiceries, dépanneur, pharmacie, complexe sportif et autres accessibles à pied à moins de 5 minutes. Stationnement gratuit disponible sur la rue. Situé entre les autoroutes 19, 40 et 15. Arrêts d'autobus à 3 minutes à pied de l'apartement. Stations de métro ligne bleue et orange à 10-15 minutes à pied.
neighborhood_overview: Grand parc, épiceries, dépanneur, pharmacie, complexe sportif et autres accessibles à pied à moins de 5 minutes.
transit: Stationnement gratuit disponible sur la rue. Situé entre les autoroutes 19, 40 et 15. Arrêts d'autobus à 3 minutes à pied de l'apartement. Stations de métro ligne bleue et orange à 10-15 minutes à pied.
access: Vous avez accès à une petite terrasse à l'avant de l'appartement. L'appartement compte un salon, un coin dinette, une cuisine, une salle de bain avec douche-bain et une grande chambre avec laveuse et secheuse. Il est strictement interdit de fumer à l'intérieur.
interaction: Nous serons ravis de répondre à vos questions et de vous indiquer les meilleurs endroits du coin!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Marc-Antoine a été un hôte disponible et arrangeant. Cependant le rapport qualité prix nous a semblé elevé par rapport aux prestations et les voisins ont été très bruyant.

name: Bright uptown apartment in the heart of Harlem
summary: Welcome to our bright one-bedroom apartment with a queen bed and two convertible sofas. We offer all the amenities you can expect in a hotel in the hopes of creating a home away from home for up to 6 guests. We're conveniently located 1 block from an express train downtown and 6-7 different bus lines, including an express bus to and from La Guardia airport. Two minutes from your doorstep are some of the best bars and restaurants in Harlem and major Harlem landmarks like the Apollo theater.
space: We created a space specifically for friends and family who come to visit us in New York, and we worked hard to make a warm home-away-from-home for everyone who stays there. Its a great home base for those who come to explore the city, but it is also a great little oasis for anyone who just wants to have a retreat in the heart of New York City. For more details about the specific amenities the apartment offers, please see the captions under each photo. **One detail to note is that this apartment is on the third floor of an old brownstone, so going up the stairs can feel more like 3 stories than 2 because of the high ceilings. For those with mobility issues, this is an important consideration.
description: Welcome to our bright one-bedroom apartment with a queen bed and two convertible sofas. We offer all the amenities you can expect in a hotel in the hopes of creating a home away from home for up to 6 guests. We're conveniently located 1 block from an express train downtown and 6-7 different bus lines, including an express bus to and from La Guardia airport. Two minutes from your doorstep are some of the best bars and restaurants in Harlem and major Harlem landmarks like the Apollo theater. We created a space specifically for friends and family who come to visit us in New York, and we worked hard to make a warm home-away-from-home for everyone who stays there. Its a great home base for those who come to explore the city, but it is also a great little oasis for anyone who just wants to have a retreat in the heart of New York City. For more details about the specific amenities the apartment offers, please see the captions under each photo. **One detail to note is that this apartment is on
neighborhood_overview: There are few neighborhoods in the world that have had the kind of cultural impact that Harlem has, and our apartment is truly in the heart of it all. We are a block from the Apollo, a music hall which is credited with launching the careers of some of the most talented African American artists since the 1930s. The amateur night every Wednesday is still incredibly competitive and definitely a fun thing to do in the city. There are several great jazz bars within a five minute walk, and the Studio Museum (a two-minute walk) is an excellent museum dedicated to showcasing African American art. (The gift shop is also highly recommended.) We are one block away from 125th street--the main thoroughfare in Harlem filled with lots of shopping (and some of the best outlet shopping in Manhattan), and there are several neighborhood walking tours that leave just minutes from our apartment organized around a variety of subjects, including food, heritage, jazz, and gospel-themed tours. There is also an
notes: We are generally very flexible about arrival and departure times, but on days when we are expecting one guest to check out and another to check in, we ask those leaving to do so by 11am and those arriving to come no sooner than 1pm in order to ensure adequate time to fully clean the studio. On days when there is no overlap of guests, we are completely flexible about check-in or check-out times (because even if we can't be there, we can keep the key in a lock box for you.) Regardless of whether or not you are overlapping with another guest, you are welcome to keep your luggage in our apartment downstairs, where it will be safely stored until it is time for you to leave. (And if you need to store it while you wait to check in, we bring the luggage down for you so that it is waiting for you when you get into the apartment at 1pm.
transit: The location is pretty amazing for transportation purposes as well. Our apartment is one block away from the 2 (subway) line, 2.5 blocks away from the A-C-B-D line, and 4 blocks from the 4-5-6 line. We are also one block from the M60 (an express bus that goes from La Guardia to Columbia University). Directly across from the street from the apartment is a private parking garage if you would like to keep your car there overnight, but we have a car that we keep on the street as there is free street parking all around. (It really just comes down to your personal comfort level.)
interaction: Both Amir and I are around and happy to help with anything you might need during your stay. We live in the apartment downstairs and Amir works from home, so it is usually very easy to get in touch with us quickly.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Our apartment was luxurious: very cosy, inspiring and beautifully decorated, light and fully equipped in a colourful and bustling neighborhood of New York. Communication with our hosts was excellent. They gave us plenty of tips as well and went out of their way of making our stay as comfortable as possible. We would definitely recommend staying with them when going to New York!

Fantastic apartment run by curteous and kind hosts, in a marvelous location.  Very clean and comfortable, quiet and still well located in the heart of Harlem. Wifi would be weak for those trying to use it to work, but is effective for quick searches etc.

If your goal is to explore Harlem, this apartment is located at ground zero. You're literally steps away from historical Swing Street for live music, the Apollo Theater, The Studio Museum in Harlem, old time watering holes, and a restaurant row that includes a wide variety of eatable delights (including Sylvia's soul food and Marcus Samuelsson's Red Rooster). In addition, you couldn't ask for better digs. Jessica and Amir's pad is clean, beautifully decorated, comfortable, and includes all the must-have amenities. Not only was this my favorite Airbnb stay ever, we're definitely coming back for more!

We stayed here for a week and had an amazing time!!  We loved everything about it!  Jessica was an amazing host and I honestly cannot find fault!   The location is perfect and so close to food and the subway and a great local vibe!  We thought the photos, although great, didn't really do it justice!  After staying in hotels for most of our trip this was definitely a highlight!  We went out each day exploring the city then came home at night to our little oasis
Very spacious, bright and beautiful apartment. Had all of the amenities mentioned and Jess was a great host.

We had a great time at Jessica's flat in Harlem. It was our third time staying in the area and the location just next to 125th street station was perfect to access the rest of the city. The flat was perfect for three of us and comfortable on dreary nights where we decided to stay indoors. We would definitely stay here again!

We spent some days in NY for our honeymoon and this was the perfekt spot, near subway and Wholefood and only a few blocks away from Central park. 

We love everything about this apartment! Jessica and Amir is so easy to get in touch with, really helpful and forthcoming. We arrived late one evening but Jessica were ready checking us in. Champange was waiting for us as they heard about our wedding - such a sweet surprise! 

The apartment is clean, quiet and have everything you need. We felt like home and could rest between our adventures in town. We really recommend this place!

Jessica's apartment is lovely, so bright and airy and clean, and nice and quiet, but just a minute walk away to bustling Lenox Ave and the subway. Walking distance to Central Park and around the corner from whole foods. Jessica and Amir are really friendly and the apartment was well equipped, and we loved Harlem. Would definitely recommend staying here.

We had a very good stay at Jessica's place in Harlem. We spent our 4 days exploring Manhattan and the place was perfect to chill a bit after long walks around the city. Jessica arranged an extra bed for our son in the bedroom, it was very cozy and convenient and we slept very well. Metro station and Whole Foods are about 2 minutes walk, and the place is clean and quiet. We had a really great time and I highly recommend this place.

The prefect little spot for a party of two or three. Huge windows that let all the light in but none of the noise. Beautiful plants to breath life and bring warmth to the space. Super comfortable sleeping arrangement, well equipped, right next to the essential shops you need and subway. The best part are the hosts, really considerate and welcoming and make an effort to ensure their guests are looked after. Would take this one up in a heartbeat again. Thanks Jess and Amir!
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jessica’s apartment is absolutely beautiful, immaculately clean, spacious with great air conditioning, in a beautiful, central but quiet location. Jessica and Amir are lovely generous people that were willing to help us in every way possible. This is the best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had. Couldn’t recommend more highly.

Jessica was very communicative and accommodative. She was generous to hold on to the luggage before check in and also offered us to stay until later in the afternoon for check out. The house was beautiful and comfortable.

Thanks
Adithya
An absolute recommendable choice - fascinating neighborhood - centrally located - not too far from fabulous Central Park - accomodating host.
Second time and we’ll be back! See my other review, but perfect location, great hosts, and so much to do (and eat)!
Hands down one of my favorite stays ever.  The location and apartment were amazing.. so comfortable and Jessica and Amir are great hosts.

Jessica and Amir were great hosts. Their space is perfectly located in Harlem.
They were very sweet and accommodated me with an issue on my second night.  Very good people and I would definitely stay again and recommend.   The bed is super cozy!! 
Thank you!
Es un apartamento muy bien situado, limpio y luminoso, en la habitación principal se duerme genial porqué no hay nada de ruido. Jessica fue muy amabla y dispuesta a ayudar. Repetiría sin duda.
Great hosts, good location, but the amenities could use some attention.

The two pull out beds are amazing and super easy to put back up . The bedroom mattress is also super comfortable .

Lots of very yummy restaurants on the corner. Neighborhood was quiet and the hosts are very quick to respond to any question .

Very well located in Harlem. And a very easy ride to Manhattan with the subway. Jessica and Amir are very reactive. We had a very good time in their place. We fitted at 5 person with no issue. 
We warmly recommend their flat for the space and the location.

This is simply one of the nicest apartments I've set foot in on the island of Manhattan, including the homes of friends. It's got more space than an average NYC 1-bedroom, too. The decor is hip but homey; there are toiletries and snacks/necessities, the location is perfect for Harlem, and the hosts are friendly and so helpful. Case in point: Amir carried my 50-pound suitcase up 37 steps for me upon check-in. If you're going to Harlem, this is your spot.

Jessica’s place was like a home away from home. We had everything we needed. The beds were like sleeping on a cloud, including the sofa bed in the living room. Kitchen was well equipped. Decor was homey and we relaxed with a nice selection of channels at the end of our day. Close to shopping and subway. Great stay. I recommend this location.

Jessica’s place has everything that you need. Dishes for entertaining and an open versatile space for lounging. Super comfy beds, great kitchen—accommodated a big pot of LOUISIANA Gumbo! Wonderful for an intimate gathering of friends, great energy and near Red Rooster and Harlem Nightlife. Worth every penny. Hosts were very accommodating.

We loved to be at Jessica's apartment. It was a very nice and confortable stay. It was fantastic at the end of each day so intense in NYC be able to return to such a welcoming home, specially with the children. The beds and bed clothes were very confortable, and the bathroom clean and with a good flux of water. The kitchen was very well equipped, making easy to prepare meals with the with the products we bought at the supermarket that is very close. TV with Netflix was a very good suprise!
The acess to downtown and central park was very easy once that nearby the apartment there are 3 different subway stations that allow to choose the better route to our city destination. Despite the apartment only have one room and the livingroom, it is spacious enough to 5 persons, as our family. 
Thanks alot Jessica for this oportunity that undoubtly turned our stay at NYC much more pleasent.

Das Apartment von Jessica war genau so wie es in der Anzeige beschrieben ist! Wir waren zu fünft und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. 
Das Apartment war leicht zu finden, der Check-in klappte problemlos und Jessica hat immer schnell und zuverlässig auf meine Nachrichten geantwortet. 
Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, ein Bio-Supermarkt (Wholefoods) ist nur 500 m entfernt, sodass man problemlos einkaufen gehen kann. Auch die Subway-Verbindung ist klasse, direkt am Supermarkt kann man die Linie 2 oder 3 (rote Linie) nehmen, um schnell in die Innenstadt zu gelangen. 
Alles in allem kann ich einen Aufenthalt in Jessicas Apartment nur empfehlen! Man fühlt sich wie zuhause und ich würde jederzeit wieder in dieser schönen Wohnung übernachten!

Excellent accommodation in a great location with easy access to subway and supermarket, very comfortable and clean lodging.  Jess and Amir are very accommodating and lovely to deal with. Felt like a home away from home and we would happily stay here again!
Very nice place

We loved staying at Jessica and Amir's beautiful apartment. Communication with them before and during our stay was great and they welcomed us with big smiles and open arms. The apartment was spotlessly clean, the bed and the sofa bed were very comfortable, they provided nice linens, and the apartment was beautifully decorated. It was also quite quiet in the apartment, with the bedroom facing the back, away from street noise. The location of the apartment couldn't be more perfect: right beside major subway lines to downtown, a Whole Foods grocery store, and great restaurants and cafés. We'd definitely stay here again! And we really appreciated meeting Jessica and Amir, who are very kind and friendly.

This was our first stay in Harlem and we couldn’t have been happier with the location and style of the accommodation.  These are understanding and laid back hosts, who clearly want guests to be cared for. The apartment is well appointed and equipped.

We had a slight problem with communication as I was unable to find Amir’s contact on the app while traveling and Jessica was out of the country.  Still everyone did their best.

The apartment is light and spacious and fantastic for a family with very comfortable beds.  Full size fridge, great gas stove, plenty of counter space made the kitchen very usable and a big table with plenty of chairs made eating in attractive.  Neighborhood is great, easily accessible and so close to everything- shopping, Columbia, the train, stores,  Whole Foods just a block away, clubs, parks, playgrounds and Basketball courts.

The cleanliness of the apartment needed attention in order to meet a 5 star review and linens need to be replaced, but these are easy fixes that the hosts can address promptly.

This clean and well-appointed apartment was exactly as pictured in the listing. And it is in a great location. It is just steps away from shopping, transportation and nightlife. On our first night we enjoyed delicious comfort food around the corner at Red Rooster, which had a live salsa band playing that night. A large grocery store and smaller bodegas and coffee shops are also in walking distance, as are subway stations and bus stops. Our hosts were great, helping us access the apartment and they were more than prompt in responding to questions that we had during our stay. All in all, it was a great stay! I would gladly recommend it for anyone looking for accommodations in Manhatten.

Great place and great host, kind and professional! We were travelling with kids and coming back home after a day of museum and sightseeing was just perfect. Very comfy and welcoming place. Loved that part of Harlem close to nice restaurants and good outlets. Subway and hop-on /hop-off bus walking distance making easy to go downtown. Will be back! Thank you Jess!
Excelente apartamento, iluminado, limpio y completamente dotado. En el corazón de Harlem cerca de buenos restaurantes y a 100 más del metro. Repetiría sin dudarlo.

This is a great apartment and Jessica is a truly helpful host. The apartment is clean , nicely decorated and very well equipped . The area has a lot of restaurants and shops and it is also close to the subway and central park from the apartement.

Jess and Amir are excellent hosts who provide more than just a comfortable home to stay in while you’re in NYC. The apartment is beautiful and well situated for travel to and from Midtown as well as other iconic places in NYC. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Jessica's place is amazing! It is  spacious for an apartment in new york. The sofa bed is in the living room so great privacy for group travelers. And the living room is just as cozy and comfy as a bedroom. The decor is chic and the room is clean. Jessica is very nice and welcoming! Definitely  would stay again if possible!

Some of my friends and I stayed here at Jessica’s home for 5 days and we absolutely loved it! We felt so at home in this very stylish apartment. The place was squeaky clean and very comfortable. Jessica was super sweet by accommodating our stay at her place. I would definitely recommend this home to others!

Lots of wonderful things to say about this Airbnb! Suprisingly spacious, incredibly comfortable and homely, fully stocked kitchen, (Website hidden by Airbnb) simply the best after a long day sightseeing. The area is fantastic - close to 2/3 line to downtown, Wholefoods, cafes/bars/ restaurants, and an amazing playground all in easy walking distance.

If you love to stay in a vivacious and strong-identity neighborhood, then Jessica’s apartment it is for you!
The apartment is near to several subway stations joining Midtown in 20 minutes. It has a bright living room and comfortable beds. After a entire day passed walking all around NYC was awesome to chill out in this cozy place!
Great well equipped, comfy and very clean apartment in a really convenient location and fun location. Handy for Colombia, subway station and places to eat etc.

You will not be disappointed!! Everything is just as pictured and stated. The apartment was quite spacious and everything was fresh and clean including the linens. I never had the pleasure of meeting Jess but her hospitality was above and beyond. I shared that I was arriving at 7am and she immediately messaged me to let me know that checking in early was no problem. On my final day, she messaged me bright and early to let me know that There was no rush to check out as she wasn’t expecting anyone. How nice is that!  So many thoughtful touches show that she really cares about her guests stay in the city.
C'est un excellent appartement bien ^placé et propre  et très bien décoré , on se sent bien
Great hospitality from Jessica and Amir. The apartment makes you feel that you are at home and have everything you will need. The neighborhood is ok, close to the subway and you are into Manhattan

Myself, my partner and 3yo daughter had a lovely stay here. The apartment is just as described, and Amir and Jessica were more than helpful with anything we needed throughout our stay. This area of Harlem is great, close to the subways, and we felt completely safe.

This apartment was a pleasant surprise! Our family of four was comfortable with the space and amenities. We had access to everything we needed including the roof for that view. 
Hosts are very kind and accessible if needed. We easily walked to great restaurants, stores and train entrance. Great way to “ live” NY

Appartamento molto carino nel cuore di Harlem. Esperienza positiva da tutti i punti di vista, Jess è stata davvero molto disponibile ed accogliente, ci ha fatto anche rimanere fino al tardo pomeriggio l'ultimo giorno appena ha saputo che gli ospiti successivi sarebbero arrivati molto tardi. A voler essere pignoli, forse la pulizia dell'appartamento non era proprio il massimo, ma niente di così terribile. L'unica mancanza, comunque segnalata nell'annuncio, è che non ci sono né lavastoviglie né lavatrice/ asciugatrice. Forse per periodi medio/ lunghi di permanenza ciò può dare problemi. Comunque io e la mia famiglia ci siamo trovati molto bene. Grazie Jess!!!

Jessica's apartment is amazing - I booked it on behalf of my parents when they came to visit me in New York and they were so happy with their Airbnb experience. The apartment is spacious, clean, and perfectly located in a beautiful are of Harlem. It's very well connected to the rest of Manhattan & Brooklyn and everything you need is just a block away. Jessica communicated with us and was very flexible with both checking in and checking out time. I would highly recommend her place!
Highly recommend!

Jessica’s place is very spacious and cozy. Lots of amenities and kitchen supplies.
Beautiful and quiet bedroom.
Very well located near subway and various restos and bars. 
Safe area
Good
The host is very nice. Quick response.

Jessica’s place is perfect for a weekend in NYC. Very spacious with great amenities and a wonderful location to quickly go out and explore the city. Jessica was a great host and extremely responsiveness. I will definitely come back!
Muy buena localización. Apartamento agradable y limpio. Lo recomiendo mucho.

Quaint upstairs apartment in Harlem one block from subway (which we used A LOT). CVS nearby. Sotto Casa Pizzeria nearby was excellent. Amir helped us with some questions we had. Very nice folks. Main bedroom bed was one of most comfortable I have ever slept in (memory foam rocks!). Very clean. Apartment, atmosphere, and neighborhood a true slice of NYC.

This place was much than what we expected. Jessica was so reactive and helped us when we needed something. The apartment is so well decorated and clean, we felt at home. The location is perfect to visit New York. Thanks again for everything!

Jessica's place was amazing, I'd stayed in the studio unit on a visit last year so my expectations were already set but somehow I was still blown away at how amazing the upstairs unit was. Super cozy, clean, and stylish. Plus any question I had no matter the time I asked was answered immediately. Jessica is super sweet and cares about you and how you feel in the space. She was also super open to share tips and help out if I needed it. Definitely my new home away from home!

name: Porto Trindade Cozy Flat
summary: Cozy and modern apartment up to 6 in Porto!
space: Welcome to Feels Like Home Porto Trindade Cozy Flat! This modern apartment has two bedrooms, one with a double bed and another one with two single beds. The living room has a sofa bed for two and it's open to the kitchenette.
description: Cozy and modern apartment up to 6 in Porto! Welcome to Feels Like Home Porto Trindade Cozy Flat! This modern apartment has two bedrooms, one with a double bed and another one with two single beds. The living room has a sofa bed for two and it's open to the kitchenette. Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon. Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centers and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin. From the apartment, you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, designer stores in Porto. A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional services. Guests must pick-up the keys
neighborhood_overview: Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon. Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centers and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin. From the apartment, you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, designer stores in Porto.
notes: A confirmation voucher will be sent to your e-mail with all the important details about your reservation and Feels Like Home additional services. Guests must pick-up the keys at the Welcome Centre located in Porto. Arrivals from 23:00 (11pm) to 06:00 (06am), a late check-in fee of EUR 30 shall be applied (paid in cash at check-in).  All guests must provide their ID or Passport Information at the time of check-in. Please note that a mandatory touristic tax will be included in the final price (2€/person/day). If it has not been charged at the moment of your reservation, it must be paid in cash at the check-in. All the remaining payments must be made in cash. Transfer Service - We can provide a transfer service for an additional cost. Lockers - We have lockers available at the Welcome Centre in Porto for an additional cost. Amenities - We provide toilet paper and shampoo only for the first day. Baby Friendly - We can provide a baby travel bed upon request.

host.host_about: We are Feels Like Home. We're a company born with a unique purpose: to bring you the best Portuguese experience you can imagine. We offer beautifully furnished, well located apartments and houses for your holiday or business stay. We're ideal for travellers who enjoy sleeping in comfortable homes at comfortable prices! We offer you options! Choose from more than 90 carefully selected properties in Portugal—suited for every taste and every occasion. We have a property that's right for you! From studios to castles. From Algarve to Lisbon and Porto.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Apartamento super gostoso, cozinha ótima!
Was excellent, quiet, clean and new. Bathroom was very nice.

We were in five people. Apartment modern, pleasant, clean. Very good location. We did not use public transport because we could walk everywhere. Near the apartment grocery store, several cafes. Since the apartment is located in the city center, underground parking is available for the guests, but only for a small passenger car. The big car will not fit in there, so you have to keep that in mind.

Really nicely refurbished flat, ideal for small families. Easy access to restaurants, city centre and shops. 
Superb for a long weekend in Porto
This place was fantastic - super clean and organized, very well located and the communication was easy. I definitely would stay there again and recomend the apartment.
Really great place to stay!
El piso está muy bien ubicado. Todo estaba limpio y ordenado. El único problema fue la plaza de parking ya que solo cabe un auto chico, el resto todo impecable.

Ines' place was extremely comfortable and clean. We were conveniently located near a metro station that got us to the train station within minutes. Within a 10 minutes walk, we had myriad restaurant and nightlife options. The apartment was very spacious, modern, and I would highly recommend!

Great apartment! The apartment was well located a little bit outside of the center but very close and can walk to everything. The beds are very comfortable however the pull out couch is not really suitable for an adult to sleep on as it is too short and is quite uncomfortable. Although there is no air conditioning the apartment is very cool and overall a great place to stay. The kitchen is well stocked and has all the necessities to cook. I would highly recommend for 4 adults!

Sem grandes reparos. Apenas para hospedes que venham de automóvel o espaço de estacionamento na garagem é reduzido servindo apenas para viaturas pequenas e o estacionamento na rua é pago e limitado a duas horas diárias, pelo que tivemos que o arcar com o custo para penalidades pelo estacionamento indevido.

L'appartement correspond au descriptif de l'annonce. Bien équipé et agréable à vivre. Vous trouverez des commerces et boulangerie à proximités.
Proche du centre ville et des grands axes.
Vigilance sur l'offre de parking qui ne peut acceuillir qu'une voiture de petite taille type 106 ou SMART.
Excelente estadia. Recomendo aos demais hóspedes!!
ottima posizione, fuori dalla ressa del centro ma a  pochi minuti dal centro, raggiungibile a piedi. Cordiali e super disponibili!

This apartment is conveniently located. Our family enjoyed our stay. The communication and the check-in process was very easy. This place is close to the Praça General and City Centre Turismo. The location of this apartment is very safe and quiet.
The only reason I gave it a 4 1/2 is because there was no hand soap and not enough bathroom tissue for our stay. We had to buy some which wasn’t an issue at all since we had a small market place right around the corner. I would highly recommend this appartment. It is perfect for a family of 4.

Bon appartement. Propre. Moderne. Proche centre commercial. Proche métro. Au calme. 
Attention parking payant dans la rue. 
Je recommande!
Apartamento impecável, super simpáticos no check in. O estacionamento é que não é muito fácil.

Appartement tres agréable, ville géniale !!! 

Seul pb: l'électricité qui saute (premier soir) parce que tout est électrique donc à 6 il faut faire attention
Apartamento precioso y bien situado, pero impuntuales a la hora de hacer el check in.

Apartamento amplio, moderno, ubicado cerca del centro en una zona residencial. Tuvimos un poco frío en febrero, deberían mejorar los radiadores. Olía a desagüe, esto lo tienen que corregir cuanto antes para los próximos huéspedes. El apartamento tiene lo justo, es un alquiler profesional, no es un hogar de anfitrión.
We really enjoyed and loved this appartment

El apartamento está muy bien aprovechado y situado. Se gestiona a través de una agencia con la que contactamos al ver que el asesor no funcionaba. Había sido clave a la hora de decidirnos por esta opción por viajar con bebés y personas mayores y ni contestan las llamadas, ni lo solucionan ni ofrecen compensación alguna
Nice spacious apartment within walking distance of most local attractions. The staff at Feel at Home were helpful and accommodating.
Es tal y como aparece en la imágenes, muy limpio, nuevo y genial!

Casa pulita, poco fuori dal centro ma comunque comoda (10-15 minuti a piedi).
Unica scomodità: check-in e check-out non avvengono in casa, ma in una location separata. Ad ogni modo eravamo in 5 e per 2 notti è stata una buona soluzione.
Muy buena estancia.
The place is great. Stylish furniture and strategic location. Recommended without a doubt
Excelente serviço e localização do apartamento.
Todo perfecto
It was a pleasure to stay in this appartament. Great location and beautiful space! Love it!

O atendimento foi 5 estrelas. O apartamento é muito confortável, acolhedor e funcional. Correspondeu ao que estávamos à espera. Adorámos a decoração. A localização é excelente. Perto dos locais turísticos.
Feels Like Home is very convenient everything was so easy during our trip in Porto thanks to the great team!

Great location, nice spacious apartment. The place was very clean and looked recently built. 

Great for big families.

If you come to Portugal use uber to get around its very cheap
Todo perfecto, aunque el calefactor del salón no funcionaba.

name: Cozy Bedroom in Copacabana! R3
summary: You are at the beach's block, so it's nice to wake up before 9 AM and go to the beach and dip at the sea before start the day. Drink a coconut water at the kiosque and come home with great energy! Make your daily plan and go!
space: Thanks for checking my listing!!! Rio de Janeiro is really one of the most beautiful cities in the world. You will stay in a nice and confortable bedroom at the beach's block. This is a 180 m2 apartment, very comfortable and spacious, 24 hs lobby, very near the of the subway and all buses stop; I have a laundry, wireless for internet .  It is easy to get in the apartment which is located 4.0 km from Santos Dumont airport (domestic flights) with connecting bus to the International City Airport (20 km) and 7.0 km from the interstate bus terminal. In addition, we are 20 minutes to the Lapa, Rio's bohemian music with various options and restaurants. I speak English, Italian, French and Spanish.  You will have everything you need around you here in a safe and honesty place. I have a simpatic little dog, Blue and 2 cats: Branca and Vick. Vick is always sleeping and Branca kidding around the house and we will love to receive you!
description: You are at the beach's block, so it's nice to wake up before 9 AM and go to the beach and dip at the sea before start the day. Drink a coconut water at the kiosque and come home with great energy! Make your daily plan and go! Thanks for checking my listing!!! Rio de Janeiro is really one of the most beautiful cities in the world. You will stay in a nice and confortable bedroom at the beach's block. This is a 180 m2 apartment, very comfortable and spacious, 24 hs lobby, very near the of the subway and all buses stop; I have a laundry, wireless for internet .  It is easy to get in the apartment which is located 4.0 km from Santos Dumont airport (domestic flights) with connecting bus to the International City Airport (20 km) and 7.0 km from the interstate bus terminal. In addition, we are 20 minutes to the Lapa, Rio's bohemian music with various options and restaurants. I speak English, Italian, French and Spanish.  You will have everything you need around you here in a safe and honesty p
neighborhood_overview: You can see Copacabana's beach  by the window.
notes: Please, learn with me how to use the gas heater in the bathroom and the stove in the kitchen. Please, bring your personal soap :) You can use the refrigerator to keep some staff fresh, but the kitchen must be used to prepare the breakfast and eat at the dining room. Not allowed to stay in the kitchen. Not allowed to wash clothes at home. Don't burn the house. Don't forget to leave the keys in the room before leaving. If you go to the beach use the service elevator and press SS to get out by the garage. When you come back, please wash the feet with the tap beside the elevator at the garage and go straight to the shower. Never sit wet on the furniture. Never sleep with a coloured foundation in your body. Visitors are welcome but not to sleep. Thank you!
transit: All transports for everywhere in the city around the corner. From the aiports GIG or Santos Dumont, take a cab from Aerocoop or Aerotaxi. They have to charge you by taximeter and if you ask before at the balcony, you can pay by credit card. Keep the number of the car with you, in case that you forget something inside the car, we can ask for the Cia. Ask for a visit card to the taxidriver and keep it to return and pay R$ 50,00 by promotion.
access: - one set of keys for you  - clean towel - clean bedsheets - internet wireless access - refrigerator - 24/7 doorman
house_rules: Be polite and don't burn the house.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hello! 
My name is Ylza!
I  hope that you enjoy Rio and feel like at home 
Welcome!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ylza me recebeu super bem! uma pessoa pra frente super alto astral foi muito bom!!!

Ylza's apartment is right on copacabana beach (perfect location) and she tries her best to give you the best experience and she is really very helpful. The room is perfect for crashing in for the night.

A great option to enjoy Copacabana and the beautiful city of Rio de Janeiro!! The apartment and the rooms are huge, and it's very well located (half block away of the beach, and three blocks away of the Metro station). And Ylza is welcoming, warm and always helpful! I would repeat the experience!
Ylza is the perfect host. It s like coming to stay with a friend. Great apt, great location, good talk, very good experience.

ylza is great host.  she gave me the best tour of rio with her scooter... 
i had great time riding scooter around the copa and ipanema.  lots of fun.   thanks ylza.
and she helped me to  get my bus ticket to paraty..   the copacabana beach is less than half block away...     the house was very big and beautiful. and her dog name " blue "  is most sweet friendly dog. he will welcome you as soon as u walk into the house.  
overall.   i enjoyed staying at house of ylza.. (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Ylza has a large, beautiful set of rooms right on Copacabana Beach.  She's very friendly and helpful.  I very much enjoyed my stay with her.

Staying at Ylza's home was really great. She's really a nice person, very helpful (she help us buying our bus tickets) and cultivate. And her animals are adorable (especially the cat "black")
The apartment is great located, huge and really comfortable. We really fell like at home and we strongly recommend to stay there !

Ylza is absolutely FANTASTIC!!! I enjoyed staying with her so much! She has a delightful personality and is exceptionally nice and helpful! She gave me an amazing ride on her scooter along Copa and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was so much fun! Her little dog and cats are adorable! I will definitely consider staying with her again next time I am in Rio.

Felt like at home, in a very nice apartment, one block from the beach.
Ylza is a very welcoming carioca and will give you all the best tips about Rio.

ótimo !

Adorei minha estada no apt de Ylza, ela é uma pessoa bacana, educada, gentil e alegre. Me  senti em casa, super a vontade, o ambiente é agradável, limpo e arejado, o quarto é ótimo e o banho muito bom!
Quando tiver que ir ao Rio de novo, certamente me hospedarei la de novo!
Abraço,
Carmen Flora

Yiza was an amazing host, very helpful and entertaining! the flat and room are big, clean and very nice, you feel immediately at home. The location is ideal, just a few meters from Copacabana beach! I highly recommend this room to everybody.
Ylza was very polite and accommodating.  She made great efforts to help me get around the city for my short stay.  She has a nice apartment in a great area too, definitely recommend staying here.

Excellent accueil d'Ylza  à Rio de Janeiro, Copacabana. Je recommande cette adresse bien située à proximité de la plage ce qui est idéal pour aller prendre un bain dès le matin avant d'aller visiter la ville. 
Idéal pour aller en métro ou en taxi à Ipanema, Central ou  Santa  Theresa.
Bel appartement, et toujours la conversation et les bons conseils d'Ylsa en Français ou en Anglais sur la ville et le Brésil.
Une adresse que nous recommandons à ceux qui ont une semaine pour découvrir en toute quiétude les secrets de cette ville de légende.

[Fuer Deutsch bitte runter scrollen]


My stay at Ylza's place was perfect! She has a wonderful apt. in Copacabana, you can see the famous beach from her windows.

I needed a place on short notice and Ylza answered me within a couple of hours - she made my day. I planned to stay for the long weekend, but ended up staying for a week.

We had some really good talks, her coffee is great, and she even made me breakfast (which is not included I guess), I really felt like staying at a friends place.

One night we went out with her scooter to Ipanema (together with Blue, the dog) - what a fun experience!

I could keep on telling how wonderful the stay was, because it really was. 
Ylza was the first airbnb host for me and an inspiring person, I hope to see her again someday.

If you decided to stay here, you will find a very clean room, there is good wifi connection, supermarket (24hrs) around the corner, beach, restaurants - Rio!

Enjoy your stay :)

[Thanks for everything Ylza, I will be back soon :-) ]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wunderbarer Host, Ylza war mein erster airbnb-Versuch - perfekte Wahl! Sie wohnt direkt am Copacabana-Beach. Supermarkt, Restaurants, Turistenangebote in unmittelbarer Naehe. Sauberes Zimmer, gutes Wifi, lustige Haustiere. Ylza ist ein besonderer Mensch, und eine gute Adresse fuer Urlauber/Backpacker/Geschaeftsreisende, die keine Lust mehr auf Hotels/Pousadas/Hostels haben.
Ylza is a great host, and her place is ideally situated close to Copacabana beach.

The apartment is well located near Copacabana beach and the metro, in a quiet street. The room is large and the bathroom is only for guest use.Ylza is a kind host and will make you feel at home. Even if I arrived late in the evening she was at home to welcome me. I was also allowed to leave my luggage until my departure in the late afternoon. Particularly indicated if you like dogs and cats.
Great location  only a minute walk to Copacabana, safe and very spacious apartment, not for those who are not fond of cats and dog
Hola pase unos muy buenos días en Rió, el alojamiento con una ubicación envidiable prácticamente al frente de Copacabana y muy buena atención

I really like to stay with Yzla and enjoyed her company, she is a wonderful host , helpful, careful ,good listener. The house located in a perfect location just a block away to copacabana beach. Interior of the apartment is so comfortable and spacious, the room and the bed is same also, i higly recommend Yzla and i am so happy to know her. I have a good friend in Rio now.
Ylza is very friendly and fluent Italian. As soon as I arrived it was as if we had known for years. It made me feel like I was at home and did not miss anything.
I liked black cat and white cat

The stay at Ylzas-place was perfect. Ylza is very nice, she has a beautiful mind and a great laughter. The appartement is located next to the Copacabana beach, in safe and nice area, perfect location. The apartment is so comfortable and spacious and the room is clean and nice. I have stayed both at a 4 star hotel and at Ylazs-place during my visit i Rio, at any time I will prefere Ylza. Hotels are boring, at Ylzas-place are full of life.  
If you like cats og one dog you just have to go there….

Ylza was a great hostess and the space was clean, comfortable and safe. I recommend her and her wonderful apartment. I also highly recommend spending some quality play time with her adorable dog, Blue!

We had a wonderful stay with Ylza. She is brilliant and most helpful and goes out of her way to help. She has an apartment most conveniently located and Ylza keeps the place very welcoming. She is a good host and we recommend her to whoever wants a great location in Rio.

Our profile: Husband & Wife, age 43, from United States; we stayed the week between Christmas through New Year's Day.  We HIGHLY RECOMMEND this apartment and Ylza as a host.  We enjoyed our stay completely and would DEFINITELY stay again!  Her apartment is VERY clean and VERY secure; locked gated front building entrance with 24 hour doorman, and a lock on your own bedroom door too (but we never even locked our door).  Bathroom is very clean and has plenty of hot water for showers. GREAT location! The apartment is in the first block from the beach - VERY close easy walking distance to Copacabana beach!  Bus stops and Metro stops are very easy walking distance.  Ipanema Beach and Lake also within a little longer walking distance.  On Sunday mornings there is a fantastic farmer's market right on Ylza's block at the park.  Her dog and cats are loving and sweet.  You MUST like animals to stay here - they are very affectionate and want to be with you.  We loved that!  The only potential negative for someone would be that there is no air conditioning - so if you get hot easily, you will not like that.  My husband and I don't mind the heat - we were not uncomfortable.  But if you need A/C, this is not the place for you.  Travel from the airport to Copacabana in a taxi is approximately $30 - $35USD.  Whenever we return to Rio, we will definitely contact Ylza again!

A Ylza é uma ótima anfitriã. Muita atenciosa e gentil. O imóvel é super bem localizado, perto da praia de Copacabana e com tudo o que se precisa por perto. O Rio de Janeiro é uma cidade maravilhosamente linda!! Tudo nota 10.

My name is Johann and I am from South Africa and stayed in one of Ylza's rooms in her apartment. 

It was really very nice to stay in Ylza's apartment.

The welcoming at 8 or 9pm was very welcoming. Blue met me outside the front door! For those of you that know him, he is Ylza's little dog - Very friendly.

Ylza is an excellent host and we had some great conversations about a variety of topics.

The apartment was very spacious and my room was inviting, clean and also cozy.

The apartment is very very central - A short 1 minute walk to the beach and about 100 meters to the closest supermarket and bank. There are many supermarkets and banks in the area. Buses are also close by.

My favorite restaurant was across the road from the apartment and there are many more.

I would like to thank Ylza and her animals (or babies!) for the very good time and experience I had. This is the first time in all my travels in 30 years to many countries that I stayed in a room in an apartment with the host. And all I can say: We are never too old to learn and experience something new.

Staying at this apartment is highly recommended!

Thanks Ylza  and give Blue and the white cat a hug from Johann.

Regards and best wishes

Johann
Ylza was a very nice and helpful host. The flat is great, neat and beautiful, the Location (only 2 minutes to the Copacabana-Beach) couldn't be better! Totally recommendable!

Ylza and her apartment are amazing! She is a wonderful and kindful host. The apartment is very stylish and cool. Our room was big, nice and clean. Close to the apartment there are many restaurants, supermarkets and shops. And Copacabana beach is only 2 minutes away!!
We would like to thank Ylza for the beautiful time we spent there. We felt very comfortable and we would return to her!

We loved Ylza's place! We had a wonderful room and a big bed for ourselves and we were able to use the kitchen as well. The place is so close to the beach and everything! Would come back again! Thanks for letting us stay at your place :-)

En voyage pendant quelques mois au Brésil pour un projet documentaire, Ylza a eu la gentillesse de nous accueillir pendant un mois entier ! L'appartement est très bien situé à une minute de la plage !! C'est l'idéal pour un bain ou un jogging matinal. Copacabana n'est plus le quartier glamour qu'il était et il ne faut pas s'y promener à pied la nuit. Mais il y a une borne de taxi juste en bas de l'immeuble donc c'est parfait ! 

Ylza nous a laissé sa cuisine pour se préparer de bons petits plats (équipements minimum). La chambre était propre et spacieuse, ça nous changeait des pousadas et auberges de jeunesse ! L'appartement a surtout un grand salon et une salle à manger très agréables pour bouquiner ou travailler.

Ylza est vraiment adorable et s'est très bien occupée de nous. Un grand merci !! Par contre, attention pour les allergiques, il y a deux adorables chats qui se promènent partout dans l'appartement y compris dans votre chambre et sur la table du petit déjeuner ..

Loved staying at Ylza's place. The location is perfect, especially if you just want to laze at the beach all day. Ylza was very helpful in pointing us around the local area for places to eat. Oh, and her pets were always happy to see us when we came home!
Ylza was a very good host. We enjoyed staying at her place.  Her house was clean and very cozy. It was overall a good experience.

My friend and I stayed for 4 nights. The location was great, the place was very clean and very good security. Our host was actively always trying to help us in any way she could. She was very friendly and helpful. Great experience.
Ylza fue una muy buena anfitriona ayudándonos con todo lo que necesitamos. El departamento es muy amplio y limpio. No tenemos ninguna queja para hacer , pasamos unos días muy lindos en Rio .

Ylza is a great host, she is warm, fun and energetic. Equally nice are her pets - two cats and one dog, they are friendly and cute. I will certainly miss them. The room itself is comfortable, clean, lightly decorated and spacious. I travel alone, but this room would perfectly accommodate two as well. The location of this house is great too, it is literally 50 meters from the copacabana beach, and is also very close to the main street ( Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana) where you will find mostly anything you need, from soco stores to bus stops to supermarkets. Everything is within walking distance and I feel very safe in this neighborhood. I would recommend Ylza's place to anyone looking to stay in Copa. I know she also has some properties in Ipanema, which is a more upscale and less touristy neighborhood, so you may as well check out her other listings.
Excellent location ! Ylza's hospitality is fantastic! Recommended!

Muy buena experiencia. Buen recibimiento y agradable estancia. Todo lo que se ofrece en el anuncio se cumple. La habitación es espaciosa limpia y bonita. Muy bien ubicado de cualquier punto. Ylza es súper agradable persona y te hace sentir como en casa
Great experience! Fantastic wifi, comfy bed, hot showers, overall very relaxing. Ylza gave my boyfriend and I some very helpful advice during our stay as well.

We had a wonderful stay with Ylza and her adorable dog and cat. The apartment is very spacious and the location is amazing - a stones throw from Copacabana beach. We were also delighted to discover a fresh food market right outside the door on Sunday! Ylza allowed us to have our own space and use the kitchen, laundry and living areas at our leisure. We felt very safe at night in the area. Ylza is an eccentric character who made us feel very welcome. Would definitely recommend a stay here!
Excelente ubicación, departamento amplio y cómodo. Ylza es muy amable, muy buena estadia en Copacaban

Ylza is a slightly crazy and very nice host. She was very helpfull and gave us good advice. We had a lot of good laughs, and we felt welcome. We had some neighbours in the appartement, which was fun, although we didn't see them too often. The location of Ylza's appartement is perfect, right at the Copacabana beach, couldn't be better.

When you get to Rio, especially the Copacabana area, this houses from Ylza could be the best choice for everyone. The location is the best from everywhere in Copacabana, room quality is exceptional and the service and cares from Ylza are just great. The apartment is extremely safe every time. I've visited some apartments for my friends and this apartment is far above average to compare with them. 
However the best thing that you will experience is the host. Ylza is just great human being. 
Thank you Ylza and Anthonio for providing me the best travel memories ever.
I will see you guys soon!!!

Me and Victoria spent one week at Ylza's place. The flat is beautiful and pictures reveal exactly how the flat is. The place is very close to Copacabana beach (2 min walking) and full of restaurants, bars, markets, etc. Our bedroom was pretty comfortable, with a big and nice bed. Bathroom was a little bit small, but it was always clean and very well equipped. Living room was big, with 2 nice couches, great illumination and good music. 
Ylza lives with Vranca and Blu (cat and dog, respectively). Both animals are well domesticated and they were always friendly with us. 
We encourage to you to visit Ylza at Rio.
Best,

Carlos and Victoria
Ylza es una gran anfitriona! Muy amable y divertida. Su casa es hermosa, segura y siempre limpia. Nos sentimos como en casa!  La volveremos a elegir!

THE HOST IS A WARM, SENSITIVE AND INTENSE PERSON THAT MAKE YOU FEEL EMBRACED AND WELCOMED.
THE LOCATION IS LOCATED AT LESS THAN 100 PASES FROM THE "POSTO 3" OF COPACABANA BEACH AND AT WALKING DISTANCE FROM  THE BUILDING THERE ARE SUPERMARKETS,CHURCHES, RESTAURANTS, SHOPS, PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION AND PUBS ALL MIXED IN A KALEIDOSCOPIC WAY OF THE BRAZILIAN "CIDADE MARAVILHOSA" RIO DE JANEIRO.
这里靠近科帕卡巴纳海滩,步行过去只需几分钟,房间干净明亮非常适合休闲旅行或者家庭度假,房东人很好很友善,住宿体验十分舒适惬意

A pleasant and aesthetically  appealing apartement near the beach of Copacabana. It's also quiet at night as the room doesn't face the street. Ylza is a helpful hostess used to receiving visitors. I can very much recommend her place!

Minha tia e eu ficamos hospedadas por 8 dias em um quarto na casa da Ylza. Tudo foi maravilhoso, o quarto é muito confortável, grande, muito bem ventilado. O AP dá Ylza é enorme e a decoração é de muito bom gosto. O ambiente é muito limpo.
O AP da Ylza está na quadra da praia, da sala podemos admirar  a linda praia de Copacabana. A Ylza permitia que usássemos a cozinha para fazer café e lanches, nos sentimos em casa e ganhamos uma grande amiga no Rio. Indico e com certeza voltaremos.
A Ylza é uma pessoa espetacular muito inteligente, fala vários idiomas e nos auxiliava em tudo que precisávamos. No último dia nosso voo era tarde, a Ylza permitiu que deixássemos a bagagem  casa dela até chegar nosso horário, ficamos muito agradecidas pela flexibilidade.

Enfim, Ylza! Um grande beijo da minha tia Anderli e meu e muito obrigada por tudo!
Até  a volta!

Kênia.

O apartamento da Ylza é super confortável e pertinho da praia! Do jeito que esta descrito nas fotos. A Ylza é super atenciosa, nos deixou bastante a vontade. Foi ótimo passar esses dias no Rio, cidade linda, espero voltar em breve! Obrigada Ylza

Ylza es muy alegre, entretenida y dispuesta a ayudar en lo que necesites. Todo limpio y ordenado. 
Perfecta ubicación a pasos de la playa, a pasos del metro y central. 
Yo disfruté mucho!
As perfect as you can get. Incredible stay!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
YIza was always willing I help with anything- directions, suggestions, etc. Friendly! Great location!
Execelente

Foi muito bacana minha experiência na casa da Ylza. O apartamento é muito agradável e a decoração é um charme. Ela deixou tudo organizadinho para eu (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza foi muito agradável. Só tenho que recomendar.

GRACIAS!! La ubicación es excelente!!! caminando hacia la playa.
Solo mencionar que hay mascotas, lindas, pero en mi caso soy alérgica a gatitos. Ylza muy amable, servicial. Lo demás no quejas.
Lugar perfeito, bem localizado, arejado, tive tudo que precisei à disposição, a Ylza é uma excelente anfitriã e os pets (Branca e Blue) também, voltarei sem duvidas quando possível.
Ylza is very nice, and the room is very clean. The location is just by the beach, perfect. And there are many nice restaurant near this area.

Excelente Ylza!!!  Divina!!! 
Fui con mi mejor amiga que justo cumplió años en las vacaciones y festejamos juntos, preparo de todo,  y nos permitió quedarnos en la casa hasta la hora del vuelo!!! Un amor de persona!!! Obviamente vamos a volver!!

Buena ubicación. 
Ambiente limpio. 
Habitación amplia.

Deficiente privacidad en habitación

I have spent 2 amazing weeks at Ylza’s. Her place is in a safe area, very clean, calm and spacious, and just steps away from the beach. She is such a lovely and charismatic person, always happy to give you tips or tell about the history of Rio.  Her two pets are absolutely adorable but if you’re not that into animals you probably won’t even notice them, since they are very quiet and always following Ylza around. 
It was an overall great experience and i can’t wait to go back.

El departamento está en una zona inmejorable, a media cuadra de la playa y cerca de muchos lugares para salir a comer y tomar algo. 
Ylza es muy atenta, respondió rápido todas mis consultas.
El lugar es muy lindo, limpio y cómodo. Además tiene unas mascotas encantadoras!! Súper recomendable ;)

Me sentí muito segura na localização do ap. Ela tem um cachorro e um gato muito fofos e muito tranquilos!!! O quarto eh privado, mas tem outros quartos que tb tem hóspedes, e o banheiro eh compartilhado. Estava todo muito limpo e ainda que não tivesse ar condicionado, o ventilador dava conta do calor.
Apartamento lindo, com ótima localização! Excelente recepção!!! Super recomendo!

I spent an incredible weekend in Rio. Your support before to my arrival and the directions and suggestions provided during my stay. The location was very good, I just walked some steps to arrive to the beach and also to the subway. Without doubt, I'd return to your appartement, if someday I'll return to Rio.

Gostei muito da hospedagem com a Ylza. Ela é atenciosa e está sempre cuidando para que seus hospedes se sintam em casa e bem recebidos. Me senti a vontade e As acomodações são ótimas, a decoração é cuidadosa. É muito bem localizada, com ótima segurança,  os porteiros e os vizinhos são corteses  e contribuíram para que me sentisse bem vinda no local.  Foram dias ótimos. Gratidão Ylza pelo seu carinho e atenção.
very well located! owner is very friendly!
Excelente un ubicacion a metros de la playa de Copacabana, habitacion y departamento en general muy lindo, limpio y confortable. Anfitriona muy amable

name: North Shore Beach Bungalow Just Steps to the Sand!
summary: **Please read the entire listing** One (or two) private bedrooms just steps from the beach, on the fabled North Shore of Oahu. A couple/group can rent just the one bedroom or two bedrooms for up to 4 guests.  *If 2 guests would like to rent both bedrooms just message us and we can set the adjusted rate ($35/night for the second bedroom)  *Please be sure to message us if 2 people would like both rooms-and we will send a special offer with the adjusted rate* **The is a shared house**
space: Welcome to the North Shore and our beautiful beach side bungalow! Here are a few notes about our place including what amenities we offer and what is available to our guests.  The living room and outdoor spaces are shared with the residents of the house (Tomas and Julia).  Guests will be staying in one or both of our very spacious and clean bedrooms with a queen size bed and a full size bed. The bathroom is shared-although we have our own half bath.  Guests will be provided with essentials such as towels, blankets, extra pillows, beach towels, shampoo, conditioner and shower soap. There is also a mini-fridge located in each bedroom for your added convenience.  There is high-speed wifi available and each of the rooms has its own fan and a/c unit. ***To clarify, the bedroom(s) are only rented to one party at a time, we do not rent both bedrooms out to separate groups during a stay. One bedroom for every 2 people. If 2 people would like to rent both bedrooms, an extra fee ($35/night) will
description: **Please read the entire listing** One (or two) private bedrooms just steps from the beach, on the fabled North Shore of Oahu. A couple/group can rent just the one bedroom or two bedrooms for up to 4 guests.  *If 2 guests would like to rent both bedrooms just message us and we can set the adjusted rate ($35/night for the second bedroom)  *Please be sure to message us if 2 people would like both rooms-and we will send a special offer with the adjusted rate* **The is a shared house** Welcome to the North Shore and our beautiful beach side bungalow! Here are a few notes about our place including what amenities we offer and what is available to our guests.  The living room and outdoor spaces are shared with the residents of the house (Tomas and Julia).  Guests will be staying in one or both of our very spacious and clean bedrooms with a queen size bed and a full size bed. The bathroom is shared-although we have our own half bath.  Guests will be provided with essentials such as towels, bla
neighborhood_overview: We live in a very quiet, peaceful North Shore neighborhood. It sits just far enough away from the crowd that you can truly experience what it means to live like a local yet still be within only miles from some of the most famous sites Oahu has to offer. There is plenty of street parking available and we are located in an area that is not seen by most visitors to Hawaii, untouched beaches, local fruit stands, etc.
transit: We are one block from a bus stop, but rental cars are highly recommended.
