access: Please be mindful, this is our home and we welcome our guests to share the living area and bathroom as well as the wonderful outdoor space.
interaction: We can be as available as needed, but also can give as much privacy as guests would like.
house_rules: - No shoes inside home, Hawaiian style!

host.host_about:
Aloha! 
We are a couple who lives on the North Shore of Oahu. We love to surf, run and live a healthy and active lifestyle. We like meeting new people and sharing our life here in paradise!

reviews.comments: A beautiful home hosted by 2 very warm, kind, and pleasant people. Steps away from the beach. Room is very cozy, clean, and the whole house is decorated with style and simplicity. Very wuiet neighborhood and home. 5 stars across the board for location, accomodation and hosts. You will not be dissapointed.

The place is exactly as you see in the picture, clean and elegant. The hosts are great people willing to help you with your stay. I would stay here again when I go back to the area. Also the beach is 5 min away.
Awesome location! Scenery is so beautiful, place is quiet and soo... clean! Would highly recommend staying with Tomas and Lucas
Super cute place in a great neighbourhood. So close to Haleiwa. Very comfortable. Nice touches. AC was nice since we are not used to the heat. No issues with access or parking. Friendly hosts.

Excellent host and location, tucked away a little (definitely a good thing) but still close enough to do things in town. Very clean and attractive house, and Tomas was friendly and helpful. 10/10 would sleep again
Nice location to explore the North Shore!
Lovely stay, very helpful hosts.
Tomas was a great host and the house was great and in a wonderful area
Just as described! Close to beach. Beautiful neighborhood, perfectly located to shops and place to eat! Comfy bedroom.

Great space and a great location for a North Shore visit. You can walk to a nice beach nearby or drive to one of the many great surfing/snorkeling sites in the area. Tomás and Julia are excellent hosts, always ready with suggestions for the best local spots. Our guest space felt private and very nice. Highly recommend!

Thomas is very friendly, giving us a lot of recommendations. Very  comfortable recently renovated house. Perfect location for exploring the north shore, close to all of the beautiful beaches around. We have simply loved it there.

A really cool, authentic place in the heart of the North Shore. Tomas and his wife are amazing hosts who gave me some great tips during my stay. They keep their place very clean and made me feel completely at home. I would definitely stay their again.

Really nice place well located on the north shore.
Tomas is very friendly.

下来再来north我们一定还会选择住在这家bnb!整个房子干净舒适,布置的用心而且有品味｡各种生活用品也都准备齐全而且好用(bnb就是这种小细节很重要)特别要讲下淋浴的温度和水量调节很好,洗澡舒服有多重要你懂的!bnb所在位置便利,附近街区也感觉挺安全的,Tomas和Julia夫妇人很好,热情真诚,而且颜值很高哈哈!我们和他们聊天很愉快!

今度もまたﾉｰｽに行ったら絶対ここに泊まります!部屋は綺麗でﾃﾞｺﾚｰｼｮﾝのｾﾝｽがいい〜生活用品も揃っていて便利です｡場所は車が行き易くて､周りは静かで安全です｡ﾎｽﾄのTomas&Juliaは親切で良い人で､英語が分かり易くて､話をして楽しかったです｡
Great room, just a block from a secluded beach.  Would definitely stay again!!

It was a pleasure to stay with Tomás and Julia! Very clean; way better than our Waikiki hotel. They provided a comfortable atmosphere and were kind to offer area information as well as convinces they did not need to. If we have the opportunity to return to the area, we will be sure to look them up!
Tomas and Lucas' accommodation was in a great location right by a quiet beach. The house was spotlessly clean and Tomas and Julia were excellent with communication.
조용한 동네에 위치하고 있고 해변이랑 겨우 한블럭 두블럭 정도 떨어져 있어요. 집은 매우 깨끗하고 화장실도 매우 깨끗합니다. 아침은 따로 먹으면 되고 방에 냉장고 있음. 물 두병 줍니다~! 할레이바 거리랑 차로 10분 정도 걸려요. 정말 좋았어요.

Beautiful beach just a few blocks from the house, nicely put together room (snacks and a french press waiting for us when we arrived) and very friendly hosts. 

Not as easy to get to anywhere other than the beach. We didn't have a car the whole time we were there, and the bus line that runs nearby doesn't run often enough to easily get around by public transit.

My stay in Waialua exceeded my expectations. Such a great location (5-minute drive to old Haleiwa Town, 5-minute stroll to the beach) and your own mini fridge in your room. Most of all, Julia and Tomas were very generous, welcoming, and easygoing. I absolutely recommend staying here!

Tomas and Julia were wonderful hosts. They made sure that we felt welcomed and at home. We arrived earlier than check in and since the room was ready our hosts graciously allowed us access. The bathroom was very clean and so was the shower. The room had AC (thank goodness because it was VERY hot and humid during our stay!). Tomas and Julia kept the room stocked with coffee and cookies. We brought yogurt and granola bars and trail mix and kept them in the fridge so they wouldn't melt from the heat. All in all, our hosts were very kind and attentive.

One thing I will note though, is the street was undergoing construction that we were not notified about. On the day we arrived, crews had just started stripping off the top layer of asphalt on the street and were preparing to finish and redo all new asphalt over the duration of our stay. Host rules dictated that we were to park on the street, which was no longer possible, so we had to park around the corner and down the block (or risk having our car towed if we didn't wake up at 7am to move the car before construction started for the day). As we usually left around 8am and didn't come back until late in the evening, it wasn't too much of an issue, but we would have definitely appreciated a heads up. 

Outside of that, our hosts were pretty cool. Julia even gave us directions to find some tidepools we've been looking for on the east side of the island. All in all, I would recommend a stay with our hosts.

I had a great stay in their beautiful home. You could tell that it was recently renovated. There was plenty of street parking. The room was stocked with a mini-fridge with bottles of water and snacks as well as things for the beach. Everyone was very relaxed. Check-in and check-out was easy, smooth, and flexible.

Tomas & Lucas' place was all we hoped for. A great place to feel at home for our N. Shore stay with gracious hosts who were very responsive and kind when I realized I failed to book the 3rd night of our stay...oops!  
The room is very comfy for two, and the guest fridge was nice and big - perfect if you need to stock up on local treats during your stay (they also provide some nice ones). The mattress was firm and we slept great. Awesome shower - and since I had to work while there I should also note the wifi was stable and speedy!  And their home is spotless. We were interested in swimming and snorkeling but if you're there to run or surf I'm sure they'd give you great suggestions about where to go!  Thanks Julia &Tomas--definitely will keep you on my Oah'u list.
房子离开海滩几步之路,安静悠闲｡如果喜欢海滩,喜欢水上运动,喜欢休闲的慢生活,是个不错的选择｡如果要每天外出跑景点的,则不是很方便｡
We had a lovely, relaxing stay! Very clean, fridge in room great and beach towels a bonus! We had everything we needed. Tomas gave us plenty of space to enjoy our stay!

Tomas and his wife were very hospitable in their lovely home. We felt welcome and were very comfortable throughout our stay. They are great hosts! The beach right by their house was an amazing spot to watch the sunset. Their house is centrally located, yet secluded. Would definitely recommend their home!

Incredible place to stay! Tomas and Julia were perfect hosts and extremely punctual checking me into their lovely home. Situated in a beautiful neighborhood with quick and easy access to the beach. Would recommend to anyone looking to explore Haleiwa/North Shore!!!
住宿条件还行,就是门牌号不明显,找了半天才找到!
Tomas and his wife were very nice. The place was very clean. I would recommend.
Small sleeping room, nice bathroom shared with host, well decorated with thoughtful hospitality.

We had such a great time at Tomas and Julia's place. Everything was more than perfect, super clean, the communication and check in was awesome and the location was terrific since all of Oahu's North Shore is really the best part of this island. Above all that, the hosts are extremely nice and it was definitely the best aribnb experience I've ever had so far!

We had a really great time though for only one night. Great communication before check in, all those small attention you really enjoy and the room was really comfortable everything you would need was there and nicely set up. Super recommended ! Thank you

Very clean place, with a private beach in walking distance (5 minutes) and excellent food trucks near by. Tomas and Julia were able to  accommodate  for the three of us (we rented both rooms). Unfortunately at times I felt we were taking over the place, but they were very sweet about it. The beach towels and snorkel masks provided were a bonus for our beach hopping. I will definitely keep their place in mind for the future.

My partner and I stayed with Tomas for two days. We chose this location because it was close to some amazing beaches and restaurants. Also, the price was within our range. We were very happy with our stay, considering what we understood to be the terms/conditions. We have no issues with sharing a kitchen and bathroom. Tomas also provided some beach towels and beach gear, which was very nice.
Nicely decorated and comfortable home in a quiet neighborhood.  Pretty beach is nearby.  Food and restaurants are a little bit of a drive away.

Everything was so good. Beautiful room, very clean and tidy. Nothing to complain. Tomas and Julia's home was beyond my expectation. Close to Haleiwa town and very nicely located for tour in north of Hawaii. I would highly recommend this place to others!

둘이 쓰기에 아주 적당했고 매우 청결하고 깔끔했던 방이었습니다. 에어비앤비 많이 이옹해봤는데 이정도로 깔끔하게 게스트 배려한 곳은 많이 없었던 것 같아요!!! 물놀이 하는데 필요한 물품들도 구비되어 있어서 편하게 사용했구요. 노스쇼어나 할레이바 쪽에서 숙박 원하신다면 여기 강추합니다!
Everything was very clean and the beach is very close

Super nice, clean, stylish, fresh. 
Awesome value! 
Couldn’t ask for more.

Feel like a local during your stay and enjoy this cute place during your Hawaiian vacation. Equipped with your own fridge, beach towels and even snorkel gear, you're all set to explore the beauty of the North Shore from this convenient location.
Amazing hikes and beaches are close-by (you definitely need a rental car) and your hosts Tomas and Julia will point you in all the right directions.
Excellent value accommodation, will be back.

Tomas' and Julia's place in the North shore is nothing but paradise. From the time you arrive you feel welcome into their home. Super sweet people who take  super good care of you, and are eager for you to have a nice stayin in Hawaii. 
Got the opportunity to run the marathon with Tomas during our stay, and really felt like staying with good friends all the time. Can't wait to get back
When in Oahu you can't choose better place to stay
Tomas and Lucas's home is a very cute, clean and comfortable bungalow. It's the perfect place to stay on the Northshore!!

Tomás' home was absolutely beautiful, and we had the most incredible time staying there. The location is literally 'steps from sand' and every morning we could watch the sunrise on the beach, that was basically a private beach (only a few people from the neighborhood were out there at a time). The home was very well decorated and clean, and Tomás was very quick to respond whenever we had any questions at all. Very convenient location, it was just a ~8 minute drive to get into the Haleʻiwa town center, with a bunch of surf shops, restaurants, etc. Everything about our trip was excellent, and allowed us to completely relax & bring ~aloha vibes~ back to busy NYC :)

BEST AirBnb EXPERIENCE YET!!!
Our stay with Tomas and Julia added so much to our trip - not only was the accommodation immaculate and very comfortable, but Tomas and Julia went well out of their way to help make sure our stay was incredible.  They had great local tips and insights, I will definitely be back!

What a special place with two special souls.  Julia and Tomas were the perfect guests.  They had extra time when we were here and helped us with the best surf spots, local transportation, the best restaurants and shopping.  There home is a sweet little bungalow steps from the beach.   You will be transported to another realm when you stay with them.  Thank you both Aloha until next time.
主人都很熱情親切,這裡到海邊或是哈雷瓦小鎮都很方便

Tomas and Julia are the loveliest and most friendly hosts! Their house is beautiful and they will make you feel right at home. The rooms are decorated nicely, are very clean, and have thoughtful touches added, such as beach towels and free coffee/tea. The house is walking distance to the beach, and a short drive to Haleiwa town centre. I would definitely recommend staying here while visiting Oahu's North Shore.

Tomas and Julia were so nice and accommodating! I broke my leg a day before the reservation and they were so sweet to me. They even gave me fresh papaya to help counteract the pain meds that had me all backed up. Their place looks even better than the pics. I can not say enough about how nice and comfortable this Airbnb was. I would absolutely come back again!

Next time I'm back in Oahu, I will definitely be staying with Tomas and Julia. They were great hosts. The room was perfect, the entire house was beautiful. Literally less than 5 min walking distance to the beach in the backyard and less than 10 min drive to the historical surf town of Haleiwa! Absolutely loved this airbnb and would be recommending it others! Thanks again!!
部屋はとにかく綺麗でｵｼｬﾚ｡でも説明が一切ないのでどぉ使っていいか分からなかった｡

房間非常整齊乾淨,空間也很舒適!
房東也很貼心哦!

Tomas and his wife were amazing host! They let us know the good local places to eat and what beaches to check out on the north shore. Their place was extremely clean and cozy. Close to a beach that was basically private, only saw one person in the 3 hours we were there. Already want to plan another trip to Hawaii to stay with them again!

Sweet little space.  Had exactly what we were looking for. Well described on the website.  Perfect location for what we were going for.  Great communication via text- although we never connected in person with our hosts.  Easy Peasy!
Julia is a wonderful host. Rooms are very clean and well appointed.
对房东和房间十分满意,房东很早就在门口等我们到来,以后一定会再来,

We had a lovely stay in Tomas and Julia's home. It was very comfortable and they let us drop our bags off before check-in so we could explore the North Shore for the day which made it very easy for us. Breakfast and coffee the next morning was also great! :)
Mahalo

What a nice stay! About a 5 minute walk to a pretty private beach, and a very quick drive to Haleiwa, this is a super affordable and centrally located. Tomas and his wife were very hospitable and friendly, offering tips for the area and provided everything we needed to make sure our stay was comfortable. Would highly recommend to any travelers to the North Shore!
Very nice hosts. Good location for everything the North Shore had to offer.

The room feels like a little home. The room with a big bed is really sweet and everything was clean when we arrived. They supplied, Snacks, drink water and coffe aswell as snorkling equipment.
The Beach is just around the corner.
The little village is cute and there is a lot do to around and 
its a quiet area.
All the beautiful flowers made me love this place! Mini fridge and coffee was great.

This is a beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood.  This property has all the little special touches like French press coffee, fresh flowers, bright and happy colors and furnishings, plus it’s clean and quiet.  The hosts are very hospitable and kind. Mahalo for a wonderful trip.
Cozy, cute, very close to the beach/main town, and excellent hosts!! If you stay here you're guaranteed to enjoy your time in the north shore!

It is beautiful home in a quiet neighborhood and close to the town and beaches!  The house is clean,wonderful decoration,fresh flowers,coffee,,, and mini fridge in your room ;)   We love this place! 
Lukas is friendly, excellent host!

What a classy beach house! Tomas and Lucas cultivated a snazzy little space to reside in. The location is ideal; footsteps from the beach and minutes from bomb local eateries. Tomas and Lucas were also very accommodating with questions and amenities as well. Mahalo, we appreciate you!

LOVED our stay here on the North Shore. Everyday after watching the sunrise on our own private beach a block from the house, we took mini road trips to the local beaches and scooped out all the delicious food trucks. Tomas told us where the best hikes were and made us special cheese bread. This cute, newly renovated and cozy home had lovely extras like beach towels and coffee in the morning! We’d stay here again in a heartbeat! Loved it! Felt like a local! It was perfect!
This place is a gem with the 2 rooms.  It is clean and nicely decorated. Our host is friendly and helpful. A great find, one of the best finds for me in my travels.  Everything was excellent!!

Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet. Es stehen Strandhandtücher zur Verfügung und der Strand liegt direkt um die Ecke. Die Unterkunft ist mit einem öffentlichen Bus erreichbar, auch wenn ein Auto natürlich praktisch wäre.

We met Tomas when we checked in. He is a nice host and made a great set up before we moved in. We enjoyed the stylish rooms in which we stayed. Their house is within the walking distance to the beach, so you can have lots of fun there in a sunny day. Overall we enjoyed our stay. Thanks Tomas!
U

Spent one night with Tomas and Lucas as I was visiting the North Shore, and I was very happy. The shower in the house is amazing and the location is literally 1 minute from the beach. I would definitely stay there again!

Tomas and Linda’s house was is charming! When you walk in, you can see their beach theme decor through out the house. It is so clean. The bedroom is right across from the bathroom. Having the AC in our room gave us a great nights rest. There is a good sized mini fridge in the closet plus some hangers. They have thoughtfully included what you would need for a trip to the beach. Parking was easy, we had no issues with street parking (it’s on a residential street with plenty of room.) The house is in a great location, you are about a 2 minute drive to Haleiwa. We felt right at home and would definitely stay with them again.
Great space! The hosts were helpful and made our stay wonderful!

Had a great stay at the house. Didn't get to meet Tom but gave us some good recommendations on hikes etc. Managed to get the Apple TV working as it was raining one of the days. The place is comfortable and I would stay there again.
Great place! Everything was very clean and organized. They were really nice and gave us a few local tips of places to visit and restaurants to eat. Highly recommend!
Very good host and place to stay to visit north shore of Oahu

Loved staying here! We only stayed one night and regretted not spending more time here. Absolutely gorgeous and well-appointed house. Room was perfect and Tomas had lots of extras -thanks so much for the beach towel!! 

The location is perfect. Not even 2 blocks from a quiet beach. Perfect way to spend the morning! :-) No issues parking on the street and was a quick drive to restaurants and nearby places of interest. Excellent spot!

Easy check-in and wasn’t hard to find at all. Great communication from Tomas making sure we had everything we needed and even giving some great suggestions for local eating. 

Mahalo!! Definitely need to come back and explore more of the North Shore! :-)

Die Unterkunft von Thomas und Lucas ist super sauber und sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet mit vielen schönen Details. Wir konnten ohne Verkündigung vor dem check in unsere Koffer bereits abstellen und an den gleich um die Ecke gelegen Strand gehen. Strandhandtücher standen zur Verfügung. Im Kühlschrank war Wasser für uns kalt gestellt sowie ein paar Überraschungen.  Zu den Restaurants  waren es nur ein paar Minuten mit dem Auto.  Das Parken auf der Strasse war auch  kein Problem es war vor dem Haus immer etwas frei.  Das Haus ist ruhig gelegen. Klimaanlage war in unserem Zimmer vorhanden hatten wir aber nicht nutzen müssen. Wir hatten schnelles Internet. Die Anweisungen zum Zugang der Unterkunft  waren sehr verständlich und einfach. Kuschelige Gästehandtücher und eins der besten Shampoos und Spülungen die ich je hatte :-)

As my first time using Airbnb, Thomas and Lucas's place has set a very high standard. The house was lovely and clean, bed was super comfy, ammennities great and coffee delicious. Just staying one night I missed the chance to meet Thomas, however there was always great communication between us. Also in a great spot on the North shore, I recommend this place to anyone.

Josh and Bek
Nice rooms on a quiet street - just a 1 minute walk to the beach.  Owners provided a few goodies in the minifridge - nice touch.

You gotta book this! Tomas and his wife are awesome! Totally friendly, helpful and openminded! The room was incredible! So sweet with a lot of little details! I would stay there for many more days! It’s really close to town and only few steps from the beach! Check in and communication were easy and everything worked fine! I can honestly absolutely recommend them!!
Tomas and Julia offer a very clean and comfortable bedroom. We found many little attentions that are very practical. They prepared everything in details for us before we arrived.
Cute bungalow close to a beautiful secluded beach. The house was tastefully decorated and the room stocked with amenities.
Great spot, would definitely recommend it!

Great location for exploring the north shore. Thomas and Julia were friendly and their house was very clean and  comfortable and provided everything we needed for a short stay. Their recommendation for the elephant truck is now the elephant shack, and we all agreed the pad Thai was the best ever. A great stay.
We enjoyed 2 pretty and well equipped rooms with a lot of extras like a fridge, coffee maker and cookies. The bathroom and shower are clean and fresh. We had a very good time, thank you
Great space and location. Mini frig in the room was a great amenity.
とても素敵なお部屋で､快適に過ごせました!気になる所は全くなかったなかったです｡

We loved staying here! Welcoming home with two nautical themed bedrooms and relaxing atmosphere. Quaint retreat minutes away from the North Shore! Super clean and very comfortable place to sleep with AC. About two blocks to the beach for a quick swim! Would highly recommend.
We hat a great stay in this beautiful apartment.  Very clean, nice located and very relaxed! :)
Wonderful, clean, close to wonderful beaches!

I only wish we could have stayed longer at Tomas and Lucas'! The house has the cutest beachy decorations and is ideal for a stay at North Shore. The small details really made our stay special including the tasty croissants and coffee and snorkeling gear.
Great place! Super convenient and private for myself.

Overall the space was wonderful. Street parking can be hard to find at certain hours but we still found satisfactory parking. The beach is close to walk down and enjoy listening to the waves. The room itself had wonderful decor, and quality linens. All the small touches throughout were thoughtful and well appointed. The space was very clean and the hosts were very friendly. You really had no idea if they were even home most of the time. If you’re a night owl or tend to be a louder person it may not be the rental for you. But if you enjoy a quiet area in a sleepy town compared to Waikiki.. this is the place!
Very clean! It felt like a hotel stay.
Perfect :-)
Clean and comfortable, nice hosts.

This duplex is situated in a traditional Hawaiian neighborhood in close proximity to a variety of homes of differing  sizes and styles. The place is small and well maintained. While there is AC in the room, I was advised twice within the first ten minutes of arrival of the “rules” for using it despite it being near 90 inside the home. 

The host, who were not Tomas and Lucas as advertised, attempted to tell me “ things are done differently here in Hawaii” which may have worked but because multi generations of my family have lived on island for years, I know that to be false. 

As a local visitor, I was disappointed in how unwelcoming we were made to feel. So much so that my sister left early to just stay at home; why stick around to be reminded of the shoe policy or to keep the bedroom doors closed at all times. 

At one point, the female host even told my sister she would be charged $50 for having her infant daughter with her, something that we had inquired about prior to arrival. I tried to call Air bnb to cancel the remaining night because it simply was not enjoyable or worth the expense and they were not helpful in the slightest. I’ve used this service countless times in many areas including Hawaii and have never had an experience quite like this one. It saddens me because I raved to family how great the service is but in this case, not so much. 

I have an affinity for the area and I hope others will find a welcoming place to experience the aloha of the islands but this place wasn’t it for us at least. 

Most importantly, a major hurricane was scheduled to hit the island during our visit. It would have been humane for the hosts to offer some support but we heard nothing from them. Again, Airbnb was useless and offered no advice.
Very clean place.  Great location.  Definitely would recommend this to others!
What a wonderful Hawaii getaway! Great location, very clean, exactly what we were looking for! Thanks again Thomas and Julia!

We were looking for something out of the hustle and bustle of the main village and this is the perfect room. Only 5 mins from the village. A short walk to a beach. 
The room was clean and linens and towels were of a high quality. The a/c in the room cools it down quickly an there are snacks and drinks in the small fridge in the room. The room also provides some snorkel gear as well as beach towels and some sun protection lotions. 
We can’t recommend this place enough. We didn’t see Tomas and Julia that often but we knew they were there if we needed anything.

We loved our stay at Tomas and Julia’s! The bungalow is about an easy 5minute drive from Haleiwa, and included everything we needed. It was a perfect introduction to Hawaii, and we enjoyed our stay on the north shore!

It was great to stay in your lovely house! And location was great with car also we enjoyed a lot at the restaurant that you guys recommend!
North shore (and short drive distance) area has a lot to do and it is perfect location to have a base.
Only 2 little concerned were Near by beach was not great when we were there (this is not your guys fault!) and the cooler/fan in the room was quite laude ( it was not too hot when we were there so we managed ok though!)
But otherwise, they prepared great room and amenities (drinks and even a little snacks!) and we stayed there comfortably. Thank you so much!

Julia and Tomas's place was very neat and stylish place. 
We stayed for get a way weekend. It was very comfortable and recommend to anyone!
房間很乾淨歐,離海邊超近,每天都有提供小點心,超貼心的,雖然是與房東一起住,但Tomas and Julia 都很親切,剛開始入住有一點不習慣,但很快就適應了~

Tomas and Julia are friendly and accommodating. Their house and rooms are very clean and beach modern.  Even when they are at home they keep to themselves
and make you feel like it's your home.  The greatest thing about their place is that
it's one block from the beach!  How great is that!  And having two rooms available is 
ideal for 2 friends or 2 couples.  Highly recommended!
Very clean and felt very welcome.  Tomas and Julia added the sweetest touches with the snorkeling gear, extra towels, waters, etc.  You feel very much at home!
Fun to stay at the North Shore.  Very clean and safe place, owners are very nice.

Great stay here, location was handy to Haleiwa by car. We had the place to ourselves as Tomas & Julia were not around but their communication was great and self check in and out was easy. The extra little touches like snacks and (my favourite) cider in the mini fridge was very generous. We also made use of the snorkel gear which was great. Thank you!

It was located really close from Haleiwa town.
The place was clean, comfortable and quiet so we could stay with relax.

And i recommend to use rental car to touch down there.
Hosts are very friendly. Great place, close to the beach. Comfy bed and the French press coffee was a nice touch. Would stay again!
A gem of a spot and perfectly appointed.
Tomas & Julia provide nice accommodations at a reasonable price.  They are located a short drive outside of Haleiwa, but still close to the beach.  We would definitely book another stay with them.

great cosy place, very friendly hosts
there are some rules but these are totally reasonable. we enjoyed staying here very much!

Was a wonderful home, great air flow through out the house. All went well as expected. Had great conversations with Julia & Tomas, they made us feel like long time friends. They always kept in contact as needed. Always had answers for any location we had questions for.
Easy and clean
I had really a pleasant and comfortable stay at your property.
Tomas and Julia were very accommodating and have a nice home in a good location.  We had a great stay!

We were looking g for a place last minute and found Tomas and Julia. Happy we did, they are a friendly couple that made travel easy. Everything was clean and tidy, plus there were some snacks and hawaiian beer in the mini fridge as a welcome. Also, it is pretty close to town. Could walk if needed but you'd be better off with a rental.
Sehr empfehlenswert top!

This was my first airbnb experience and everything was great. Julia and Tomas were very nice and helpful. The place is clean and cosy, nothing to complain about. I definitely recommend it if you're looking for somewhere to stay on the north shore. Thanks again to Julia and Thomas.
Gracious hosts - darling, cute and clean comfortable room!  Would stay again if in the area!

Absolutely loved staying at Tomas and Julia’s place. It’s location is perfect. A short walk to the beach and a quick car ride into Haleiwa. They were super nice and so quiet! Their house is so cute too. Highly recommend staying with them :)
Julian and Thomas were really lovely hosts. You will definitely need a car here though! Beautiful stay - thanks guys :)

name: Lovely Studio for two! twinbed, wifi, CWB MTR
summary: Cozy Studio in the Heart of Causewaybay. 1 minute walk to MTR.. (CWB exit C) - 30 min. from airport. - twinbed (130x185) - stove - closet - super fast Wifi (200mbit) - water boiler  - stove - refrigirator - AC - MTR Station Causewaybay & bus station within 50m range (1min walk). Pizzahut, McDonalds (opposite the street), 24/7 local food and 7/11 super market just next to the building. great for first time travelers. 250HKD DISCOUNT: https://www.airbnb.com/c/sureeruts7
description: Cozy Studio in the Heart of Causewaybay. 1 minute walk to MTR.. (CWB exit C) - 30 min. from airport. - twinbed (130x185) - stove - closet - super fast Wifi (200mbit) - water boiler  - stove - refrigirator - AC - MTR Station Causewaybay & bus station within 50m range (1min walk). Pizzahut, McDonalds (opposite the street), 24/7 local food and 7/11 super market just next to the building. great for first time travelers. 250HKD DISCOUNT: https://www.airbnb.com/c/sureeruts7 The Studio is on of the best locations of Hong Kong - Causewaybay! The MTR "Causewaybay Exit C" is about 30 seconds away from the buildings entrance. You have on the oposite site a McDonalds, Pizzahut and many local chinese food restaurants which are 24 hours 7 days a week open. Directly on front of the Entrance is a 7/11 which is also day and night open, for drinks and snacks. The Studio is Hong Kong Standard, in another words; cozy (about 100 sqft.) with a twinbed (120x185cm), very pratical and gives you the perfect exp
notes: The Studio is on of the best locations of Hong Kong - Causewaybay! The MTR "Causewaybay Exit C" is about 30 seconds away from the buildings entrance. You have on the oposite site a McDonalds, Pizzahut and many local chinese food restaurants which are 24 hours 7 days a week open. Directly on front of the Entrance is a 7/11 which is also day and night open, for drinks and snacks. The Studio is Hong Kong Standard, in another words; cozy (about 100 sqft.) with a twinbed (120x185cm), very pratical and gives you the perfect experience for this vibrating city! We have a brand new 2in1 washing and dryer machine in the hallway which can be used for only 50HKD a time, alternatively we do provide a Laundry Service for 10HKD / pound of clothes! The Laundry Service will pick up the clothes, and deliver it next morning ready up washed and dryed. Another great special is our selfcheckin - you do not have to meet us, you simply get the access keys for the door after booking and can checkin whenever yo
house_rules: Checkout is 11.00 a.m. - If you checkout later, we do have to charge you an extra day of stay. Make sure you have put the right ammount of guests - if you book for one person, and a second person enters the studio, we will request the double price as penalty for each day of your stay! The whole building is CCTV protected. Turn off AC, Heater and lights when you leave the room.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: NICE PLACE
地址需要改一下 写错了 地段还可以 房间太小 性价比不高

Nancy's place was very convenient. Location was centrally located, close to MTR. Room is small but comfortable enough to enjoy my stay. (Normal size for HK standards). Nancy was very friendly upon check-in and made sure everything went OK during my stay. I would def recommend her place and stay again in the future.

Nancy was a great host, very welcoming and made sure my stay was great! She was always on her phone when I needed to contact her, and came the last day to greet me. The place is very centric, it is full furnished and modern, it may be small, like most of the places in Hong Kong, but the value for money is definitely unbeatable! I will recommend this stay 100% to friends and relatives if they come to Hong Kong too!
Convenient location.
Value for money if you're a budget traveler.
Nancy was great, quick to respond to all of my inquiries. Location is surprisingly quiet in spite of being so close to the station and shops.
Tiny but very comfortable apartment in the center of HK.

I enjoyed my stay in this studio that respect the standard of surface for a room in HG. Nancy is super reactive and you feel very well hosted at the 7th floor. The flat is located in a lively district so you reach easily late open nice restaurants to find out.. and the wooloomooloo bar is at a walking distance !

Great place to stay! Clean and awesome location!
Very friendly hosts! Super helpful! 
Recommend this place for sure! :)
位置挺好的,离地铁口很近

離地鐵站非常近,旁邊就是銅鑼灣SOGO....後面時代廣場!
香港地小､床鋪一個人睡剛好!
Nancy訊息回覆很快,非常讚!
不建議一個女生入住,因為樓下其他樓層是特種行業!

One of my favourite ABBs! Nancy is very quick with responses and her room was very accurate . I definitely  recommend only one person staying in here as the room is small. However, if you are into living compact, then this place is for you! I will definitely stay here again :·)

Nancy's place is located in a very colorful building that is conveniently situated to get all around Hong Kong Island and Kowloon. Getting to and from the airport is very convenient. Will definitely book this space again.
Nancy and Andreas are very quick to respond to questions. The rooms are literally right outside Causeway Bay station Exit C. Very convenient.
很熱鬧的住宿環境 只是五樓有其他粉色行業 但是很安靜 跟我其他間住宿比起來這家很好 忘記帶轉接頭 裡面還有兩個轉接頭 床是單人床 兩個人睡比較擠 沒有提供罐裝水 但是可以煮水 整體來說 下次還會來住 對面就有翠華 麥當勞 很棒
샤듼으류 뵤면 염쳥 쬬아뾰이는데 샤즨뺠이예윰 염쳥 쨕야욤. 뎡먈뎡먈 걔짝야요. 침데갸 챠즤햐뉸 굥갼뻬묜 성읜 냠쟈 퍌귭혀퍼기 햘 굥갼 겨으 냐와윰. 그릐규 요긔 윳긘게 계슈튜드리 준 별졈만큼 자긔도 쟈둉으류 별졈 평졈 쥰댜고 예약햑인셔에 냐와이쎠윰. 규례서 별졈의 눂은결슈듀? 냐쀼진 않은데 샤즨이 계죻야요 챰교해여 위치는 정말 짱임.
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全｡位置也很好｡

Place was clean and well located! Also very clear communications with Nancy.
Thanks!

Das Studio von Nancy war sauber und aufgeräumt. Die Lage des Zimmers ist genial. Man kann in wenigen Minuten alle möglichen Geschäfte, den Geldwechsel oder die Metro erreichen. Shopping Mall und Restaurants sind auch zu genüge vorhanden. Ich habe meine Freundin in Hong Kong besucht und würde das gleiche Studio nochmal buchen.
perfect check in, perfect communication, good value for money, good location but be aware of the building. It is not suited for minors. Also room fits one.

It was not the host’s fault to rent out this place on Airbnb but rather my own not to have read through reviews already noting that the building is filled with brothels. Men was looking at me in the lift which is quite run-down and slow. I ended up not staying the night and checking in at a hotel instead. Nothing wrong with the room itself for its value.

Nocleg położony jest w centrum miasta, skąd blisko do wszystkich, wartych odwiedzenia miejsc. Czysto.
Polecam to mieszkanie na krótki pobyt w HK.

It’s a good place for the price. Room was quiet, clean and comfortable. Great location, near restaurants and public transport. Although the bathroom/toilet has a faint urine smell. Also the room is situated in a building with ‘red-light’ activities on other floors (not the floor of this building), which may be a concern for some guests.

Nancy's flat is very cozy and in a great position! Kind of small, but probably in the average of Hong Kong. The flat is quiet despite being so close to the main attraction, restaurants, pubs and busy streets! Reccomended for a single traveler or business man visiting Hong Kong.

The location is great and the studio was clean. That is without question. As other travellers note, the fact the studio is in the same building that offers prostitution, it means I often had to wait for the lift to arrive as it was busy with punters. The building is safe though, as almost everywhere is in HK.
Fantastic, cozy place, in an amazing location. Couldn’t ask for more at that price point.

It is a good airbnb if you are looking for a cheap place to spend one short night and if you are not bother by the fact that the building is used for prostitution. For me it was ok, but I am not sure if I will recommend it for everybody haha
Good location, good apartment for the price

The apartment is very Central and great for walking around. You can find countless places to eat and plenty of nightlife. 
The place itself is typical for Hongkong, small but enough for two people.

More or less as advertised. Room is a bit smaller than the pictures make it seem, but such is real estate in HK. Good location and value for the price. The area (and building) is a bit grungy, but the room itself is kept clean.

Nancy was super helpful and very quick to respond. Check in process is quick and easy. Security is good. 

The property is recommended to all and the location is great. The bed is big enough for two people although maybe a bit small for someone taller then 185cm

Also would not recommend to kids to stay here.
The only issue to me is the hot water shower is very weak and short.

If you are ok to stay in one apartment and sharing with few other tenants at separated room this is the place. Do not expect a studio apartment because it is not as described. It is actually an apartment with few rooms altogether.

Pros
+ Perfect location, but due to awesome Hong Kong metro it is not crucial
+ Nancy is very responsive. Always answered fast 
+ Easy check-in procedure

Cons
- Barthel on the few floors of the building. 
- we couldn't check-in at 12:00 and had to wait till 17:00. We asked Nancy to check-out a few hours later, but she rejected.
- 2-ppl bed was really small for 2 people. 
- small towels

Overall impression:
There were problems like brothel on the most floors of the building, towels weren't ready, check-in time and no-water day but that was not crucial and solved fast.  I propose to rent apartments not in the middle of the city because you can reach most famous tourism spots in 20-30 minutes from any part of the city.
Nice place. Good location.
The flat was ok by HK standards, well kept and clean. Helpful maid/cleaner. We wont recommend for young ladies or children as it seems to be surrounded by brothels in the other floors.

Good location close to CWB MTR. The unit was clean. The hot water does take a while to heat up and it only lasts a couple minutes. The unit is located inside a brothel but everyone minds their in business. Overall it was a good stay.

Location is really good and convenient!
If you are carrying luggage you can take lift (cwb mtr exit D). Come out from the lift keep straight, till you will see exit C is on your left hand side and further cross the road.
不建议女性独自入住

Space was cozy, but located in a convenient location. Good for one, maybe up to 2 people. Only downside is that the building, although not that specific floor, is used for prostitution. Lot of guys coming in and out of the building at all hours of the night.

Nancy's place was very convenient with a subway station located 5 mins away. Bedsides the shower room, the bed and room were small. I visited Hong kong around February and it was super cold for me. The room had to heater. The hot water/heater, fridge, lights, TV, and more were enabled by a bunch of switches.   These switches were labeled in Chinese. So, I it wasn't user friendly for people who can't read Chinese. I ended up with no fridge, and TV. I did figure out the heater for the bath room. Although, the hot water stayed hot for only 3 mins. So, I ended freezing myself to death.  I checked in with the place not cleaned properly. I found multiple hairs in the shower room and a box of opened condom next to my bed.  Thankfully, I booked Nancy's place just for one night. Overall, I'm was disappointed and I would not recommend this place.
Strategic
Cozy home. Nice location.
Place was perfect and affordable. I recommend.
Great location near metro and many restaurants. Small room but has everything you need to be comfortable.
This location is conveniently located in the heart of Causeway Bay. Easy access to MTR and there are plenty of eateries around. Room is compact and well kept.
great location. unit size is pretty good
As described. Small but convenient. Clean and smooth experience.
場所は日本で言えば渋谷や新宿の中心地と言ったところでしょうか｡便利さを求めるならｵｽｽﾒです｡他方で､女性の滞在には少し歌舞伎町的な雰囲気もあるため気にされない方のみお勧めします｡

Great location and very convenient for travellers who would love to roam around Causeway bay. We were just a bit worried about safety because we noticed a lot of men were going down on the other floors with bright neon lights.. But all in all, we had a great stay.
Central location and a clean place for a reasonable price. It’s small yes, but that is Hong Kong ;)
Great location, excellent place.
Great location !
It’s an absolutely ideal place for single individual male to stay. There are thousands choices in the building. And bring an ear plug due the noise from AC.
Very convenient spot in Causeway Bay, close to convenience stores, great food, and the MTR station to access most of Hong Kong. Cozy place to rest for a night—and the wifi is fast, to boot.
건물이 노후되서 처음에는 좀 당황했지만 방은 사진 그대로 여행하면서 묵기에 좋았어요 !

比較像是藏身在大廈中的小旅館(3-4平米左右/一間房),也沒有見到過房東｡
到了直接就可以入住也算是一種方便吧｡

Typical Hong Kong size apartment (~15sq meters) - a tight squeeze for 2, but very well furnished with some toiletries provided. Good position in a safe neighbourhood, very close to Causeway Bay MTR, 7-11, 24/7 conveniences etc. Make sure when you arrive that you receive a photo from one of the hosts outlining check in instructions. I didn't, and the listing is very vague, however I was able to contact someone after a couple of phone calls.

This place is perfect to see downtown Hong Kong, near the subway and walking distance to Victoria Park. The room is tiny as expected, but comfortable enough and fine for a few nights. The bed is wide enough for two but not meant for very tall people. Michelle was very thoughtful in sending a note on how to get into the city, and the plugs all have adapters!
Queen size bed, tiny but cozy

Nancy's place is very clean and in a good location very close to Causeway Bay station what is quite convenient. 
It is very easy to find the location and the check in is very easy as well. 
I can recommend the place, but the bed is not that big, so not recommendable for tall people and bring ear plugs as the air con is quite noisy (what seems like to be normal in Hong Kong, as I was told)
地理位置优越,房内整体环境不错,本人可能对床上用品的整洁度要求比较高,觉得不够干净｡
Apartment building has multiple brothels situated in it. Otherwise, great location. Host is pretty petty so do be careful of that as well.

Would not pay the amount that was offered for this place. You can pay the same amount and get a way bigger space that is top notch cleAn and in shape. Nancy did not respond to my messages, the fridge was broken, toilet wasn’t working properly, there was silver fish In our bed, clean towels and sheets were hard to find. Not impressed with the communication or help at all! Also elevator takes forever because there’s 4 floors that are brothel
Houses so it takes forever to get down and up as well weird men creep outside the apartment door, especially if they see a girl, I was followed up to my suite a couple times by weird men!

Got the check in details late, check in was available later then described.
Location is good, not far away from metro station, some groceries and local cafes are available.
Tiny place, but I guess it is typical for HK. 
Place is clean, but obviously quite used.

Yeah its in a brothel building, but its HK. Almost every other building in Causeway Bay has some seedy massage parlor in it. Whilst there were guys going in and out, i was never bothered by any of them and quite frankly found the entire setting pretty unique to HK. My fiance and friends back home were astonished to find how the entire building functions. Trust me you will have a story to tell after staying in this building. 

Andy and Nancy were extremely accommodating and friendly from the 1st day. Awesome cleaner who was very helpful and nice. Room was much bigger than most hotels in HK(this is my 8th visit to HK and 1st Airbnb) and with a location this close to Causeway Bay will definitely stay here again.
Clean, convenient and a simple place to stay while in Hong Kong! I appreciated the firm mattress, great location to get to anywhere in the city easily, and quietness in the building.
The location is really convenient and easily found.

Small apartment with amazing location. You are in the heart of the island where locals come to spend their evening.
The staircase looks a bit rough with some brothels on the lower floors but the apartment is clean and safe. It grew on me after a few days, I would definitely stay there again.

You get a private room with your own key. The shower is very good with great water pressure. The air conditioning unit is very powerful for the small space and can be fine controlled. There's travel adapters in some of the power sockets. 

Tips:
The bed is 1,80m long but if you are tall like me (2m) you can open the lower part of the cupboard at the end of the bed and rest your feet there :)

You have to switch on several switches grouped with the light switches in order to get the AC unit and the hot water to work.

If you closed the bathroom ventilation pull the cord away from the wall to reopen the hatch.

There was a point in the conversation where nancy became sarcastic. There's no need to be rude most especially for guests who are asking questions as it's their first time to stay in your country and they are planning itinerary. communication must be improved. I'm giving 3 stars cause the place is cozy. I just noticed that most peeps getting in the elevator are guys. must be because of the brothel in the other floors. Putting the communication aside, it was a nice stay.
非常好的体验
很好,很干净,交通便利
Small cosy room in the heart of causeway bay. Affordable and easy to Find.

My trip to Hong Kong did not start well. I followed the instructions in the chat from the host and was looking for door with a keypad to enter a code. Upon found the door, the keypad was not visible. It looked like a hotel door that you need a magnetic card to activate. I thought I thought it was the wrong door. I spent quite a while hunting around the building. I called the host but the call went straight to voicemail. I texted her and messaged her through chat but still nothing. I had to call Airbnb. It was impossible to tell from the instructions that the trackpad was digital. Finally Airbnb was able to contact the host and the matter was resolved. The host sent me a link to a six page website which I hadn't read all the way through but read thoroughly once I checked in. The room was small and clean. It’s at a very low price point so I wasn’t expecting the Four Seasons. It would have been nice if the sheets and towels were fresher and better quality but everything else was good.  As an expat male who’s lived in Asia for almost 30 years, it didn’t bother me to discover that the building is kinda one big brothel with prostitutes working out of small flats throughout. As a result, the lift and lobby attracts a lot of shady punters. I felt safe but if you're female or new to Asia, I wouldn’t recommend it. The flat was quiet, cozy and everything worked. Location is excellent so that made up for the initial inconvenience. I would happily come back for a short stay.

I found out the bldg was a brothel in the lower floors which made it quite uncomfortable for me because I’m a female. We arrived early so I asked Nancy if it was possible to leave our luggage there but we had a misunderstanding. Although she said yes, we can leave it at the hallway, she didn’t reply if it was safe to leave it there. I asked if there was a receptionist or someone who can watch over the things that we would leave behind because it is my first time to stay at a condo/ arbnb in HK. She replied “there’s no reservation dear” which was not helpful at all. We waited 30 mins outside the door (thinking the door was for our room only). Good thing someone went out and let us in. He said there’s more than 1 room inside that door. A filipino cleaner welcomed us and that’s when I understood what she meant by “hallway”. There were 3-4 units inside with small kitchen, etc. She was so helpful and that’s when we started to feel comfortable. Room was clean, small but well ventilated. Everything we needed was there also. So I’m giving it a good rating coz the overall exeperience was great.
Отсутствие воды в унитазе, тараканы в комнате
come back again. sure
floors was not what I expected but for the price it was fine

The place is small. (Somehow even smaller then how the pictures made it look). The bed is small so if you are over 170cm tall you might not fit. Also the bed is really only fit for one person. Elevator was often delayed because of the heavy stream of traffic visiting the brothel on the 12 floor. The building didn’t have any good vibes, However, the location was very good, 5 minutes to the closest metro station. Lots of food options close by. The check in was very easy ( there was a touch activated keypad). There was no issues with communication. Would not recommend for single females or couples.

The studio is well located, it's near Time Square and everything you need to discover Hong Kong at your own pace. The only downside it's the size of the studio, which is super small, but it's according to HK standard, also there are several brothels in the same building, which for me wasn't a big deal because I was with my husband  and there wasn't any safety issue but I wouldn't recommend it for women travelling alone.

The location is really strategic. There’s 7-eleven, Mannings (you can buy medicines, chocolate or anything you need there), Yoshinoya, McD, Pizza Hut—it’s a complete stop. Just take 5 mins walk and you’ll find Apple Store, Ichiran and MTR Station. 

The apartment is really small, but it’s enough since you’ll spend most of the time exploring the city. Hot water, hair dryer worked just fine. The bed is too small for two people. But you can squeeze in and get comfy.
Great for solo traveler. Not anything more. Bed is very firm. So if you are used to a soft or plush mattress this def isn’t for you.

위치는 코즈웨이베이역 근처에 있어서 정말 좋아요. 방도 좁긴 하지만 생각보다 깨끗하고 아늑했어요. 수납공간이 되게 많아서 괜찮았구요. 드라이기, 샴푸, 간단한 식기도 준비되어 있었어요. 혼자서 쓰기에 가격대비 좋은 것 같아요. 근데 숙소가 있는 건물이 되게 음침하고 무서워요. 그리고 여자분들은 조심해야될 것 같아요. 혼자 갔는데 건물에 nam자들 엄청 많고 추측인데 up소가 있는것 같음.
Nancy’s place is very conveniently located. It is well equipped and easy to access. Very good value for money. I’d stay there again!

入住过各个城市的很多民宿
这间是体验最差的
不可否认交通便利 位置很好 设施也算齐全 打扫卫生的阿姨很nice
但存在以下问题:
1. 打扫不干净 一个枕头很脏 上面有头发
2.洗澡热水只有几秒钟 剩下全部冷水
3. 隔音效果差 房子不是独立单间 而是一个房子隔出来的多个套房 这点在介绍中没有体现 十二点 一点 两点 三点都分别有人回来
4. 房东回复慢 很难沟通 由于离港时间较晚 想寄存一下行李 被告知需要另外缴纳一晚房费 能够理解规则 但缺乏人情味和冷漠的沟通方式 负分
5. 看到房东对其他住客的建议是在入住期间反馈意见 个人觉得很搞笑 
第一房东反馈很不及时 
第二卫生间的问题被反馈过很多次 也并没有得到解决 
所以 遇到问题不解决问题 反而质疑住客的沟通方式 都是借口

总结 香港资源稀缺 即便服务很差 房东或二房东都可以倚仗资源本身直接赚钱 只想要经济实惠的 可以考虑 想要旅途愉快的 还是建议住酒店

Nancy’s place is very conveniently located close to the metro and in a busy part of Hong Kong. It is very practical to stay there. I have already stayed at this accomodation twice and will definetely book it again.

name: Cozy Living Room in Mid-Levels
summary: Our flat is awesome! Conveniently located with easy access to public transportation, it's spacious and fully furnished with a great view. Walking distance to Sheung Wan and Central, the Mid-levels escalators is a 4 min walk. Avoid the congestion and pollution of Central and Sheung Wan and stay up in Mid-levels! Note: this listing is for our sofabed in the living room, privacy will be limited!
space: Your bed will be a sofa bed in the living room. Clean sheets and towels are provided. Our cozy flat is in a gorgeous area with a stunning view. By booking here you will have access to a spacious living room, a comfortable sofa bed, and any other amenities you'll require. neighborhood_overview: Quiet, peaceful, and homely yet still easily accessible. If you're into local flavours, downtown Sai Ying Pun has some lovely little shops and restaurants for you to enjoy! If you prefer a nice cocktail, dancing at clubs, or going out and drinking late at bars, SoHo is a great option for you! If you just want to take a casual walk and enjoy some inspiring views and fresh air, mid-levels suits you well!
notes: Feel free to ask us for recommendations, we're happy to help you better enjoy your stay!
transit: The Sai Ying Pun MTR (island line, 2 stops from central) is just a short walk from our flat, allowing easy access to the entire city. Multiple buses will take you to Hong Kong University, Admiralty, Wan Chai, and Causeway Bay. SoHo is just a 5 min walk, and Central just 10 min via the Mid-levels escalators.
access: Living room, full bathroom, dining area. Your bed will be a pull-out sofa in the living room with curtains installed for privacy.
interaction: Unless states otherwise, at least one of us will also be at the flat. We can also be reached at any time by text, phone, or the airbnb app
house_rules: Be mindful of the neighbours and respectful of the hosts and their property. Clean up after yourself, make sure you lock the doors when you leave, and turn off lights, water, air conditioning, and electronics when you're not using them. Keep in touch during your stay, we'll make ourselves available whenever possible to help you out and deal with any issues

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great location and cool place, its close to the airport and also close to the action, the host is very friendly

A simple and functional space to take a break from exploring Hong Kong. The guys were great, more than happy to chat about life and advise us on Hong Kong. Value is fantastic, and moving around the entire city of Hong Kong isn't a challenge so the location, although not central, is not a problem at all. Overall, we really appreciated the chance to stay here during our trip. Thanks guys!
It's a good place to live a s a traveler. Hosts are nice as well, and I enjoyed it during my stay.
房东还不错,就是床上用品最好自己带上｡这里交通还是挺方便的｡nice

A very good budget option for those wishing to stay in Hong Kong for a few days. It's cheap and excellently located, within walking distance of bars, restaurants, subway stations and shopping districts. Might not be so suitable for those staying for business purposes or who need good workspaces, etc.
Luke and his Roomate David are friendly and discrete. It was nice to stay with them.
Great place to stay, close to everything and very comfortable!
호스트가 친절함. 거실을 이용하고 호스트랑 함께 지내서 불편할 수 있지만 전혀 그렇지 않다. 위치는 딱히 좋지 않지만 호스트덕에 만족했다. 다만 청결도는 약간 떨어지지만 신경쓰일정도는 아니다

It was dope. I visited Cheung chau, Tst, lamma island, Victoria park. I still didn't touch half the stuff you can do in HK. 

As for the stay, the guys are Americans and were chill. The door guy is kinda weird. Besides that it's just a normal Chinese place with a nice view.

Luke and David seem really nice. They give you privacy, they offered to help in case we needed something. 
There is a kitchen, washing machine, bathroom and TV. Location is good, near the MRT.
这是个在半山的高楼住房,房东很赞｡客厅挺舒适,给人亲切的感觉｡我喜欢西营盘附近,有着很多有趣的人
Luke and David were easy going and the flat was nice and clean.
루크는 거의 통화만 하고있음. 데이빗은 친절했고 우리에게 너무 많은 관여를 하지도 않았고 적당했다. 동네도 볼거리가 많았다.

Luke and David were warm with advices & guides about Hongkong. The lack of privacy was a slight problem for us but we got used to it after the first day. The location made this place value for money. Just two stops away from central MTR!
A very homely place about 15 minutes from the trams and with good amenities.

We haven't met Luke, but David is a very nice host..and i guess Luke as well :)
The flat is in a good location. It's clean and even if you are staying in the living-room, you get enough privacy by closing the curtain.
There are MTR and super markets near by house. Very convenient! Hosts are kindly and friendly, offered great flexibility ☺︎

Prix attractif, situation géographique bonne, station de métro très proche.
anglais obligatoire , petit restaurant pas cher prés de la station de métro
Peut être bien si chambre indépendante,sinon à déconseiller.

The apartment has the best location ever! You can walk to all the nice shops, Cafés and galleries in Central and Sheung Wan and go to all the bars in Lan Kwai Fang by foot :) Our hosts were very friendly and easy going. We'd come back :)
Luke and David are great hosts and their place is very convenient!
Nothing
Amazing location, really nice view from the appartment. The couch is comfortable. Globally a very good adress for a couple of nights in HKG.
David & Luke’ s home is fantastic. David & Luke are very welcoming
挺好的,适合短期旅住

Luke and David's place is in a great location and ideal for a short stay in Hong Kong. They are very friendly and leave you all the freedom you want. The couch itsself is comfy enough for 2 people, and the curtain lets you sleep in privacy. It can be helpful to bring an extra blanket if it is cold outside as most houses in Hong Kong do not have central heating. Value-wise this place is a definitive 10/10!
Super friendly hosts, Luke and David, were highly considerate and of great respect during my stay. The location is quite convenient to reach by MTR and several buses.
Perfectly located not too far from MTR.  Just a small walk from the Central Markets. Great deal!
Really enjoyed my stay. Location was wonderful. Luke, David and his girlfriend were very friendly and sociable. Great internet and very easy going hosts. Highly recommended.

If you are looking for a budget friendly spot in a great location this is it! Luke and David were great hosts with lots of local tips. One thing about this place, and most of Hong Kong, they do not have heating so make sure to ask for extra blankets (if it's cold). We were there in the winter and luckily had brought my own sleeping bag.

It was a very good place to stay for short vacation in a great location, nearby central area and accessible to nearest mtr. We did not meet the two of them personally,  but we felt welcome in the house where everything was ready and prepared for us.

The place is very good value in a great location. Hosts are friendly and easygoing. The sofa is comfortable, but the place could really use some tidying up! With some more cleaning the place would be a perfect option for budget accommodation in Hong Kong!
luke和他的女朋友还有David人都很好,有疑问都会尽力帮助你｡房间比较乱,但清洁度很好,感觉比我家干净很多…睡的是沙发床,有新的床单和枕头和被子｡离地铁很近,比较方便｡西营盘比较安静,地点很好找｡
na

Great location. Luke and David were helpful on things to do in the city. The couch made for a very comfortable bed for two to share!
Great location. Luke is a great guy.

reviews.comments:
Me hospedei na casa da Beatriz, e quero muito agradecer a hospitalidade, simpatia e a atenção que ela me deu. Sempre que voltar ao Rio de Janeiro vou procurar ficar e com certeza indico para todos que forem ao Rio de Janeiro 
Beatriz obrigado
Bia received me as a guest and a (Hidden by Airbnb) friend with the traditional Brazilian "jeito" ...Very helpfull and interested in making my stay the best.

I spent three weeks in Rio de Janeiro during Olympics. Beatriz hosted me in the best way. A big room in a nice apartment really close to Flamengo beach and to metro station (Largo do Machado). All you need to spend great time and relax yourself in Rio is on Beatriz's home. Then you have the great and helpful opportunity to share with Beatriz some doubts and the beauty of Rio. No more words. Just amazing time in the perfect place.

name: Large and bright room near the beach - Poblenou
summary: The flat is a typical example of catalan modernist architecture, with high rounded ceilings, huge windows and tile floors. There is plenty of natural light and it will take you a 10' walk to get to the closest beach and 3' to the closest metro station.
space: I fell in love with this flat, with its bright light and charming tiles floors. It combines a retro atmosphere, with modern facilities in regard to kitchen and bathroom.  The room is bright as well ventilated through a big window, that opens to a balcony. There is a small closet at your disposal for your own stuff.
description: The flat is a typical example of catalan modernist architecture, with high rounded ceilings, huge windows and tile floors. There is plenty of natural light and it will take you a 10' walk to get to the closest beach and 3' to the closest metro station. I fell in love with this flat, with its bright light and charming tiles floors. It combines a retro atmosphere, with modern facilities in regard to kitchen and bathroom.  The room is bright as well ventilated through a big window, that opens to a balcony. There is a small closet at your disposal for your own stuff. All rooms are really big and spacious. There are two bedrooms (one of them is my own bedroom), a huge living room, an entry room connected to the big kitchen and to my studio. There is only one bathroom. I live in the flat myself, so the common facilities of the apartment will be shared with me.  There are no animals, and you can expect stay in a tidy flat with a very chilling atmosphere.  The main reason I started with airbnb
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in Poblenou, a lively neighborhood 10' walk from the beach, 15' from Arc de Triomf and Parc de la Ciutadela, and 25' from Plaça Catalunya. There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets just in a 3' walk.
notes: The bedroom's window is open towards the street, and although it is not a traffic dense area, you may hear some traffic noise. In case you'd be ultra sensitive to noise, ear plugs would be recommended.
transit: The neighborhood is very well connected trough bus lines (H14, V27, 92) and tube (L4 - Llacuna station). Anyway, as BCN is a rather small city with plenty of nice views, getting to city centre by foot would also be a perfect option to start getting familiar with it. Public transportation is available from El Prat airport and from bus and train stations.Otherwise, taxi would be an option (aprox. 35€ day-fare from the airport).
access: All rooms are really big and spacious. There are two bedrooms (one of them is my own bedroom), a huge living room, an entry room connected to the big kitchen and to my studio. There is only one bathroom.
interaction: I live in the flat myself, so the common facilities of the apartment will be shared with me.  There are no animals, and you can expect stay in a tidy flat with a very chilling atmosphere.  The main reason I started with airbnb is to get the chance to meet interesting new people and to enjoy the cultural exchange in hosting, also sharing my experience of the city in order to help you getting outside of tourist main-stream places. So I hope my presence will be a plus to enjoy BCN at its best!

neighborhood_overview: Hiking trail starts just behind the house. Takes you to Clearwater Bay Beach in 1 hr (15 min by taxi) and other nice beaches. Sai Kung with seafood restaurants (ca. 50min by bus, 30min by taxi). Jogging trail along Junk bay with views of HK Island.
notes: You have these options for parking a car: - short term/ 30 min free/  direct lift access: loading zone - short term/ 20HKD per hr.: covered visitor car park in the compound - short term/ 8HKD per hr., max. 2 hrs./  200m from the compound: open visitor car park - during the night/ for free but limited availability/ 100m-300m from the compound: parking along the street - long term/ ca. 2300HKD per month, 75HKD per night, 12HKD per hr./ 450m from the compound: open but fenced and guarded car park
transit: by taxi/ car: 20 mins. to Tsim Sha Tsui 25 mins. to Hong Kong Central by public transportation: Minibus directly in front of the compound. Takes you to Hang Hau MTR station (malls, wet market, restaurants nearby) in 10 mins.   15 mins. to Tseung Kwan O via MTR (more malls, restaurants, supermarkets) 30 mins. to HKUST via Bus. 35 mins. to Hong Kong Island/ North Point via MTR. 40 mins. to Hong Kong Island/ Causeway Bay via MTR. 45 mins. to Hong Kong Island/ Central via MTR. 50 mins. to Tsim Sha Tsui/ Mong Kok via Bus. arriving from the airport: 45 mins. by taxi (approx. 350HKD) 1:30 hrs. by bus A29 outside the airport until "la Cite Noble",  change to the bus station at the opposite side of the street and then take minibus 113 to "the Beaumount" (terminal). (48HKD)

house_rules: Absolutely no pets, no parties, no visitors!  As we usually live in the apartment, we will store our belongings in the storage room, but of course never access the flat when you are our guest. Smoking only on the balconies, pls.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Friendly host, clean and cozy residential flat. Though there is only a few shops around, you can take a minibus to shopping mall within 10-15 mins.

The clean & comfy apartment really makes me feel like at home.  Transportation is much better than I expected, a minibus to Hang Hai MTR is right next to the building.

Daniel is a super nice host.  Though I check-in late in the midnight, Daniel still welcomed me in person with a big smile.  He always responds to my questions promptly.

I would love to have the opportunity to stay in Daniel's place for next time.  Thank you,  Daniel & hope you & your family have a wonderful life !

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood This particular address puts you in an area that offers the best of the city and nature, with close proximity to both the downtown core and Mount Royal. Those with an active lifestyle will love the mountain’s large network of hiking trails open year-round for climbing, biking and cross-country skiing, as well its scenic areas including the newly-re-designed Beaver Lake, the Camillien-Houde Lookout, and the Kondiaronk Belvedere. Heading down along Cote-des-Neiges toward the Golden Square Mile, is where you’ll find top cultural, shopping, and entertainment attractions, such as the Museum of Fine Arts for fascinating permanent and temporary exhibitions, or the near-endless designer store, boutique, and amusement centre options of St-Catherine Street, Montreal’s major commercial artery. When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!

reviews.comments: Great condo, great view, great location.  Love the Kapalua area.  Pool right across from the condo was very convenient.  The complex is very quiet as well.

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our visit to Kapalua Ridge!! The accommodations were extremely clean and spacious!! This unit had a very well stocked kitchen, two large bedrooms with ample closet space and a very large bathroom in each, and a comfortable deck that overlooked the golf course with views of the ocean in the distance. Our daily morning walk started with a visit to the village center, about a ten minute walk, for coffee and whatever else we may need. We then ventured to the beach access entrance, which is just across the street from the complex entrance. There you will find a well established path along the oceanside with beautiful beaches. In addition to the ocean, there were several dining and happy hour options within walking distance and many more within a short drive. We especially enjoyed the overall quiet atmosphere.

I can’t recommend this location enough. Everything about it is exactly what you want in a Hawaiian getaway. First, the location. If you’re not familiar with Kapalua, it is in my opinion the best part of the island. Beautiful sandy beaches and much less crowded than other parts of the island. The only down side is it’s quite far from the airport and to the road to Hana, but, hey, the drive is gorgeous every time so this was not a problem for us at all. Another spectacular detail, you are within walking distance of the ritz. BUT, the ritz offers free valet, so feel free to drive over and go to one of there many fantastic restaurants and don’t expect to pay. You can also access there pool by renting a day bed for $200 a day or by arranging a massage. Everything was very simple to set up at the ritz. Fantastic hospitality. You can also just drive over and walk down to the beautiful beach right in front of the ritz, or just simply walk to the beach from the villa (about 5-10 walk - also a beautiful hike right along the coast if you’re up for it). Now, on to the villa. First, you have a designated parking space that is right in front of the villa on the ground level. Second, the communication with the host was outstanding. We had one minor issue with the ice machine in the fridge, and they came over and fixed it immediately. Every amenity is included just as advertised. Many towels, and soap and shampoo all throughout. Also, the space is huge. You can easily fit two couples and one extra person to stay in the living room. The bathrooms are huge and have giant beautiful tubs. The water pressure was amazing! Finally, the view is breathtaking. From one of the bedrooms you can actually walk right out on to the grass and head down to the beach. From the living room is a raised balcony with outstanding ocean views. The pictures don’t do this place justice. It feels bigger in person. The kitchen was very clean and well stocked. One concern I had going in was the AC. There is only an AC in both bedrooms... but you don’t really even need the AC. We were more than comfortable opening the doors and enjoying the cool breezes all day and night (with the screen doors shut to keep out the bugs of course). Two quick points of interest. The Kapalua Zipline tour is right next to the villa. My girlfriend and I did the 7 line course and really enjoyed it. So beautiful and so much fun! Also, the Honolua General store is also right next to the villa. They have everything you would need, plus they serve outstanding breakfast and lunch with a nice little patio deck. If you stay here, you must go to sensei sushi which is also very close to the villa. Best sushi...
Fantastic! Absolutely loved our time here. Great location, very clean, phenomenal host. Can't wait to come back. Thank you!
Great location,Great sea view,Nice house, quiet and safe community, surrounded by two top golf courses,close to the supermarket, I'm sure we will be back!!

name: Coney Island MCU Park Wi fi Cable Apt****
summary: This open loft cozy apartment w/ocean view is centrally located literally just a 3 minute walk to area amusement parks, area beaches and mass transit system. Visit the new Ford Amphitheater, IHOP, Chipolte, MCU Park, Luna Park Rides, the Scream Zone, Coney Island USA, the New York Aquarium, The Cylcone and Thunderbolt Roller Coaster, Coney Island Brewery, Foot Print, Totonnos Pizzeria (rated NYC best), Garguilo's Restaurant, Parkview Diner, Tom's Diner, Abe Stark Skating Rink, Matchpoint Spa.

Plenty of places to visit while you are here in Coney Island Amusement Parks District: from area beaches, parks, theaters, shows, attractions,, restaurants, supermarkets, mass transit, Brooklyn Cyclones, Ford Amphitheater, Abe Stark Skating Rink, Coney Island and Brighton Beach, Deno's Wonder Wheel, Luna Park, New York Aquarium, the Scream Zone, ThunderBolt Roller Coaster, Nathan's Famous, Applebee's, IHOP, Chipolte, Park View Diner, Totonno's Pizzeria (NYC #1 rated), Garguilo's restaurant, Randazzo's, Starbucks, Williams Candy, Coney Island fishing pier. Friday night fireworks (every Friday night during th
