Visit the new Ford Amphitheater, IHOP, Chipolte, MCU Park, Luna Park Rides, the Scream Zone, Coney Island USA, the New York Aquarium, The Cylcone and Thunderbolt Roller Coaster, Coney Island Brewery, Foot Print, Totonnos Pizzeria (rated NYC best), Garguilo's Restaurant, Parkview Diner, Tom's Diner, Abe Stark Skating Rink, Matchpoint Spa. 1 bedroom open loft apartment with queen size posturepedic foam bed and sofa bed, kitchen (include eating utensils), refrigerator and stove, pod coffee maker (bring your own flavor pods) full private bath, walk up apartment. 60" LCD screen Smart tv  HDMI, Netflix (must have your own Netflix  Hulu account) and many other options such as Pandora  Netflix, Hulu, Amazon and Prime Video. Plenty of places to visit while you are here in Coney Island Amusement Parks District: from area beaches, parks, the
neighborhood_overview: If you like the action of an upbeat amusement thrills, parks, Sandy seaside beaches, shows and attraction then welcome to Coney Island.
notes: During the summer I would suggest Mass Transit for your commute. There is private parking available for a minimal fee otherwise there is free alternate side of the street parking available.
transit: Getting around is simple and very conveniently located just,a stone throw away from area beaches, amusement parks, shows and attraction. We are,also located just,three short blocks away,from mass transit.
interaction: I always available if the need arises.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Very hospitable. like being conversational and having a dialog with my guest when able to. Always finding ways to provide superior accommodating experience to my guest.

reviews.comments:
Isabel was very friendly and welcoming for our stay. The place is pretty much how it's described. We had plenty of towels and the bed is very soft and big. There are fans in the living and bedroom which allow for some nice air circulation.

The location is pretty great though. It's only a block or two away from the Boardwalk and a few from the subway. There's a delivery Chinese place I liked nearby called Chow Time if you want some cheap eats.

The only issue that we had (which shouldn't bother future stays) is that we were without water for a couple days and we were not told in advance about it. After the pipes were fixed, Isabel was quick to apologize and compensated us a bit for our troubles.

It was the most comfortable bed of my life! There is no AC, but fans and breeze with windows. 5-7 min walking distance to public transportation. About an hour on the subway to manhattan & 30 min drive. There isn't an elevator and we stayed on the 4th floor. I would suggest bringing towels because the ones provided are small but they are there. It was good though since the only purpose was to sleep, also had a really nice TV.
This property is in a convenient location. Short walk to the subway as well as to the beach. The neighborhood in the evening was a little rowdy and loud and not very family-friendly.

The pictures on line do not do this place justice, it is much nicer in real life.  The apartment is well furnished with just about everything you need right down to USB ports in the wall.  The bed was super comfortable, the appliances are new and the whole place is super clean!  There is a/c but you don't even need it because of the breeze off the ocean and the ceiling fans.  The building is super secure which include security cameras.  On checking in our host had a book with information on local places as well as coupons for local eateries.  
Public transportation is very close by with the train station being about a 5 minute walk and there are buses all over.  The beach is only about a block or two away so you can walk over and stroll the boardwalk for shopping and restaurants, and Coney Island amusement park is just steps from the door!  
Our hosts were very responsive, friendly and accommodated our every need.  I would definitely stay here again!!

when i was reading reviews about the place, i saw someone saying the pictures on line do not give the place justice.
well,iam totally agree,the placeis way far from the picture,mush mush better,it  is well decorated,clean,the bathroom ,really every thing and in a very very nice location.
the couples are very nice,helpful,and always there when you need them.
i really enjoyed the place alot.
i would like to thank you very very much for everything.

The pictures really don't do the place any justice! It's way better in person. So clean and well furnished. I had a wonderful stay with my friends. Close to the trains but is does take an hour to get to the city but the train ride is worth it. I would definitely stay here again.  Thanks again for hosting us!

Great experience, friendly host. So centrally located, we could walk everywhere (boardwalk, stadium, aquarium) in 5 minutes or less. The only downside to being so centrally located was the noise at night, but overall, very satisfied!

We took the kids down to Coney Island for an end-of-summer vacation and it was fantastic. Edwin & Isabel were great hosts and very accommodating. They have extra items that you might need, whether it's an umbrella or HDMI cord for the massive TV. Both of the beds are super comfortable. You will be feet from the boardwalk, aquarium, and all of the attractions of Coney Island, all while about a 30 minute ride from Manhattan. We decided that being with kids, it was better to be closer to the beach (so we could bounce back and forth to the apartment as needed) than being in Manhattan, and we were right. Highly recommend this place.

For anyone who wants to explore the real Coney Island, this is the place. Conveniently located for everything from the Cyclone to the boardwalk to the beach to all the great Russian places just a mile or two down in Brighton. Best of all: about three blocks from Tontonno's Pizza. Had a blast!
Really lovely space located near Coney Island and the train station. Good if you are local or traveling from elsewhere.

We were in town for a Cosmos game, and it was an affordable place a block from the stadium. Great access to Coney Island. Very clean and comfortable. Like other reviews mentioned, it was a little loud Saturday night, but didn't keep us up. Isabel was very friendly and accommodating.

Edwin and Isabel are really nice people. This was my 1st time trying airbnb and they help made my stay so easy. I was surprise that that room was a lot better than what the picture showed. Had an awesome view with great air flow coming in.

The hosts were great. Very accommodating and stayed up late to allow me to check in late due to traffic. The pictures are pretty accurate about apartment. Very clean and has the basic essentials you will need. Only thing I would mention is it's 5 flights up stairs only. So pack light or expect to make a few trips. Also since you are right by the board walk (which is beyond convenient if you need to be in this area. It's right near public trans, stores, and highway) however, it gets very loud because of the rides and board walk festivities. The announcer starts pretty early on the loud speaker about prizes and rides etc. So be prepared for an early wake up if your a light sleeper. Other than that you can't beat the price  and the value. The hosts live in the building which makes it convenient if you need something or if something goes wrong. And they supply all of the necessities towels, blankets etc.
Worth it every time I stay or my people stay
Comfortable, clean space. Pretty basic, but located in a great location. Very close to Coney Island
awesome views. great location. nice and clean room. edwin + isabel were very hospitable.
Loved the place and would definitely go back

Edwin and Isabel were very responsive with messages leading up to our stay. It was nice that private parking was available. The room was very nice but at first there was no air conditioning. But right away they had an air conditioner ready and set up for us. It was walking distance to the subway station and the beach and boardwalk. We had a great stay and would gladly stay with them again.
Edwin and Isabel were great hosts.  Communication was great, and responses were quick.  Located near subway and beaches.   We were a bit nervous to walk around at night, but had no issues.
Pretty cool place at a great value by the boardwalk!
Great location near the boardwalk. Nice apt.

A terrific space with a great view of Coney Island. There's a nice, big TV, excellent air-conditioning, a stove, basically it was like a really stylish hotel room with some extra perks. Would certainly stay again.
Great little place that’s a thirty second walk to the boardwalk, perfect for a trip to the attractions of Coney Island.
Very close to Coney Island and the boardwalk. Several flights of stairs if you have luggage.
This is a wonderful space in a great location surrounded by countless things to do
Very easy to communicate with. Will definitely return

We had a great stay- went in for a concert at the Ford theater, and it was an easy walk there and back. Meeting them before hand was so nice to put a face to the name, and to get a lay of the land. The off street parking was perfect and took a stress off the plate. Highly recommended, would stay there again!
Parfait pour la localisation près de coney island, conforme à la description. Rien à dire :)
Nice people good location

Edwin's apartments have everything you would need as far as amenities and they are also very clean. We got in around 2 and even though Edwin could not meet us there he had somebody there waiting to let us in. Because of construction around the neighborhood the parking on the street was limited so it was nice to have the option of off-street parking. This was our second time staying at one of Edwin's apartments and just like the first time it was very enjoyable, plan on returning a third time.
Very well situated, and a lovely view of the tower from the room at night. My boys enjoyed the decor. Apartment was clean and hosts were very responsive.
Really lovely flat but not such a nice location.  As a mom with kids, I did not feel safe in the area..
The space was perfect and it was very close to the beach.
simple and clean...a block from the beach...priced right!
No complaints. Neat and clean place. Good location.

Great location.  We had a rental car and were able to park in a nearby lot for a small additional fee.  We certainly enjoyed our time here, it was clean and relaxing.  The only downside was this is a 4th floor apartment and there is no elevator available.
It was nice
This place was outstanding! I rented the space for my friends and I and we all enjoyed it. If you have the chance to enjoy this area.. don’t miss your chance!
Un apartamento acogedor igual que en las fotos. Limpieza inmejorable
Great place Great location
Great value! Cute room in a quaint apartment. We had everything we need for a good night sleep. Apartment was quite and clean. Friendly welcoming by host. Recommend it !
Great space with plenty of room! Right close to a subway and very clean inside.
Edwin and his wife Isabel are kind people.  They are very attentive if any issue arises.

name: Central Park North $140 - 1 BR with yard
summary: Perfect to explore the whole city - central to subways and easy access to all parts of the city.  Centrally located just one block north of Central Park in an area now known as South Harlem.   We have a 3 BR 2.5 BA pet friendly apartment and we are offering 1 bedroom for 1 or 2 guests with the potential of a second bedroom for 1 or 2 guests - total max 4 people.    Though you do not get the entire space, you will have lots of privacy with up to 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths and a private yard.
space: This first floor apartment has only 4 stairs right inside the entryway.   We have 2 air conditioned bedrooms on the first floor available each with a queen size bed.  The windows are double paned so the rooms and the apartment are pleasantly quiet for a ground floor.  The bedrooms are not especially large but they are comfortable.   There is one full bath with a tub and shower and one half bath on the same floor.   The main guestroom has a closet, the second bedroom does not have a closet.   We live in the lower level but share the kitchen and entrance on the first floor.  You will have lots of privacy since we have our one bedroom, bathroom and living area on the lower level.  We also have access to the backyard.  Access to the backyard is through the second bedroom.   AGAIN, we rent bedroom #1 for 1 or 2 people.  A second bedroom for 1 or 2 people is also available separately for an additional cost.  We do not rent to multiple renters at one time.  The main guest bedroom has a closet
description: Perfect to explore the whole city - central to subways and easy access to all parts of the city.  Centrally located just one block north of Central Park in an area now known as South Harlem.   We have a 3 BR 2.5 BA pet friendly apartment and we are offering 1 bedroom for 1 or 2 guests with the potential of a second bedroom for 1 or 2 guests - total max 4 people.    Though you do not get the entire space, you will have lots of privacy with up to 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths and a private yard. This first floor apartment has only 4 stairs right inside the entryway.   We have 2 air conditioned bedrooms on the first floor available each with a queen size bed.  The windows are double paned so the rooms and the apartment are pleasantly quiet for a ground floor.  The bedrooms are not especially large but they are comfortable.   There is one full bath with a tub and shower and one half bath on the same floor.   The main guestroom has a closet, the second bedroom does not have a closet.   We live i
neighborhood_overview: We look forward to making your stay special.  SoHa is a great neighborhood.    We are located just one block from Central Park and the great North Woods and a short walk to the Garden Conservatory, the Harlem Meers, The Museum of the City of New York, St John the Divine, Columbia University and Morningside Park.   We have great local Harlem restaurants like Melba's, Amy Ruths and the supper club Mintons nearby along with restaurant row only Frederick Douglas Boulevard.  Supermarkets, restaurants, and easy access to the entire city.  We have a Starbucks 1.5 blocks away but we have other NY coffee places slightly further.   And I highly recommend Bo's Bagels on 116th St for a delicious NY bagel. We can offer recommendations for sightseeing, dining and great walks in the North Woods of Central Park.  If you bring your dog, they are allowed off-leash in Central Park from 9pm to 9am.  Many dog owners gather on the Great Hill - about a 5 minute walk into Central Park North - from 8 - 9am for
notes: This area is mainly residential so on-street parking is generally available but I offer no guarantees.  There are parking garages 7-8 blocks away. No parties!  When using the backyard please be considerate of our neighbors - keep the noise to a minimum especially after 10pm weekdays and 11pm weekends.
transit: We are near the 2/3 and the B/C subway lines that run down the westside to Times Square / Broadway, Penn Station and the Freedom Tower and, if you do not want to walk 10 minutes, up to 125th Street to the heart of Harlem and the Apollo Theater.  The M2, M3, and M4 buses are one block away and head straight down 5th Avenue to all the great museums and shopping on Madison Avenue.
access: Our backyard has a table with seating for 6-8 people plus 2 couches and our garden.  It is great for relaxing, dining or just having a glass of wine.  If you have dog, they will have access to the yard between long walks in Central Park. You will have access to the kitchen and all its amenities - pots, pans, utensils, plates, glassware, flatware, stove, refrigerator, microwave and Keurig Coffee.  You are welcomed to make yourselves at home in our home.  We will help you with any questions you have.
interaction: We will leave you alone most of the time but we welcome getting to know you more and sharing life's experiences if you are so inclined. We offer dog day care and dog walking services - please ask us.
house_rules: - Smoking allowed in the backyard.  - Maximum 2 guests per room

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Very private bedroom in a good neighborhood. Communication was very efficient. James was very friendly and we had some great conversations.

We stayed 4 nights and everything was very good.
James is a very nice guy and kind to the guests ..
The house is very clean, the rooms and bathrooms too.
Ideal for a few days in New York.
It is located in an area with very good communication, the subway is less than 5 minutes walk.
Recommended!!!!
Awesome experience all around, great guy, great house!

James is a hospitable and accommodating host. The lodgings are clean, spacious, and near to main transit lines.

You will have much privacy; as described. You'll also get amazing local recommendations if you ask!

Perfect place to explore New York.
2 perfect rooms and within 5 minute walk and 10 metro minutes you are downtown.
James is a friendly host, gives you privacy and is helpful.

We loved staying at James' place! It's a great spot for any length of stay in Manhattan.  Their lovely home is quite convenient to subway stops in a few directions for heading downtown or further uptown.  The north side of Central Park is but a few steps away and we enjoyed exploring Harlem from their location.  We found their home to be bright, clean, spacious, cozy and comfortable  --  an oasis from the bustling city and just right for unwinding inside and also outside in their awesome backyard.  Oh, yes -- their family includes a cutie of a very friendly dog, too!   James and Tom are exceptional hosts, easy to be around in the shared spaces, great conversationalists and excellent with recommendations when we were on the go.  We miss them!

Tivemos um tempo muito bom com James. 
Local que acomoda muito bem grupo de 4 adultos com conforto. O que para NY é raro. 
Localização ideal para nos
House was always clean, great location around the corner from Central Park and main subway stop. I will definitely be coming back to stay here again.

We loved everything about it. The dogs instantly felt at home. Spending time with them in the back yard was awesome. Coming back to the neighborhood and Central Park brought back great memories. But meeting James and Tom was definitely the highlight of the weekend.

James and Tom could not have been more accommodating, gracious, generous, and friendly.  The location is amazing and was such a great introduction to Harlem and to NYC for us.  Hubble (the dog) was very sweet as well.  The rooms were clean, spacious, and had great temperature control (although the weather was perfect this trip).  We highly recommend staying here!
Great place to stay! Located a few blocks off Central Park and close to local restaurants you can't go wrong with this location.  Even had a back yard to relax!!
A warm and welcoming place to stay and the guys were a terrific help to us in finding our way around town.  Would highly recommend their place when you visit.
Very nice apartment, well located. The yard is great!
The place is close to everything
Great place

From the moment we arrived to the aroma of homemade cookies we knew we had made a fantastic choice. The rest of our stay proved this to be the case. Jim is an experienced host who managed to make us feel completely at home and went the extra mile to ensure we had an enjoyable and comfortable stay e.g. homemade bagels and cupcakes. The place was spotlessly clean, quiet and the beds were extremely comfortable. The location was fantastic for Central Park and subway stations. We had a lovely room each and a bathroom and separate toilet to ourselves. It felt truly felt home from home.
完美的房東,細心的跟我溝通,願意幫我解決問題,每天還準備點心招待,地點很好到哪裡都方便
Realmente es un muy buen lugar, excelente ubicación, James siempre estuvo atento a cualquier inquietud y nos lleno de detalles increíbles. Sitio recomendado 100%. James lo hace sentir como en casa.

Absolutely loved our time with James.. kind, caring and considerate.. centrally located to bus and subway.. nothing was too much trouble.. James is an excellent host and we have no hesitation in recommending his residence to fellow travellers (both holiday and professional)

James and Tom are supper nice hosts, their reception  made people feels like at home, especially I  suddenly caught cold and fever during my stay, they took care of me and helped me a lot, tons of thanks indeed ,and love to have good conversation with them too. The apartment is big and very clean, bed is very comfortable, the  location is convenient too, there’re serval subway lines just near by in 5mins walking, and there is Central Park North close by, very easy to walk around. People love NYC is not because of the amazing city, but also because the amazing people lived in NYC just like James and Tom.

James is a fantastic host!! He is friendly, kind, hospitable (home-made cakes! And even tea from China! Btw, we are Chinese.) and gives good suggestions. The place is very clean, warm, comfortable and near to everything. Not going to have trouble finding restaurants, subway station or bus station. Great place! Strongly recommend!

James and his husband, Tom, were the most wonderful hosts.  Their place was clean, they were very communicative, and they made sure we always had everything we needed. Their dog, Hubble, was also a gracious host.  Lots of love from him and he was very friendly and welcoming to my dog as well.  The private bedroom and the whole space in general is large by NYC standards.  They also have a private backyard, from which your room will have plenty of natural light.  I could not have asked for anything more, especially considering the price.  I would stay again in a heartbeat and recommend James & Tom’s place to anyone that is looking for a safe, central, affordable place to stay.

James and Tom were excellent. James was very responsive -- the place was very clean and we had our toilets! If you are bit sensitive to noise like I was, I was suggest to bring earbuds. New York can get pretty noisy.

Their apartment was conveniently located right around the corner from the subway. Definitely would stay here again.

We stayed here for three nights and we can wholeheartedly recommend it. James and Tom are wonderful hosts, really friendly and interesting and they have a beautiful apartment (and a great dog).  The apartment was spacious, clean and very tastefully decorated and has everything you could possibly need.
Location is fantastic just a block away from Central Park and five minutes walk from the metro.
Thank you both. X

Awesome hosts! Can't say enough great things about the accommodations, the service, and the pleasure we had spending time here. It's the perfect place for a short or longer stay and has some fantastic restaurants nearby.  Highly recommended and next time we come up we will be staying here!

James & Tom (and Hubble) were exemplary hosts - friendly, hospitable and ready to share their enthusiasm for their neighbourhood. The rooms (one with access to the courtyard) and the house were very spacious and comfy and James’ bakery was another highlight. I look forward to coming back to stay with them again.

This was a fabulous place to stay, very clean and spacious with absolutely lovely hosts. Easy access to the subway and very close to LaGuardia. Would 100% recommend and will be looking to stay there again the next time I visit NYC :)
非常棒的一次经历,我们一家三人来纽约参加颁奖典礼,住在这里五天｡这里位置很好,安静又交通便利,离中央公园很近｡公寓很棒,很温馨､干净,James和Pubble非常好客,后花园很惬意｡下次来纽约还住这里!

Le logement est idéalement situé dans Harlem, juste à côté de Central Park, du métro, des commerces. Il est très calme et confortable. Les équipements sont complets. La cohabitation avec James se passe très bien, dans la discrétion et l'attention. Leurs bagels sont super bons. On s'est promené en sécurité dans le quartier, y compris tard le soir.

James is a very kind and helpful host. The apartment is very comfortable and convenient to travel in New York City! We like to walk through the Central Park and get to the metropolitan Museum from his apartment. Definitely recommend and will stay here again if I come to New York again!
Very nice host, solid location next to central park, and comfortable living conditions.  Overall excellent experience

Jimmy, Tom and Hubbles are wonderful hosts. We loved the hospitality and the chitchats we had during our stay. Jimmy was very responsive before our arrival. A parking spot was good to find (one block) and the neighborhood felt safe. The location is great and close to Central Park, Restaurants, Bus/Metro Stations. We will definitely come back on our next NYC trip. They really deserve the title “super hosts”.

Great location, clean & spacious and comfortable rooms, friendly & knowledgeable host; banks and restaurants, groceries and pharmacy close by. (Even got an emergency dental problem handled next day, affordably!) All 4 of us made great memories, slept soundly, and saved money by staying with James! (A beer in the backyard did tough competition with going out for a drink!) No concerns about safety; saw some homeless folks sleeping next to the cathedral at night but they were quiet & respectful. Walks & (Citibike) bike rides in the park were a highlight of our trip. Large public pool nearby is great for laps, recreation or therapy.
Muy buena opción tanto por hospitalidad como por localización, no lo dudéis.

James and Tom were absolutely perfect hosts ! Very friendly, very good cooks. They can help you with anything you need. 
Our only regret ? Our trip in New-York was too short ! Now, I really hope we can see them in France next year. Thanks you so much my  friends (and Hubble of course !).

James makes staying at his place comfortable and easy.  He's fun and interesting to talk to, the bedrooms have all of the amenities needed (beds are comfortable), and the place is clean.  James even made us welcome muffins!!!  How much friendlier of a host do you need?  James' place is also close to the subway and close to Rite Aid which is almost a grocery store where you can get almost anything you'd need.  There are also restaurants in the area which is convenient.  I'd definitely stay here again.  Hopefully, I have enough time to come back and take advantage of the comfy looking backyard!!! =)
We really enjoyed our stay in Harlem :) Super nice people and the cutest dog! Would definetly reccomend staying here.

James and Tom are the most wonderful hosts! The apartment is great, spotlessly clean, easily accessible to the metro, and we felt so at home there. Small touches like waters in the fridge, baked goodies and being lent an umbrella when it’s raining are fantastic when you are a long way from home! We would definitely stay there again and highly recommend them.

Aufgrund der bisherigen Bewertungen, waren wir sehr gespannt auf die Unterkunft. Was soll man sagen, aber alles bisher positiv geschriebene fanden wir genauso vor. James und Tom sind tolle Gastgeber, bei denen man sich einfach wohl fühlen muss. Alles war sauber, gut ausgestattet und gemütlich. Zudem konnte man die Küche und das Wohnzimmer mit nutzen, wobei die Gastgeber immer sehr zurückhaltend und meistens auf ihrer Etage waren. Die Lage empfanden wir als richtig gut. Sowohl Subway als auch Fahrradverleih (Citibikes) waren sehr schnell zu erreichen und der Central Park quasi direkt vor der Haustür. Wir können die Gastgeber und die Unterkunft mit bestem Gewissen weiterempfehlen und werden sicher wiederkommen.
James is a marvellous person with a tremendous sense of hospitality. In one word, my best address in NYC.

James es encantador a la hora de recibirte y pone todas las facilidades tanto para la llegada como para la salida. Ahora bien, debería especificar que entra y sale del apto. cada vez que él quiere ya que se queda en el piso de abajo y para entrar y salir debe pasar por el mismo, por lo que saliendo de la ducha te lo puedes encontrar, además con su perro. 
Excelente ubicación con línea c 110 station que te lleva a cualquier punto interesante de la ciudad.
Great Host, experienced with the city, and very amiable gentleman.  The space is all you could hope for and the Host is an amazing family.

Perfect location if you are visiting Manhattan...if you prefer the feel of staying with family/friends for a few days over a hotel room and don’t mind a shared common space concept you will love this airbnb!  Hosts are so friendly and welcoming, but also will limit interaction based on the guests wants/needs. The extra-special thoughtful touch of having a plate of home-baked Christmas treats waiting for us when we arrived 12/22 that magically replenished itself each morning was very appreciated!   We also enjoyed cuddles with their precious dog Hubble!

I seriously can’t say enough about Jame’s place. Perfect location for exploring the city. Easily accessible to the subway and bus lines. Great restaurants within walking distance and a safe neighborhood. James and Tom were awesome with advice for getting around and local attractions. And after a full day of exploring there was nothing better than settling into the most comfortable beds EVER!!  We will definitely be back!!
This Airbnb is in a great location, subway stations are just a block away. Great hospitality. Also, their dog Hubble is adorable. Will definitely recommend this airbnb

name: V.N.Gaia Center , 10min Porto Center
summary: O meu espaço fica em pleno centro de Vila Nova de Gaia, tem paragem do metro a 50m do prédio. 5 minutos para a Ponte D. Luis I, um ícone da cidade, com vistas maravilhosas da cidade. O apartamento é muito acolhedor, familiar e tem tudo o que  precisa para ter uma ótima estadia.
description: O meu espaço fica em pleno centro de Vila Nova de Gaia, tem paragem do metro a 50m do prédio. 5 minutos para a Ponte D. Luis I, um ícone da cidade, com vistas maravilhosas da cidade. O apartamento é muito acolhedor, familiar e tem tudo o que  precisa para ter uma ótima estadia.
house_rules: - Silêncio entre 22h e 7h  - Não é permitido receber visitas - Manter a organização no quarto e nos ambientes comuns - Manter separação do lixo - Proibido acender velas, incenso e similares

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments: Olga's home was very welcoming, clean and simply beautiful. The room does not only have an en-suite, but a private balcony as well. We were staying with Olga for one night but would definitely stay longer if we had more time in Porto. Great place to stay at, lovely family, highly recommended!
Olga est une hôtesse très sympathique. Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez elle
Everything was really nice, beautiful room, and nice location

Great location and great host. We booked in on our Camino cycle from Lisbon to Santiago and Olga's place is 50m off the "way" and from the metro which takes a few minutes into town. The room is beautiful with an en suite and balcony. To be recommended.

La chambre et la salle de bains sont spacieuses,  confortables,  propres,  bref parfaites. Le lit est excellent. Vraiment à 2 pas du tram/metro qui vous emmène en 10' au centre de la ville. Assez facile de se garer. L'hôtesse,  Olga, vous parlera français comme vous et moi,  elle est absolument charmante, vous indiquera les bons coins et tout ce dont vous aurez besoin.  Une ville magnifique,  un logement parfait: une belle étape airbnb

Olga was a lovely host. The room is spacious, clean, comfortable and comes with private bathroom and balcony. The location is perfect; Metro is 1min away. 
We had a lot of fun playing with her cats too!
The room and the bathroom was very clean. I def recommend it :)

Quarto com óptima decoração, muito confortável, limpo e com ótima localização!Tem casa de banho privada o que é  muito bom e prático. Tinha aquecedor central e estava uma óptima temperatura  no quarto.tem também wi fi e TV  no quarto. Sítio a voltar

Olga's place is awesome! For a private room, rather than a full house, it is a great option because it has a private bathroom connected to the bedroom. It also has a cute little patio that we were able to enjoy. The wifi was fast and easy to connect to. Olga had many different resources available for us to use for sightseeing. The room was very cute and also clean! We loved it here! :D
Obrigado pela hospitalidade. Espaço muito limpo, reservado e calmo. Perfeito para quem quer realizar uma formação ou vir passar um fim de semana ao Porto. Voltarei certamente :)
Casa muito confortável, limpa, óptima para descansar, perto do metro, foi uma agradável experiência. Recomendo.
Muita simpatia, suuper limpo e suuuuuper cômodo! Muito obrigada pela experiência Olga 5 ⭐.
Confortável, limpo, bom para descansar, bem localizado. É a segunda vez que fico no espaço da Olga e gostei muito e recomendo. Grato achyuta

Olga is a great host, very fast in communication, great room with on suite bathroom, very comfortab
le bed and even a little balcony! great value!
Olga est une hôte  attentionnée et  très disponible . Le lieu est bien situé et le cadre de l’hébergement était tout à fait adapté à nos attentes . Je vous recommande sans hésitation !
Alojamento muito perto do metro , com comércio nas imediações. Quarto limpo , arejado , boa luminosidade e sossegado.

name: Perfect Peaceful Hale
summary: This is a perfect location in the much sought after Kahala/Diamond Head area. The house is spacious, modern, and centrally air conditioned. We are minutes away from the Waikiki night life, many great dinning areas, and walking distance to some of the most beautiful beaches on the Island.  We take great care to provide a clean, private, home away from home that is setup to accommodate your every need.  Relax and recharge in this tropical garden like setting.
space: Once inside you will immediately feel relaxed and ready to enjoy your vacation. We have taken special care in providing a clean and comfortable home so you  can  enjoy your stay on the islands. This location is accessible to Diamond Head Monument, Saturday morning Farmers Market, and multiple paths to amazing secluded beaches. This quiet, safe neighborhood is only minutes away from Kahala Mall where you will find Wholefoods grocery, lots of eateries, and great shopping options.  A 5 min. drive into Waikiki for all it's attractions and dining options is another plus.This is the perfect spot to come back to after a long day of beach going, sight seeing, golfing  or shopping. You can relax on the beautifully landscaped garden patios that surround the house. An out door shower and bathroom make it convenient to rinse off after a long day at the beach. This house is tastefully decorated and every consideration has been made to insure that your stay is stress free and one to remember. This h
description: This is a perfect location in the much sought after Kahala/Diamond Head area. The house is spacious, modern, and centrally air conditioned. We are minutes away from the Waikiki night life, many great dinning areas, and walking distance to some of the most beautiful beaches on the Island.  We take great care to provide a clean, private, home away from home that is setup to accommodate your every need.  Relax and recharge in this tropical garden like setting. Once inside you will immediately feel relaxed and ready to enjoy your vacation. We have taken special care in providing a clean and comfortable home so you  can  enjoy your stay on the islands. This location is accessible to Diamond Head Monument, Saturday morning Farmers Market, and multiple paths to amazing secluded beaches. This quiet, safe neighborhood is only minutes away from Kahala Mall where you will find Wholefoods grocery, lots of eateries, and great shopping options.  A 5 min. drive into Waikiki for all it's attractions a
neighborhood_overview: The most sought after neighborhood on Oahu for it's beautiful ocean front estates and easy access to shopping, dining and out door activities.
notes: The rates per night include tax of 13.90%. Cleaning fee of 395.00 for the main house and an addition $75.00 will be charged if the cottage is used. This cleaning fee is not included in the nightly rate.  Maximum of 8 guest, including infants and children.
transit: Easy access to the city bus stop and parking is available for three cars.
access: This location is accessible to Diamond Head Monument, Saturday morning Farmers Market, and multiple paths to amazing secluded beaches.
interaction: We are accessible to help you with any needs.

host.host_about:
We are a local family that enjoys sharing our home with visitors. This island is a special place with lots of things to see and do and we are happy to share with guests our favorite spots. You will find such a great blend of cultures and interesting things to explore here, there is truly something for everyone to enjoy.
We have had such a positive experience sharing our home, and wish we had done this sooner. We are here to help make your stay perfect, you will enjoy a clean, safe, private accommodation with a little aloha to take home  :  )

reviews.comments: WOW! what a place. This was our first trip to Hawaii and was told to stay around Diamond head / Kahala. Saw this little cozy home and thought it fit the bill perfect. The pictures don't do this place justice either! We had 5 adults and had way more space then needed. The house is fully modernized yet has a very warm feeling to it. The hosts were amazing and thought of every little thing/activity you would/could need (beach towels, bikes, etc). We would definitely stay here again and felt like this place made our trip. Thank you Karin and Maele
The host canceled this reservation 172 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The place was amazing.
great house, very professional service.

Peaceful Hale is an amazing place to stay! Both indoor and outdoor space is perfect for a family or a group of friends. Karin and Maile were fantastic hosts. The house came with beach chairs, boogy boards, and first aid kit. Helpful when scraping on rocks and coral. The location was close to Whole Foods and Starbucks. It was a nice quiet and safe neighborhood. 
I will be back again. 
Mahalo.

This home is absolutely stunning - the common area was where everyone gathered in the morning and evenings and it was spacious and had beautiful light throughout the day. 

The home is in a very prime location. Having parking available was a huge plus as that's the main problem with staying in Waikiki itself. 

Would definitely stay again!
Great place to ztay with kids. Clean, comfortable and close to the beach. Close enough to Waikiki for a quick outing  or dinner. Highly  recmended.

You will love the location and layout of the place. It's been tastefully refurbished by the owner. Pictures are accurate. Minutes to Diamond head, the beach or Kahala Mall. Owners are quick to respond to your needs.
It is a house with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a huge living room. And outside a house, there is a cottge with a bedroom and bathroom. Also there is a toilet and a shower outisde.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The garden, lanai and spacious living space provided for a relaxing atmosphere. Furnishings and amenities were nice and comprehensive. Plenty of bath towels, beach towels and beach equipment; nice dishes and utensils. Basically all you need to enjoy indoor and outdoor living. Conveniently located for easy bus ride to Kahala beaches, and short drive to Waikiki and Diamond Head, and accessing freeways.
Comfortable, luxurious and sensational location just enough out of the way of the hustle and bustle, perfect for families with young adult children

This house is even nicer in person. Spacious, comfortable, and very kick back. My daughter ran about in the yard, my husband, brothers, and dad were found lounging on every different couch, indoor and outdoor, and I couldn’t stop poking around the yard at all the different plants. The neighborhood is very fancy, some major estate homes just down the road. My husband and I took the master suite, and the bed was super comfortable. It’s right in the shadow of Diamond Head, and easily accessible to Waikiki and the surrounding areas. If you are considering staying at Peaceful Hale, just do it, you’ll love it!

Peaceful Hale is in a gorgeous location, a quick walk to Diamond Head, and a quick drive to Waikiki.  The home was better than the pictures and Karen and Maile were quick to respond. It was very handy to have beach towels and chairs to take to the beach. We really enjoyed relaxing on the  patio in the evening. 
 We loved staying here and would definitely return.

Hawaii was the central point for my family from Australia and Canada to meet up. Peaceful Hale was the perfect home. The home fulfilled all of my expectations. It was clean, and provided everything we needed. The location was great, easy access to roads to get around the island, quiet area, yet only a few minutes away from Waikiki. Thank you for very much for having us in your home

The home was perfect for our family gathering. The house was spacious and clean. There were beach towels and toys provided  as well as a couple of bicycles. We will definitely book with Karin again if we come back to Honolulu.

The place was perfect for our family gathering. I would say it has everything you would need for your vacation. They even got baby stuffs including pack and play! It's spacious and very clean. The location is right nearby Waikiki beach so it was a quick drive. We would highly recommend this place!

My family and I had a wonderful time staying at Karin’s home.  We were a group of 6 adults, 1 teenager and one 2 year old.  We utilized the whole house including the attached cottage and felt the home was spacious for our needs.  Plenty of towels (bath & beach).  During the end of our stay we had a Hurricane Lane warning - hosts were responsive and prepped all the outdoor furniture, set up sand bags at all ground floor entrances and dropped off some emergency supplies for us (water, flashlights, candles etc.). In the end the hurricane passed us but we appreciated the precautions.  Garden area is very spacious and the 2 year old in our group enjoyed being able to safely run around within the fenced space.  Love the Kahala area - easy access to the Whole Foods which is minutes away and super quick to drive into Waikiki.  Great stay!!

We had a wonderful stay in Karin's house. The location was perfect for us to attend a wedding in Kahala Hotel but also visited the Saturday Farmer's market. The area is quiet, comfortable and convenient to drive around the island. House is gorgeous and spacious.  We'll definitely book this house if we come to Honolulu again !!
This space was a beautiful locale for a meetup between longtime friends.  Each and every couple had their own space with beautiful common areas to share. A perfect tableaux for every aura.

A wonderful home with private space for all guests, also a lovely large common area for everyone to be together. Extremely clean and not lacking in any amenities! Only downfall, we thought we were going to be real close to a beach but unfortunately the closest “beach” was just a rocky area with no sand. But there are so many other beaches to enjoy near by it wasn’t too big of deal. Perfect location near Waikiki but not too close to town!
Everything Perfect. Coudn't find any cons. Next time in Hawaii, I will not hesitate to stay here by Karin.

name: Entire house in the heart of the Plateau
summary: This is a charming two floors cottage in the heart of the Plateau. Very well located only 10" from parc Lafontaine or parc Laurier and 15" from Laurier subway.The house has an amazing backyard perfect to relax or have a meal surrounded by the garden.Two bedrooms and a third studio/sofa (Website hidden by Airbnb) , covers and all the kitchen/dining furniture are available.
space: The entire house is rented and it can host a maximum of 6 people: 2 bedrooms  and a third studio room with double sofa-bed.
description: This is a charming two floors cottage in the heart of the Plateau. Very well located only 10" from parc Lafontaine or parc Laurier and 15" from Laurier subway.The house has an amazing backyard perfect to relax or have a meal surrounded by the garden.Two bedrooms and a third studio/sofa (Website hidden by Airbnb) , covers and all the kitchen/dining furniture are available. The entire house is rented and it can host a maximum of 6 people: 2 bedrooms  and a third studio room with double sofa-bed. The house is very well located. There are two metro stations at 15" walking: Mont-Royal and Laurier metro stations. Bus stop are at the street corner. The great Lafontaine parc is at 10m walk and the amazing areas of Mont-Royal street and Le Petit Laurier are just one block from the house. There is a cat in the house: very gentle and independent. The only need we require is to check that her bowl is always full with croquets and water.
neighborhood_overview: The house is very well located. There are two metro stations at 15" walking: Mont-Royal and Laurier metro stations. Bus stop are at the street corner. The great Lafontaine parc is at 10m walk and the amazing areas of Mont-Royal street and Le Petit Laurier are just one block from the house.
notes: There is a cat in the house: very gentle and independent. The only need we require is to check that her bowl is always full with croquets and water.

reviews.comments: Agréable logement bien placé et bien agencé. A découvrir!
Great stay in Montreal! Davide was great at communicating details and answering any questions I had. The place was exactly as described and was perfect for our group's stay.

We had a wonderful stay at Davide's house. The house is located in a beautiful area of Montreal, and walking distance to a bunch of trendy shops and restaurants. The house was very clean and we were offered everything we needed (laundry, kitchen stuff, coffee, towels, etc). Our favorite part was sitting outside to eat breakfast in the private backyard. Athena, the cat, was sweet, quiet and easy to take care of. 

Davide had great recommendations, was very communicative and accommodated an early check in for us. I would highly recommend this airbnb for anyone looking to stay in a fun, non-touristy part of Montreal.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Davide and Pierre's home offers great style, location and value! It looks even better than the photos, because the kitchen and downstairs have been recently renovated. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone who wants to experience living in a neighborhood setting. However, please keep in mind that the home isn't air-conditioned, and that it's located next door to a charming BYOB restaurant. The latter has outdoor seating in the back in the warm weather months, so there is some outside noise until about 11 or so on weeknights and until about midnight on Saturday.
Davide went above and beyond. Left information about local spots and how to access them. Amazing and hope we can stay again. Thanks again Davide.
Séjour très agréble chez Davide. Tous étais propre et conforme aux déscriptions. Très bon emplacement à distance cyclable ou à pieds des quartiers animés. Merci.

Davide’s house is lovely and is in a beautiful and lively location. It has a cosy backyard  where you can spend special evenings in the summer. The house has a cool decoration and everything is handy in the kitchen. 
The only thing we were not satisfied about the house, although we knew the owners live there, is that we thought we were not given enough space to place our personal belongings in the kitchen and bedroom. And the owners didn’t go the exta mile to make us feel welcomed like the other houses we stayed in this trip. 
Overrall a good stay.

Davide est une  personne , très réactive, qui a su répondre a toutes nos questions , arrivé sur place nous n'étions vraiment pas déçu, le logement est impeccable , spacieux et bien équipé ,il est idéalement bien placé ( boulangerie , ligne de bus , dépanneur sont à proximité ) . De plus le plateau est un quartier très animé .
Nous reviendrons un été ...

name: Cute Beachside Get Away
summary: Our very cute two bedroom apartment is in a quiet apartment block of 8. It is one step away from the beach, parks and the amazing rock pools of Coogee.  It's 10 min walking distance from the shops on Coogee Bay Road and it has great connectivity to the city (25 min bus aprox) and the adjacent beach Suburbs, Bondi and Maroubra.  We have really nice restaurants within walking distance, and great coffee around too. This is the prefect place for couples or a family with kids.
description: Our very cute two bedroom apartment is in a quiet apartment block of 8. It is one step away from the beach, parks and the amazing rock pools of Coogee.  It's 10 min walking distance from the shops on Coogee Bay Road and it has great connectivity to the city (25 min bus aprox) and the adjacent beach Suburbs, Bondi and Maroubra.  We have really nice restaurants within walking distance, and great coffee around too. This is the prefect place for couples or a family with kids.

host.host_about: HI, I'm a Sydney based Architect who loves what I do and love travelling. My favourite part of discovering a new place is spending my days filling my sketchbook and then indulging my other great love of great food and wine.

reviews.comments: Imogene's flat was perfect for our stay. Within walking distance to shops, good coffee, and the beach. It was quiet, the bed comfortable with lovely white sheets and tidy and clean. Imogene was helpful and accomodating with our booking.

name: Kona Tropical Bungalow
summary: (Website hidden by Airbnb)
space: Full furnished with full kitchen full size refrigerator. Microwave oven, toaster oven, coffee maker and kitchen utensils. The bedroom has a queen bed, dresser and a walk in closet. Large bathroom with tub and shower.
description: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Full furnished with full kitchen full size refrigerator. Microwave oven, toaster oven, coffee maker and kitchen utensils. The bedroom has a queen bed, dresser and a walk in closet. Large bathroom with tub and shower. Entrance is conveniently located on the ground floor. I periodically contact my guests during their stay to make sure everything is going well. I give them information on current events, points if interest and directions to locations they're interested in.  Safety is very important to all my guest and offer them information on the local health clinics and hospitals. One of the first subdivisions built in Kailua Kona and conveniently located about 10-15 min. ftom downtown Kailua Kona. There's only one way in and one way out so we don't have traffic driving through all day. This is a very safe neighborhood and the residents watches out for each other. I recommend you rent a car to get around the largest island in the Hawaiian Islands.  I'm a Uber
neighborhood_overview: One of the first subdivisions built in Kailua Kona and conveniently located about 10-15 min. ftom downtown Kailua Kona. There's only one way in and one way out so we don't have traffic driving through all day. This is a very safe neighborhood and the residents watches out for each other.
notes: It is a local custom here in Hawaii to remove your foot wear before you enter the house. Please wash any sand from your feet and footwear before entering. There is water a hose outside for your convenience. Mahalo  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
transit: I recommend you rent a car to get around the largest island in the Hawaiian Islands.  I'm a Uber driver and will be more than happy to take care of your transportation needs. I also provide personal custom guided tours of the Big Island. Pls. Inquirie for rates. Aloha and Mahalo
access: Entrance is conveniently located on the ground floor.
interaction: I periodically contact my guests during their stay to make sure everything is going well. I give them information on current events, points if interest and directions to locations they're interested in.  Safety is very important to all my guest and offer them information on the local health clinics and hospitals.
house_rules: Absolutely NO SMOKING on premise, no illegal, drugs, no  parties, no excessive alcohol consumption, no loud noise or music after 10pm. No unannounced over night guests allowed unless approved by host.

host.host_about:
Aloha. Greetings and welcome to the Big Island of Hawaii. 
It will be my pleasure to be your host here in  beautiful Kailua  Kona and share the spirit of Aloha. I'm single, retired from the hospitality industry. I'm a part time Pro freelance Musican, Photographer, love  traveling,  cooking, nature,   outdoor activities, and meeting people from around the world. 
I look forward to meeting you and having you stay in my home. Mahalo and Aloha

reviews.comments: Bert’s place is great.  Central location, modern apartment. Wifi is fast. It was nice having a full kitchen and access to a washer/dryer.  We plan to stay again next time we are in the area.

Bert is a great host. Is place is quiet, clean and near beaches, grocery store and downtown Kona. He suggested us some activities. 

We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it!!

Aloha!

Nice location and good value - Bert is very nice and helpful- for those of us used to A/C, just be aware A/C is not typical in many homes on the island.

Bert did provide a fan - and we got by fine.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Bert, first of all, is a very nice and helpful guy. He even provided us some food and water. We had a very pleasant stay at his place. It's small, but clean and it offered everything we needed.

Berts place was clean and tidy with special extras.   Full fridge.  Full kitchen.  Towels.  Sunscreen. Laundry room if needed.  Quiet.  Peaceful.  Central to kona.  Do need a car - but that is for any where on the big island of Hawaii she is big!    Communication was great.  And Bert went above and beyond when my plane was delayed / lost in the dark / he came and got me and my hire car.   Special bonus.    You won't regret staying here :-)

Bert is very hospitable, helpful, friendly, communicative. He met us in the airport, made a tour of the island by car. It was very convenient. The flat not very big, but very comfortable. It's not close to the city center in quiet area. The best place for relaxation. Everything was great! Thank you, Bert!

Bert was great, he greeted my husband at check in and had fruit ready for us. I wasn’t able to be there at check in because I arrived later because of work. However, I felt the aloha and welcome through the messages he sent checking up on us. He’s a great host, present and easy to reach but we had our complete privacy. The place was exactly as advertised, clean and easy private access. Definitely recommend.

Bert was very nice and friendly. He was very thoughtful of  stocking the essentials in the kitchen .. we were welcomed with bowl full of fruits Pineapple, Oranges and Banana.. sure it took care of our immediate hunger . 
   Very family friendly stay .. and conveniently located to drive from Kona airport , market place and to go for sightseeing .. amazing white and black sand beaches close by .. 
Mahalo

In short: it was awesome
You have a whole apartment with everything you need for your self all alone. Bert is very accommodating and very nice. He´s looking for his guests.
The location is also perfect. You are near to Kailua but also in a very local area. No long ways to downtown, shops or beaches. Your directly on the Highway to discover the whole island. From our perspective: absolutely recommendable!

Bert's place was exactly as advertised. Kitchen was fully functional and bedroom area was cozy. The location was great, outside the bustle of downtown Kona, but still close to everything on the East side. Bert greeted us with warm smiles, fresh fruit and macadamia nut chocolates. We'll be back!

Bert is a good host.  He was there to greet us with island chocolates and other treats.  He kept in touch by email and gave us suggestions where to visit.  The apartment is spacious enough and quiet.  Need a car to get around.

Bert was very welcoming and the place was comfortable and cool. Bert gave us chocolates and a lei as a welcome gift and was there to greet us. The neighbors had a dog that barked quite a lot and the place was not quite as clean as we would have liked. The location was great.

The main reason we chose Bert's place was because of his excellent cancellation policy.  We have elderly parents and this was important to us.  Bert was an excellent host and as a welcoming gift he left us some treats and some Kona coffee!  The unit was spacious and centrally located with excellent WiFi and plenty of hot water.  There was also a nice washer & dryer which we used the night before we checked out.  When communicating with Bert he always answered promptly and he gave us much local advice such as shopping, beaches, etc.  All in all a nice experience!
Great place and great host!
Nice location, and Bert is a great host!
Bert was very accommodating and the location for Kailua Kona was excellent.

Bert war ein guter Gastgeber und die Kommunikation mit ihm verlief einwandfrei und rasch. Das Bungalow hat eine super Lage, jedoch sollte man in einem Besitz eines Fahrzeuges sein. Auch ist die Ausstattung komplett inkl. Waschmaschine die mit weiteren Familienmigliedern geteilt wird.

Bert's place gives you the feel and ambience of staying in a  local, older neighbourhood.  Not fancy... basic.. simple... but has all the necessities. Comfy bed, bathroom, shower was great, everything you need! Definitely not a touristy part of town. You get a view of the ocean from the street,  but not from my lower suite.  Would be nice to have a patio or lanai to sit and enjoy a view. You definitely need a car. It is hard to locate if you arrive late in the dark! (Like me, as I had a very late arrival time.)  Bert is a very kind and hospitable host, and checks in to see if I need anything or any questions. It was very much appreciated having papaya, bananas, coffee to welcome me! He offers very helpful tips,  quick in responding to any questions. I would highly recommend Bert's place for a simple, basic, down to earth stay.. especially if you want to be away from the touristy hustle and bustle!
My sister and I had a fantastic time in Bert's cozy bungalow. He had great tips for us about what to see and do, and was very centrally located. Thanks Bert

Nice calm and relaxing place. We had everything we needed and more while living here. We got chocolates and chips, and there was coffee available. The extra beach equipment was nice. The apartment was clean, but we had some small ants in the kitchen looking for food. It's in the first floor ground level, so it was sort of expected. Bert was a good host and replied quickly to my questions. All in all a nice place to stay.

This place was amazing, it had a fully equipped kitchen where we could prepare our meals, Big bathroom, super comfy bed, washer and dryer which was really helpful during our two weeks stay in Kona. It’s very close to the beach, to kona village, and to all the major supermarkets. 
Bert was an outstanding host, always ready to help with anything we may have needed. The place was quiet and relaxing!! I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone staying in the kona side!!!

Bert was a great host and his place exceeded our expectations. He welcomed us at check in and even offered some fruits and cold drinks. I appreciate his tips on what to do and where to go around Kona. The place is 10 min drive from Kona, and very easy access to both the north and south sides of Kona. It is spacious (photos don’t do it justice here, there is so much space). The kitchen has everything we need. Lots of things were provided by Bert that we used and we really had a great time.

Bert goes above and beyond to make you feel like home when you're staying at his place. Right when we met him, he's very thoughtful and polite. The home was super clean and quaint. He really prepares you for your trip! He has snorkeling gear, boogie boards, and other beach gear you can use, as well as sunscreen and other bathroom amenities. He always gave us awesome suggestions for things to do. We really can't thank him enough!

We had a great time. Everything was clean, with enough towel and stuff. Bert welcome us with a little present. He had answers for our questions. We had an own room with bed, couch and kitchen. It’s big for 2 people.

It is a very nice appartement at a very reasonable price, I was very pleased and confortable, I had a rented car and I didn't have any trouble to get anywhere. Bert is a very serviciable owner, I recommend it with great pleasure.

Bert was very friendly and hospitable. He gave great tips on beaches and places to visit on the island. 

Snorkel equipment and beach chairs were a nice extra too
Bert was a gracious host. The apartment was comfortable and met our needs. It was great having a local host full of Aloha spirit!
Clean, great location, great host.
Bert’s place was exactly as advertised. He was very accommodating, and we were happy we stayed there.
Bert is a wonderful host and really makes you feel at home !

name: Beautiful apartment in the center
summary: The apartment is very cozy. Located in downtown Barcelona, 10-minute walking distance from Plaza Cataluña.  Most of the iconic places of the city can be visited on foot. The airport shuttle stop is 10-minute walking distance on foot.
space: The apartment is very cozy and modern. Located in downtown Barcelona, it is perfect for discovering the city because many iconic places can be visited on foot, and the ones located farther away from downtown can be reached by subway or bus, both of which can be taken right next to the accommodation. Besides, the bus that arrives directly from the airport has a stop in Plaza Universidad, located 5 minutes away on foot from the accommodation. The apartment includes the following: A very comfortable bed of 1.60 m and a sofa that can be unfolded to make a bed of 1.60 m.  A fully equipped kitchen with a Nespresso coffeemaker, a dishwasher, a kettle, a toaster, a sandwich toaster and all the utensils you may need.  We will receive you here and give you useful information about the city to make your visit easier. We will be available any time to help you with any concern or to address any problem that may arise. This apartment is located in one of the most emblematic neighborhoods of the city
description: The apartment is very cozy. Located in downtown Barcelona, 10-minute walking distance from Plaza Cataluña.  Most of the iconic places of the city can be visited on foot. The airport shuttle stop is 10-minute walking distance on foot. The apartment is very cozy and modern. Located in downtown Barcelona, it is perfect for discovering the city because many iconic places can be visited on foot, and the ones located farther away from downtown can be reached by subway or bus, both of which can be taken right next to the accommodation. Besides, the bus that arrives directly from the airport has a stop in Plaza Universidad, located 5 minutes away on foot from the accommodation. A fully equipped kitchen with a Nespresso coffeemaker, a dishwasher, a kettle, a toaster, a sandwich toaster and all the utensils you may need.  We will receive you here and give you useful in
house_rules: --Os agradeceremos respetar a los vecinos , no hacer ruido a patir de las 11pm. --Piso ideal para familias! --Ascensor para 2 personas. Hay un tramo de escaleras antes de llegar al ascensor. --Entrega de llaves: en el apartamento --Hora de llegada: A partir de las 14 horas (consulta flexibilidad, nos adaptamos si es posible)) --Check-In con coste extra: Después de las 8 pm coste extra de 20€ Después de las 11 pm coste extra de 30€ --Hora de salida: antes de las 12 mañana. Somos flexibles ( nos adaptamos si es posible, consultar) --Acceso con silla de ruedas: no --No se acepta: Fumadores Fiestas (despedidas de soltero etc.) Mascotas --Importante: Es obligatorio registrar a nuestros huéspedes mayores de 18 años en el registro de establecimientos de la Policía Catalana. Solicitaremos los detalles de vuestros pasaportes o cartas de identidad. --En Barcelona, en todos los establecimientos turísticos hay un impuesto, concretamente: Tasa Turística 2,25€ por persona/día Los menores de 17 años

host.host_location: Vilanova i la Geltrú, Catalonia, Spain
host.host_about:
Trabajo como profesora de administración de empresas ,me encanta la fotografía, el cine, dibujar y pintar cuadros. Mi gran pasión es el viajar, descubrir lugares escondidos.
El piso lo he reformado yo, espero que os guste, lo disfrutéis y os sintáis como en casa.

I love Photgraphy, cinema, drowing and painting. My big passion is travelling and discovering new hide places. The Loft it's been rennovated by me so I like you'll love, enjoy and feel like home.

reviews.comments: Ana has a very cozy and well furnished apartment. Central and walking distance from ramblas, Catalonia square and other main destinations. Idea for one person or couples.

Ana was in constant contact with us in advance of our trip via text and airbnb messages which makes for a pleasant and easy welcome by her and Laura.
Everything was simple and effective.
The apartment was one of the best I have stayed in with airbnb. Beautifully decorated, well thought out, full of appliances such as hairdryers etc! This is such a  great help for people on the move.
Ana constantly checked in on us too.
Couldn't ask for more! Great location - MAKE SURE YOU TRY THE CAKE SHOP!
Thank you Ana (and Laura) for everything!
Caroline

Excelente ubicación y excelente atención.
El departamento está a pocas cuadras de las estaciones de metro del Paseo de Gracia y Universitat. Desde estas estaciones se puede conectar fácilmente a toda la ciudad.
El departamento es muy agradable, bien decorado y está en excelentes condiciones.
El entorno es muy agradable, hay muchísimos restaurantes y cafeterías en la zona.
Excelente experiencia.

Ana and her daughter Laura were incredibly flexible and prompt during check in, gave us great recommendations, and above all lent us their beautiful apartment.

The apartment was spotless and comfortable - very modern furnishings, and looks just like the pictures. Wifi worked well, and the neighborhood was great! Thanks for everything.

L'appartement est super, conforme aux photos. Il est à proximité de tout : 100 mètres d'un supermarché, d'une boulangerie et à 5 minutes du métro. Idéal pour deux. Ana est super, elle a tout fait pour rendre notre séjour le plus agréable possible. Je conseille fortement cet appartement!!!!! :)

Ana and her daughter are amazing hosts.
The flat is ideally located in Barcelona and is perfect. Everything is very clean, modern and well decorated.
Ana is very available and will always answer your questions. She is very helpful.
I would highly recommend this place and I'm pretty sure that I will book it for my next trip to Barcelona.
This is how every AirBnb should be.
Ana and her daughter were great hosts. The appartment is lovely and perfectly located. I can recommend this appartment to anyone who wants stay in the city center.

We were welcomed by Ana's daughter, she was really nice with us. The apartment is well located, in the centre of Eixample, a lovely neighborhood!! The flat is modern, fully equipped. Ana is very interested in helping in your stay

We had a very pleasant stay at Ana's apartment! Ana is a welcoming, helpful and friendly host. She advised us a wonderful bakery just near the flat and some other nice local areas. The apartment was modern, clean and tidy with well equipped kitchen and bathroom. You can open a window or use air conditioner at your own option. 
Ana even left a bottle of water, cola and Nespresso for our enjoyable stay! 
Location of the apartment is perfect, 7-10 minutes to the centre and metro station. Casa Batllo you may reach in 5 minutes and be the first in the queue:) 
We would definitely recommend Ana's apartment to everyone!

It was my first visit to Barcelona and am so pleased with what a fantastic experience it was. This was due to the lovely, comfortable and modern apartment and great hosts. Our flight was delayed by 3 hours but Ana and laura were happy to wait for us and told us not to worry. They showed us how everything worked. Ana and laura had bought a wifi box to use during our visit as the system they had was not working. This was very considerate. We were told prior to our visit about places to visit to get a real feel, information about transport and on arrival food places worth a visit. Very happy and would recommend :)

La casa es estupenda. Se corresponde totalmente con las fotos que muestran. Ellas han sido unas anfitrionas geniales. Estaba todo en perfectas condiciones y limpio. Ademas hasta nos dieron recomendaciones de en donde comer o que ver en Barcelona. Si volvemos a la ciudad sin duda volveremos a contactar con ellas.

Parfait petit appartement. Tranquille, bien organiser, cuisine complète, quartier central, bons restaurants et pâtisseries dans les environs. Vraiment parfait. En plus l'accueil a été charmant et cela dès 11h ce qui nous a permis de profiter de l'appart très tôt dans la journée. J'y reviendrai je pense.
Excellent place, wish I can stay longer or coming again soon!

Gracias Ana por una estadia increible! El piso es exacto como muestra la foto. Es precioso y super limpio. Esta ubicado en un lugar perfecto. cerquisima de todos lados- Lo disfrutamos muchisimo-
La cocina esta equipada con todo lo necesario y mas. Estamos muy agradecidas por su ayuda para ubicarnos los primeros dias y seguro que volveremos...

Ana's apartment is perfect!  I couldn't have a better experience. Its really clean, modern and well equipped.  Beside that, it's really central, in the best location ! You can do many things by foot.  Ana is really helpful. She waited many hours for me in the apartment because my flight was delayed. Also she provided a Map and gave some advices about the city! I recommend Ana's apartment to have a wonderful stay in Barcelona!

Ana and Laura were so professional and lovely to deal with from the initial request to saying goodbye.  THey made our trip to Barcelona all the more wonderful.  The apartment studio, with its "sexy stlyed" bathroom is perfectly located near the metro, grocery, nightlife and an AMAZING Pastisseria with croissants filled with crema catalana that are heaven on a plate.  They provided coffee for the nespresso maker, which is not normally done in other airbnb spots, and I have to say it was a lovely amenity and MUCH appreciated that I didn't have to go and search for them. A few soft drinks and beers in the fridge as well. Towels, linens, and kitchen supplies were in abundance and there was care and Spanish gracefullness in every part of our experience with Ana and Laura.  Muchas Gracias!
The apartment is AMAZING. It has an unbelievably modern feel and awesome theme. Ana was amazingly helpful and nice and was always in contact with us if we needed it.

Overall we had a good experience, and would definitely recommend this apartment. Ana was a great host, she was ready to greet us right away - The apartment is exactly as pictured, clean, and has all the basics. We were there in the high summer heat and the air conditioning was wonderful. The location is o.k., a short walk to the Gaudi houses and there is a nearby bus that takes you to the Gothic Quarter etc. This was one of the more expensive apartments we rented in Spain, but Barcelona is pricey. 

Note: The apartment states it has an elevator (and it does) but there are about 15 stairs to get up to the elevator, which was challenging for my mother who has a bad knee.

Ana fue muy atenta con nosotros desde el primer contacto. 
Tuvimos oportunidad de conocer también de persona .. es una persona muy amable ... . La ubicación perfecta, la casa preciosa, acogedora y muy cómoda, equipada con todo como en la foto ... 
Esta ubicado en un lugar perfecto, cerquisima fe todo... 
Lo disfrutamos muchísimo ..
Estamos muy agradecidas por su ayuda para ubicarnos los primeros dias y seguro que volveremos... gracias de parte de nosostros #fernando #andrea #maria

Ana was a great host.  She met me at the apartment, and checked in the day afterwards to be sure everything was going ok. 

The apartment  is exactly as pictured.  It's quite compact (especially the bathroom), and I'd say perfect for a single guest or couple.  The apartment has two a/c units, one in the lounge area and one in the bedroom.  They are powerful and provide plenty of cool air.  The apartment is in the back of the building, and its one window (which is frosted) looks out onto the mechanical equipment and the space between two buildings.  Not at all scenic, but, Carrer d'Arago is a six lane street, and this apartment hears zero street noise; very nice for  peace, quiet and sleeping.   There are two Metro stops about 600 meters from the apartment and from these you can go anywhere.  I mostly walked to the places I wanted to get to, but did use the Metro too.  There was a Barcelona guide book, metro maps, museum information and other tourist info in the apartment.  This was my favorite apartment of the 3 I stayed in while in Europe this summer.  Ana was fantastic, and very responsive, the apartment is exactly what you see, and the location is great.  I'd stay here again without hesitation.

Just an FYI:  The apartment across the hall is also a vacation rental.  I did hear the people in that apartment, but it is not a reason to not stay here.  I just mention to let anyone know that you may here these neighbors, and don't be surprised.  For the first two nights, no one was in the apartment.  Then I'd hear them during the day and evening, but at night when it was time for bed, all was quiet.  I texted Ana about the neighbors on the first night, and she was super responsive and concerned.  She's a really wonderful host.

ev sahibemiz ana bizi çok sıcak bir şekilde karşıladı. ev tam olarak yazılan ve de fotolarda gözüken gibiydi. açıkçası ne eksik ne de fazla tam bizim ihtiyacımıza göreydi. temiz, merkezlere yakın... fırınından kahve makinesine, klimasından tvsine her şey tam bize göreydi. evde çok vakit geçirmeyeceğiz, yani çok büyük hacimlere ihtiyacımız yok, sadece temiz ve merkezi bir evde kalmak istiyoruz diyenlere tavsiye ederim. bu arada merak eden varsa muhit konusunda da bir problem yaşamadık.

Ana and her daughter Laura were so kind.
When we arrived, they showed us the flat that was really cute and confortable. We also like that everything was green, and this is a little particular that show us how the apartment has a lot of details: cleaned, complete of all stuff for cooking and stay well for a relaxing vacation.
During the stay, they informed If everything was going well.
Lee were close to metro, many supermarket 24hr, restaurants and clubs.
Really adviced.

We were very pleased with our stay in the apartment!
Ana was very helpful in welcoming us. Very quaint apartment and perfectly situated for us, all the bars and Restos were within walking distance.
Laura was on time and gave us all the necessary info on the area.
Georges,

The apartment is amazing. You will find everything you need so you can feel at home. The air conditioner works perfectly. Better than in hotels. Big fridge, nice bathroom a lot of living space and storage. Perfect for 1 to 4 people. Loved the location!!!! We walked everywhere. Thank you so much Laura for your warm welcoming. We will be back.

We met with Laura at the door of the apartment. It looks just like the photos and is very clean and modern and fully equipped too! We love the apartment! It will be more perfect for couple or young family rather than like us 3 adults as the bathroom door cannot be lock and is made of frosted glass. Also there are stairs before we reach the lift so its a quite difficult for big luggages like what we had to move up before we reach the lift. Other than that the apartment is perfect and Laura gave us good advice and information on how to get around in Barcelona! Thank you!

We loved our cozy, modern apartment in the beautiful city of Barcelona!  It was clean and the location was accurate as mentioned in the description. It was a quiet neighborhood and close to lots of restaurants and shops.  Although our host was on vacation, she provided detailed instructions and was is constant contact with us to make sure we were doing ok.

Ana has been perfect host. She waited for as in front of apartment. She explained to us everything about apartment, traffic, sights, how can buy tickets, etc… She showed to us on map places for eating, shopping, bus and metro station etc… The apartment was exactly the same as pictures on AIRBNB. It was clean and beautiful. Ana interested about our comfort for all time. Apartment has very good position. We used bus and metro rarely.  We enjoyed stay in Barcelona so much. Thank you Ana.
Ana was very welcoming and friendly.  She met us at the front door and showed us around, as well as provided maps and information about local spots.

Ana's apartment is absolutely gorgeous like the photos depict. Laura waited half the day for us with a smile on her face when our flight was delayed and then our luggage lost. She was in contact with us throughout our stay to check up on us. We almost didn't want to leave! Thank you ladies!

Thoroughly enjoyed our trip to Barcelona and the apartment was perfect. Had everything we needed and more really. We were met by Laura who let us in and spent a few minutes with us and some maps which was particularly helpful in getting our bearings and had also left us some bits in the fridge which were a massive help. The A/C works excellently, has all the facilities you could think to need and generally a really nice place. Good location, being near Passeig de Gracia and excellent hosts also. Would definitely recommend.

Ana and Laura were perfect hosts: They welcomed us very friendly although it was late at night and they took time to explain to us everything we wanted to know and gave us very good suggestions where to go (food, events etc.).  The apartment is perfectly located at the city center so you can reach most places within walking distance. Nice restaurants and cafes are in the direct neighborhood. We felt very comfortable in the apartment that looks exactly as it is shown on the photos.
We can wholeheartedly recommend this accomodation!

the aprtment is just gorgeous and looks exactly like the photos
Ana and her lovely daughter Laura where just lovely and answered every question we had.
we had alot of fun and would recommand it to everyone without a doubt!
Hemos pasado una hermosa estancia, Laura y Ana fueron muy cordiales. El dpto es exacto lo que se muestra. Lo recomiendo al 100%. En 5 minutos caminando puedes llegar a Plaza Catalunya.

Nuestra valoración sobre la casa es excelente, por ubicación, atención y el estado de la casa, pese a ser pequeña transmite amplitud.
Hemos quedado encantados, la recomendamos a todos los que quieran visitar Barcelona,
