El apartamento está muy céntrico , limpio, moderno y confortable. La comodidad va más allá del mobiliario: café , agua y refrescos. Buen equipamiento y excelente la recepci,no que nos hizo Ana. Para volver sin dudarlo....

We had such a wonderful stay in Ana and Laura's apartment! Our plane got delayed and we arrived at 11:45pm, they waited for us in the flat and despite the late time, took the time to make some great recommendations of restaurants and places to visit, to tell us about public transports, they also gave us a map and there was even a touristic guide available if we needed one.

The flat in itself is gorgeous, very well decorated, modern and functional. It's super quiet and there's only a quick walk to Passeig de Gràcia.

We were seeking a modern, spacious and clean apartment in the center of Barcelona and that was exactly what we found here. Ana and her daughter Laura were very friendly host, quickly replied to all my messages and enabled us a wonderful long weekend in super cool Barcelona. Thank you!

Everything about the apartment was as described by Ana.  There were only two of us and it was a nice size.  We stay on the move during our vacations, so we didn't use the kitchenette, but it was very well equipped.  Ana and her daughter were extremely helpful with information and directions about Barcelona.  They were also flexible on our departure time.  A great place to stay.

It was great. The apartment was beautiful, and very conveniently located. Both Ana and Laura were very friendly, and we could contact them any time to ask something we couldn't figure out. We really enjoyed our stay, and we wish we could stay for longer. It was my wife's birthday, and Barcelona made it so very special! The location was very convenient: 5 minutes walk to Casa Batllo, under 10 minutes walk to Placa de Catalunya. It was our first visit to Barcelona, and we'll be definitely coming back!

C'était vraiment un super appartement, moderne et bien placé, à quelques minutes de rues très commerçantes, d'une grande station de métro et du "Barcelona bus tour". Tout était disponible (machine à café, lave linge, petites fournitures...) ce qui a grandement facilité notre séjour. Même si l'immeuble était situé sur une grande avenue, l'appartement, donnant sur la cour, était au calme mais donc pas très lumineux.
Ana et sa fille était d'une grande disponibilité et d'une gentillesse à toute épreuve, à l'image des barcelonais. Nous n'avons pas regretté notre choix  :)

El apartamento de Ana está ubicado en pleno centro de Barcelona y por lo tanto muy bien comunicado. Es una zona con muchas tiendas y muchos locales de restauración. Por poner una pega; las paradas de metro mas cercanas no están tan cerca…

Las ventanas dan al patio interior. Lo bueno es que gracias a eso es super silencioso. Lo malo, puede que sea algo oscuro. Un hecho que es compensado por un sinfín de lámparas repartidas por todo el apartamento. Todo el equipamiento es moderno y está en muy buen estado. El espacio disponible está perfectamente aprovechado con soluciones inteligentes. Los detalles decorativos están muy mimados y hacen la estancia muy agrdable.

Ana y su hija han sido muy atentas y amables con nosotros. 
Moltes gràcies i fins aviat!

Although we never actually met Ana, her friend who greeted us was lovely.  The apartment was a little smaller than we expected but it was beautiful.  It was full of modern equipment (washer/dryer, fridge, coffee machine, microwave/oven etc) and everything was very clean.  Located near many great restaurants, everything is within walking distance.  We loved our stay.

Beautiful apartment. Minutes walk from the city centre. We really enjoyed our long weekend here it was perfect. The apartment has everything you need (pots and pans, towels, hair dryer, coffee machine, shampoo/conditioner, shower wash) We were greeted by Ana and she took her time to show us everything and point things out on the map. Ana was so understanding about everything as we had a few problems and really put us at ease. Very nice lady! The bed in the dining room is a pull out bed but so so comfortable you wouldn't even know! Overall fantastic no complaints! Thanks Ana x

El departamento de Ana es magnífico. Está ubicado en un lugar privilegiado para ir a pie a muchos de los lugares turísticos de Barcelona.
Tiene comercios y restaurantes en la misma cuadra.
Ana nos recibió con una sonrisa y nos explicó detalladamente todo lo que podíamos hacer en la ciudad.
Nos sentimos muy cómodos y no tuvimos ningún problema durante nuestra estadía.

The apartment was perfect for us. Ana and her daughter were always in touch, and very eager to please. They both met us upon arrival, took the time to provide a marked map with local highlights and recommendations, and even provided water, soda, and beer! The apartment is in a great location, just a few blocks from the main shopping and dining streets. It looks exactly as presented in the pictures, had everything that we needed, and was extremely clean. Because the apartment faces and inner courtyard, it was extremely quiet and we slept very well! We also recommend Brunch and Cake, an adorable place for breakfast just two blocks away. We would definitely stay with Ana again!

Ana's was the perfect spot for a weekend of sightseeing, food, drink, and football. The flat is extremely clean and modern and it had everything we needed its location allowed us to walk to every major attraction within 25mins. I 100% stay here again.

Ana fue muy amable, nos estaba esperando en la esquina del departamento porque sabía que veníamos en aerobús. Nos explicó las principales atracciones turísticas y como visitarlas. 
El departamento está muy bien ubicado y excelentemente decorado. Sin ruido. Ademas tenía galletitas, queques y bebidas para nosotras.
Nuestro vuelo era en la tarde y nos permitió dejar las maletas en el departamento hasta las 4pm, hora en que llegaban otros guests, lo que nos permitió aprovechar el día.
Ana es una excelente anfitriona.

Ideal little apartment for two. Spotlessly clean, ideal location and just like the pictures! We felt really comfortable as soon as we arrived. Ana was lovely and had loads of information available for us. I would recommend without hesitation.

Très bien accueilli par Ana , qui nous a donné tout ce qu'il fallait comme informations pour passer 4 jours parfaits à Barcelone!  L'appartement est bien situé et proche de deux stations de métro :  impeccable pour se déplacer dans la ville ! Merci encore pour votre disponibilité! 
Vincent

Ana y Laura nos recibieron excelentemente. Fueron muy amables y nos dieron consejos para visitar algunos puntos de Barcelona que nos faltaban conocer. 

El apartamento es hermoso, uno de los mas completos de los que hemos estado. Super moderno, con todas las comodidades para pasar una excelente estadía, los utensilios de cocina muy completos para poder cocinar lo que quieran. 

La ubicación es muy buena con conexiones a todos los puntos. El metro se encuentra a 3 calles. Tambien esta muy cerca de Plaza Catalunya. 

No podemos mencionar nada negativo en nuestra estadía. Ana se comunico con nosotros en todo momento para saber si todo iba bien. Sin duda lo recomendaríamos al 100%.

Wonderful experience at Ana's apartment! It is exactly as described and even better. You'll find there everything you need and Ana is a perfect hostess; she gave us lots of advices and information about Barcelona and was in contact with us during the whole stay.

We will definitely come back and recommend the apartment!

What a brilliant apartment. Ana and her daughter Laura go out of their way to make you feel at home and make sure you have everything you need. Ana always responded to my questions quickly and was very easy to communicate with. She checked on us a couple of times during our stay to see if everything in the apartment was ok. Both Ana and Laura met us on arrival and Laura sat down with a map of Barcelona and talked us through what we could do and suggested great restaurants. The apartment is beautiful, spotlessly clean with the most comfortable bed and sensational shower. It has everything you need and is in a great neighbourhood with fantastic restaurants on every corner. Public transport is close by, however we walked everywhere so didn't need to use it. If there were 6 stars to rate this apartment  I would. I'll be suggesting Ana's place to anyone I know visiting Barcelona. Thank you Ana and Laura for a wonderful stay. I would highly recommend this apartment.

the apartment is amazing, very well designed, cosy, calm and has everything we needed and very clean. it's also very well located we could visit so much things just by walking.
Anna and her daughter received us warmly and gave us useful informations to visit barcelona
i recommand it !

Abbiamo trascorso 3 notti a Barcellona in questo graziosissimo appartamento ristrutturato con stile e gusto dei dettagli.
L'arrivo è stato perfetto.
Siamo arrivati ed Ana era ad accoglierci con la giovane figlia.
Quando siamo arrivati ci hanno mosttato l'appartamento e ci hanno illusttato la città indicandoci ristoranti e punti di interesse. 
L'appartamento è piccolo ma molto funzionale.
Noia siamo in tre. Per tre è assolutamente perfetto.
Nostro figlio (10 anni) ha dormito nel divano letto (comodo e grande).
Il bagno è comodo e la doccia si fa bene.  Non abbiamo usato la cucina ma c'era tutto l'occorrente. Nel frigo ci hanno fatto trovare bibite e acqua.
L'unica nota negtiva è il panorama della finestra. L'appartamento affaccia su una corte interna e non si vede nulla della bella Città. 
L'appartamento è su una via importante. Molto trafficata  (ma il rumore non si sente).
La via è piena di negozi market e ristoranti.
Comoda la Metro (due fermate) a pochi metri a piedi.
Ana ci ha chiesto ogni giorno informazioni sul nostro soggiorno.
Persona attenta e disponibile.
Ci ha dato la possibilità anche di lasciare l'appartamento nel pomeriggio.....

Un grazie di cuore.

We loved our stay in this apartment. Great location in a very nice part of town, near great restaurants, sites, groceries, and the trains and buses. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and quiet. Would definitely stay there again the next time we Re in Barcelona. Thank you Ana and Laura!

We had a great time in Barcelona and Ana's apartment was perfect for our stay. Ana and her daughter Laura were very helpful and gave us all the info we needed before our travels and during also. Definitely recommend this apartment and we'd be happy to stay here again!

Beautiful modern flat. Perfectly clean. Everything needed is there. Added bonus is Ana, the gracious and very friendly host. She made sure to meet us on our late arrival and promptly communicated whenever we had a question. She also let us stay as late as we wanted on departure day so that we didn't need to carry our bags with us until the last minute. 
Flat is well situated, in a quieter neighborhood but within 10-15 mins walk of Placa Catalunya. Also, the bakery "La Patisseria" is a block away for some world renowned desserts/breakfast items. 
All in all, a superb listing. We would definitely stay again the next time we are in Barcelona.

Ana es una excelente anfitriona, nos conto de manera detallada que hacer, donde comer y se preocupaba por como estabamos en nuestra estadia.
El departamento esta muy bien decorado, la combinacion y la eleccion de los muebles y objetos esta hecha en forma minusiosa.
A su vez esta perfectamente equipado, limpio y funcional.
La ubicacion es muy buena es cerca de paseo de gracia.

Ana nos recibió muy amablemente. Nos explicó bien sobre el funcionamiento del departamento y además se tomó unos minutos para ofrecer recomendaciones sobre la Cuidad (restaurantes, movilidad, etc.). Estuvo atenta en mandarnos información y consultó sobre si estaba todo bien.
El lugar es muy cómodo y amplio para dos personas. Su diseño es moderno y el lugar es bastante tranquilo, sin muchos ruidos. La ubicación es excelente (fuimos caminando a la mayoría de los ligares para visitar). En resumen, buen lugar y amable anfitriona, muy recomendable.
Fabulous apartment in brilliant location. Great insight from host on where to go and when and lovely places to eat. Very happy - thanks. Barcelona is my new number one city.

Beautiful and modern little apartment for a couple in a great area of Barcelona. Perfectly clean and with everything you need to enjoy a great vacation in Barcelona. Communication with Ana and her daughter was easy and fast. We will certainly stay here during our next trip to Barcelona!

Ana and her daughter Laura were extremely hospitable and kind. Laura met us at the apartment and told us all about the city and places to go. The apartment was very clean and perfect for the two of us. Great use of space with many ammenities such as an iron and hairdryer. We can't wait to come back!
The apartment is very nice and clean and is in a really cool neighbourhood, close to plaza de catalunya. Laura and Ana are really friendly hosts and gave us great tips. All in all highly recommended.

We had a wonderful stay at Ana's apartment. Laura her daughter was there to greet me when I arrived and was very helpful with information and maps regarding all the places we wanted to visit. The apartment was as posted. Very clean ,quiet and had all the amenities one needs.  Great location with everything you need close by. I will definitely recommend it to friends and will stay there again!

A super apartment with all you would need in a great location to see the city. We were greeted with a warm welcome and a provided with a great list of local eateries to visits .  The apartment was  well finished with quality equipment which added to the magic of Barcelona.  I would definitely be staying here on my next visit . Thank you so much

Ana did a lovely job of making us feel safe and welcome in Barcelona by showing us the neighbourhood and recommending places to go / eat. The apartment is perfect size for 2 people with such smart furnishings which made our stay that bit special. Many amazing places to eat around the apartment !! And supermarkets just around the corner, nothing was too far of a walk eg: las ramblas around 15 minutes. Would definitely reccomend and would stay again xx

Beautiful apartment, every amenity you could possibly want. Easy access to major shopping/restaurant areas. Laura and Ana were very helpful, even ordered us a taxi to pick us up at 5:00 a.m. when we left on an early flight. Highly recommended!

Alles bestens! Ana hat bereits auf uns gewartet und uns danach wertvolle Tipps gegeben. Wohnung ist ruhig und schön, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt bei den Siestas und nachts. Den Rest verbrachten wir ja in der tollen Stadt!

The apartment was perfect for the needs of myself and one friend. All the devices worked perfectly; and WiFi internet speed was excellent. 

For us the location was perfect (a block from Axel and Skybar), and an easy walk to good restaurants and the shopping area (maybe 10 min. at most to the University area next to Las Ramblas). 

Ana was delightful, and her daughter spoke by phone with reflections in English. They were also helpful as my bags were delayed during to my flying from New York rather than Atlanta. 
Ana was waiting for me in-front of the apartment when I arrived; and well, it was very efficient, pleasant and given the long trip too; quite welcomed. 

I enjoyed the apartment and definitely would book again for my seemingly annual trip to Barcelona. Thanks for the hospitality Ana.

We missed our train to Barcelona, and Ana was accommodating to our delayed arrival.  The apartment was exactly as pictured.  The neighborhood was great, within walking distance to all the major attractions in the city.  Ana is friendly and offered us advice on where to go in the area and what to see.  

Nos perdimos nuestro tren a Barcelona, y Ana era servicial a nuestra llegada tardía . El apartamento era exactamente como aparece . El barrio era genial, a poca distancia de los principales puntos de interés de la ciudad . Ana es amable y nos ofreció consejos sobre dónde ir en la zona y qué ver .

Ana & Laura were brilliant hosts and gave us good recommendations of where to go. The flat was brilliant and had everything we needed for our trip around Barcelona. The Location of the flat was brilliant with a short walk to the metro and La Ramblas. We would definitely stay here again.

I thought this apartment was on the ground floor or a basement because of the window placement/frosted glass, but it is actually on the second floor facing an inner courtyard (the bed area gets a good amount of natural light). Everything else lived up to or exceeded expectations as well. Laura, Ana's daughter, spoke great english and gave us an informative walkthrough of attractions, events and (great) local restaurants. The apartment is pristine and located in walking distance of just about everything we wanted to do. Only wish we had more time to do everything Laura recommended.
Super Wohnung, tolle Lage und perfekt ausgestattet.

Ana's place is close to everything near Passeig de Garcia. There are lots of restaurants, shopping and nightlife around but it is located in a quiet area.  It is clean, neat, modern and tidy. Ana doesn't speak much English but her daughter Laura does. Both of them were there to receive us that day and they were warm, friendly and polite. Our flight was late in the evening and they even allowed us to stay for a bit longer which we deeply appreciated. Highly recommended this apartment to everyone. We had a wonderful time in Barcelona and we will definitely be back. Thank you very much, Ana and Laura.
Todo perfecto! Ana estuvo barbaro

Ana and Laura were very kind and very helpful. The apartment is clean and beautiful and could not have been in a better location! Communication was top notch and my partner and I felt very comfortable in the space. Please try Pompero Steak House just around the corner. Best meal I've ever had. We would stay there again in a second! We walked everywhere and it's just 25 minutes to Sagrada Familia and the Picasso Museum. There's even a Pokéstop in the apartment! Five stars!

Ana and her daughter Laura were great in helping us with what places we should visit and where to eat in Barcelona. Their recommendations were really good and we enjoyed staying at their apartment which was perfectly located , close to all the landmark points of interest and very clean. Everything was less than 15 minutes walk and there were plenty of good restaurants very close by. I will highly recommend to stay at their place.
It was wonderful.   A lovely apartment would recommend it highly to anyone who wants to visit Barcelona .   Felt very safe it was very convenient to the metro and local restaurants.

Ana was very accommodating upon our arrival following our early flight and let us leave our bags whilst it was cleaned and prepared. Ana was very friendly and welcoming and provided us with great recommendations and advice to ensure we had a fantastic trip! The apartment is just as the pictures show: very clean, spacious and comfortable. It is in a great location where much of Barcelona can be easily explored and it has some lovely cafes, restaurants and patisseries within a 3 minute walk! We would highly recommend this apartment! Thank you for a lovely stay. 
Hattie and Andy

Ana's apartment was so central to everything we wanted to visit in Barcelona. It was a lovely, bright, modern, clean, comfortable apartment with everything we needed. Laura, Ana's daughter, was very friendly and helpful with suggestions on places to see and how to get about Barcelona easily. Definitely recommend this Airbnb. Loved it.

Mom and I enjoyed Ana' s lovely place. This was our first Spain trip and first Airbnb experience. Great location. Ana Showed good spots on the map. We arrived bit late at her place but she was waiting in front of the building. Thank you Anna. I highly recommend.

Nuestra experiencia en el Dto de Ana fue maravillosa. Ella es muy buena anfitriona, nos ha hecho sentir "como en casa"., nos ha otorgado mucha informacion y queda a disposicion para lo que uno quisiera o necesitara.
El lugar es acogedor, impecable y muy bien situado.
Por supuesto que lo recomendamos!

Ana is a wonderful host! The place was clean, neat and well-equipped. Especially, I loved the kitchen. It has everything we need! 
Ana welcomed us with a big smile, and gave us detailed informations about the attractions and good restaurants in Barcelona. She even gave two big bottles of water for us :) I'd definitely like to recommend this place to travelers who visits Barcelona. 

Oh and I'd like to tell you that there's a MUST-VISIT tapas bar near Ana's place. The place is called "La Flauta". You must visit this place as they serve great "boquerones fritos". It's really recommendable.
This place was perfect!!!! Great location; Ana was helpful; clean; includes all that is needed!!! Just perfect!

This is by far one of the best units I've stayed in on Airbnb. Ana was an amazing host throughout the process. She met us at the unit with bottled water and gave us great suggestions on places to go and great restaurants in the area. 

As for the apartment, it's in excellent condition! The modern style is perfect and super clean! The bedding is soft and you have access to plenty of clean towels in the cabinet. The unit also comes with a washer/dryer so this certainly helps. 

The unit is quiet and definitely perfect for a couple looking for a peaceful stay in the beautiful city of Barcelona. 

I would highly recommend this unit and would definitely stay here again.

Ana und Laura sind sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberinnen, denen das Wohl ihrer Gäste sehr am Herzen liegt. Die Wohnung war super ausgestattet, sauber, modern und hatte eine tolle Lage.  
Wir können diese Wohnung wärmstens weiterempfehlen! :)

A lovely apartment very well located in central Barcelona yet very quiet and peaceful. Comfortable bed and fabulous wet room with excellent shower and very well equipped kitchen. Wifi is fast and the apartment is uber clean. Ana the owner is delightful and very engaging and helpful. Highly recommended.

El apartamento es tal cual se lo describe en el anuncio, impecable, muy nuevo, muy cómodo para dos personas, super equipado, con todo lo que necesitas y más, por encima del promedio de lo que encuentras en otros apartamentos similares. Todo funciona perfectamente.
La zona es muy buena, muy cerca de los restaurantes del Eixample, aunque hay que andar unos 1.2 km para llegar a la zona de tiendas de Plaza Catalunya. La estación de metro mas cercana se encuentra a unos 500 metros.

Visited Barcelona with my mum for 3 days and the apartment had everything that we needed. It was clean and modern- exactly as in the photos. Great location- could walk to loads of places and a short walk to a choice of metro stations. Ana met us on arrival and was super friendly and helpful!

Ana was a wonderful host. She answered all emails promptly and made a real effort to be there personally to greet and brief me on my arrival. She followed up with contact to ensure that everything was going well during my stay. The beautifully renovated apartment, while small, was very functional, modern and well-equipped. It is superbly situate close to the Passeig de Gracia and Place Catalunya. Many of Barcelona's attractions are within easy walking distance. Those that aren't are easily reached by the metro which is five minutes away. Ana's apartment is the perfect base of operations for a visit to Barcelona. Highly recommended.

Ana was an amazing host. She gave us a lot of useful information so we could eat and enjoy the city. The apartment is exactly as shown on the pictures. Everything was very nice and clean and definitely has an excellent location.

Thanks Ana!

Great experience overall! Ana was very kind and helpful. She made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment was exactly what we were looking for. Brand new appliances, clean sheers and towels, great location... I'll definitely book it again.

Two comfortable double beds.  Clean kitchen and bathroom, modern decor in a very central part of Barcelona.  Plenty of great cafes, restaurants and bars nearby and easy to walk most places.  A perfect little pied a terre from which to explore this wonderful City. Ana is easy to be in touch with and provided all the information we needed well in advance
Ana was a fantastic host, the appartment had everything we needed,and the location was perfect.We will be back.Thankyou Ana.

We had a wonderful stay at Ana's flat! It was very comfortable and clean. It's sleek, modern, and cohesively decorated. It's in a great location for getting to sights in the city either by waking or public transit, but it doesn't feel like you're drowning in tourists, which we really appreciated. Nearby sights include Casa Batllo and Casa Mila. It's maybe a 15 minute walk to La Rambla and is around the corner from really delicious restaurants. We didn't get to meet Ana in person, but she was always easily available by email and was really helpful! Her mom helped us get checked in and gave us great tips for getting around the city. We had such a wonderful time in Barcelona and would definitely recommend Ana's place!
lovely host, nice area, definitively recommend it!

Ana was an incredible host and was very communicative leading up to the trip. She did a great job making us feel welcome and giving us recommendations of places to try different types of food.  She was also quite accommodating in terms of check in/out times.

El apartamento se ajusta totalmente a lo descrito. Muy bien cuidado, moderno, céntrico y bien comunicado. Ana es una anfitriona estupenda. Nos estuvo esperando hasta que llegamos, nos aconsejó previamente sobre transporte público para llegar allí y ademas nos aconsejó sobre sitios para ir a comer, desayunar, hacer compras... Muy recomendable!

I had a great stay at Ana's place. The apartment was very clean and had everything I needed. 

The check in was friendly and informative.

Thanks for a great stay!

The apartment was super clean and modern. It had all the amenities. Great location, lot of good restaurants around. Within walking distance to all tourist attractions. Ana was a great host and made us feel welcome at beautiful Barcelona :)

Apartment is wonderful! Everything is elaborately, stylishly. Very good wi-fi ☺️And there in the house is an elevator! 
Location is very good, not far from metro and all sightseeings. Beside the apartment many supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies. 
Anna and her colleagues who met us are very friendly and helpfully. They tell us everything what we wanted to know. Thank you! 
So in conclusion, I recommend to stay in this apartment, it is really good. Apartment are suitable for families with children and for couples.

O apartamento da Ana é ótimo, renovado, limpo e muito bem equipado.

A localização não poderia ser melhor, próximo ao transporte, aerobús e também de muitos excelentes restaurantes.

Ana was helpful before, during and after check in. The apartment  was beautifully appointed, clean, warm, safe and quiet. There wasn't anything missing for a comfortable stay!
Thank you so much Ana!!
Great little place in convenient location. Super modern, clean with 2 comfy beds. No views, but therefore very quiet.

Ana's apartment was in a prime location which had plenty of restaurants and bars nearby. The place was in very good condition and ana herself was a brilliant host. I'd recommend Ana's place to anyone!

Nice flat, nice location and nice welcome.
Good value for money.
Thanks Ana...
Excellent location every link within easy walking distance perfect for a couple on a city break
A wonderful clean and beautiful apartment in an excellent location. Ana is absolutely lovely!

Ana's place was just great. Location is fantastic with full of charming little restaurants, cafes and bars. Easy to get there from the airport and the check in was super smooth, Ana was super Nice and always reachable. Thanks a lot again

Ana was fantastic with the apartment. It was very clean and looked exactly as the pictures made it out to be. She was very helpful with recommendations for things to do around the neighborhood but especially helpful with food recommendations. Communicating was effortless, and check in and check out went smoothly. If we had any questions she was readily available to help out and answer them. I would highly recommend anyone to stay here, and if I come back to Barcelona I will definitely look into staying here another time.
So recommendable! Amazing host and an amazing apartment! Couldn't of gotten any better!

Ana's apartment is a comfortable place to stay to visit while visiting Barcelona. Central location and within walking distance to many of the popular tourist locations. 

Would definitely recommend to friends and family.

Impeccably clean just a few blocks from passeig de Garcia  easy walk to gothic area. Had everything we needed including all those necessities that one usually has to purchase. Filled with toilet paper serviettes coffee tea sugar salt oil shower gel etc. What a blessing   Creatively and tastefully decorated as seen in the pics. Would ask to return if we choose to come back to Barcelona. Thanks Ana
We had an excellent stay at Ana's apartment. The location is great and the apartment is well equiped. I also received a very nice welcome on my birthday. Thanks for everything Ana!
El apartamento es muy céntrico, limpio y tiene todo n lo necesario para pasarse unos días excelentes en la ciudad, la comunicación fue muy buena, 100% recomendado.

We had a great time at Ana`s place. Check in was perfect. The apartment is exactly like the photos. Clean, comfortable, and close to everything. Extremely well equipped. Lots of restos, tapas places, cafes and bakeries nearby. Everything you need to enjoy Barcelona. Next time we go we hope to stay here again. Thanks Ana.

Ana's apartment is well-equipped with a comfortable bed and modern appliances. It is in a superb location in the Eixample district surrounded by lots of great places to eat and drink, and it is not far from the Sants train station. The old sections of town and the Sagrada Fanilia are well within walking distance, too, and public transportation is close by. Ana was a pleasure to deal with and she was always quick to respond to messages. We will definitely stay here again. Barcelona is a great city.
Schoon appartement van alle gemakken voorzien. Beetje klein, maar dat was niet echt een probleem.

Excelente estancia! Tal cual las fotos, muy bien ubicado, cerca de todos los transportes públicos y de los principales puntos turísticos caminando. Ana fue una anfitriona excelente, nos aconsejo lugares, nos permitió dejar las valijas antes del check in y siempre fue muy atenta. El dpto esta muy bien equipado y decorado. 100% recomendable.

Appartement très propre bien équipé etbtrès bien situé à côté des transports, boutiques et restaurants. Très bon accueil de la part de Laura et Ana qui étaient ponctuel au rendez-vous. Literie confortable. Un peu de nuisance à cause du bruit dû  au manque d'insonorisation entre voisins.

Excelente ubicación. Comodo,limpio y super completo. Estan contemplados hasta los  minimos detalles de lo necesita el viajero. Ana excelente anfitriona. Al llegar nos explico los puntos de interes y estuvo atenta en todo momento para lo que le consultaramos. Dan ganas de volver. Muchisimas gracias Ana! Saludos
Apartment was really beautiful and very close to everything in downtown Barcelona. I was staying here with a friend, not a boyfriend, so the see-through shower was a bit of a surprise!

The apartment is as described. Ana made sure we had everything we needed to have a great stay in Barcelona. She even checked up on us via airbnb message to see how our stay was going. I would highly recommend this place.

El departamento impecable, tal cual se ve en las fotos. >Muy funcional. La ubicacion es perfecta. Ana es muy amable y esta disponible en todo momento para cualquier necesidad. Una estadia maravillosa. Super recomendable

Excelente lugar muy bien ubicado al lado de todos los puntos de interés.  
Muy bien el wifi , Ana es excelente host

Ana is a great host. She met us at the apartment and showed us what we needed to know about where to eat, tourist spots etc. The apartment is in a great location, clean, comfortable. We had a great time.

Ana et sa fille Laura sont des hôtes absolument adorables ! L'appartement est bien situé, propre et conforme aux photos. Elles répondront à toutes vos questions et elles n'hésitent pas à vous faire quelques suggestions afin de visiter des coins atypiques de Barcelone.
Si vous avez un soucis, elles sont disponibles pour vous aider. Je recommande cet appartement sans hésitation ! Merci pour tout !
Ana's place is nice. Very clean and modern. We walked all over Barcelona from the apartment.
Clean, modern studio apartment, perfect for using as a base to explore Barcelona. Would definitely stay again.

Ana's apartment is modern and nicely decorated. We slept very well as the bed is so comfortable! We were provided with everything we needed for a great stay in Barcelona including maps, brochures and dining suggestions. From the apartment it is an easy walk to the metro and plaza catalunya. Thank you for a wonderful stay Ana.

This city apartment is located near the metro Gracias exit, A 20 minute cab ride from the airport with shopping and Gaudi homes and locations nearby. Ana could not be more nice and was super helpful, gave us great local knowledge and wonderful tips for sightseeing and restaurants to go too! Barcelona is an enchanted city with lots to do and many things to see and do.

Ana's apartment is in the perfect location. Walkable to all the interesting areas, but just far enough to be outside the tourist swarm. And her restaurant recommendations were delicious and spot on. Thanks for everything, Ana!

Ana's apartment is just perfect for a stay in beautiful Barcelona! It's just a 10 minute walk to Casa Batllo and a little further to Placa Catalunya! There are some nice bars and restaurants around. The apartment is super clean and perfectly equipped!! There is EVERYTHING you need!! Ana is very friendly and we can only recommend to stay there!! We came with our 10 month old son and it was perfect!!

Thank you Ana!!

Great location near Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and the Gothic Quarter - hostess was lovely and apartment just like photos and very clean! Awesome AC which was important because it was 98 degrees two of the days we were there!! Would definitely return to stay here :-)

Beautiful apartment. Nicely decorated. Close to many restaurants, bars, and shopping areas and a short walk to the metro. Ana was always available to answer my questions and was a great host.  I Absolutely recommend this flat!

Anna and her daughter were very friendly and helpful. The apartment looks just like the pictures. Very modern looking. Close to everything (La Rambla, Sagrada Church and lots of shops). The apartment was clean and had everything we needed for our short stay. I recommend this location.
Die Wohnung befindet sich an einer sehr guten Lage, ca. 10 Min. zu Fuss bis Placa Catalunya. Kleine aber sher konfortable und saubere Wohnung.

Ana was a wonderful host. She met us when we arrived and showed us around the apartment and provided a map with directions to all of the major sites in the city. Ana also had a book of recommendations for restaurants. The apartment was very clean and was spacious for the two of us. We really enjoyed our stay!

Ana is the perfect host. Met  me on check in and explained the local area and attractions. The apartment is great. As a solo traveller it was the perfect size and the location is fantastic, so close to major attractions, restaurants and transport.thank you Ana.

Just steps away from all that Barcelona has to offer, Ana's unit was clean, cool and very well appointed.  Her daughter, Laura, welcomed us and I really appreciated her taking the time to give us tips and hints to get a true Barcelona local experience!

Il soggiorno da Ana è stato molto positivo. Siamo stati accolti dalla signora e dalla figlia che ci hanno dato preziose indicazioni sia su ristoranti che attrazioni "sconosciute". Settimana fantastica in un appartamento completamente funzionale e adatto a tutti i tipi di viaggiatori. Peccato che la finestra non si affacci alla strada ma ad un cortile interno: piccolezza che sicuramente non macchia un soggiorno praticamente perfetto.

Ana ha sido una excelente anfitriona, muy amable. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, es en un edificio antiguo pero el apto. está remodelado al estilo moderno. Para dos o tres personas está perfecto.

Fantastic apartment!  Great host!  Immaculately clean, wonderful location (close to bus and metro),  quiet neighborhood and building in a gay friendly area.  Ana stocks plenty of extra towels for beach days,  and there's a very nice washer / dryer too.  Comfy beds!  Go to the cafe Can Joan next door for the tortilla de patata, DELICIOUS.  We loved Barcelona and this airbnb!

Absolutely perfect place - matching the description exactly, and exceptionally well put together. From
lots and pans to hair dryer and everything in between, in addition to the ultra central location and the most helpful host (suggestions upon arrival, prompt communication, etc.), this place is just perfect. 
Thank you for a great stay!

Casa bellissima, abbastanza grande, divano molto comodo e grande . L'appartamento e situato in una zona tranquilla, ci sono ristoranti e negozi vicino.Anche là metro è molto vicina la rambla anche . La signora Ana ci ha spiegato un sacco di cose e ci ha lasciato anche la mappa

We had a fantastic stay at Ana's place. The location is perfect! Make sure you check out the local restaurants and cafes. We found a really cool place called Cosmo nearby and also some amazing brunch at a place called Brunch and Cake. All just around the corner! The apartment feels very safe and is equipped with all you need - a home from home. Ana is a wonderful host and was very communicative the whole time. You must stay here :)
A great place. You could not expect much more from a host. She met us at the property and went over the other area highlights visitors might not get to see on the regular tour Maps.

Ana's apartment is in a great location, just a short walk to La Rambla. Ana gave us a good intro of the area on our arrival and left a bottle of water in the fridge. The apartment is clean and designed nicely. Just a word of warning that the bathroom isn't the most private wth frosted glass and a thin glass door. Not the biggest deal but something to keep in mind depending on who you're sharing with!

Thanks Ana for making me feel so welcome in Barcelona! The apartment was perfect. Centrally located, super clean, close to loads of transport, restaurants, and shops. Ana met me at the apartment and showed me all the the local feature spots, as well as recommending some lovely spots to eat. I've never felt more at home on a work trip. I'll definitely stay again when I come to Barcelona.

Ana's apartment is centrally located and very secure. It is well appointed with everything you would need for a comfortable stay, we loved it here. Ana is a fantastic host, she greeted us warmly and showed us on the maps where a lot of the attractions are located as well as giving us good advice on where to eat and shop. Public transport is close by and a lot of the main attractions are within walking distance as is the supermarket and there are plenty of varied restaurants close by to choose from. I would definitely recommend Ana's apartment to anyone who is travelling to Barcelona.
Great location that is close to main sights and transport. We walked to most sights. Ana met us on check in and was very helpful in pinpointing sights and places to eat. Enjoyed our stay thoroughly.
Make sure to get a good understanding of how the stove top and oven at work if you plan on cooking. Other than that the place was great.

The apartment is exactly as described. Perfect location, all the mod cons (if you require them). Apartment was spotlessly clean and Ana was the perfect host - there  to meet us as planned and quick to respond to any queries we had.
The location of the apartment is ideal - not in the hustle and bustle of the centre but, at most, a 5 min walk to all the attractions. There are plenty of bars and restaurants close to the apartment too.

Ana's place was just like in the photos. It was in a terrific location, easily accessible to everything we needed. We were met as planned even though we got delayed by protesters and when there were a few minor problems, they were very quickly sorted out. A lovely apartment in the middle of Barcelona, close to restaurants, transport and within walking distance of most that we wanted to see.
바르셀로나에 간다면 다시 이용하고 싶은 곳이에요^^
Le logement d Ana est très bien situé. Proche du centre touristique et pourtant avec la possibilité de trouver des supers restos proposés par ana

Sin lugar a dudas uno de los mejores apartamento y host que hemos visitado. El apartamento esta totalmente remodelado con una excelente distribucion, muy cerca del metro universidad  y a menos de 5 minutos caminando de las Ramblas, por si fuera poco, Ana siempre, está al pendiente y nos contacto para coordinar el viaje, desde la llegada nos recibieron con mucha paciencia y atención, apoyándonos con mapas, guías y consejos para disfrutar Barcelona, incluso nos ayudaron a reservar un taxi para llevarnos al aeropuerto por la madrugada el cual llego puntual, recomiendo ampliamente a Ana y su apartamento para disfrutar al máximo tu visita a Barcelona.

We loved staying at Ana's place! We were able to walk a lot and felt that it was a great location. The excellent amenities included a washer/dryer and an espresso machine. The space was bigger than most places we have stayed in Europe and very well decorated. We hope to stay here again one day when we come back to Barcelona!

Bel appartement très bien équipé. Bien qu'il soit situé sur une grande artère, il est très calme car il donne sur une cour intérieure. Ana est très disponible et serviable et met à disposition plein d'information pour ses hôtes. Je le recommande grandement

La casa es tal cual como se ve en la foto, muy moderna y en pleno centro. Cerca de todo. Ana se comportó muy bien con nosotros, y nos esperó hasta última hora. Sin duda muy recomendable para pasar unos días en Barcelona.

Have never used AirBnb before but thankfully we did as Ana's apartment was better than any hotel we could have stayed in and was in the perfect location! Would most definelty reccomend and will definely be returning! Clean, helpful and wouldn't go else where, looks exactly as the pictures!

Ana's place was in a great location, easy to walk around and near lots of food options. She was very quick to respond and checked in to make sure everything was going well. I highly recommend this spot!

Ana's place was so lovely. Exactly as pictured and described. I never met Ana but did meet her daughter Laura who was at the apartment to greet me. She kindly bought me some drinks and gave me some great suggestions for places to visit around the city. The apartment was very clean and had all the appropriate amenities needed for a couple of nights stay. It is close to shops, restaurants and within walking distance of public transport. Would definitely stay at this place again :)

Ana's is a modern apartment in Barcelona in a great location accessible to all places of interest,  the metro and great restaurants within 200 metres recommended by Ana.
Easy to find being one R train stop and a comfortable walk from Barcelona Sants station.
Apartment very well equipped , quiet and highly recommend . Book it.

Daryl & Lesley

Australia

This is a beautiful apartment and well situated to explore and enjoy Barcelona.
You can walk to many sights or use public transport which is not far.
Ana is a lovely host, who is so very helpful and welcoming. Highly recommend this apartment.

Usually, I start out commenting on location, but this time I’m commenting on how pristine the place is. 

Entering into a 19th century building, as soon as the door to the flat was opened, it was a WOW. I mean, the place is pristine. It was as if I was the first ever guest. Open and bright with high, high ceilings. Like I said: pristine 

Now on to location. 7 minutes’ walk from Universitat Metro. 15 minutes to Plaça Catalunya, and a few more to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter

Shops, supermarket, more shops and cafés. And I lost count of the number of bakeries / patisseries within a few minutes of the apartment. 

The apartment is on the back of the building which makes it immune from street sounds. 

It is ideal for one or two. More if you’re family or great friends. 

The place is, in a word, fun

Laura was waiting for me and provided excellent suggestions and geographic orientation which added to the brightness of the apartment 

Definitely a “will stay again” choice

I’ve stayed at many Airbnb’s and this is my favorite one so far! Ana’s apartment has everything a traveler would want in an Airbnb: location, clean, stylish place,  amenities, and wonderful host! You just need to take the Aerobus from BCN to plaza universidad (about 6 euro one way) then apartment is about 7 minutes away.. There is an elevator in the apartment which is helpful for luggage. Ana’s daughter met us and gave us helpful detailed information on where to go, local recommendations, mini maps. She is very friendly and patient. The apartment is very modern upgraded design, exactly like in photos. Super clean, many towels, lights, kitchenware, washer, fridge. I felt like it was nicer than the hotel! Very safe area. Thank you for such a wonderful day I highly recommend it and would stay again
Excellent location and very stylish apartment!

This place is so beautiful - completely accurate to the pictures. Very impressive, clean and modern. They also provided recommendations for food and things to do which was extremely helpful. We had a wonderful stay here.

We have enjoyed staying Ana's place.  It was clean and we felt very comfortable. The location is great and so we found all the places we wanted go as Ana showed us. She was very kind.

We would recommend to our friends and plan to come back. 

Thank you again Ana!

Excellent location, very clean apartment with great access to all transportation , restaurants 

Excellent communication with host
Great location, and Ana was super helpful. She gave us a nice overview of the city and answered all of our questions. We'd love to come back to Barcelona, and would stay here again.

Ana’s place was amazing. Really clean and cozy. It was located right in the middle of everything. We could walk everywhere. She also left directions for favorite restaurants and gave us directions to the most popular sights. Amazing host.

The apartment is very tidy and in a great part of the city. It's an interior apartment so there is no city noise at night which is fantastic. Ana was excellent at helping us on arrival with local tips, and was easy to contact throughout the stay if we needed her.

Ana’s apartment was absolutely amazing! The apartment is so close to Garcia and Catalunya street but away enough to relax. Walking distance to so many delicious restaurants and cafes. Ana left us with a TON of recommendations and she’s so sweet and nice! We are definitely coming back to visit Barcelona and hopefully stay at Ana’s apartment! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Ana's place was great - a fantastic location with tons of cafes/restaurants/bars nearby and within walking distance to many iconic Barcelona sights such as Casa Batllo, Casa Mila, La Sagrada Familia, Las Ramblas, the Gothic Quarter, El Born, etc. Ana's friend Sehila met us at the apartment and gave us an orientation which was great. The apartment itself was very nice and updated and my mother and I were very comfortable for our four nights there. Ana's communication both before and during were great. Would definitely love to visit Barcelona and stay there again!

The apartment was perfect! Just what we needed - walking distance to all landmarks and main streets and lots of nice bars and restaurants on the door step. Ana and her daughter Laura were perfect hosts - they gave us a map and talked us through the best places to go to and how to get there. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a central place to stay!

Nous avons passé 3 jours dans cet appartement. La localisation est parfaite et juste à côté de La Rambla de Catalunya. 
Le studio est très bien équipé et très propre. 
Nous avons été très bien accueilli par la fille de l’hôte, qui nous a fourni de bonnes informations sur Barcelone (choses à faire, comment se déplacer etc...). 
Appartement idéal pour découvrir Barcelone et se sentir comme chez soi !

Ana's place was amazing - clean, comfortable, and extremely well located in the Eixample neighborhood (close to the metro and to a lot of shops, restaurants, and amenities). Ana and her daughter Laura were amazing as well - extremely hospitable and responsive. I look forward to returning to Barcelona and staying with Ana again soon!

Ana’s place was exactly as described, thanks Ana 
You were really helpful when we eventually arrived
The internet was excellent and the place was quiet and so central to everything.  I would recommend your place to everyone and if we went back we would stay there again 
Thank you

房子的地理位置很好,入住的时候Ana在家迎接我们,还给了很多建议｡整体环境很舒适,各种日常用品一应俱全,而且有电梯很方便｡
总之非常棒!
The place was beautiful and in great location. I appreciate the flexibility waiting for me as I had difficulty getting to the apartment from the airport.  I highly recommend the apartment.

A great place from which to visit what Barcelona has to offer. And easy to walk to most of them. Clean and all as advertised. Comfortable and good level of amenities. Five minutes from airport bus stop.

Ana is an axcellent host ,caring , she told us everything about local amenities, best way to go to places, kept In touch during our stay .
The flat is very  well situated to explore the city, and very quiet and comfortable to sleep at night , the local restaurant recommended were very nice 
Everything was perfect
La verdad que el departamento está increíble, muy bien ubicado, con muy buenos detalles de decoración y l atención de la anfitriona es excelente! Lo recomiendo!
Super clean and pleasant to work with
The apartment was clean and modern. Located in very convenient place. Lots of good restaurants around it. Thank you Ana!

I would definitely stay at Ana's place again. Great location- even though it's on a very busy street, the flat is very quiet. 
I appreciated the extra touches, such as a box of kleenex, abundant toilet paper and towels, a hair dryer and a coffee maker compatible with Nespresso capsules. There was even fresh milk for coffee. The only thing I would have liked is bottled water but there are plenty of convienence shops nearby to purchase whatever you might need.

I also liked the reading lamp on the nightstand. 

All in all, a great place. HIghly recommend!

Apartment was as described. Good location, very walkable to everything.  Quick responses from owner. Helpful to know that it is on the 3rd floor (with elevator after short steps) even though it is called Primer.  Many appliances which are useful if you know how to use them. Less than private bathroom space so better with someone you are very close with! Very efficient apartment for the space it occupies - no closet but good hanging space etc.  Comfortable beds!

So stellt man sich einen Kurzurlaub vor. Wohnung top, waren mit allem zufrieden. Besonders die Sauberkeit und Tipps haben uns gefallen. Die Wohnung können wir mit reinem Gewissen zu 100% weiter empfehlen. Vielen Dank Frank und Erika

Anna’s place is right located in downtown Barcelona.  Easy to touring around.  Her place is hug compare to the 4 star hotel room we got in Paris.  We have a nice stay before our cruise out.  There is a few stairs before the elevator, but it is wide for us to carry the big suitcase.  We would love to back soon.
Nettes kleines Apartment in bester Lage in Eixample, sehr engagierte Gastgeberin mit tollen Tipps
La ubicación del apartamento de Ana es excepcional a pocos minutos de Plaza Cataluña y de Las Ramblas y se la estación del metro Universidad , Paseo de Gracia y muchos otros puntos de interés
Excellent central place, well-designed and clean. Convenient place to explore the city. Thanks!

Alles tiptop gelaufen!
Das Apartment war klein, jedoch sehr schön und gemütlich. Perfekt für 2 Personen. Gute Ausstattung (ausser Ofen), schön eingerichtet und gute Lage.
Such a perfect apartment!

Five stars does not tell you this apartment is well appointed down to all the things you would want in a rental.  Kitchen top notch.  Comfortable and quiet and half a block to a convenient and well stocked market.  Convenient to the metro.  Highly recommend.

This apartment is in a great location, 10/15 mins walk to most things, lovely selection of restaurants all close by and some lovely recommendations given by Ana who was really helpful about the local area and prompt in replying to messages. Would highly recommend staying here if you’re visiting Barcelona and would certainly return!

Het is een geweldig appartement. Het ligt centraal in Barcelona en is erg schoon. Er is alles aanwezig. Voordat we kwamen kregen we al bericht hoe we het beste konden reizen van vliegveld naar appartement. Echt een aanrader.

Dieses 1 Zimmerapartment besticht durch seine sehr gute Lage. Ca. 7-10 Min Gehminuten bis zur Metro Pl. Universität. Sagrada Familia (25Min), Casa Batllo (10 Min) sind fußläufig zur erreichen. Einziger Nachteil im Apartment ist das Badezimmer. Dies ist halt inklusive Toilette im Raum und nur durch Milchglas abgetrennt. Man hört halt alles vom Zimmerkollegen.

The apartment is great!! It has everything you need and it's super clean. Walking distance to the main tourist spots like the Sagrada Familia and the gothic neighborhood. Ana is amazing! She was there when we arrived and showed as everything we needed to know about the apartment and the city. Thanks, Ana!
Ana was amazing and her apartment was great! She gave us some great tips of what to do in the city and the apartment was in a prime area. Would definitely stay there again!
Great central location.Ana waa very hospitable.  She gave great recommendations and checked on us during our stay.  Would definitely book again if in Barcelona.

Right from the start it was a great experience staying in Anas home. Her communication is excellent -she responds quickly to messages.
Ana meet us at her place and gave us some great tips about local restaurants and places to go. The apartment is in an excellent location surrounded by many good restaurants and shopping areas all an easy walk . 
Great for a couple the apartment is really well set up .
Proximity, quiet, modern, welcoming, secure- we loved it
Friendly and informative host , gave us maps and tips on what to see .
Very clean and a great location for discovering Barcelona. Would highly recommend to other travellers

Ana is a nice hostess.
The apartment is wonderfull
You can expect a great host and an apartment that is clean, well stocked with everything you will need and in a good location

Ana is an outstanding host. She was excellent with her communication throughout the stay. Not only did she give us excellent directions to her place, but she waited outside and waved at us when we were across the street. (Guessing the luggage gave us away). It made us feel very good to be welcomed so quickly.

Ana spent time going over details in the apartment (all the amenities) and ensured we were comfortable before she departed. She even had a map of the area for us and made sure we were comfortable knowing where the apartment was so we wouldn’t get lost.

She has a nice book of sites to see and restaurants to try. We tried a couple she recommended and were extremely pleased (excellent tapas and paella).

The amenities are very good: plenty of towels, toilet paper, shampoo, etc. There are plenty of outlets which is a plus. The air conditioning was excellent (two units) to keep the rooms very comfortable during our stay.

The location is also excellent: it is just a few blocks walk from the University Aerobus stop and there are plenty of other buses and trains nearby.

We hope to stay there again!

Ana's apartment is modern and clean and in a great spot a little further uptown. She was very helpful in letting us drop our bags off very early in the morning and provided great information on the area. Thank you.

Some Airbnbs, you look at the pictures, then you get there, and it’s a moment of disappointment. This is not that Airbnb. This place is absolutely gorgeous. The location is amazing. I highly recommend checking out Morro Fi which is around the corner if you want to get acquainted with Spanish vermouth. 

Ana is an excellent host. She greeted us at the door and took the time out of her day to walk us through the area, giving us recommendations about restaurants and other attractions. Also, the clothes washing/drying machine was a godsend on our three week trip through Europe.

Book this place now and don’t look back!

Lovely apartment in perfect quiet location within walking distance to all major attractions. Anas contact prior to our stay was fantastic with directions etc. The apartment was spotless and felt very safe

This was our first time to Barcelona and we found Ana's place to be centrally located and a perfect location for getting around to visit everything we wanted to see. The apartment was very clean and modern and all essentials were provided.
Thank you Ana
Amazing place! Definitely recommend!

Ana esta en todos los detalles.
Todo se cumple tal cual la publicscion.
Tremendo lugar. 
Muy amable, consejera ,
Todo de 10

Appartement super! Proche de la place principale et des transports en commun. Nous avons adoré séjourner ici.  
Ana est une hote réactive et très bonne hospitalité. 
Je recommande

An excellent host who is helpful and quick to respond to questions. The apartment is exactly as displayed on Airbnb. We found the location exactly as we expected. Very close to required bus routes and a short walk to Place de Catalunya.

Appartement très design très sympa pour 4 personnes. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Barcelone, l'appartement est bien placé aussi.
Tous les produits de base sont disponibles et c'est très pratique.
Anna est facilement joignable.
l'appartement est très calme il n'y a pas de bruit.
It has a lot of maps and books for things to do in Barcelona.
very nice , exactly as discribed  , you wont be dissappointed , only minor problem no natural light as only window has obscured glass  , very clean and modern

A great little apartment thats packed with lots of features. This was our first time using airbnb amd wasnt sure what to expect. It was a great experience well looked after with plenty of useful info to get around town and explore. Its handy to transport and lots of places to eat, but its also quiet at night. Would come and stay again.

Excellent place to stay in the heart of Barcelona. The bus from the airport drops off very close to this place. Ana is a welcoming host who offers some great suggestions of places to eat, visit etc. Comfortable beds, great air conditioning and modern facilities. I would highly recommend anyone to stay here. I will be back!

A lovely,  newly updated studio. There is everything we needed for the 3 days we stayed there. The location is about 30 minute walk to most places although there are some places like the beach and Montjuic which are more likely a taxi ride away. Ana was a good host.

Ana’s place was super clean and comfortable.  Everything was in excellent condition and the place is well maintained.  The location was convenient to public transportation and close to many sites.  There are loads of restaurants in the area.

This place was really amazing. So much space and really unique style. Lots of accommodations for everything you could think of. Close to Las Ramblas, and lots of amazing restaurants near by. I highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in Barcelona!

This was by far one of the best experiences. Ana was very helpful she made sure our experience was the best at her place. The place was modern clean comfortable and right in the heart of Barcelona. I will definitely stay there again.
Located in a area that allows walking to most destinations/sights in Barcelona.

Ana's apartment is the perfect place to stay at by yourself or with one other person in Barcelona. the host met us at the door and gave us a map and great recommendations. the unit was very clean and the perfect amenities for a few days in Barcelona. the bed was comfortable with enough pillows, blankets and sheets. the shower and bathroom is very clean with shampoo and wash. the air conditioning worked great. the hosts communication was great. the unit faces a quiet alley, not a busy street, which was great. would definitely come back.
Excellent home for our trip to Barcelona perfect location, very clean. Ana gave us some some great tips and recommended a delicious tapas bar!

leider können wir das Apartment nicht wieder buchen, auch wenn es wirklich schön war.
Die Matratzen zu weich und wir können bei der Helligkeit ohne verdunklung der Fenster leider nicht schlafen. 
Aber der Rest wer genau so wie auf den Bildern und sehr nette Gastgeber.
Muy bonito departamento, mejor de lo que esperaba, nos atendieron muy bien y muy amable. Cerca de todo.

A very clean and spacious apartment within walking distance of many great places to visit.  Close by to a major Plaça, and metro train stop.  Safe area.  Host is quick to help, and has many good suggestions to ease you into your stay.  All the amenities you need were provided, from cookware to an iron + board.  Definitely  worth the booking.

Pros: apartment was modern and very clean 

Cons: Not an exciting neighbourhood. Wasn’t close to restaurants, bars, shops (Las Ramblas). So you need to take a taxi or metro to get anywhere.

Great apartment in a great location. The apartment is a small one bedroom but the white walls,excellent lighting, and high ceilings give an open feeling. Everything is fully functional (including the wonderful ac and washer/dryer)and linens,towels,paper goods,toiletries,and soaps are in abundant supply. When I return to Barcelona I won't stay anyplace else. Highly recommended.
This is a very comfortable apartment, the lacation is real good and the room is cleanly.

Clean, neat, great location. All amenities needed and more are provided. Toiletries, towels, linens, plenty of everything. Much larger than a hotel room by far. And for less money. We noticed at first we "missed" the idea of having a doorman or concierge to ask questions. However, with he good Wifi, honestly, we did better than hotel advice. And once we left the apartment the first morning, we never thought of that again. Even local tour guides were not aware of things we learned online. I'd stay there again in a heartbeat.

Excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu em seu apartamento com um sorriso e simpatia sem igual! Nos indicou vários restaurantes próximos e o nosso queridinho “la flauta”. 
O apartamento e limpíssimo, silencioso, confortável e com tudo necessário para uma excelente estadia!
A localização é excelente! Perto de diversos restaurantes e dá pra fazer quase tudo a pé!
Recomento muitíssimo! Um dos melhores apartamentos que fiquei pelo Airbnb!

photos of this place are a accurate and Ana was a perfect host - even messaging during our stay to see if everything was OK.

Only thing we were a bit surprised about is the lack of sound deadening between the apartments. Be prepared to here EVERYTHING through the walls - TVs, babies crying, loud people coming back from a night out drinking and even the metro rumbling past underneath! These were not loud enough to stop us from getting sleep but if you are a light sleeper they may wake you up.
Great host and appartment

Lovely, well-designed place-- much roomier than the pictures show! Location is wonderful, very close to several wonderful restaurants and bars. It was easy to have some drinks and tapas and then go right to bed. Neighbors were quiet and there was no noise from outside at night so we got lots of rest. Everything was very clean, heat worked well, had no issues with (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great. Thank you for having us!

Stylish small apartment with everything you need. It’s in a great location, with plenty of restaurants close by.
Communication with Ana was excellent. Highly recommend.
Ana is one of the kindest, most attentive hosts I've ever had. Her place is basically perfect: quiet, well located, and stylish- ideal for a single or couple.

Lovely apartment and cozy.  Very Flexible and allow us to early check in. Anna is great communication. Sheila is very sweet and helpful. This apt is center of everything. Great neighborhood and lot of great restaurant. Tks again guys.

This is a lovely apartment in a very safe neighborhood full of restaurants and stores. It was very clean, plenty of linens and towels, a comfortable bed, a full kitchen, an elevator (easy to operate and efficient with my claustrophobia!), and so easy to walk everywhere in Barcelona! The host, Ana met us personally to check in and gave helpful tips and suggestions. We loved our stay here.

Very clean and cosy modern apartment, perfectly located within walking distance to most of the major attractions, and surrounded by local restaurants an bars. Also, the underground station called Passeig de Gracia is only a 5-minute walk from the apartment, with one of its exits being right in front of Gaudi's gorgeous Batllo House. If you stay at Ana's place, make sure you also check the Brunch & Cake cafe, which is only a 2-minute walk; you won't be disappointed. But I digress, the apartment provided a good level of utilities, was clean and quiet and Ana was very helpful and friendly, recommending us some very good local restaurants and providing us with great advice for our trip. Highly recommended.
Nice app. Fully equipped and an amazing host
Great place and the host gave plenty of helpful tips. Would highly recommend staying here when visiting Barcelona.
Fantastic location and our host was very helpful and quick to reply to our messages. Thank you!

El departamento está muy bien ubicado y muy cómodo. Es tal cual las fotos. Tuvimos un inconveniente con la cerradura de la puerta de entrada y lo solucionaron rápida y eficazmente. Totalmente recomendable.
Ana's place is very well located.  She has a book with great local tips.  I would stay thee again if in Barcelona.

1.위치 면에서 훌륭합니다.어디든 걸어다닐 수 있는 거리에요.카사바트요.카사밀라.모두 가깝구요. 가까운 지하철 역도2개나 있어서 전혀 불편함이 없었습니다.

2.호스트가 너무 너무 좋아요. 제가 메신저로  잘 모르는 내용이 있어서 서툰 영어로 물어볼때마다 매우 친절하고 상세하게 답변해줬습니다^^

3.세련된 인테리어 및 편의시설 좋았어요. 특히 저는 1월에 10살짜리 아이를 데리고 가서 추울까봐 걱정했는데 히터가 2개나 있고 침대 이불이 푹신푹신 제가 머문 여느 호텔보다 훨씬 따뜻하고 좋았습니다. 정말 매일밤 꿀잠 잤어요. 또 수건도 넉넉히 준비되어있어서 6박 하면서 불편함이 전혀 없었습니다. 무엇보다 좋았던것은 부엌이 잘 정비되어있어서 토스트기.전자렌지 겸 오븐,간단한 양념이 있어서 요리하기도 편했어요. 참 아쉬웠던점은 포트가 좀 낡아서 교체가 필요한것같았습니다.
엘레베이터도 현대식이고 현관문부터 보안이 잘 되어있어서 마음 편했습니다

모든면에서 봤을 때 완벽했습니다.저는 다음에 바르셀로나에 또 온다면 다시 머물고싶어요^^행복한 숙소였습니다.

가족 단위 여행 추천합니다. 
thanks ana!
Location was good and walking distance to many good restaurants and tourist landmarks.

Great location. It is right next to many bus routes, restaurants, and tourist sites. Excellent value for the place, and Ana provided an extensive list of recommendations for both food and sightseeing.

Very accessible location in Eixample. Ana was waiting for us on arrival from the airport and provided a nice tour of the space with local tips. The apartment was clean and very convenient to all the sights in beautiful Barcelona. I highly recommend.

I loved this place!   This was my fourth visit to Barcelona and by far my favorite in large part because of my stay at Ana's apartment.  The unit itself is super clean and very well designed.  Perfect for a solo traveler or couple.  Ana herself was a lovely hostess, showing how everything (in what's a very well appointed apartment) works and then providing some guidance on some great places to check out in the neighborhood.  The neighborhood itself was my favorite part.  Truly a beautiful part of town.  And it was really nice to be a little bit of short walk from the tourist sites.  It really felt like a true local experience.  I would stay here again in a heart beat!

name: Home Sweet Home ❤️of Downtown BreakfastBuffet&Spa
summary: Convenience at its peak. Spa, restaurant, bar, BBQ, swimming pool and more available without stepping a foot outside. Breakfast buffet at the 1st floor for under 15$. This apartment at a corner of St Catherine st and metro Guy-Concordia for those who like to go out and have fun, and also near Bell Center. Great location for visiting Montreal on foot. If you have any special requests or any questions do not hesitate to contact me it will be a pleasure to be of service.
space: Dishwasher, all the necessary for those who want to cook and the essential coffee maker with coffee and sugar available.
