host.host_about:
Les voyages 4 fois par an
La famille
Les amis
La vie est une très belle chose :)

reviews.comments: Carole's place central location is something that you can't miss it for. Its really clean, spacy, close to downtown, st catherine street & 5 min drive to old port. She herself is really helpful & accomodating. Would highly recommend staying at her place.
Parfait pour passer quelques jours à Montreal
Carole's apartment is a really good place with good location. Quite clean and beautiful place. My mom and I have a really good time here. Carole 的房子非常温馨舒适,安静,地理位置也很好,交通非常方便｡我妈妈也很喜欢｡我们在这里度过了一个非常不错的时光｡
The apartment is beautiful and the location is great! Carole was very nice and she responded very quickly to my questions.
Carole's place was great! I will recommend it to anyone!
The host canceled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place ,very clean

I selected this apartment for location and value, and I was quite pleased. From this location we didn't even use the car. We just rode our bicycles everywhere. The bike trail is not far, and it took us to Old Montreal and beyond. The second bed in the apartment is a pull-out couch, which was comfortable enough for our short stay. We were there during a heat wave, and we noticed with the bedroom door closed the bedroom was stuffy, but that was solved the next night by leaving the door open. I opted to park curbside and received a parking fine, not realizing it was illegal there. Next time I would pay to park in the garage. Overall, we were quite happy with the apartment, and Carole was very responsive and helpful.
Appartement très propre et idéalement situé. Nous avons tous fait à pied mais vous avez la possibilité de prendre le métro à 5 Minutes à pied
Spacious and comfortable apartment well located. We had a good time :)

The apartment was in a location that was easily accessible from an airport shuttle stop.  It was also close to many restaurants and coffee shops. 
The apartment itself has just the basic amenities.  It appears no one lives there when it's not inhabited by short term (Airbnb) renters, and that means that there were some things missing that someone living in a place might have been able to offer (i.e., a hairdryer).  Getting into the apartment was a breeze with the no-key entry.  Carole was nice although I didn't meet her in person.  She was  available via text- for the most part.  We had a nice, one night stay in Montreal at Carole's place. :)
Fantastic room that was located in a great area. Close to public transportation and to downtown Montreal. Very clean and spacious. Would recommend :)
Carole's place was great - so close to downtown and old Montreal with tons of shops and restaurants. Her place is well equipped and very comfortable.

Carole's place is clean, simple, and tucked quietly away from the main hustle and bustle of Montreal--exactly what we were looking for in our short stay.  Carole is easy and efficient to communicate with.  We appreciated her quick responses to adapt to our changing circumstances prior to arrival.

Carole was easy to reach and very accommodating and let us check in early! The space was well cleaned and accurate to the posting. The only down side being that the laundry service costs $4 to use and the wifi was spotty. Overall a good stay and would recommend to my friends.

Un grand merci à Carole pour son accueil et sa disponibilité l'appartement est très agréable, propre et calme, parfaitement situé près du centre et des transports en commun pour profiter de Montréal ça donne envie d'y revenir.
Easy to communicate with. Was very flexible upon check in. Great location. Highly recommended
Carole's place was really conveniently located in the downtown area, close to bus and metro stops. We enjoyed using the pool a few times. Check in and out were very straightforward. Thanks Carole.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The location of this place is perfect!!! One block from Rue Saint Catherine where you can find all sorts of place to eat. Quick walk to downtown. One block from the subway. Quiet street. Full kitchen to cook meals. Brand new dishwasher. Carole was awesome communicating with us.
Great place. Walkable! Quick communication with host!

Carole's place had everything we needed! It was very spacious, clean, and comfortable. The location was amazing, as it was a very short walk to both Saint Catherine St. and downtown while also being tucked away from busy traffic. It's the perfect place to make you feel safe and at home!
O apartamento foi perfeito. Possuia tudo o que necessitamos. Muito limpo e cheiroso.  Perto dos meios de transporte e da estação central. Recomendo sua locação.

Great location, clean, comfortable, and well-equipped. A lovely place with almost everything you need, including a little balcony if you like getting some fresh air. The WiFi signal was kinda weak in the bedroom and there was no TV in the living room, but overall, it was a very pleasant stay. 10/10 would recommend.
Great host, quick reply and very helpful. Great location if going to Bell Center!! Would book again!
O apartamento de Carole é muito confortável e bem equipado, além de bem localizado. Nós o encontramos muito limpo. Um dos melhores lugares em que me hospedei pelo Airbnb.

Great location 

Close to food, pharmacy and metro.

Avoid walking around at night solo if ur a girl there was some issues with the locals catcalling us. 

Other than that we would defiantly
Stay again

Sarah's place is a nice little apartment in a really great location downtown. It is really close to the Metro station which was very handy. It was really hot when we travelled which the air conditioner wasn't able to compete with therefore the apartment was quite hot. The WiFi also doesn't work very well. Other than that we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it.

Parking on site for a fee but necessary in such a busy city. It is below the high rise apartment building and a little confusing at first. You have to walk out the drive in ramp when you arrive since you won't have the code card yet to scan. After that it's easy in and out. Little extras in the apartment make you (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable and clean. Our first Airbnb and a good experience.  We walked everywhere but the public transportation would get you there too.

Sarah's place is amazing! Super close to everything we needed and we were able to find parking close by. The communication with Sarah was super easy and once we arrive to the apartment it surprised me how clean and nice it was. She provided us with everything we need (or may need) for our stay. I totally recommend it and I would love to stay there next time I go back to Montreal.
Sarah est super  disponible. Appartement propre et spacieux.

El apartamento de Sarah es mas amplio de lo que se ve en las fotos. Fácil acceso al metro, se puede llegar caminando a 3 diferentes estaciones. Muy limpio y ordenado. Un supermercado y varios restaurantes cerca. Sarah es una excelente anfitriona, de fácil comunicación y pendiente de cualquier cuestión. Un plus es que hay artículos de aseo en el baño y botellas de agua disponibles, ademas de suficientes toallas para la estancia.

Sarah's place was excellent. She communicated with me to ensure our stay was pleasant and we had everything we needed. 

Very clean, walkable to down town Montreal, and a stones throw from lots of restaurants and city life. Highly recommended to anyone looking for reasonably priced accommodation in Montreal.
Clean, large space. Walking to little burgundy area is far, and requires navigating under a highway.
Shoutout Sarah!
Very comfortable room!There are lots of great restaurant nearby and you can walk to the city centre. I recommend this house to everyone, especially for the person with family~

Sarah’s location is ideal, very central to everything including the train station. We had a very pleasant and excellent stay, thanks to the cleanliness of the apartment and the super easy check-in / check-out process. Five stars!

Sarahs place was perfect for our quick trip to Montreal. Location was amazing, parking in the building was a huge plus, the apartment was super clean and we felt right at home. Would defintely love to stay here again :)

Sarah's place worked great for our stay in Montreal! Location was awesome & we were able to walk nearly everywhere we wanted to go. We had a couple issues come up and Sarah was right on the ball to getting it resolved.
Everything was great, Sarah was a very responsive host. The apartment is very clean and modern we would definitely return again
our stay in Montréal was amazing! we were near of everything and the appartment is huge !
Très bel emplacement près du centre ville de Montréal. Propre et spacieux, nous avons bien aimé notre séjour!

My sister and I stayed at Sarah’s place during an incredibly cold 3 days in Montreal. It’s a beautiful one bedroom apartment with a pullout couch that is located very close to downtown and the subway. Definitely would stay here again as it is a great spot and was at a great price.

Sarah was an excellent host with great hospitality. Her place was spacious and comfortable and made my stay in Montreal that much more enjoyable. She was also a very good host and was very helpful. Would recommend her place to anyone staying in the downtown Montreal area. Thanks again Sarah!
The stay here was absolutely lovely. So close to all amenities - shops, restaurants, hockey arena, but very quiet with it. The place is spacious & very comfortable. Would definitely recommend
Better than the post. Great location. Host is very responsive and helpful. Definitely recommend
Great clean apartment. Hart of Montréal for sure. 5 min away from Sainte-Catherine. Cheap and secure underground garage. I would definitely stay there again

Had an excellent stay in Sarah’s apartment. 

The location was central, the apartment had everything we need and Sarah responded to any questions I had very speedy.

Would highly recommend staying here d in Montreal.

Thanks for having us, Sarah :)
Convenient location of the flat, great response time, very attentive to details.

I recommend this place without second thoughts. Everything I needed was available. It is a very cozy place, clean and it felt like my own. The location is perfect as I used to live in Montreal for 13 years and went to Concordia university. It is close to all kind of fun entertaining places, close to metro, and it is a safe area.

This apartment was everything we needed. It was a short walk to  all the downtown stores, restaurants,  and bars.  It was great to have a full kitchen and a balcony to catch some sun and fresh air. We felt very safe with our car in the parking garage and the secure entance. We would stay here again on our next trip to Montreal!

Great place to stay in Montreal. Very convient location, close to Ste-Catherine street. Easy check-in and quick response from Sarah. Clean, nice and comfortable apartment. Would definitely recommend and stay there again!

Très bon séjour chez Sarah.
RAS

Sarah’s place was great. She kept in touch before and during our stay and checking in was super easy. The apartment was really clean and had everything you could need. Plenty of space and a very good shower!

It was in a great location close to Lucien L’Allier and Guy Concordia Métro stations and just around the corner from the 747 airport bus stop. Despite being next to a busy highway and a fairly busy railway line, there were no issues with noise at all (thanks to the good windows). Only 5mins walk to St Catherine Street and max 20min walk to downtown. 

If I’m back in Montréal I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
Très bon séjour chez Sarah qui est d'une grande disponibilité pour répondre aux questions. L'appartement est propre, bien équipé et d'une bonne situation pour découvrir Montréal. Je recommande
Amazing stay. Will definitely go back

Awesome location! Walking distance to St Catherine’s and crescent street. Quiet apartment, great bed and I can’t say enough about the location and value. We will definitely look to book again for our next visit to Montreal.
Sarah’s place was clean, comfortable and a perfect space for two! We were so happy here and highly recommend her.
Superou minhas expectativas.
Très propre et bien aménager !
Great location and value! Truly enjoyed ourselves. Would be great to have a couple of outdoor chairs to enjoy coffee or wine on that balcony. Thank you!
Merci
Great place! Comfortable and close to everything I wanted to do and see. Would recommend to others. Communication was great as well. Would stay here again in the future. Hope I can return soon!

Stayed at Sarah's on a brief 2 day trip to see a concert at the Bell Center.  Fantastic location,  just a 10 minute walk away.  Also walking distance to great restaurants and pubs.  The space was clean, bright and airy.  Everything worked including the AC.  Beds are comfortable and linens clean and fresh.  Great shower.  Lots of space including a balcony.  Quiet building too.  Would recommend this place and this host in a heartbeat.   Hopefully I will get to stay here again.  Thanks Sarah.

I rented this place for my son to take his 13 year old daughter for her birthday to Montreal.  He sent me a text to say the place was excellent - the location couldn't be better, the availability of parking within the building helped a great deal and was not expensive - the food in the breakfast buffet worked well and he just found it overall excellent - and very clean.  Thanks to the hosts.

Sarah was a saviour. We had our original booking get cancelled very close to our trip date. Sarah was very responsive and helpful with coming to our rescue. We then experienced another uproar with airbnb themselves, and Sarah had our back the entire time. I am very thankful for what she did and provided us with during our stay. We walked to Old Montreal, all through St Catherine. And everything was close if you didn't mind the walk. Being 10mins from the Bell Centre, which was our main reason for our trip, was amazing. We felt very safe during our stay, and would highly recommend this space. And will most definitely check for availability my next trip
nice  modern place but cleaning and customer service needs to improve
Sarah is a great host! Responds quickly, extremely helpful. I travelled with my child and we had a great stay
Sehr coole Location an toller Lage. Unkompliziert und autonom. Aber sehr laute Umgebung.
Great place to stay and explore Montreal!
Très bon rapport qualité-prix, bonne literie, appartement propre et tout équipé !

Sarah's place was really nice and it's located at a convenient location, making access to downtown Montreal very easy. The place was also very clean, I would recommend this place to any travellers staying in Montreal.

Sarah’s house is in a perfect location; the bus from the airport drops you 3 minutes walking from the house, you have 2 different subway stations to choose from within 7 minutes walking from the house and it’s a nice, short walk to get downtown!
Although we never met Sarah, she answered right away to all of our questions, both house-related and not, such as where we could find supermarkets late t night!
The flat is very spacious and provided with everything you might need both for short-term and long-term stays: plenty of towels, soap, shampoos and conditioners, pans and pots, coffee maker, hair dryer...
We absolutely loved the house and it helped us enjoy our 5-day stay once Montreal even more!
Appartement assez agréable à vivre avec tout le nécessaire pour être bien dès son arrivée.
Very clean and cozy place to stay! I would definitely stay here again someday.

Magnifico apartamento en una zona muy céntrica. Amplio y cómodo. No vimos a Sarah porque nos dio un código para entrar al apartamento, pero está continuamente atenta a la llegada y a cualquier duda que tengas. Responde enseguida. Mejor de lo esperado.

Nice, clean and cozy, very good located, very close to the commercial area of Quebec 
Excellen and fast communication with Sarah, always very attentive to our needs
Of course I would go back here and highly recommended

Super séjour chez Sarah ! L'appartement est facile d'accès depuis l'aéroport et à une quinzaine de minutes à pieds du centre-ville. Dans l'appartement tout était propre et parfait, la climatisation était allumée et des bouteilles d'eau nous attendaient dans le frigo à notre arrivée, ce qui nous a permis de rapidement nous rafraîchir. 
Encore Merci
Great stay super helpful host and parking was super useful! Appartement bigger then expected!!!

emplacement idéal à quelques centaines de mètres du métro
facilité d accès avec le pass et les codes .
logement agréable avec toutes les commodités 
très bon séjour
The host was very accommodating and made us feel just like we were at home. The apartment had a nice balcony and everything was very clean. Would stay here again if I ever come back to Montreal.

nous avons passé un agréable sejour chez Sarah! il est bien équipé, bien situé  et bien desservi par les transports. Sarah est attentionnée envers ses hôtes (clim et bouteilles fraîches a  notre arrivée). nous recommandons totalement, merci Sarah!

Sarah’s apartment is great, located in a very safe spot of town. The rooms are all very clean and fully stocked w everything we needed!  Sarah was great at responding quickly and was very accommodating with all requests
Great location, great apartment and would recommend it anytime.
Great place, location and host. Sarah made our stay in Montreal as pleasent as it could be, thanks!

Tout est tel que décrit dans l'annonce.
Bon accueil et souplesse pour une arrivée précoce
Rue Sainte-Catherine et Métro Concordia/Guy à 5 minutes à pieds
Petite précision concernant le petit déjeuner : il se fait dans le restaurant de l'hôtel. Il n'est pas nécessaire de réserver, il suffit de se présenter à l’accueil.
Tres  bon accueil. Je recommmande
Clean, spacious home, very comfortable bed, balcony and well stocked with kitchen and bathroom needs!

Sarah’s apartment was in a great location. Kitchen and bathroom was fully equipped not to mention clean. Sarah was very responsive and responded to any questions I had within minutes. Definitely recommend and would stay again
Very clean and good apartment
Très agréable séjour chez Sarah, appartement situé proche du centre, petites attentions appréciables à notre arrivée, très propre et bien équipé. Je recommande !

Sarah’s place was in a  fabulous location, close to transport and shops and safe with the security on the front doors of the building. 
All instructions for finding it and the access was clear and easy. Very comfortable bed, and a great size space. The extra touch’s such as bottled water was fabulous. Having the wifi was also great as an international traveller.

Sarah's place is lovely. Check in was a breeze. The location is right down town. I walked everywhere, and it's near bus stops and conference centers. Comfy bed, safe  neighborhood.  Her place was perfect!

It is a nice apartment.
Clean and comfortable.
Very close to shopping street and restaurants.

We stayed at Sarah’s place for 3 days during our visit to Montreal. Sarah was very easy to communicate with and responded promptly. The Airbnb was very clean (and smelled amazing!) cozy, spacious and centrally located to all sightseeing spots/attractions. Everything was provided such as soap, linens, pots, pans, silverware etc. I would definitely recommend to anyone and stay here again!!

Atout : appartement spacieux bien équipé,assez bien situé, bien chauffé l’hiver, calme.
Inconvénient : proximité voie ferrée bruyante le matin , canapé convertible ne pouvant servir que d’appoint ( enfant)
Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Nous retournerons lors de notre prochaine visite. Merci Sarah!
Amazing location, amazing host, let us in to get a lost item after we checked out
Awesome. Great location and easy to communicate

This is the second trip to Sarah's place and it was just as great as the last time I was there. Sarah is always a great host and was clear with her communication. This place is cozy and you will feel right at home. Thank you again Sarah and I of course will be back for the summer! Merci!
logement bien situé
Everything she has describe is accurate. It was a great stay with everything so close to explore downtown Montreal!
Sarah's place is conveniently located with everything reachable within a 10 min walk. The place was quaint and had amenities available for us to use. Would recommend.

The apartment was well located and near to a metro as well as shops and restaurants. It has everything you may need  and there are nice  extras  such as  shampoo and tooth paste  and paper towels. Sarah is  brilliant with responding quickly. I certainly recommend Sarah's place and would stay there again in future.

name: Ao Coliseu 3C ( central 2 bedroom apartment )
summary: Practical and conveniently located 2 bedrooms flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 6 people comfortably. 5 minutes walking distance to Bolhão metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.
space: “O meu espaço é singelo mas acolhedor, com preocupações ecológicas reflectidas em iluminação LED em todo o prédio, aquecimento de águas sanitárias da Junkers assistido por energia solar e um Elevador OTIS, também alimentado a energia solar, com sistema de auto resgate em caso de falha eléctrica que assegura cerca de 100 utilizações.  Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa da localização, as pessoas, a zona exterior, o ambiente, e as vistas. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças).”

neighborhood_overview: Tal como o nome do empreendimento indica, o meu espaço fica na rua onde se situa o Coliseu, a 50 m deste e paredes meias com o famoso Café Santiago, um dos mais afamados com as suas afamadas Francesinhas à moda do Porto, sendo o Restaurante Escondidinho também a cerca de 50m e uma Cervejaria, a Brasão, mesmo do outro lado da rua, paredes meias com o Supermercado, havendo mesmo um salão de cabeleireiro unissexo por cima do supermercado. Um pouco mais adiante, e a cerca de 100m, situa-se o Café Majestic e a FNAC do outro lado da rua, ambos os estabelecimentos no cruzamento da Rua de Passos Manuel com a Rua de Santa Catarina, a mais movimentada de Portugal.    Num raio de 50m encontramos 3 garagens para parqueamento Automóvel, uma mesmo ao lado do Supermercado Pingo Doce, com entrada pela Rua da Alegria, outra na Praça dos Poveiros e outra ainda em frente ao Coliseu.    A cerca de 300m, encontramos ainda o Mercado do Bolhão e, a 500m a Avenida dos Aliados, tudo muito próximo da Torre dos
transit: Estação de metro : Bolhão a 250m; Estação de comboio :São bento a 300m, parques de estacionamento a 50m
house_rules: - Silêncio após as 22h É necessário efectuar,  no check in, o pagamento da taxa municipal turística que corresponde a 2€/noite por hóspede ( >13anos),  num máximo de 7  noites, ou seja, 14€ por hóspede. You will need to pay, in cash, during the check in process, the municipal tourist tax of 2€ by guest (older than 13 years) with maximum of 7 nights ( 14€ by guest ) Hay que pagar, en efectivo, en el check in, la tasa turísitica municipal que es de 2€ por persona ( edad superior a 13 años ) por cada noche con un máximo de 7 noches (14€ por persona ) La taxe de séjour, 2€ par nuitée et personne, est due par toute personne âgée de 13 ans qui séjourne dans un hébergement touristique à Porto, à payer par nuit, pour un maximum de sept nuits consécutives, 14€, par personne.

reviews.comments: Vous ne serez pas déçus, moderne, propre, bien situé, sécurisé, en face d'un petit super marché bien pratique !

Muy limpio y muy buena ubicación. Se puede ir caminando a todas partes pero en verano es demasiado caliente y no tiene sino 1 ventilador que no sopla nada, y si se abren las ventanas no se puede dormir del ruido! /// Very nice and clean, walkable everywhere but in summer is so hot, it doesnt have enough fans and if you open the windows is imposible to sleep due to the street sounds
El apartamento está ubicado en el centro de Oporto, está fenomenal, es como aparece en las fotos; muy limpio y cómodo.

Muy buen situado y cómodo. Camas muy cómodas y cocina equipada.
Hemos pasado 5 días muy agradables.
Totalmente recomendable

Super appartement, hyper bien situé. Nous étions 5 et il est très spacieux. Très propre, serviettes de toilettes à disposition.
Je reviendrai et je recommande !
Su ubicación era Excelente, cerca de las principales calles y a 5 minutos del Ayuntamiento. Si viajáis a Oporto es un apartamento bonito y amplio! 100% recomendado.
Espaço agradável, com uma decoração simples e (Website hidden by Airbnb) boas condições e limpo.Boa localização. Aconselho vivamente.
Owner very nice kind and helpful .Apartment clean well preapared ,more than we have expected.
Apartamento lindo e impecável. Localização ótima. Recomendo altamente.
The location is very convenient!  The house is clean and well-equipped. Lisa and Tiago gave us some very usesful  advice and recommendation! Thank you!
Cute and nice place, central heart of the city, host was helpful, definitely will choose again if i go visit porto again.

The perfect apartment to stay in Porto!!!!!
Host Tiago was so nice with us.He explained everything we needed  it.

Apartment is wonderful and modern.!!!!
Centrally located.
We recommend it 100%
Ana & Family
Acomodações e localização excelentes!

Appartement très lumineux, bien équipé et idéalement situé, dans le centre, supermarché en face, meilleure Franceschina en bas de l'immeuble (restaurant Santiago), très pratique d'accès avec code, personne très agréable à notre arrivée.

Very nice appartment

The fifth person slept in the living room without stores on windows
Voir commentaires précédents.

appartement spacieux, propre, très bien situé, au calme malgré tout.
rien à redire

Le logement est très bien et très bien situé. C est dommage que c est un organisme et non un propriétaire car pour récupérer les clés cela a été un peu compliqué. C est dommage que l ascenseur ne fonctionnait pas ce jour là quand on prend un logement exprès avec ascenseur pour une personne ayant du mal à marcher. Mais je comprends qu ils n y soient pour rien.
Superbe appartement, idéalement placé pour visiter la ville à pied! Accueil irréprochable!

위치도 매우 좋았고 아주 깨끗하고 마음에 드는 숙소였어요. :)

단지 좀 오래 머무르는동안 세탁기가 없어서 아쉬운 점 외에는 아주 좋았습니다. 세탁기는 제가 미리 체크하지 못해서 아쉬웠어요.
Escelente localização, muito espaço, apartamento novo e com todas as comodidades. A recomendar.  Melhor era impossível!
The apartment was in a great location and check in was easy.  Tania was also kind enough to allow us to leave our luggage prior to check in.  I would recommend this apartment in Porto.
O apartamento está muito bem localizado. Em frente tem.um supermercado e vários restaurantes ao lado. Consegue-se fazer tudo a pé.
Très bon séjour. Appartment tres fonctionnel et très bien situé. Il faut dormir la fenêtre fermé, comme dans beaucoup d appartements à Porto je pense.

Very good place, stylish, large at the center of the city
no key needed, you enter with a password

Posizione strategica per visitare Porto in tutte le sue direzioni.
Trilocale moderno e spettacolare
Très bel appartement idéalement situé, personnel très agréable. Je conseille cette location

Estancia muy agradable. Al llegar nos indicaron los sitios más turísticos y sitios para comer y nos obsequiaron con una botella de vino. Ubicación muy buena del apartamento, cerca de todas las atracciones turísticas. La única “pega” es que en verano y con las ventanas abiertas se escuchaba ruido de la calle al haber algun que otro bar justo debajo.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
Ok

O apartamento é bem grande, moderno e confortável. O prédio possui elevador e fica bem localizado na cidade. O único ponto negativo foi a falta de ventiladores: o apartamento tinha apenas um. No entanto, era só abrir as janelas que ficava fresco.  Eu e minha família recomendamos este local.

Staying at this apartment was great. It is in a great location, walking distance to a variety of areas in Porto both the center, historical neighborhood and a variety of bars and restaurants. It was neat and tidy upon arrival and just as you see in the pictures.

Appartement très bien situé et propre. Très bien équipé.
Un peu bruyant avec les fenêtres ouvertes la nuit.
Muy bien alojamiento
Apartamento nuevo, impecable y situado muy céntrico.
El lugar es muy limpio y lindo.

Very nice apartment, really comfortable with everything needed for a pleasant stay and well located to visit Porto in a few days.  Diogo received us and was very kind and gave us his number in case we needed something. Would recommend it to everyone!
Very confortable flat near the center. I recommand this place.

Very nice and friendly girl, who received us. She also gave us some very nice tipps what to see in the city. The accomodation was perfect. We did not miss anything ;)
Thanks again for your tipps, it really helped us :)

Boa tarde!!
Foi excelente o período de estadia. Perfeita acomodação, recepção, limpeza e localização. Recomendo a todos!!!
Reomendado

Apartment really central, modern, large and clean. Host really kind.
Strongly recommended.

Très bel appartement ; excellent emplacement ; idéal pour un week-end ; vous pouvez tout visiter à pieds. Communication rapide ! Merci à Tania et Vladimir pour ses conseils 
Je recommande fortement cet appartement
Ótima localização! Adorei o apartamento!

Je recommande cet appartement!! Un emplacement plus que parfait, cafés et épicerie en face! A 5 minutes à pied de la place centrale et 10 minutes à pied de la station de train !! 

Ils ont un endroit où aller porter nos sac le matin de notre arrivée ou au départ et facile de s’entendre pour une heure de check in ! Tout a été facile avec eux !! 

Seul bémol, peu d’installations dans la cuisine. Pas de cafetière, sel ou poivre, sucre, huile ou quoi que ce soit. Une seule coupe de vin et un seul bol! Nous avons tout de même pu cuisiner tous nos repas à la maisons, car si près de tout !!!

o apartamento fica extremamente bem localizado e com acesso rápido a supermercados (Pingo Doce fica mesmo à frente, do outro lado da rua), restaurantes e fica a poucos minutos a pé da torre dos clérigos e da livraria lello. 
É muito limpo e muito confortável, e forneceu tudo o que era necessário para a nossa estadia. 
 Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo rapaz que nos fez o check in. 
Gostei muito e recomendo vivamente.
Gerne wieder!
Buen apartamento y localización perfecta!
This is a great, comfortable place, everything you need is nearby

Excelente localização. Perto de muitos restaurantes gostosos e dos principais pontos turísticos. Tem um supermercado bem na frente do prédio e outro na rua de trás. Eu e minha família adoramos e recomendamos.
Appartement très propre, très bien placé dans la ville, système sans clé très pratique!
Apartamento em ótima localização. Dá para fazer tudo a pé. Supermercado Pingo Doce em frente.
Localización perfecta. Muy agradable

Extremely conveniently located, right opposite a good sized supermarket in city centre and close to the riverside. The flat is managed through an agency: communication was not personal and sometimes delayed, but it was sufficiently efficient for check-in and check out to be smooth. Nice flat and nice location!

The house is very clean. The location is great. It’s very convenient to go everywhere. There is a big supermarket in front of the house. And there also may restaurants nearby.
Anyway it’s a very nice experience. Recommend it!

The apartment itself is very good. Bright and spacious. The men who opened the door for us is very kind and give us many information. However, the customer support from the agent is poor (slow response). They didn’t reply me on Airbnb so I have to contact them via (Hidden by Airbnb) and their official website. Hair dryer is provided but is not functioning. Eventually we dried our hair with heater. Agreed to replace it but we did not receive anything at the end.

Séjour extraordinaire à Porto tout etait parfait l'accueil, l'appart, la propreté, la convivialité des gens on a eu un super acceuil avec pleins d'explications et de recommandation, l'emplacement on a pu tout faire à pied très facilement. La petite supérette juste en face très pratique pour faire quelques courses..... En bref je dirais juste parfait. Je recommande totalement pour un séjour très agréable. J'espère revenir très vite.
Ótimo acolhimento... gentileza e precisão... excelente acomodação... limpeza primorosa! Recomendo...

Parfaitement placé
Propre
Bon accueil

Alojamiento muy recomendable, todo muy limpio y nuevo, con todo lo necesario, y una ubicación ideal cerca del centro y con el añadido que teníamos un supermercado enfrente y un aparcamiento en la esquina.

Espaço muito agradável e limpo, atendendo totalmente as nossas expectativas.
Localização perfeita. Excelente (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendarei seu espaço para amigos que forem visitar Porto.
Espaço super limpo, um apartamento bem situado mesmo no centro do Porto perto de supermercados, restaurantes e cafes.
Excelente localização. Apartamento muito espaçoso, com camas confortáveis. Muito agradável. Só a limpeza da cozinha e da louça deixou a desejar.

Tania welcomed us and gave us some great tips. She was especially accommodating and helpful, responsive and attentive to our requests. 
My family and I loved our stay in this 
charming and comfortable apartment. Incredibly convenient to all areas in Porto and accessible to transportation; within walking distance to the Douro River and major historical sights. There is a bakery in front of the building; great restaurants and cafes nearby. 
The pictures of the apartment on the website don’t do justice to the actual place, which is much nicer, lovely with lots of sunlight during the day, and nicely decorated. It was exceptionally clean and the kitchen, completely equipped. The host kindly offered us a bottle of wine upon our arrival. 
We had a very enjoyable stay, highly recommended!
great location, place was clean and basic but had everything you could need. two large comfy beds.
Recomendo o local. A localização é muito boa, ambiente agradável, limpo.

Localização privilegiada. Lugar é ótimo para quem quer fazer Porto a pé. Apartamento muito aconchegante (ideal para 4 pessoas), e tem o necessário para uma estadia tranquila. Tivemos um problema com a válvula da descarga, apesar de sermos  prontamente atendidos, o problema voltou a acontecer no dia seguinte. Os aquecedores foram suficientes para nos aquecer no frio de janeiro. Indico o apto!!!
Alojamiento perfecto situado en el centro de Oporto. Se llega a todos los sitios a pie. Muy limpio, moderno y el sofá cama super cómodo. Muy buena atención, la comunicación y hospitalidad muy buena.
집이 깨끗하고 괜찮아요. 상벤투역에서 완만한 오르막을 좀 올라와야 합니다. 숙소 바로 앞에 크고 좋은 슈퍼마켓이 있어 편해요. 포르투갈은 호스트가 업체에 맡겨 관리하는 집이 많은거 같아요. 리스본에서 지낸 숙소도 그랬는데 여기도 그렇습니다. 용건있을 때 주인에게 메세지보내는 거보다 업체 메일이나 체크인해주신 분 핸폰으로 연락하는 것이 빠릅니다.
Excelente localização, limpo e muito bem cuidado! Adoramos
clean space,  well located, supermarket across the street. we had a lovely stay.

name: Clean and cosy bedroom
summary: Clean, cosy 2 bedrooms and 1 living room comfortable flat in Uskudar. Very close to Kadikoy. Near by pier and dolmuş. About 30 min to Taksim, 15 min to Kadıköy.
description: Clean, cosy 2 bedrooms and 1 living room comfortable flat in Uskudar. Very close to Kadikoy. Near by pier and dolmuş. About 30 min to Taksim, 15 min to Kadıköy.

host.host_about: I'm a mechanical engineer. I lived abroad about five years. My special interest in music and theater. I like to play instrument and sing. Philosophy and sufism are my fields of interest.

name: Cozy, separated living room in Prospect Park, NYC
summary: Separated living room with sofa bed (fits 2 guests). Located 20 minutes away from Manhattan (4 stops on Subway) in Prospect Park area. Me and my wife are living in other room. Since it's a separated living room, sound travels easily and we appreciate if our guests  don't make any noise between 11pm and 7am. we guarantee to do the same! Also we are very neat and respectful.
space: Quiet, peaceful, friendly living space. Me and my wife Tatyana are Vipassana practitioners, so if you are practising Vipassana too, we can sit 1 hour sittings together!
description: Separated living room with sofa bed (fits 2 guests). Located 20 minutes away from Manhattan (4 stops on Subway) in Prospect Park area. Me and my wife are living in other room. Since it's a separated living room, sound travels easily and we appreciate if our guests  don't make any noise between 11pm and 7am. we guarantee to do the same! Also we are very neat and respectful. Quiet, peaceful, friendly living space. Me and my wife Tatyana are Vipassana practitioners, so if you are practising Vipassana too, we can sit 1 hour sittings together! Kitchen, Bathroom are fully accessible!!! If You Have Any Questions, We Will Be Happy To Answer Over The Phone Or Email. Great multicultural historical neighborhood, close to Manhattan (20 min away) and close to the Beach (20 min on express subway) B,Q trains. Church avenue station. No loud sounds after 11pm. No parties. No visitors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: We chose this location because it is very close to prospect park and a short distance to the train. The room was clean, spacious, comfy and well appointed. Having an AC in the room was great since it was 92 degrees when we were there. Our hosts were very welcoming and we enjoyed our stay very much.
Dmitriy's place is as he describe.  It is very quiet and good for a good night's sleep.  Keep in mind that it is a sofa bed, so not the most comfortable, but I had no trouble sleeping.

It was very nice and clean.
Dmitriy was also very friendly!
Dmitriy was very helpfull and we Find everything as it was described. Really good localosation

Dimitry and Tatiana were excellent hosts! They gave clear directions and were very helpful. The place itself is pretty much what you see in the photos. They keep their place nice and tidy. 

Their home is near the subway station and a bus stop is right around the corner. Getting to the city takes about 30-40mins. There are also two grocery shops within walking distance so that's a bonus. Prospect Park is about ten mins away on foot. 

I would suggest bringing a back pack instead as the building doesn't have an elevator.

Tatiana and Dimitry are both lovely and very helpful!! The room is exactly as depicted. It hs AC wich was nice. Water in shower runs a little low but it is an old building. Very close to subway and some cafes (with good coffee), restaurants and grocery stores.
All was very good!!!thank you!!!
nice person
Exactly as advertised, comfy stay and very nice, helpful hosts.
Everything was fine. Dmitriy and his wife are amazing. :)
I had a great stay with Dmitriy and Tatiana.
Exactly as described, good value for NYC
Tal como lo describe la publicación, cerca de estación de metro donde te puedes movilizar fácil al centro de Manhatan. Barrio tranquilo, y todas las indicaciones claras. Volvería a ir sin duda.
Nice host.
Nice place, there is near the subway. Thank you.
Good location (near subway) and hostess very kind!
Das Zimmer ist für den Preis mehr als in Ordnung. Dmitry und Tatsiana sind sehr freundliche und zuvorkommende Gastgeber.

Absolutely lovely people to live with. Place is clean and well maintained, location is quite far from the city center but easy for relocation because of numerous Underground stations and busses. Recommend this place

This is a great value and great place to stay overall. The apartment is conveniently located near a subway station with good service to the rest of Brooklyn and Manhattan. The apartment is kept really clean and the room is spacious and well-equipped. Good internet-access too!
絶妙な距離感が日本人にうってつけです｡
Comfortable room for short stay, close to metro, 40 min from Manhattan. The apartment is on the 4th floor, so it isn't too easy to go with heavy bags.
Great host and convenient location with only a 5 min walk to the B/Q train. The home was also really clean and comfortable. Thanks!

The location is fine, close to Prospect Park and to the shops and subway in Church av. The room in itself is simple but clean and big enough. I never saw Dmitri, I can't say I got a lot of informations from Tatsiana( I have been told I could use the micro-wave oven on the last day). If you expect to cook or even have breakfast, you must bring your own : sugar, tea, coffee, salt, pepper, oil, toaster, electric kettle. And the windows are permanently open, so I caught a big cold in the bathroom and I have wandered around NY with an obstructed nose and a sore throat. I recommend this place anyway but have your meals outside.
Сияющая, кристальная чистота, хозяева гостеприимны и отзывчивы, вид из окна прекрасен, местоположение замечательно, цена соответствует. Дима, Таня, спасибо!
Cerca al metro, zona central de brooklyn, buen apartamento y recámara, muy limpio

It was a great experience staying with Dmitriy an Tatyana! The locations is very convenient, a few minutes walking to Q and B lines which take you directly to Manhattan. The place is super clean and organized. The bed is comfy. There is a lot of light coming in. Truly enjoyed communicating with guys, a very pleasant couple! If you coming to visit NY, I’d definitely recommend their place!

Dimitry's place is peaceful, calm and has privacy. Dimitry and his wife both are kind, generous and helpful. The room was nest and tidy and all amenities were available as advertised. I surely will stay again.

Clean apartment and room. Dmitriy was very nice and helpful. However, it has little communication but also because I was almost never there. You can sleep with open windows it is nice and quiet. However, it is also an air conditioner available. I was the entire kitchen with all facilities for use. I can only recommend this accommodation.

They are a married couple, both very respectful. The building is noticeably old, but the apartment itself is kept clean. There are 3 flights of stairs to climb so I suggest carrying no more than 1 luggage. Very close to Q/B lines and B35 bus stop which is convenient. Close to downtown Brooklyn (15-20 minutes), but about 40-45 minutes from Midtown Manhattan via subway, all depending on the subway's mood. 

There is AC in the living space, which is a must in the in the scorching summer months. Plenty of shelves and closet space for you to use as well. 
 
Soaps and shampoo for showering are not provided, which is unusual for an Airbnb, but it is stated in the listing if you read it carefully. 

While the kitchen is kept very clean, there are small roaches that often roam around at night. They appear to be mostly German roaches, which are smaller and do not fly. They won't bother you in your living space so it won't be an issue unless you need the kitchen. On rare occasions, you may see one or two near the bathroom sink but only at night.
clean room,good people and nearly subway station.sweat home.
Quick response, Great convenience, Clean house, Satisfies! ^^

Everything was exactly as described. Dmitriy was responsive and kind, room had everything you need. Maybe a suggestion for the future would be a hairdryer but that's just a small thing :)
Apartment is very clean and well kept. Location is close to B and Q subway and a small grocery store is also around the corner.
It was a great place to stay! The B/Q trains werent in service during my stay, but there was an F about 15 minutes away so it was fine overall. Definitely worth the price!

Very good living experience, the room is cozy and quite, you can have a very good rest in Dmitriy’s home. It is adjacent to a nice park. On the other direction, there at lovely house blocks with beautiful view. However, if you want to explore Manhattans, the room is a little bid far away.
Great place and very good communication

Cool place ,nice place 
Thanks for everything!

This place is in the perfect location for quick access to transit, Prospect Park, and other great local amenities. This neighborhood actually seems to go asleep around 10, as opposed to other areas in and outside the borough. All around great value!
Highly recommend if you want to see New York and stay in a budget. Beautiful park near the home. Metro stations and shops with fruits like 5 min from home.

We provide simple furniture, you will take relax in this unit. There is laundry room each floor. You can enjoy shopping, beach and also clean and private renovated unit. Kitchenette , showers with clean towels ready. Dinnerware, silverware also available. Easy access parking

reviews.comments: This was a wonderful airbnb. The Lei Hawaii team were very helpful and communicative. I'd definitely book this airbnb when I visit Oahu again. Thank you so much Lei Hawaii!

We really enjoyed our stay in your studio apartment. It was clean, quiet and comfortable. The king bed made sleeping delightful. The kitchen had all new items and even though it was small in size, we were blue to make nice breakfasts and even a gourmet meal--thanks to the toaster oven!  Features that we particularly liked were the free parking space and the location. Getting in was seamless and the laundry facility was helpful. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

we (couple) enjoyed our stay very much.  location is right in the heart of waikiki.  interior is clean and modern.  ac blows cold and starts up quick,  bidet was a nice treat.  self parking was convenient.  it was affordable, but offers much more than we expected.  we loved it and treated it like our own home.
Good location!

This place is located on the 21st floor of the Marine Surf complex. It's in an amazing location... right in the heart of Waikiki. There are so many shops and restaurants within walking distance. You're also practically next door to the International Marketplace. Sure, Waikiki is super touristy, but we were tourists, and the sheer number of quality dining options were overwhelming. It also had an excellent view from the balcony (especially the sunrise!).

The room was well-stocked and the instructions, while strict, are to the point and easy to understand (check out procedures, wifi, laundry, garbage, etc). We never needed to contact the hosts because the instructions were so thorough. 

A couple things to note:
- You must remove your own trash before you leave. There is a refuse chute on each floor that you can dump your trash down.
- If you stay here, make sure you remember to remove your shoes before walking into the main living space. There is a basket by the door reminding you to do so.
- Despite being on the 21st floor, you can still hear the drunken hollering and "whoo girls" from the Seaside Bar & Grill across the street at night. It didn't bother us (sounds of the city), but just something to keep in mind.

Would definitely stay here again!
中心部に近く､とても動きやすかったです!!!お部屋もｷﾚｲでよかったです｡

It was very nice place to visit. Located the center of the city/ easy to check in

Im sure that will take same decision if I go back

すべてにおいて便利で快適に過ごせました

歩いてのｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞ､ご飯を食べて飲んでも安心して帰れる､ﾋﾞｰﾁに散歩などﾜｲｷｷｽﾃｲなら大満足な立地｡
お部屋は写真のとおりで爽やかな印象で二人で過ごすに充分でゆっくりできたお部屋でした
ﾊﾜｲに住む友人も見に来ていいね!と言ってました
部屋を出てﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰがあるほうと反対とが吹き抜けているようになっていてそこから夕陽もみられました
車を借りて滞在する私たちには申し分ない滞在となりました
This is the same as the photo, all  by yourself, near the beach "Waikiki ", parking spaces in the ground floor, be sure to pay attention to car height.
Very clean, great price, easy to access, and great location. I would highly recommend staying here.
Great location and newly renovated place. Definitely we will come back again. Quick and easy to communicate.

The pictures accurately shows what you get. The price was great, especially including a parking space. Check in and check out was seamless. They unit is clean and nicely decorated and had everything we needed to enjoy our one week vacation in Waikiki. The location makes it easy to get to the beach, shops, and places off the beaten path by foot. I would recommend staying here.

This location is a gem with parking space. Walking distances to many restaurants and stores nearby. You can definitely hear street noises, but the noise from AC overpowers that. I was not bothered by the noise level even though I am a light sleeper.  Easy self check-in and check-out process.
Great location, close to Waikiki and a lot of shops and restaurants. Very clean and a nice view from the balcony.

Great Airbnb! Within walking distance to Waikiki beach, international shopping center and countless dining options; just what we were looking for. 

View from the 21 floor lanai was wonderful, especially at night and the highway was easily accessible, should you feel the need to explore other parts of the island like we did.

Facility was exactly like the picture. It is located in the middle of waikiki and a great area surrounded by restaurants and shopping. The rules are a little strict  so if you are worried about getting towels dirty I suggests you bring your own but their rules are very understandable. 
The parking is really low so make sure you bring a small vehicle. I do not recommend SUVs. 

Unfortunately the time I was staying the upper floor residence was doing some type of construction so we were unable to enjoy our stay and decided to leave the room earlier then planned. The host responded in a timely manner and gave us a refund for the days of construction and the last few days we had canceled the room. 

It's a beautiful place and great for the price. They have a friendly front desk and night security staff if you need any help. The laundry is on the same floor and they have a great Sea food restaurant on the first floor! 

Would recommend if you are planning to stay in waikiki.
It's a very cute place in the centre of Waikiki. Walking distance to all the good restaurants. Just a tip, if you drive make sure you enter the building from Kuhio street.

The place was easy to find and the instructions that were provided to check in were easy to follow. The studio was very clean and the bed was really comfortable. The location was very convenient- walking distance to all the shopping, the beach and restaurants. The biggest perk of this room was not having to pay for the parking space. Would definitely stay here again.

Very clean, homey, modern. Conveniently located to beach, shopping centers, restaurants and etc. Only downside is that it gets quite loud over the weekend. Other than that I have nothing to complain. Self check-in and out was very easy and the bed was comfortable too. Thanks for hosting!
Great place to stay. Very central to everything around Waikiki.

Enjoyed our stay and recommend to others if looking to stay in Waikiki. Clean place, everything you need, comfortable bed. With a great location comes with late night/early morning street noise but we did expected it.

ﾎﾃﾙ全体は古いですが部屋はｵｼｬﾚにﾘﾉﾍﾞｰｼｮﾝされており自宅の様に過ごせて落ち着きました｡所々に絵が飾られておりｾﾝｽも良い感じです｡
食器などもｾﾝｽ良く必要なものが揃っています｡自炊する人は調味料は用意しましょう｡
自分はそれほど気になりませんがﾎﾃﾙの立地上しょうがないですが外の騒音が気になる人はいるかもしれません｡車を乗っていない方には関係ありませんが駐車場は無料なのですがｽﾍﾟｰｽが狭く地下でｷﾚｲではなく匂いもあるので気になる人は辛いかもしれません｡
Great location!!! Walking distance to Waikiki beach, shops and restaurants.  Clean Condo with everything you need.
I liked how clean the space was as well as how central the location was.
Great location. Nice apartment. Clean.
Great location and place.

Clean space and comfortable bed, but wish I could say the same about the pillows (time to upgrade them).  As stated, it is conveniently located to the beach, shopping centers, restaurants, etc. I like how secure the building is - you need your key fob to access the elevators and basement parking.  Although the instructions said that parking was tight, we were still able to parking a GMC Acadia (carefully) without any issues!! We used the laundry facilities on the other floors, due to the 21st floor being out of service during our stay. Only real downside to it all is that it was quite noisy at night.
Very central condo, clean and ideal location for price

Place was clean and exactly like photos. Close 10 min walk to the ‘strip’ and beach. Parking must be entered from Kuhio not Seaside as the condo’s spot is at the lowest level, which you can’t reach from entering from Seaside. Pillows were uncomfortable and sheets were like sandpaper, depends how picky you are. Location is great but very noisy due to sirens etc but some like to be very central, depends what you’re looking for. Host responded the next day when we had the fire alarm go off at 3am and my husband who’s a firefighter said it wasn’t working properly so they had it replaced and we were pleased with that. Overall, it was a good place to stay.
Great place to stay! Highly recommended!
Great location!

This place was very stylish. The lamps were very interesting. I would say watch out for them since they dangle a little low. The location was perfect. Its in the center of downtown Waikiki and every shop was within a 15 min walking distance. Checking in and out was super easy. I was happy that this place had its own parking garage since I was told downtown parking is hard to find. The parking space is a bit tight, but nothing too hard to manuver around.
立地は良かったですが､部屋の使い勝手は小さい子供連れにはちょっと向いてないかなと思います｡対応はとても良かったです｡ありがとうございました!

Местоположение отличное. До моря 5 минут. Вокруг есть много магазинов и кафе. Удобная парковка. Достаточное количество полотенец и необходимой посуды. Нам все понравилось, особенно свежий тунец  недорогой и очень вкусный. Безопасность проживания на уровне, доступ в лифт, здание только при наличии ключа, что является не маловажным.
Had a nice stay with my family! Mahalo
The apartment is in a great location, right in the heart of Waikiki. Would definitely stay here again!
전체적으로 좋았네요...

The location of this condo was amazing - right in the heart of all the action (great restaurants, shopping, Waikiki beach, etc.). We were so happy to return home here every night after long days of exploring the island. Could hear noise from the streets below until about 10pm but it quieted down significantly after that. We had a 2-door Jeep Wrangler and were able to fit it in the parking spot with no problems. The condo itself was good - very spacious, decent bed, nice decor. The air conditioning unit was extremely loud so we had to shut it off at night to sleep, although the evenings were so cool that we didn’t really need air conditioning anyways. Our biggest complaint was that the hosts did not provide enough toiletries to last us for our 8-night stay - we ran out of paper towels, Kleenex, shampoo and conditioner. Definitely would have been nice to be provided with more of these basic necessities. Overall a great choice if you’re looking for an exciting and conveniently-located place to stay.
Super great location. Right in the center of Waikiki.
Great location, very clean studio over all, enjoyed our stay here. Thank you!

位置非常棒,逛街相當方便
還有免費停車場
公寓本身較舊,走廊稍微陰暗,但房源內部裝潢新穎
小建議 燈再明亮一些會更棒!
Great location without a doubt! Clean, safe, and welcoming place stay. Would definitely use Lei Hawaii's place in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay! Exactly as pictured. Beautiful and clean. Others complained about the AC unit. It was perfect, not different than any other AC units. Did not hear much noise either. It’s centrally located. Everything was amazing! We are coffee drinkers so the only negative I can think of is the coffee machine. That machine has got to go. We enjoyed breakfast on the lenai every morning. Just perfection!

Our stay in Hawaii was really enjoyable and the place was very much in line with what we expected from what was posted on the website. The free parking was an amazing benefit and the value we got was really tough to beat! We wanted a car so we could get out of Waikiki when we wanted to, not having to pay for parking, and knowing our car was secure was great. Location is very close to the water and a short walk from anything worth going to in Waikiki. You could definitely stay here and not need a car at all. We definitely recommend staying here, and will look out for this place when we return.

Thank you for our stay! The location was fabulous for dining shopping and the beach! The condo is decorated in modern minimalist style-which we found relaxing. Although we had a car, we loved walking to Waikiki beach to see the sunrise, surf, eat and repeat. Due to all of the food options around we didn't do much cooking but if you would like to cook there are adequate kitchen supplies. This is a modest accommodation in a great location-which is in the heart of the action so it is a little busier. We were visiting from a small town so we enjoyed the all the people and enery! P.S. You will love the bidet-trust me! I can no longer live without one!  I would definitely visit again!

This is our second time staying with Lei Hawaii and we loved it! The place was clean, just like in the pictures. Location was amazing. Would definitely recommend anyone visiting Hawaii to book with them. We had a fantastic time!
Great location, clean place in a nice building. The parking spot is a bit tight so don't try to park there with a big vehicle, but it's great that there is parking at all. Recommended.
Central location and clean apartment.

二週間不自由なくご利用させて頂きました｡ありがとうございます｡
立地や駐車場へのｱｸｾｽがとても便利でした｡部屋は朝日が入り明るくて気持ちが良いです｡高層階のためﾗﾅｲから海も綺麗に見えます｡また､ｺﾞﾐ出しや洗濯乾燥機が同じﾌﾛｱｰにありとても便利でした｡ﾄｲﾚは洗浄機付で清潔でした｡

一方で､お部屋の電球が切れていたり､ｷｯﾁﾝの電気も付かなかったり､炊飯器があるのにしゃもじが無かったり､不便な部分もありました｡ﾗﾅｲは一日中ｸｰﾗｰの水が上階から滴り落ちてきています｡
また､仕方ない事かもしれませんが､滞在中にｺﾞｷﾌﾞﾘが何度もｷｯﾁﾝの引き出しや冷蔵庫裏から出てきましたので､対策ｸﾞｯｽﾞを持っていく事をｵｽｽﾒします｡

The Marine Surf Waikiki is conveniently located on the corner of Seaside & Kuhio Ave. All the restaurants & shopping are within walking distance. 

The unit itself was clean & cozy. It had fresh linens, bath towels, plenty of toilet paper, a/c unit, cable tv, WiFi, and dishes if you want to cook. 

The parking was a big deal for me as it becomes difficult & expensive in Waikiki. The unit has one spot in the parking garage and although the spot was in the corner and was somewhat tight, it wasn’t a big deal. 

All in all, the unit was comfortable for myself, my wife, and infant daughter. Having everything nearby was great.
Clean and cozy space right in the heart of waikiki! would definitely book again!

This condo was exactly what we were looking for. Walking distance to all the shops, restaurants and Waikiki beach. Condo had a great view, clean and the building was safe. Would definitely stay here again.
Great stay. Unlike other Airbnb, this place had extra towels for us and our baby.

great location with great views over Waikiki to wards beaches and towards the mountains from both end of building balcony and having the pleasure of watching the Hilton fireworks from the 21st floor balcony made our evening.
I loved stay here! super good location, nice neighbor and complementary parking place. We would definitely stay again when we back to Hawaii.
A very nice trendy spot in the heart of Waikiki and near everything!!! Super recommended place!

The place is clean and has a nice view. Everything was pretty easy. We loved our time there. If you don’t like noises this is not a quiet area, but the location is great. It is walkable distance to everywhere in Waikiki.
素敵なお部屋です!立地もよく､満足!!
The apartment is super clean and very close to the beach and many good restaurants. We enjoyed the trip very much!

host.host_about: Love movie, travelling, reading and cooking.  Sincerely hope every one enjoys staying my apartment and enjoys Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Thanks Stella for the place. It is very neat and tidy. It is also close to transit and restaurant. Would definitely stay here again if we have the chance.

We enjoyed staying at Stella's apartment. Although we didn't get to meet her, she was easy to communicate with and very responsive to messages. The place was clean and looks exactly like what is shown in the pictures. The apartment building is situated in a nice neighbourhood with lots of options for eating and having drinks. Public transport (mtr; tram; buses) are within walking distance. Having visited Hong Kong several times, this was one of our favourite places.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The stay was very good, 

my flight to the south of china got delayed heavily and thus i checked in around 10pm, this was no issue for Stella and her husband. Very convenient!

When i needed an additional towel it was supplied to me very quickly.

The only downside was, there was no shower gel and shampoo, i bought some for myself. No biggy.

Also the area is great, quite calm and alot of restaurants all over the place and the MTR is also just around the corner.

Overall the stay was great and i recommend Stella to anyone!

The apartment location is very local and convenient( many bus and Subway station can get here) . Many delicious restaurant,supermarket and vegetable market around here, beautiful harbor just frount the building. It's good to live as a local person. Stella is helpful and friendly. Space is quite enough to 2 people as home.
Cozy location within reachable distant to the city centre. Good response from the host too.

name: M&S Apartments Porto
summary: Localizado no Porto, junto à Estação de Metro do Marquês, o M&S Apartments Porto é rodeado por vários serviços (restaurantes, bares, supermercados, centros turismo, transportes, etc). Dispõe de quartos com casas de banho privadas. A acomodação apresenta móveis e camas de madeira. Cada quarto tem um roupeiro e uma cómoda. Também estão disponíveis televisão por cabo e acesso Wi-Fi.
space: A casa de hóspedes está localizada a 2 paragens da central Estação de Metro da Trindade, onde passam todas as linhas de metro do Porto. A Residencial Do Marquês (Alojamento Local) dispõe de estacionamento no local.  União de Freguesias do Centro é uma excelente escolha entre viajantes que estão interessados em arquitectura, degustar vinho e caminhadas na cidade.

host.host_about:
Hi
My name is Pedro and I live and love this town and I really would like to share it with you. Porto is being voted best destination for travel year after year, and I will be most glad to help you find out why!
Hope to see you soon :)

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: O espaço é fantástico, com um design moderno e acolhedor. Atendimento exemplar. De certo um espaço a visitar novamente.

Estadia muito agradável no studio do Pedro. Perto do metro Marquês ( 2 estações de Trindade, centro do Porto).
Pequeno detalhe : Falta de louça para cozinhar.
Senão foi muito bom.

Pedro is great to deal with and the room is very nicely renovated and really clean, but a few more items are needed to make the apartment more liveable. Some more kitchen items to cook and items to make the entrance feel more comfortable to relax. But I'm still very happy with my visit and would recommend. Also the photos are of several apartments and common hallways in the building, so may not be exactly the room you are getting but not a problem once you are aware
Cute room, the apartment is well-located (near the subway, easy access to the city center). We had a great time :) we recommand

The apartment is not really an apartment, more a bungalow that is well finished in the interior. The bed is a real bed. Shower is electric and low capacity so if you are 2, do not expect to take long showers or you will end up freezing. There is no heating so do except to freeze during the humid winters in Northern Portugal. The manager only gives you two small towel and very low quantity of toilet paper. The place it is really really small and very humid. It is OK for a couple of nights but not for more than that. Ok if you plan to eat outside all the time (if you can bear Portuguese heavy food for more than 2 days :) ). The kitchen is in fact a kitchenette and not equipped for cooking but only to warm up pre-made food.  There is no oil or salt, as in most Airbnb I have travelling to. Moreover, we went there in end of September and the house was really humid so, cooking, would have added more humidity to it. The bed is quite confortable and there is a good WIFI connection.  Shower is electric and low capacity so if you are 2, do not expect to take long showers or you will end up freezing. There is no heating so do except to freeze during the humid winter in Northern Portugal. There is no nice places around to have dinner but quite good bakeries to take breakfast in the morning (breakfast it is not included). Positive point: the place is spotless and Pedro was nice for the check-in. I recommend this place only for really short stays in summer.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The Wi-Fi didn't work and the kitchenware was rather poor. For the rest the apartment was OK.

The house was very close to the metro station of Marques, which is 2 stops from center! The house is one room which is cool if you are willing to stay few days, there are very few kitchen items so do not expect to cook for a Christmas meal  There is an air conditioner so the temperature was not a problem. It’s close to some supermarkets and the neighborhood is quiet and safe.
The place has an excellent location. Everything was clean. There is some things on the kitchen but not enough if you want to cook.

El apartamento está bien, limpio y en buena situación, el principal problema la comunicación pues aun teniendo la reserva confirmada no conseguimos hablar con el responsable hasta una hora antes de llegar. 
En los apartamentos de la planta alta la red wifi no nos llegaba.

This is a good place to stay, you can reach by walk 10-15 min the City Center of Porto. The place is close by two good places to eat, the bakery in front of the part next to the metro Station, try the Pan de Arroz, The croissant, and the cherry juice. If you want to eat local food two block front the place there is a small restaurant called Estrella do Lima,, good food excellent price. This place has the basic things you need to prepare your breakfast and quick dinner. The shower always has hot water, and Pedro is a great guy.
O local é pequeno, a "cozinha" não é muito funcional como está organizada.

L’arrivé à porto fut compliquée..
L’adresse dite sur la page est soit disant sur la place du Marquês. Hors c’était une rue plus loin. Pas très grave, mais assez embêtant quand on se trimbale des valises.
Arrivé sur le lieu on nous explique que ce que nous avons loué n’est pas disponible, et qu’on nous propose ou de nous rendre l’argent de la nuit pour qu’on trouve autre chose, ou nous donner un autre logement. Sachant qu’il était déjà 21h, on a choisi l’autre logement de peur de ne rien trouver pour la nuit, du moins pas a nos tarifs. Et là surprise, l’autre logement était très loin du centre, dans un lieu moins sûr, à 15 min du métro, en devant traverser le « périphérique » de porto à pied, qui est un endroit très dangereux sachant qu’il n’y a pas de trottoir. 
Je connais la ville, j’ai pu me débrouiller avec mon conjoint par conséquent, mais pour quelqu’un qui ne connais pas, cela peu devenir très compliqué.
Le lieu, c’était n’importe quoi. Tellement d’humidité que les draps, coussins, papier toilette était trempé. Surprise au moment du couché: nous n’avions pas un lit double, mais deux lits simples collé l’un à l’autre. La nuit fut douloureuse, dormir sur un bout de bois des structures de lit, c’est pas très agréable.
Réveil compliqué également. Quelqu’un d’autre vivait dans l’appartement, hors nous avions demander un logement pour nous exclusivement. Mais ce n’est pas tout. Je n’osais pas sortir de ma chambre le matin venu, car j’entend différentes voix d’hommes dans le logement. Six hommes étaient entrain d’exécuter des travaux. Certains sont même passé devant la porte vitré de la chambre et ont regarder à l’intérieur, alors que j’étais coucher! 
Nous y avons passé qu’une nuit. Le lendemain nous avons pu avoir le logement de départ, qui était prevu, et pour lequel nous avons payé.
Et en effet là le logement était très sympa, et était conforme à ce qui avait été demander.
Seuls petits soucis: un seul rouleau de papier toilette, peu d’ustensiles de cuisine, armoire cassé
Point positif: climatisation, réseau wifi fonctionnel, lieu assez chaleureux, et agréable pour un petit séjour en couple

reviews.comments:
PROS: 
-Position was excellent
-Apartment was very big and comfortable for a family of 4
-we were told we would only find beach towels, instead we also found beach chairs, sand toys, boogie-board (and we bought and left there 1 beach-umbrella and 2 floating-tubes)
-condo was nice
-free parking (crucial for that area)
-big swimming pool
-had some small electrical problems (lamp, tv, etc) but the owners solved them very quickly 
CONS:
-owner met us below bulding at check-in but gave us the keys and left very quickly, without even explaining anything about the apartment nor the area
-found little bugs in the kitchen
-no laundry detergent
-wifi was ok in the morning, but VERY SLOW in the evening time
and THE BIGGEST ISSUE WE HAD WAS...
-front door, parking garage and elevator all needed a FOB key to get access. When checking-out we were told to leave the key+fob in the apartment, but this meant that we couldn't get the elevator down (14 floors - with luggage and stroller!!) nor leave the parking garage! Since it was very early in the morning (5am) and there was nobody around we didn't know what to do and this was very frustrating since we had to rush to the airport!

name: Bright and Breezy Bondi Beach Pad
summary: This bright and stylish Bondi pad is located just 2 minutes walk from the beach, with all that the breathtaking Sydney hotspot has to offer on the doorstep. Our favourites for dinner are Lox Stock & Barrel and Sefa Kitchen. Also, be sure to check out ANITA La Mamma del gelato after dinner or for a lunch time treat. You'll love our place because it's so close to the beach and public transport is only a short walk away too, you'll be in the heart of Sydney, within 15 minutes on the bus or train.
