Rising above Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach, Bondi quietly watches surfers hit the lip from its elevated perch in the city’s eastern suburbs. Bondi’s relative shyness to its rowdy neighbour doesn’t mean it lacks style, charisma, or personality. On the contrary, its local shops are neighbourhood institutions and its classic bungalow
neighborhood_overview: Rising above Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach, Bondi quietly watches surfers hit the lip from its elevated perch in the city’s eastern suburbs. Bondi’s relative shyness to its rowdy neighbour doesn’t mean it lacks style, charisma, or personality. On the contrary, its local shops are neighbourhood institutions and its classic bungalows preserve its beach town charm. Share a brew on Bondi Road or skate to the beach with your board—it’s easy to take it easy in Bondi.
transit: Bondi Beach - 2 minutes walk Bondi Junction Station - 15 minutes by bus Sydney CBD - 25 minutes by bus and train  Darling Harbour - 45 minutes by bus and train Harbour Bridge - 40 minutes by train Opera House - 40 minutes by train Airport - 55 minutes by bus/train
access: The apartment is within a communal block. Guests will have access to the entire apartment during their stay.
interaction: I will be contactable by email or telephone during your stay.
house_rules: - Please treat the home as you would your own.  - Please respect the neighbours, and do not make significant noise or play loud music after 10pm.  - No parties - If guests lock themselves out of the property OR they do not place keys in the lockbox at checkout, an $80 fee will apply. If a guest loses a set of keys during their stay, a $120 fee will apply.

host.host_about: Hi! I'm 38 years old and live with my partner in inner Sydney. I work as a psychologist and love nature, travelling and spending time with friends.

reviews.comments: Great location! I was here for 3 weeks and it was close to beach and public transport. Perfect apartment

Great location, walking distance to bondi beach and many restaurants and  cafes! Nice and big apartment, super comfortable .
The host was always reachable .
Would recommend this airbnb for sure!!

Really lovely little apartment.  Bright and cheerful, cozy and warm.  Very central with everything you need at hand but set back slightly so you don't have to feel in the middle of everything if you don't want to.  Sarah has thought of everything to welcome you during your stay.  I loved the colourful plastic cups, bowls and plates for my lil girl.  Lovely kitchen to work in and great shower too.  Loved our stay here.

Nice place in a great location.

This is a flat in a great location. Minutes only from the beach, public transport and of course, the cafes of Bondi Beach. The flat is well laid out and well suits someone staying in the local area. 

Sarah was a great host. We had a few initial issues but she was very efficient and courteous in resolving them. Her directions to get to the flat and the keys was terrific and worked like a dream. 

Well worth considering for your stay in Bondi

A casa da Sarah é muito acolhedora e  a com uma excelente localização. Nos comunicamos pouco, porque em Sydney tudo é muito interativo, além de termos uma filha que mora por lá. Mas Sarah passou todas as informações necessárias e não tivemos necessidade de ligar para ela.
Um ótimo local para se hospedar. O único detalhe é que estávamos em três e para quem usava o sofá cama era necessário passar pelo quarto de casal para ir ao banheiro. Ideal para dois.
Outro detalhe é que seria melhor se houvesse uma pia/tanque na área de serviço.

Stayed for 7 nights in this spacious apartment at a great location. Close to the beach, shops and restaurant.  Plus well connected to the city via public transport. 
However the cleanliness for the apartment was not good.  Hairs and soap remains the bathroom (and some mold as well) and food remains in the Kitchen.  Contacted the owner about this and she offered to send a cleaner, so perhaps it was just a one off thing.
Awesome location and cool apartment. Great contact from Sarah. Would stay again
Nicely appointed Bondi flat with all the essentials. Will stay again.
Great place to stay
Great, comfortable stay. Very convenient location close to everything in Bondi.
Great!
Perfect location! Great fit for 2 people on beach holiday. Tight fit for 3. Instructions to locate key were clear. Cleanliness was average. A bit noisy mornings and night.
Great location, just a few blocks from Bondi. Plenty of restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood. Spacious and clean apartment, perfect for two people.

A tidy and spacious unit for a 1 bedroom. Close walking distance to some great restaurants, shops and the beach. Outside of the building is quite smelly as garage system is in a bit of a mess but this is happening a lot in the area because of the number of units. 
The host is really helpful! Great spot for a short stay in Bondi.
Perfect location in Bondi, close to everything! Excellent communication from Sarah and overall great weekend holiday spot.
This flat is very good with a great location!
Great place to stay!
I cant reccomend it. Location okay nut that is it.
Great location. Close to amazing cafes and short walk to beach and Main Street. Great communication.
Great size and location.
Sarah’s place was a perfect stay in Sydney. Her location in Bondi is absolutely central to everything you need to have a memorable holiday.

I stayed at this apartment for 4 weeks and it's the biggest feature is its location and proximity to the beach, just  5min walk. The place is quite large for 1 or 2 people. The only issue was that a number of light bulbs were not working inside and the bed was average comfortable. However, it was fully furnished and also included a washing machine which was great. All in all, it was a pleasant stay.

Unfortunately we didn't have a pleasant or restful stay here. Noise from car mechanic shop and building construction site right beside the apartment was so loud that it felt like it was coming from inside the unit! Went on all day long and none of this was mentioned in her listing! The noise was so unbearable that we had to cut our stay short. No one would want to waste their money on a noisy apartment while on vacation, especially after a very long flight!
Even with recorded audio as proof, the host still would not refund for the days we didn't stay. Obviously she doesn't bother checking what goes on around her apartment regularly and that is just negligence! She doesn't seem to care much about guest satisfaction!

For sure the biggest value added of this house is the location, just 5 minutes from Bondi Beach. Another plus is the bus stop just right in the corner that bring you to Bondi Junction where you can get the tube. The check in isn’t the easiest one whereas there are instruction (mostly if done in late evening). The flat is perfect up to 2 persons and is quite clean, even if something more could be done. At the end, considering the general picture, I’d suggest this accommodation to another guest.

Convenient location on Curlewis St near the corner with Glenayr Ave.  Close to shops,  restaurants and public transport.  Apartment is located at the rear of the property so relatively quiet.  Easy check-in process.  Did not deal directly with the owner but rather through Airsorted.  A few broken light globes were replaced promptly.  TV reception was inconsistent and needs improving.   Notwithstanding this, this is a nice apartment and we would stay there again.

Very clean place and in awesome location. Although, parking says free all day, it doesn't mention you need to move your car every 2 hours every day you stay there - ruins your time if you do not know of this, we left a day early. 

Bring toilet paper and soap as these were not available at our stay. (they said they would reimburse us of the toilet paper)
Great location! Cleanliness wasn’t great - had to throw lots of food out from previous people. Inside wardrobes were dirty.
Good location and nice flat, there is a building site and a motor garage next door which is worth mentioning as it can be noisy.
Great spot to stay, close to the beach, shops, restaurants and bars. Nice area too!

This is a fantastic place to stay. Location is fantastic. Great comfy bed. Great WiFi. Nice easy to follow instructions for entry and great quick communication. The place is roomy with everything you need. We stayed for 12 nights and had a great time.

Great location for a 8-10 min stroll to the beach, plenty of cafes and shops much closer. Spacious place with great master bedroom, but small and uncomfortable (double) sofa bed in lounge - may be better to book a proper 2 bed place if you need two proper beds.
Great central location. Excellent communication. Nice, serviceable unit.
Great location be weary thatt it is up a flight of stairs

I stayed at Sarah's apartment for approx. 3 weeks and highly recommend it to others...  it's a really clean n tidy place... very spacious and a 2 minute walk from the beach...  The host was very helpful with getting back to me quickly when I needed her help a few times..  Many thanks Sarah !!

The place's location is amazing! Bondi is a great area and the apartment is very close to everything. 

Some non-major things were a bit off which lessened the experience: dirty towels/linen, leaky faucet, broken towel rack. But overall we had a good experience. 

Sarah and her team were great at coordinating everything.
Great location

I would not recommend staying here. It was simply disgusting.  The location was accurate but the photos were edited with a filter to make the apartment seem clean, however that was not the case. The apartment was filled with dust, mold, and rust. Things in the apartment came dirty and broken. Not to mention the apartment was infested with maggots. I was supposed to stay 11 nights but thank goodness I was able to get out as soon as possible and got a hotel for a remainder of my trip in Sydney. I’ve stayed in Airbnb’s in Berlin, Paris, Positano, Milan, Lisbon... and had even just moved from one in Sydney to this one. I had never experienced something even remotely close to this one. This Airbnb needs to be put off the site because the living situation is unhealthy!

A fantastic apartment in a fantastic location. Perfect for getting around and staying close enough to the beach. Apartment was spacious, well-furnished with washing machine/dryer, kitcheb utensils and fans for the heat!
Amazing place for a vacation in Sydney! Great location

An excellent location, was clean and practical. It’s not fancy, nor particularly quiet but it’s what you would expect for Sydney. My one suggestion would be a bin and a second set of keys as it’s not amenable to two guests with different plans.

name: "Gorgeous and artfully styled oasis ...."
summary: Perfect for couples, business travellers and those in search of an offsite venue that sparks creativity. With pool and lush rainforest garden on the edge of Sydney Harbour, the setting is magical.  Incredibly, it's only 15 mins drive (6.6km) from the Sydney CBD with the city bus only metres away. Unique and beautiful, you'll enjoy total privacy with your own solar-heated pool, double hammock, old school canvas tent for afternoon siestas, BBQ,  parking, Foxtel IQ Platinum, parking and WiFi.
space: Large suite with ensuite bathroom and private entrance, pool and terraces with stunning views over Sydney waterfront rainforest. Guests have their own private sitting room and kitchen with direct access to the pool terrace with its BBQ and multiple dining and lounging areas.  It's like a small but perfectly formed boutique hotel where you're the only guests. Enjoy hotel-like amenities, peace and privacy only 6.5kms from the Sydney CBD with a city bus at the door.
description: Perfect for couples, business travellers and those in search of an offsite venue that sparks creativity. With pool and lush rainforest garden on the edge of Sydney Harbour, the setting is magical.  Incredibly, it's only 15 mins drive (6.6km) from the Sydney CBD with the city bus only metres away. Unique and beautiful, you'll enjoy total privacy with your own solar-heated pool, double hammock, old school canvas tent for afternoon siestas, BBQ,  parking, Foxtel IQ Platinum, parking and WiFi. Large suite with ensuite bathroom and private entrance, pool and terraces with stunning views over Sydney waterfront rainforest. Guests have their own private sitting room and kitchen with direct access to the pool terrace with its BBQ and multiple dining and lounging areas.  It's like a small but perfectly formed boutique hotel where you're the only guests. Enjoy hotel-like amenities, peace and privacy only 6.5kms from the Sydney CBD with a city bus at the door. Guests have access to private sitting
neighborhood_overview: Greenwich is a hidden gem of Sydney.  It's close to the city and even closer to the restaurant districts of Lane Cove and Crows Nest.  Because it's a harbourside suburb, and this is Sydney,  the terrain is hilly and quite steep in parts and the views are breathtaking.    The suburb has wonderful urban, green, pretension-free, harbourside vibe.  It's a great place for hiking.  If golf's your thing, there's  a public golf course just up the road.  An absolute must see is the iconic Greenwich baths, one of the few remaining Sydney Harbour public swimming baths.    It you love to work your muscles, there are many parks with outdoor training facilities (the best is at the bottom of my garden),  tennis courts for hire, an aquatic centre in Lane Cove, all this with great transport links to the CBD for the business traveller.  What's not to like?  There's a reason that most who move to Greenwich tend to trade up and stay in the vicinity rather than moves to other parts of Sydney.
notes: SECURITY - HOUSE ALARM AND VIDEO/AUDIO SURVEILLANCE Alarm: The interior of the property is fitted with a back to base monitored alarm system.  Instructions for the operation of this system are included in both the House Manual and the Arrival Directions. It is extremely simple.  Please note that this system does not capture or record any visual or audio information, it simply detects motion. Exterior Surveillance:  There are 3 cameras covering the exterior of the property and 1 within the non-guest area of the property which record video and audio and store and upload to the cloud in real time. Note that tampering or removing these cameras will not prevent the information already recorded from being transmitted and stored.   The actual location of all exterior cameras will be shown to you at check-in. There is no surveillance inside the listing nor in the backyard/pool area.  These cameras feature a two way audio feed, so I can speak to you, and you me via them if necessary. Smoking is
transit: We have a stop for a bus travelling to the centre of Sydney at the front of the house, buses which travel up and down the nearby Pacific Highway on their way to the Sydney centre, airport, north west, northern beaches and eastern suburbs, two train stations and two ferry wharves with services to the city and Parramatta to choose from.  With so much choice it gets confusing,  so I advise guests to download any of the many local public transport apps to use during their stay. Our house is one of only five in Greenwich that has direct access to the Sydney Harbour foreshore and is also on the main bus route (Route 261) to the centre of Sydney.  The bus stop is 60m away and the bus travels to the very centre of Sydney's CBD.   We are within walking distance of St Leonards and Wollstonecraft train stations.  St Leonards is a main transport hub and trains from here run to most parts of Sydney including Macquarie University.  Buses from St Leonards run to the city, the northwest and also the n
access: Guests have access to private sitting room with Foxtel IQ , kitchen, solar-heated swimming pool, BBQ area with large Weber gas BBQ, well-equipped laundry and a range of interesting and comfy outdoor dining and lounging areas with stunning views over a Sydney Harbour foreshore rainforest. There's also parking for one guest car on the property and free street parking.
house_rules: NUMBER OF GUESTS IN YOUR BOOKING I do NOT have a 'children under 2 don't count as guests and don't pay a fee' policy. Every human in your group must be included in the guest numbers and guest numbers must not exceed 2. Unfortunately,  Airbnb's system will not calculate the correct guest numbers for those 2 and under.   To manually override this, enter children under 2 as though they were in the 2-12 category.  I require the names and ages of all guests in your group at the time you book.    The guest in whose name the booking is made  must be physically present at check-in unless previously agreed. CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT TIMES Check-in is any time after 3pm, check-out is any time before 11am.   SECURITY Please close and lock all doors and windows and turn on the alarm when you're not in residence. SMOKING Smoking is allowed outside only in the designated smoking areas. POOL SAFETY Do not prop open the pool gates or door or make any attempt to override the self-closing door mechanism.

host.host_about: I love to create beautiful spaces for humans which delight and deliver peace, comfort, privacy and efficiency with a sense of fun.  As a seasoned business traveller who's spent far too much time in hotels,  I've developed an aversion to  giant towels marinated in fabric softener, mean little shards of shrink-wrapped soap, toilet paper origami,  shower gels that could degrease a sea otter, coat hangers that require Tetris-like manipulations to unleash their hanging power and bio-hazardous pillow shams.   With this in mind, I've put a lot of thought into creating an accommodation experience that avoids inflicting these hospitality sins on my guests.

reviews.comments: Louise is a phenomenal, warm, helpful and responsive host! Her home was a gorgeous and artfully styled oasis mere minutes from the CBD. I loved every aspect of this stay and highly recommend for those who want a retreat during a business trip or weekend get away - 5 Stars and Thank You Louise!

I'll be back here again and again! It's an awesome retreat or gorgoeus alternative to another boring work hotel! Louise goes out of her way to Ensure a beautifully decorate, luxury oasis awaits all her guests with scrumptious snacks, breakfast, and all the mod cons you could want. Don't miss your chance to stay!

So tranquil despite its central location. Felt like our own private oasis. Lots of thought has gone into this listing to make it comfortable and liveable. Lots of careful little touches that make it a lovely place to relax.

name: The Porto Concierge - Belvedere First
summary: Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 10 minutes walking distance to Trindade metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.
description: Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 10 minutes walking distance to Trindade metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.

host.host_about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Lovely location and apartment  but extremely unresponsive hosts. We waited for more than two hours, and when the host finally showed up, she did not even apologize for the wait.
Great location, very helpful host. Lovely well priced apartment in central Porto. Would stay again
Nice and clean appartement with central position

Service très pro et attentif ! L'appartement était parfaitement propre et spacieux. Le quartier est idéal pour les sorties et pour découvrir la culture portugaise durant un court séjour, tout en étant dans une rue assez calme .

Nous sommes arrivés un peu plus tôt et avons pu stocker nos affaires dans les locaux de TPC, le staff est gentil.

Je recommande ;)
Adorei o espaço, limpo e arejado. O espaço acomoda muito bem até quatro pessoas. Boa localização. Só não foi perfeito pq o box vazava água e tivemos um problema com a máquina de lavar roupas.
Casa bem localizada, muito higiénica e com boas condições de conforto.
Appartement au calme, tres bien équipé et bien situé pour voir la ville à pieds.

Brilliant flat located in the centre of the city offering great place to rest after long walks and visit in local restaurants and cafes. The apartment is amazing with comfortable beds and space leaving you to enjoy it.

L'accueil a été très sympathique, nous avons en plus eu toutes les informations nécessaires sur Porto.
L'appartement était très bien situé, proche des activités et animations du centre ville mais placé dans une rue plutôt calme. 
Tout était très propre et même mieux que sur les photos. 
C'était de façon générale un très bon séjour dans cet appartement.
Very good location! Places to eat and drink only few steps away. The apartment was clean and spacious, I recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Porto :)

Asunnon sijainti oli hyvä. Sisäänkirjautuminen sujui vaivattomasti ja huoneiston luovuttanut henkilö oli todella mukava. Hän antoi paljon vinkkejä Portoon, mm. Hyviä vinkkejä ruokapaikoista ja nähtävyyksistä.

Viestintä oli nopeaa ja vaivatonta. Saimme myös myöhäisemmän uloskirjautumisajan kuin olimme sopineet sitä pyytämällä.

Kiitos Jose!

We had a nice stay in a large apartment with a nice northern pointed terrace. The neighborhood was quiet but very close to a more
Lively area

Really comfortable, clean and tidy place to stay - highly recommending it! The flat is off the main roads, so is generally quiet. 

There was no living room space in the flat and the kitchen is fairly small but it didn't matter to us at all.

Très bel appartement, propre, spacieux et fonctionnel, situé au calme dans une petite ruelle en plein centre ville. L'accueil a été très chaleureux avec des documents et des conseils pour notre séjour. Rien à redire, nous avons été enchantés!

J'ai vécu une très belle expérience dans cet appartement, l'emplacement, l'accueil, le prix, le service tout y est pour avoir un séjour agréable. Assurément, si je retourne à Porto un jour, je vais envisager re-loué ce logement. Je le conseil vivement. Idéale pour découvrir Porto à pied, à proximité de métro, bus, bon restaurant, bar/club, magasins etc. Vous ne serrez pas déçu
Apartamento conforme as fotos e super limpo. Perto de tudo, quase não precisamos usar transporte. Fica numa rua calma, mas perto de bares e restaurantes. Muito bom. Recomendo!

El apartamento era excelente! Al llegar nos lo encontramos impoluto, incluso con un regalo de bienvenida! Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable, y la localización muy buena, nos desplazamos a todos los sitios andando. Como consejo a próximos visitantes, en el anuncio de AirBNB aparece como un apartamento de 1 habitación pero en realidad tiene 2 habitaciones, cada cual con su cama de matrimonio. Además de cocina y baño! 
Como única pega diría que las paredes del edificio son bastante finas y en algunas ocasiones oíamos a los vecinos demasiado cerca.
En general muy recomendable!

Logement central mais calme. C'est un appartement propre et fonctionnel, cependant, il manque un espace pour se poser (style salon ...) après une journée de marche dans Porto. Absence de machine à café pour le petit déjeuné. Appartement qui convient pour une ou deux nuits.

Lovely apartment! 
Easy check in and check out. 
Incredibly clean and hygienic! Great and easy location to walk around Porto. 
Very comfortable beds and pillows. The only downside is that there's no living room/lounge to relax in at the evening but this really wasn't a big issue at all :) 
Would happily recommend this accommodation!!
Logement simple et fonctionnel pour petit séjour. Équipé comme il le faut.
Tuvimos unos problemas al hacer el check in pero lo supieron solucionar perfectamente. El piso genial y la ubicación muy céntrica y tranquila. ¡Lo recomiendo!

Appartement agréable et bien situé. Dommage que la propreté de la literie, et de la vaisselle laissait à désirer, et que lorsque nous sommes arrivés le ménage venait de débuter à l'arrache, malgré que nous avions communiqué notre heure d'arrivée. Attention l'immeuble se trouve dans une voie en sens unique  et le stationnement est difficile si vous arrivez tardivement. Personne ne parle français, donc anglais de rigueur ou portugais.
Ottima posizione, appartamento molto luminoso e ben pulito.

The apartment is very clean and central. There are 2 bedrooms but no living room and no tv, but it's fine because most of the time we were out visiting the beautiful city of Porto. 
There is a small and quiet terrace in one of the bedroom.
Great central location, good for a short stay.
Super clean place located in central area. We had very nice stay here and thanks for all your kind greeting and hosting.

Appartement très propre, grand... Par contre l'arrivée dans les lieux, 3min chrono pour nous accueillir, aucunes explications sur rien, ni ou sortir nos poubelles, ni sur le quartier,  forcément vu le temps qu'on nous a accordé... Équipement du logement très limite (1 sac poubelle, 1 torchon...), pas de produits douche contrairement à l'annonce. En plein milieu du séjour, un mail pour nous prévenir qu'un technicien va venir réparer des choses dans l'appartement,pendant la semaine ou moi je loue, avec toutes mes affaires dedans. Bref, c'est commercial, c'est expéditif. En partant nous devions fermer la porte en laissant les clés. Sauf que jamais la porte ne s'est fermée, personne n'a pris le temps de nous répondre.... L'appartement oui, la gérance non.
The appartement was very clean and well located in the city. Very quiet neighbourhoud and near good restaurants and bars. The check-in was well Done by María, she's very friendly.

L'accueil : l'appartement est géré par une agence. La communication est bonne. L'accueil est parfait (ponctualité,  precision, explications sur l'appartement, les possibilités pour garer la voiture, les transports en communs, les restaurants, les boutiques...).      L'appartement : tres beau logement dans un petit immeuble bien entretenu et au calme. Un petit cadeau de bienvenue nous attendait et tout etait à disposition. Les 2 grandes chambres dont 1 avec balcon etaient parfaites. La cuisine est bien équipée, il y a même  le lave linge. La salle de bien est top, spacieuse, fonctionnell (Website hidden by Airbnb) L'emplacement : le quartier se situe à  10 minutes à  pieds  du centre historique et du métro de trindade (que nous n'avons jamais pris!). Cest 1 quartier très sympathique, vivant et calme à la fois. Beaucoup de petits bars, restaurants et boutiques à  proximité de l'appartement. La rue de l'appartement est tres calme et accessible (Website hidden by Airbnb) Nous avons beaucoup apprécié et recommandons cet hôte sans hésitation. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent.

El apartamento está en una zona muy céntrica. Es un apartamento que consta de dos habitaciones con cama de matrimonio, pueden entrar dos parejas perfectamente. La limpieza inmejorable. El único inconveniente es que no tiene salón, ni TV en ninguna de las habitaciónes. Por el resto genial.
The Jose's place is at the great place if your are in Porto for busyness or pleasure! Will certainly use the same accommodation next time in Porto if possible!

It's a cute apartment. Everything was so clean, lots of space indoors, necessary kitchenware and a possibility of using a washing machine. Jose was polite and easy-going. Check-in and check-out were easy. 
The only disadvantage was that it's a bit cool indoors.
Bien comunicado para pasar en pareja o con un niño, como fue nuestro caso. Cerca hay restaurantes y zona de compras y supermercados. Recomendable.

L'appartement est idéalement situé pour que tout soit accessible à pied.
La propreté est au Rdv ainsi que le calme. L'accueil a été rapide mais efficace avec de bons conseils notamment sur les restaurants.
Bon séjour !

Fomos recebidos com uma garrafa de vinho de cortesia, o que achei muito legal.
O apartamento é bonito e a localização é excelente, colado na Rua de Cedofeita.
A empresa se mostrou sempre disponível para resolver qualquer problema, o que infelizmente não resolveu um mal estar na estadia.

Tive alguns problemas:

1 - A porta do banheiro travou a chave e minha esposa ficou presa. Tentei contato com a empresa, mas não mes responderam. Precisei entrar pela janela e forçar a chave com muita força para podermos sair. Quase perdemos a viagem de trem que havíamos comprado.
Somente após eu entrar em contato em outro dia, a empresa me respondeu e consertou a porta.

2 - Comprei 11 diárias, mas só havia um rolo de papel higiênico disponível. Solicitei mais e a empresa me atendeu.

3 - Não havia como limpar o apartamento, pois não há vassoura ou pá.

4 - O forno não funcionava direito.

5 - A geladeira só funcionava se colocada no nível máximo. Toda vez que a deixei abaixo da temperatura mais fria, ela desligou e minha comida estragou. Quando coloco no máximo para que ela se mantenha ligada, os alimentos congelam e, por isso,  perdi minha salada.

6 - O apartamento dispõe de dois quartos: um pequeno sem varanda e um grande com varanda. Arrumaram para mim o menor sem varanda e apenas um travesseiro tinha fronha.

A hospedagem foi ótima! O apartamento é muito arejado, com várias comodidades de qualidade. As fotos são muito sinceras. A limpeza é impecável! Localização muito boa para bares, restaurantes, lojas e todos os outros pontos turísticos da cidade. Eu retornaria ali com certeza!

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado  y esta muy limpio ,luego internet no funciono durante tres dias ,el transfer que contratamos con ellos se olvido la silla para el bébé muy peligroso,luego la calefacion no es muy buena es un aire acondicionado que hay que ponerlo en modo calor ,la mujer que nos recibio no nos dio ninguna informacion turistica ,luego tuvimos que reclamar la cuna del bébé que ya me la habian confirmado por email ,la verdad no recomiendo este alojamiento para familias demasiados detalles para olvidar y ningun tipo de atencion para disculparse...el servicio es mediocre y despersonalizado .

Excelente localização e uma ótima relação qualidade/preço.
A limpeza não é perfeita, nomeadamente o chão da cozinha e a loiça mas nada que não se possa ultrapassar. 
O frigorifico também causou alguns problemas, certifiquem-se que não está no máximo porque congela a comida.
Really nice place and localization I really recommend this place like a good to spend few days in Porto
Extremamente recomendável.  Ótimo apartamento. Perto de tudo.

Clean appartement and well located. The appartement was central yet in a calm area, making it easy for us to visit the historical part of Porto just by walking without the disturbances. Fabio’s help was appreciated, he gave us great tips to visit the city. Since we only were there for a short period of time we did not have to use the other services offered by Jose (tour bookings etc.), but it’s definitely a plus.
Simple, clean and comfortable. Ideally located in Porto. Great communication from the host. Exactly what you expect from the pictures. Highly recommended
Very good location! We had an amazing time in porto in this appartment. Easy communication with the owner. I recommend!!
Gostamos muito de estar no porto e a casa está muito bem localizada o que nos permitiu visitar muita coisa.  Para o ano voltamos ao porto. Obrigada
Lindo, bien en equipado y super limpio. Buena ubicación. Hubo un malentendido con la planificación de la llegada, pero enseguida nos contactamos y quien nos recibio fue super amable
Do check this place out! Affordable, comfy and nice. Cheers.

This apartment is very nice clean and good prepered  for gests with all kitchen stuff and even a washmachine ans and air condition.
Great location, near the metro station and city center, but in quite area.
Better than  hotel. 
The host is very proffesional and take care of everything.
Muito bem localizado! Limpo! Ótima recepção, inclusive com vinho...um verdadeiro mimo! As dicas dos locais para visitar foram sensacionais!
The apartment was perfect and everything as advertised. Great communication with the host who was very flexible and accommodating. We had an amazing stay!

La ubicación del piso excelente. El apartamento limpio y espacioso. Lo malo es que se escuchan todos los ruidos de las escaleras y de los otros pisos. Hay calefacción en dos habitaciones pero en la cocina y sobre todo en el baño hacía mucho frío. No tuvimos cosas básicas que normalmente encuentras en los pisos de Airbnb: sal, aceite, champú (había solo 4 pequeñitos para usar y tirar para 4 días y 4 personas) y etc. Es más como servicio de un hotel que un piso normal. La recepción muy buena, la chica super amable. Tuvimos unos problemas durante la estancia que el host intentó resolver. Así que bastante bueno pero no es nuestra mejor experiencia en Airbnb.
The apartment's in a great location, very clean and well equipped. We loved it. Thank you very much!
Local muito agradável, ambiente super limpo.
Muy agradecida la casa muy bien cuidada ideal para estar con niños y muy cerca a todo
Magnífica recepção, apartamento impecável, obrigado por tudo!

El alojamiento es tal como se muestras en las fotos, todo perfecto y lindo, bien iluminado y muy acogedor.
El detalle de recibirnos con una botella de vino y agua es valorable.
Tiene una excelente ubicación, muy céntrico, cerca de bares, metro, lugares turísticos y supermercados.
Pero lejos, lo mejor de todo, fueron las chicas que nos recibieron, se tomaron el tiempo de darnos un mapa y recomendarnos lugares para visitar, fueron muy amables y nos pasaron su número de teléfono por si teníamos algún problema. Tuvimos mucha buena onda de parte de ellas.
Great location and good value.

Ubicación perfecta ya que esta en pleno centro. Muy recomendado para visitas turísticas ya que como he dicho esta ubicado a menos de 5 minutos de Trindade y andando llegas en 15 minutos a la zona turística de Rua das Flores. No tiene comedor pero si que puedes improvisar alguna cena en una mesa en la cocina.
Recomiendo utilizar uber para venir del aeropuerto, es una opción que no facilitan pero que es más económico, unos 15 euros. 
En definitiva, si volviera a Porto repetiría alojamiento.

Very central location (behind one of the busiest roads) and close to great brunch and dinner spots! The hosts were very responsive and there are two bedrooms with queen sized beds (instead of the couch that's on the pictures). Fyi - The kitchen is small and there is no living room area if you are looking for that.

El apartamento destaca por tener una ubicación muy céntrica. Las 2 habitaciones, cocina y baño están muy bien, limpias y el personal de acogida fue muy amable y procuró con sus indicaciones que estuviéramos muy a gusto en nuestra estancia en el apartamento y en Porto. Tan sólo echamos de menos una habitación, tipo salón, para convivir todos la familia mientras estábamos descansando en el apartamento.
The apartment was exactly as expected!
Appartement Très bien situé Au calme!  Super accueil Avec une attention ... un vrai plaisir.
언덕에 집이 위치하고 있어서 케리어를 끌고 올라가는데 약간 어려움이 있었으나, 호스트가 친절하게 짐을 옮겨줘서 너무 좋았습니다. 집은 중심가에 위치하고 있어 20-30분 걸을 경우 대부분의 관광지를 다닐 수 있었습니다. 내부는 매우 세련됐고 사진과 같았습니다. 집은 매우 청결했습니다. 다만, 쉐톼끼 꼬쟝냤꼬  튜어떠여...:):)

Située à deux pas du centre-ville, cette location est idéale pour une visite efficace de la magnifique ville de Porto. 
Propre et fonctionnelle, l'appartement correspond parfaitement à la description de l'annonce. 

De même, la communication avec l'agence de location a été très fluide, toujours disponible et réactive pour répondre aux questions.

great place to stay! great conditions!
location, cleanliness, communication everything what you need !
Appartement bien situé et propre. Service de conciergerie très pratique (voiture à l'aéroport). N'y voyez qu'un lieu pour dormir car la déco est inexistante et les équipements sommaires!

This place was absolutely perfect. Within walking distance to everything you could possibly want in the city center, and the woman who checked us in had all of the best local tips with where to find the nearest grocery store, bars, which foods to try... Amazing value, would definitely go again.
la casa è in una posizione centralissima e molto ben tenuta

The apartment is very well located, in a small and quite street near the center. The house is big with wide spaces and two bedrooms, even if a bit dated, but in any case comfortable. The wifi is not working, only in the bathroom could be used a little bit better.
The host belongs to an agency and it is complicated the communication, because it is hard to understand when the message is an automatic one and when is a person writing it. For this reason the check in and the communications were not easy

El apartamento está genial! No tiene salón comedor o sala de estar, pero en la cocina te apañas bien. Dejan un detallito para tu entrada, cosa que se agradece muchísimo! Limpieza y ubicación un 10!! Cerca de todo, a 10 mins a pie de todo... Muy cerquita hay un Mr pizza donde por 15€ se come una pizza XXL buenisima! Hacer un free tour por Oporto es la mejor opción para conocerla mínimamente primero, y después perderse. Gracias por todo!+

This apartment is in very good place. Is near to the Trindade metro station and also in walkable distance to Ribeira- 15 minutes. Apartment was clean. Was located in quiet area. Owner answered quickly to our questions.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado. A cozinha é muito pequena. Quase não cabem 4 pessoas.  Não há sala. A mesa da cozinha é muito pequena. Apesar de ter máquina de lavar roupa, havia um aviso de que estava avariada.
O apartamento é ótimo pra 2 pessoas. Para 4, fica um pouco desconfortável.
O apartamento tem dois quartos bem amplos e o banheiro é bastante limpo e espaçoso.

The apartment was within walking distance of great restaurants and much of what we wanted to see and do. There was no lounge area which we didn’t mind as we were out and about much of the time. Beds were comfy. There was an unpleasant odour in the kitchen.
Awesome location.  Great place and very comfortable.  Good value!

Tivemos uma estadia muito agradável! O Marco, que nos recebeu, foi muito gentil e deu dicas maravilhosas sobre o Porto e suas atrações turísticas. O espaço é limpo e com uma ótima localização!! Voltaremos com certeza!

Gostámos muito da estadia. Simples mas muito acolhedor. Calmo. Tranquilo. Mesmo ao pé de uma rua super movimentada e com muito comércio e perto de vários locais pra visitar a pé. A anfitriã uma simpatia, atenciosa e disponível pra qualquer coisa que precisássemos. Pontual. Boa relação qualidade preço. O Porto é lindo!

The place location is great, close to the actions but very quiet at night and away from screaming drunks on the street. The concierge services is an excellent value added services to AirBnB. You know that someone will always be there should you need something. For sure I will be back  to Porto, and will certainly use their listing.

Le logement est  propre et bien situé , cependant il souffre de l'absence de matériel de cuisine et d’entretien . matériel mis à disposition en panne. Grande absence de José qui n'a pas daigné nous rencontrer ni répondre à nos message .

Great apartment in amazing location. Super clean and very spacious with everything you may need. Comfy beds, good air conditioning, very good bathroom and a nice full equiped kitchen. No noise whatsoever at night, very quiet and great to sleep. Only con is that the clothing washing machine was broken, but I guess they will fix it...
Overall a great place to stay and I would highly recommend it.
We spend à beautiful moment in Porto. Thanks for the hospitality. The apartment was in à perfect strategic place !

The Belvedere First is a two bedroom appartement with a nice kitchen, a bathroom and a mini terras. The host was very friendly and always ready to take my call when I was in need. The appartement itself was very fresh and clean when I arrived and it's perfect for a vacation with your friends or with family. The location in the middle of the beautiful city that is Porto, is just the cherry on top of the icing. Me and my friends would definitely recommend the Belvedere First.

It is great that the apartment is located in the center, all the spots were within walking distance. Check-in was in the afternoon, as the apartment had to be cleaned first. However, we could leave our luggage at the welcome center to start our tour. The apartment was clean and equipped with the basics. I would definitely recommend the place, as the communication with the host was very professional and the apartment as shown in the pictures.

Casa muito bem localizada, espaço super limpo, tudo novo e bem seguro. 
Gostamos bastante, local excelente para quem quer conhecer realmente o Porto e suas atrações turísticas!! Perto da tudo no centro!!

Apt bem montado e bem localizado.  A 10 min de caminhada da Torre dos Clérigos. Fomos recebidos pela proprietária do imóvel que foi extremamente gentil e acolhedora. Recomendo e espero voltar em breve.

lovely place, great for a short stay when in the Porto area.
Very helpful with information on arrival of places to see and go to. We went to a lot of places they recommended
Boa localização, limpo, confortável.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
Gute lage in gut ausgestattetem Apartment. Sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber

The flat is in a good location. The people at the concierge desk are really helpful and available to contact when you need a hand with anything! Overall, it is a good value if you're looking for a place to stay that is close to many of the landmarks in the area.

The place is awesome. Really clean and cozy.
Best part is definitely the location, since the apartment was in short walking distance for most of the main attractions of Porto. 
Diana, responsible for our check in, was really patient and explained to us all the details about the touristic points, what to do, how to get there and so on.
Really great!

It’s an amazing place, with a beautiful view and very central. Restaurants and bars right around the corner! Diana, the concierge, showed us a lot of places on the map! Thank you for that! 
The only very annoying thing is, that they contact and call way too much for the arrival.
Ok

Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral und ist gut an die Metrostation "Trindade" angebunden, von der alle wichtigen Linien abfahren. Die Kernstadt mit den meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten ist zu Fuß gut erreichbar. Umliegend befinden sich viele Möglichkeiten zum Essen und Trinken. 
Bei Anreise wird man persönlich empfangen und bekommt sehr gute Tipps für Porto. Der Check-Out ist total unkompliziert. 
Die Wohnung ist minimalistisch ausgestattet (wenig Ablageflächen, kein großer Spiegel, nur eine kleine Handtuchstange), das Nötige ist aber vorhanden.
buena ubicacion , limpio y practico.

Great place in the perfect (!!) location. 
The apartment got it all for your days exploring the town. 
Clean, calm and basic (in a good way). 

Cons:
This is an old building, so the walls are thin and you can hear the steps of your neighbors . (And assume they might hear you as well)...

** We enjoined our stay and the stepping sounds didn’t disturbed us.
Very nice flat situated in the centre of Porto.    I would visit the place again.

The location was superb! Walkable to nice restaurants and cool shops, can't ask for more. The room was nice and clean. The check in was a bit dodgy as we had to wait for quite a while and the laundry machine was out of order. The wi-fi was a bit unstable but if that's all fixed, it's a great place.
Buen sitio!!!

It was a lovely appartement to explore Porto. It's in the middle of the centre and you can walk everything.
Also the reaction time was very fast and you get lots and lots of information about things to do and to see.

Excellente adresse pour aller à Porto !
Il a suffit de se rendre au welcome center pour obtenir les clés de l'appartement ! Ensuite l'appartement était propre et très bien situé ! Une petite attention avec une carte de Porto et un vin était aussi au rendez-vous !

We really enjoyed our stay at the apartment. The location was nice, in the city center, so we could walk everywhere. The communication was very fast and complete. Everything went very smoothly. Highly recommended!

De locatie is goed, binnen 5/10 minuten sta je midden in het centrum. Het appartement heeft 2 slaapkamers, waarvan de bedden wel aan de kleine kant zijn. Wij waren met zijn 2e dus ieder een eigen bed, maar indien je met zijn 4e bent is het wel smal. Verder ontbrak er wat keukengerei. Ik zou dit appartement aanbevelen als je met zijn 2e bent, je hebt ook geen woonkamer of iets. Dan heb je nog een balkon, waar je met zijn 2e op kan zitten, maar met 4 personen niet. Verder reageren ze erg snel en was het schoon.
The apartment is well situated, simply decorated, and is excellent value for a short stay in Porto. Would certainly recommend it.
Great stay in Porto. Amazing location, right in the action but quiet. Host is friendly, apartment is clean. Great shower, good beds. Wish we could have stayed longer.
The apartment was nice and a good value for the price, excellent location close to everything ..  and Diana our host,  took time to give us travel tips and good restaurants to eat..
appartement bien situé et tranquille sécuritaire et prope,la personne qui ouvre très gentille
Place was good for a trip of 4 girls for 2 nights. The washer was broken but the local tips from our point of contact were great.
Sehr gut gelegene Wohnung mit vielen Restaurants &  Bars in der Umgebung. Für den Preis kann man nichts sagen. Wir waren mit der Wohnung sehr zufrieden.
Le logement est très bien situé à proximité du centre ville par contre il lui manque une pièce de vie
Clean and comfortable to stay with excellent location.

VERY clean apartment and close to a shopping street! There was a complimentary bottle of wine for us as well. The concierge explained everything in detail. Expected the overall vibe to be more stylish as in the pictures but I am still satisfied. The cleanliness was exceptional!

Appartement très propre, idéalement situé et au calme. L hôte est serviable, disponible et très réactif,c est vraiment appréciable. Un appartement bien adapté pour 4 personnes ,pour un séjour à Porto d une semaine, c est l endroit idéal!

The system was a little difficult to figure out because they were slightly unresponsive on the Airbnb database, but in the end the company was very friendly and the flat was clean and comfortable. Great location!

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Diana was a fantastic concierge, gave us a great welcome guide into Porto and tips on where to go and eat. The location is very good and within 10 mins to the centre of Porto. Along with the cheap price, it's a great place to stay!

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
Great place just to sleep. If you count on staying in the house, this is not the place.

this was a wonderful location but you must be in good waking shape as it is down an alley with narrow stair case. all rooms are seperated including the kitchen and there is no central community living space. quiet and clean.

José a de nombreux appartement qui sont gérés par des personnes réparties par secteurs.  Notre séjour s'est très bien passé, la communication est au top si vous avez whattsapp, et la réactivité aussi (nous n'avions pas de couette à notre arrivée, Diana est venue dans la foulée pour nous en ramener).
Merci !

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the communication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxurious and fully equipped. Highly recommended

name: Ocean Front Ecstasy! Homey w/Tile Floor, Full Kitchen, WiFi, Flat Screen–Paki Maui 409
summary: A separate living area and bedroom add appeal for families into days on the go and nights for recharging. Amenities include a full kitchen, lanai, ceiling fans, WiFi and flat screen TV.
space: Keep it comfy in this suite with refreshing tradewind breezes and gorgeous ocean views. Enjoy “the best seats in the house” while dining on the private lanai with a postcard-perfect panorama overlooking Molokai and Lanai. This one bedroom haven also includes WiFi, full kitchen, ceiling fan and flat screen TV.     On the ocean’s edge in the heart of the Kaanapali Coast,  prime location between lively Lahaina Town and the famous snorkeling bays of Napili and Kapalua puts West Maui’s most coveted recreation at your doorstep. Learn to surf and SUP (Stand Up Paddle), enjoy winter whale watching or just kick back on a catamaran cruise - it's right there and yours to discover! Paki Maui is an idyllic beachfront condo retreat with sun deck, pool, jet spa and picnic areas with grills. Enjoy championship golf, world-class spas, shopping and dining in nearby Kaanapali Beach and Kapalua resorts.

Keep it comfy in this suite with refreshing tradewind breezes and gorgeous ocean views. Enjoy “the best seats in the house” while dining on the private lanai with a postcard-perfect panorama overlooking Molokai and Lanai. This one bedroom haven also includes WiFi, full kitchen, ceiling fan and flat screen TV. host.host_about:
Relax & Recharge at our Kaanapali Coast Oceanfront Condo Resort

It’s all about the West Maui view and vibe. In the heart of the Kaanapali Coast, oceanfront Paki Maui Condo Resort raises the bar to epic levels with a beautiful Pacific Ocean panorama spanning across the Hawaiian islands of Molokai and Lanai. Individually appointed suites let you slide from simply vacationing into truly living the good life on Maui.

Paki Maui puts you at the ocean’s edge for enjoying Hawaii’s legendary sunsets and winter whale watching from your suite or the hotel’s landscaped grounds. Our prime location between lively Lahaina Town and the famous snorkeling bays of Napili and Kapalua puts West Maui’s most coveted recreation at your doorstep.

Your Paki Maui oceanfront vacation home invites you to soak in the splendor from a private lanai with an ocean or tropical courtyard view. You’ll also enjoy hotel amenities like our oceanfront swimming pool with jet spa, picnic area, barbecue grills, laundry facilities, and Free parking.

reviews.comments: Paki Maui is in a great central location, and has a great view whether you are facing the ocean or the beautifully landscaped garden in the middle
Beyond amazing!
NA

Check in was smooth and easy at the front desk. This is more like a hotel than what I pictured, but very nice. Rooms very clean, basic amenities and utensils in kitchen. View is spectacular, very close to many restaurants and grocery stores.  Convenient to Lahaina and Kaanapali.
A bit pricey for the place. The bathroom is not ideal. Good location

Management was responsive to questions.  I did feel that the age of some of the bedding could have been better.  Bedspread was almost threadbare.  Could have been more hangers, as well.  When we had a problem with ants in the kitchen, management gave us some ant buttons that seemed to work well.
Beautiful lanai view. Quiet and great location. Washer and dryer are 2.50 a piece but have internet way to pay. Beach is not great but just so many other beaches nearby it is not a problem.

name: Character renovated house close to city
summary: My house is a charming older house with character and renovated for comfort. The ground floor has 2 bedrooms, lounge/dining, kitchen, laundry and bathroom. The upstairs has a main bedroom, and another bedroom, and a large patio or balcony. There is a rear courtyard garden and pond.
space: The house is about 200 m2. It is in a quiet street. It is a street block from the Glebe Light Rail station which light rail connects to the Fish Markets, Pyrmont, Star Casino, Darling Harbour, China Town and Paddy's Markets, Capitol Theatre and the Central Railway Station. Frequent buses pass through Glebe Point Road - 2 minutes away - to the city, Central Railway Station and to the suburbs of Newtown, Leichardt and the beach side suburb of Coogee. Blackwattle Bay and the public parks and walkway around it, an arm of Sydney Harbour , is but a short walk from the house. The city , and its attractions of the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Botanical Gardens, Pitt Street shopping mall, Circular Quay, is within 15 to 45 minutes from the house, by transport or walking. Glebe Point Road , a street of cafes restaurants and retail centres is close by. Broadway Shopping Centre, with an Aldi supermarket, a Coles supermarket, a Harris Farm fresh fruit and vegetable outlet, cafes, restaurants, clothi

The upstairs has a main bedroom, and another bedroom, and a large patio or balcony. There is a rear courtyard garden and pond. The house is about 200 m2. It is in a quiet street. It is a street block from the Glebe Light Rail station which light rail connects to the Fish Markets, Pyrmont, Star Casino, Darling Harbour, China Town and Paddy's Markets, Capitol Theatre and the Central Railway Station. The city , and its attractions of the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Botanical Gardens, Pitt Street shopping mall, Circular Quay, is within 15
neighborhood_overview: Glebe is an early and original inner city suburb off Sydney dating from the 1800's. It is marked by terraces and workers cottages. It has a mix of people from students - for the nearby University of Sydney - to those renting to owners of all walks of life. Its closeness to the city but without the business of a city is its attraction.
notes: There is no off street parking. Streets in the area and in the Glebe suburb are mostly restricted parking of 2 to 4 hours between the hours of 8am to 6 to 10 pm each day. Visitor parking permits are available allowing daily parking in any Glebe suburb restricted parking streets where the parking signs exempt Area G permits - which is streets around the house and in almost all other streets of Glebe. The upstairs rooms are accessed by stairs. The stairs are like usual stairs in Sydney terraces. The stairs are carpeted with a hand rail. Some may find the stairs "steep". Some one with a physical impairment, or of some age with physical limitations, may have difficulty negotiating the stairs. The stairs are shown in photos of the house. Two bedrooms are on the ground level on the house so those who may not be able to use the stairs will have unimpeded use to these rooms.
transit: Buses regularly connect to the city and suburbs along Glebe Point Road. Times between buses is 10 to 20 minutes. The Light Rail, nearby, regularly connects to the city and Central Railway Station which has a direct train connection to the domestic and international airports. The Light Rail runs every 10 minutes in peak hours and 20 minutes at other times.
access: The house has a rear courtyard and pond sheltered by a large tree, which allows for  outside meeting and eating. The kitchen has a Miele electric oven, a gas 4 plate stove and a dishwasher. The laundry has a front loaded Bosch washer and a separate dryer. Wifi is available. The house has 2 TV's - one in the upstairs main bedroom and one in the lounge. There is air conditioning in the 2 upstairs bedrooms and air-conditioning in the bathroom.
interaction: There will be contact available to guests with the host or his agent during their stay.
house_rules: 1 No quests in number to exceed the number  identified on booking. 2 The total number of quests not to exceed 6. 3 The house and property to be kept clean in the same state as it was when the quests take possession. 4 Any damage to the property or items, however caused by the quests or anyone else, during the period of possession by the quests, to be the responsibility of the quest(s) who shall compensate the host for the costs of fixing the damage, or the replacement cost or value of the lost or damaged item as the case may be as the host shall determine. 5 No smoking of tobacco or use of any illicit drugs or substances in the house or its grounds at all.

host.host_about:
I am a retired lawyer. I live in Sydney, Australia. I was born in Tasmania and lived there until I moved to Sydney 25 years ago. I live in Glebe, an older and early suburb of Sydney west of and close to the city. It is close to public transport - light rail and buses - and is between 15 to 35 minutes from the city depending on whether you bus or train or walk. My house is close to Blackwattle Bay an arm of Sydney Harbour.
I have travelled and intend to travel in the future. I usually travel alone or with my partner a pharmaceutical representative.
We love food, music and theatre and experiencing the joys and wonders of different cities and places. Our favourite places have been Asia, Europe and USA.
We are friendly, personable and considerate with a clean and tidy attitude.

reviews.comments: Bill's house is an opulent oasis. We were 3 colleagues in town for a trade show, and this was a wonderful base to relax in. 2 mins walk from the light rail station made it really easy to get around. The third bedroom is up a flight of quite steep stairs. There are good hand rails, but those with limited mobility would be better in the downstairs rooms. Beautiful things surround you throughout the property. The beds were very comfortable and there were plenty of amentites. A true home away from home. Highly recommended.

Very nice house Best place to live in Sydney.
Bill is a very nice man who takes care of his guests and their wishes. 
Absolutely reconommable
Great. House in reachable location. Really comfy beds and all needs catered for. Good communication. Very highly recommended.

Bills's Place is exactly as described and with 4 bedrooms certainly has plenty of space. 
We loved the little courtyard in the back with the fishpond. 
The beautiful antique furniture and deco was a nice touch to a classic terrace house in contrast to the modern kitchen and bathroom.
The house manual was very helpful in explaining everything to do with the house.
Location is perfect, just 2 minutes walk to the light rail and 2 minutes to shops and restaurants. 
Bill was very helpful with our request to extend our stay a couple of hours so we didn't need to wait at the airport.  We would definitely like to stay again.

This is a beautiful, well-equipped and comfortable home full of eclectic decor and in a great location, close to transport, cafes, restaurants, interesting shops and markets. The stairs to the top bedroom are steep and the only bathroom is on the ground floor, so not suitable for anyone with disabilities or young children, but perfect for those who appreciate beauty and art and good living and prefer to be in an area that is lively and hip during the day but quiet at night. The sunny courtyard is a bonus, as are the friendly neighbours.
Great house and location highly recommend
Very beautiful house, worth the money! Very good communication and we even checked in early. Definitely be back again.
Beautiful period house. Very spacious and tidy. Amazing location so close to transport and city. Made to feel very welcome by our host. An absolute pleasure. Would choose to stay here again.
Great location to central city. Bill's home is very nice, clean and had great amenities. Bill sorted parking permits for us which was great. Thanks, we will definitely be back.

Feel like living in owb own home. Amazing house with beautiful garden.
Close to Darling Harbour, about 20 minutes walk. Close to restaurants and supermarket.
The host was very supportive and quick response for any querry or issue.
Absolutely will come back if travelling to Sydney.

Great location, great for family, plenty of amenities and supplies provided and quick helpful host .  Would definitely stay again.
Book about property was great for advice as well as house information and history.
Thanks for a great stay
A lovely house in a great location with a very thoughtful and considerate host.  A real find!

Bill's place is full of characters as he stated in his advertising.  Lots of books, pictures, vases, antiques and more. It is spacious and comfortable. Nice kitchen and bathroom, very clean. Beautiful courtyard - unfortunately we could not enjoy much due to lots of stormy days.  We suggest people with children younger than four years old be more thoughtful about renting the place, due to Bill's antiques displays in the house. Also taking your children to toilet at night is a bit of a walk.
Lovely house in great central location, 2 minute walk to light rail station. Great couples house, very comfortable and everything we needed was there.
Great location

Bill has been a wonderful host, very communicative and helpful with the checking in and out process as I booked his place on behalf of my in laws. My in laws enjoyed their stay and I would recommend his place to other travelers traveling in a group.

Staying at Bill's place is a home away from home. Beautifully decorated and enough room for 3 couples. Comfy beds, beautiful courtyard. It has everything you need, full kitchen if cooking. Very conveniently located in Glebe, only minutes from Light Rail Station, a short walk to Glebe Point Road to busses that take you into the CBD, lots and lots of restaurants, cafes, supermarkets. A short walk to the Glebe Markets held every Saturday (a must do in Glebe). Bill was very helpful and prompt in communicating, his book is very informative. Parking is scarce in Glebe, however Bill was able to supply parking permits at a very small cost. Value for money!!!
Very nice house and Bill is very thoughtful.
Wonderful home.... an oasis on the city. Close enough to everything but when you close the door it is a sanctuary within the hustle and bustle. Sit in the private garden and relax.
房子很有特色,让我感觉到房东的文化底蕴丰厚｡地理位置十分满意｡房东人很好,我们早上退房下午飞机,就帮我们保管行李,好让我们早上去逛｡

Bill is a most helpful and hospitable host, and the house is beautiful, peaceful and relaxing. It is located in a leafy suburb close to the CBD & right around the corner from restaurants, cafes and bars. Bill's place is the perfect base from which to explore Sydney and is a pleasure to come home to after a day out. The bedrooms are spacious, the kitchen is newly renovated and contains everything you need, and the living area is homely and comfortable. Bill's home is furnished with interesting and unique artworks and antiques, and the courtyard is a relaxing spot to enjoy a morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening. Highly recommended!

Do yourself a favour and stay at Bills house. The locations in Glebe is wonderful, close to the city and Glebe but in a gorgeous quiet location. The house is really big and allows a large group to expand into the space. Bill is a very accommodating host. Thanks for everything.
Great location, excellent host, very well provisioned house. Spacious bedrooms, good quality linen. Super kitchen. Had a great stay.

Bill is nice and patient. He made a very useful information booklet for all customers, including all kinds of travel information you need!
The house is more amazing than the photos on website. You won't be disappointed!
A beautiful house, in an amazing location. Bill, a great host. Everything was easy and simple. I really recommend it!
Bill's place was FANTASTIC!  The house was very clean, organized and Bill was a very hospitable host.  Definitely a hidden gem in a great part of the city!  Thanks for making our NYE stay great!

Beautiful home, great location, very comfortable, great host.
Thanks for a perfect stay Bill.
We felt very lucky to enjoy your beautiful home.
Robyn

Bill was a lovely host, easy to communicate with, quick to respond. He ensured we had everything we needed and knew the locations of nearby essentials. The house was spacious, clean and equiped with all we needed. Beautiful art.

The house is an older style, full of character and art, and Chinese (Website hidden by Airbnb) has spacious bedrooms and modern kitchen equipped with all the appliances,however we found the living area a bit dark, with no sunlight during the day. Another con would be only one toilet for the whole house.

The host is very responsive and happy to assist anytime.
Overall a nice stay, and would recommend it to the fellow travellers.
整套房子干净,整洁｡布置的比较紧凑温馨｡摆放了很多画,照片,装饰品,Bill是非常周到细致的主人,准备了详细周边购物,交通,出游指南｡厨房用具非常全,我们一家五口做饭聚餐,不亦乐乎｡距离旁边轻轨站Glebe只有100多米,很方便｡主人家的小院子很棒,还有个小鱼池,绿植茂密,坐在院子里吃酒喝茶也是美事!

Bill很贴心的提醒我们一点钟可以提前入住了｡对于凌晨七点到达的一大家子早休息一个小时很重要,关键是感觉到了切实的关心｡
距离鱼市场步行十分钟,然后从鱼市场距离daring harbor十分钟,中间经过一个儿童乐园不错｡继续步行十分钟就到了海德公园,然后一路沿着公园走到皇家公园｡临近海边看当地人锻炼身体,读书,几个朋友喝啤酒都十分惬意｡
悉尼核心区步行一个半小时够了｡带着孩子们走走停停,步行是最好的选择｡
感谢Bill准备的旅游建议｡桌子上放了一大本书｡各种电器使用说明,到远近的商店信息｡很用心的人｡屋里各地带回来的艺术品｡泰国的,中国的元素不少｡推荐大家来悉尼住在Bill家｡再次感谢
Bill is a very nice people,he gives me a lot of tips how to tour in Sydney.

My family and I had a great stay at Bill's Place. The house was roomy, with everything you need, and in  great central location to get around Sydney. Bill was also very responsive and detailed in his communication. Would highly recommend.
Beautifully appointed place conveniently located to city transit. Gracious, accommodating, informative host.  Highly recommend!!
Bill’s place is fantastic and fantastically located. He was also a very attentive host providing lots of helpful info and responding quickly. Thanks Bill!

Highly recommended this amazing terrace home. The owner has thought of EVERYTHING. truly felt as if we had the experience of a lifetime.     Comfortably slept 5 adults with room for extras if we needed it. Don't go past this air bnb.... It was our first and blew us out of the water....

Beautiful house in a great location, easy to walk into city or the light rail is only a five minute walk from the house. Bill was very accommodating as we arrived two hours earlier than expected (party of six). Also let us stay longer than normal checkout time. Everything you need for your stay is detailed in the house manual, bill also took the time to show us around explaining the workings of the house. Only issue for us (Scottish folk) was we couldn’t open any of the windows as no fly screens, maybe not a problem for others though. Would recommend staying here.

Bill was a great host. He met us at the house and showed us around. He gave us a lot of tips. The house is amazing. So beautiful with everything you might need! We can definitely recommend staying here! It is beautiful!

Amazing house. Beautifully decorated, quiet, relaxing. So close to public transport, restaurants and shops. Tea, coffee and condiments included.Full laundry and fully equipped kitchen. Delightful outdoor areas. Plenty of information about the area. Better than the best hotel. True luxury. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

What an inner-city haven this place is.
Even more charming than it appears in the photos. Clean, quite and perfectly situated in Glebe for all it has to offer, as well as close to transport options to take you where ever you want to go.

Highly recommended

Bill's house is located at strategic place where you can reach to many tourist spots easily. The walking distance from the house to Sydney fish market is less than 10 minutes. There is a light rail station nearby. 

We were impressed when we see the fully equipped kitchen.You can even do some baking stuff with this nice kitchen. 

We feel grateful when Bill allowed us to check in earlier and check out late.  He is a good host and his house is well maintained.
It was a wonderful stay for me and my family at Bill's house. It is exactly as what is there in the description and photos. Would strongly recommend to stay here if one is traveling to Sydney.
Such a gorgeous house and so spacious for the location! Would stay again!!

This was my first airbnb experience and I really hope my future ones are as oustanding as this one. The place is in a good location, clean and modern but you still get the 1800s terrace housing experience. All amenities were outstanding and very good detailed information was provided.

The house is amazing - beautiful interior design and decorations. A handy house manual tells you lots of stories behind the house and it’s fascinating. Great location, all rooms are spacious and got comfy bed, very clean and kitchen is well equipped with everything you could need. Highly recommended!

If you are looking for a great 4 bedroom place in Glebe with heaps of history & character then look no further than Bills place. Retains some of the original charm with some furniture & decorations which it has a great new kitchen & bathroom. On a quiet street walking distance from Glebe shops or only a quick cab ride to city this is a great launching pad to explore the city from. Highly recommend Bills place.

Hi Bill, we had a great stay. Thanks so much for your hospitality. The house was lovely and clean and well equipped. Easy walk down to Darling Harbour each day of our conference. Perfect location. Highly recommended
Fantastic home with plenty of space, close to public transport and eclectic mix of art and furniture. Would stay here again.
The host canceled this reservation 80 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good value,  close to local cafes and  transport. Nice to have room for 3 couples to feel at home an not in a hotel.
Fantastic place, far better than the photos show. Great location just out of the hustle of the CBD. Highly recommended.
The ambience of the house is wonderful, the location is great for exploring Sydney CDS/Harbour area. Just take note there are 4 brms and 1 bathroom.
Great place thanks bill !

Fantastic house with beautiful art work and comfortable amenities. Close to public transport, downtown Glebe and Sydney CBD. Bill was very hospitable.
Will stay again.
Highly recommend Bill’s place for space and location.  It far exceeded our expectations.  A very stylish environment.  The host was first rate.
非常好了

name: Spacious Sunlit 1 BR Apartment in Heart of Harlem
summary: Oversized 900 sq. ft. 1-Bedroom apartment on 2nd floor walk-up of a family-owned brownstone in the heart of Harlem. 15 minutes to Times Square!
space: - Giant windows, Northern and Southern, tall ceilings, ceiling fans - Gas Oven, Microwave - 60 inch 4KTV, basic cable - Yamaha P90 Keyboard
description: Oversized 900 sq. ft. 1-Bedroom apartment on 2nd floor walk-up of a family-owned brownstone in the heart of Harlem. 15 minutes to Times Square! - Giant windows, Northern and Southern, tall ceilings, ceiling fans - Gas Oven, Microwave - 60 inch 4KTV, basic cable - Yamaha P90 Keyboard I'll be out of town during your stay, so I'll arrange to have a key-drop-off and pick-up from a family friend! I'll be accessible via phone or email for any questions, concerns, or recommendations. Also,

notes: It's a family-owned brownstone and my very kind and gracious landlords live beneath me, so just use your discretion in terms of late-night activities. Also, a dog lives in this apartment for a few months of the year, so tenants with pet hair/dander allergies may want to look elsewhere.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a Kansas-bred actor living in New York City with my 10-year-old corgi, Bailey. I've lived in the city for about 10 years and I can't imagine living anywhere else. I'm a piano player, gadget nerd, travel aficionado and food lover. I've been using Airbnb for years and I'm happy to now be able to share my place with you!

reviews.comments: Excellent near-two-month stay here with my wife. Jeff is a friendly host and his home was perfectly-equipped, tidy and indeed spacious as described. We would have stuck around even longer if the space remained available.

The space is very comfortable and super big!
The neighborhood is safe and there are a lot of good bar and restaurants.
Laundry and grocery very closed and subway as well.
Jeff is very nice and friendly always responsive and precise.
Definitely recommended host and apartment!

name: Beachside room not far from the airport,
summary: A family home near the beach, airport and city. Have all the benefits of being 15km from the airport and city, but with the advantage of being a 2 minute walk from the beach. Great views from the upstairs lounge out over Malabar bay and headland.
space: Our house has a double bedroom available with wardrobe and guest's own bathroom. There is also an upstairs lounge with balcony and sea views for guests to use. We have a pool or, alternatively, Malabar beach is a 2 minute walk away. The airport is 15km away (20mins in a cab), the city is 15km away, and a bus stop just around the corner that takes you straight into the city. A cab or uber will take about 20mins to the city, the bus can take for 40 - 50 mins.
description: A family home near the beach, airport and city. Have all the benefits of being 15km from the airport and city, but with the advantage of being a 2 minute walk from the beach. Great views from the upstairs lounge out over Malabar bay and headland. Our house has a double bedroom available with wardrobe and guest's own bathroom. There is also an upstairs lounge with balcony and sea views for guests to use. We have a pool or, alternatively, Malabar beach is a 2 minute walk away. The airport is 15km away (20mins in a cab), the city is 15km away, and a bus stop just around the corner that takes you straight into the city. A cab or uber will take about 20mins to the city, the bus can take for 40 - 50 mins. Guests can have free use of the pool and upstairs lounge.  Unlimited WiFi for free. This is as much or as little as guests require - we can give advice on how to get around, where to get the best coffee (in our opinion anyway!), the best places to go. Or we can leave you alone to discover S
neighborhood_overview: The beach is at the bottom of the road. Surrounded by golf courses! Malabar is one of Sydney's best kept secrets - quiet beach not far from the city. Gentle waves with no rips so ideal for families and fishermen! There are 3 coffee shops 5 minutes walk away, along with take aways, a couple of restaurants, a convenience store and a pharmacy. There is a children's playground and BBQ area right next to the beach. Coastal Walks around the headland and in surrounding suburbs. Maroubra is a short drive away with another great beach, surfing, and plenty of restaurants. Little Bay & La Perouse are also a short drive or couple of bus stops away with restaurants, take away shops and yet more beaches.
notes: There is a TV / monitor in the lounge, but no TV channels available. If you have streaming apps on your apple devices (netflix, seven etc) these can plugged into the TV via an HDMI cable.  We also have a dog FYI - if this is a problem please contact us prior to booking.
transit: There are buses from outside the house (number 399), directly into the city, travelling past the beaches, Randwick,  Centennial Park and the SCG, ending at Circular Quay. This can take 40 - 50 mins depending upon traffic. There are also frequent buses from Anzac Parade (approx 5- 10 mins walk) to the city and Central Station. These buses take a more direct route and can be a little quicker into the city.
access: Guests can have free use of the pool and upstairs lounge.  Unlimited WiFi for free.
interaction: This is as much or as little as guests require - we can give advice on how to get around, where to get the best coffee (in our opinion anyway!), the best places to go. Or we can leave you alone to discover Sydney yourselves.
house_rules: - No loud music or parties. As this is our home please respect the property and our neighbours - Please enquire for additional room if you have children (sofa bed)

host.host_about:
My partner Steve and I are originally from the north of England, but have been in Australia for over 12 years now. We are new to hosting on Air BnB but have used it as guests and thoroughly loved it.
We have been living here in Malabar for 5 years and feel so lucky to live in such a fantastic beachside suburb yet so close to the city.
Hopefully we can look after guests as well as we have been looked after by other Air BnB hosts.

reviews.comments: Great place, location and room. Fiona was a great host and she also let us use a tv room in the second floor. Room and bathroom were clean and we had everything we needed. She provided guidance on public transport and places to visit. Jackson, her dog, is lovely and very calm. We definitely recommend this. place.

Really suited what we needed during our stay in Sydney. Shame we didn't have time to enjoy the local beach. Felt really at home with the top floor at our disposal, to chill and unwind after a day out and about.

The best location. An awesome couple. And even if you don't like dogs, their dog is beautiful, friendly. Great location. Fantastic room and gorgeou
views of the ocean. Highly recommended. 11/10 can't wait to return and visit.... Thank you so much for a home away from home...

Nice well furnished room in a quiet neighborhood. Hosts are very kind and helpful, the dog is really cute, you'll fall in love with him.
We definitely recommend this place and had a beautiful stay there.

Fiona and her family made sure we felt welcome in their home. We had plenty of privacy upstairs; a very quiet house. 
Excellent host!

Mon copain et moi avons passé un mois chez Fiona. La maison est parfaite, très grande et la chambre se situe au premier étage. Tout était propre, on avait notre salle de bain privée ainsi qu'un balcon et qu'un salon avec TV pour nous. Fiona et Steeve sont des personnes formidables avec qui on peut facilement discuter. Leur chien Jackson est très câlin et super gentil (très sage). Je recommande cette chambre à tout le monde !
Fiona and Steve’s place is absolutely fantastic for a homely and quiet stay close to the city. Close to the beach and shops. Great stay for a business/pleasure trip !
Really awesome stay. Highly recommend. Very comfortable room, clean and nice shower. Friendly dog and great location
Very friendly, close to the beach, lovely water views, quiet neighbourhood, clean and comfortable.
great people, great place and one very spoiled super friendly doggie
