Fiona was a great hostess. I was able to come and go as needed. The dog was no problem, in fact quite friendly. The bed was very comfortable and tastefully furnished. The bathroom was clean and for my own use. Overall recommend for short stay visitors to the area.

Fiona's place is in an exceptional location, nearby the beach and some stunning views and park facilities as well as a lovely cafe.  The amenities are very nicely arranged and very clean.  Everything is stylish and modern and Fiona is delightful.  I would highly recommend staying!
Excellent host who was extremely helpful. Very convenient to Airport and beaches.

I chose Fiona’s place because it was near Randwick Golf Course .
Steve and Fiona where helpful and accommodating with you feeling obliged to continuously chat.
They left us to the upstairs area with privacy yet with the added benefit of being able to reach out downstairs to them when needed
Beautiful well equipped room in a separat floor with a stunning view over the beach.

Great location, accommodation and hospitality.
Very friendly family and cute dog.  Hosts were helpful
but not intrusive and made me feel very welcome in
their home.
I stayed in a lovely, bright bedroom, which was quiet with
a very comfortable bed and good amenities.
I had a very enjoyable stay and it was a pleasure to meet this host family.

name: Acogedor alojamiento en SAGRADA FAMILIA
summary: Alojamiento cerca de la Sagrada Familia. Situado en una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona. Cerca de todas las  comodidades y a un paseo a pie de los sitios mas emblemáticos de la ciudad.  La habitación es pequeña pero confortable y con lo necesario para que disfruten de una magnifica estancia.  Nos gustaría alojarles y compartir experiencias con ustedes. Llevamos tiempo viajando de esta manera y ya no contemplamos otra forma de viajar. Hablamos Ingles, Francés, Portugués y Español.
space: El alojamiento es un piso muy luminoso y muy tranquilo, sin apenas ruido. Disfrutaran de una habitación doble con ventana, armario y ventilador. Posibilidad de alojar una tercera persona en una pequeña habitación individual, la cual dispone de armario y escritorio, con salida a un balcón interior. El alojamiento mide alrededor de 60 m2. En el caso de que 2 personas quieran ocupar las 2 habitaciones, tendrían que comunicarlo en el mensaje y se aplicaría un suplemento.
description: Alojamiento cerca de la Sagrada Familia. Situado en una de las mejores zonas de Barcelona. Cerca de todas las  comodidades y a un paseo a pie de los sitios mas emblemáticos de la ciudad.  La habitación es pequeña pero confortable y con lo necesario para que disfruten de una magnifica estancia.  Nos gustaría alojarles y compartir experiencias con ustedes. Llevamos tiempo viajando de esta manera y ya no contemplamos otra forma de viajar. Hablamos Ingles, Francés, Portugués y Español. El alojamiento es un piso muy luminoso y muy tranquilo, sin apenas ruido. Disfrutaran de una habitación doble con ventana, armario y ventilador. Posibilidad de alojar una tercera persona en una pequeña habitación individual, la cual dispone de armario y escritorio, con salida a un balcón interior. El alojamiento mide alrededor de 60 m2. En el caso de que 2 personas quieran ocupar las 2 habitaciones, tendrían que comunicarlo en el mensaje y se aplicaría un suplemento. Ustedes podrán disfrutar sin compromiso n
neighborhood_overview: Situado a pocos pasos de la Sagrada Familia. Podrán pasear por la avenida Gaudi,  el paseo de Sant Joan que lleva hasta el Arco del Triunfo y por las calles del distrito de Gracia. A pocos minutos se sorprenderán al ver uno de los hospitales mas bonitos del mundo. Podrán tapear y degustar la gastronomia catalana y española. En fin, el barrio dispone de todas las comodidades.
notes: En esta casa existen pequeñas reglas: • Sentirse como en casa y disfrutar de la estancia. • Compartir experiencias. • No tener vergüenza para preguntar cualquier cosa. • Utilizar los servicios que los anfitriones ponen a disposición con respeto y orden. • Cuidar las cosas como si fueran de uno mismo. • La terraza le está esperando con mucho gusto si desea fumar. • Después de un largo día, respetemos nuestras horas de descanso.
transit: Diferentes metros y buses disponibles en el barrio.
access: Ustedes podrán disfrutar sin compromiso ninguno de la cocina (totalmente equipada), del salón/comedor muy luminoso durante todo el día (equipado con sofá, televisión y una mesa para comer) , de una terraza muy practica y de un baño.
interaction: Podrán discutir con nosotros y mantener conversaciones interesantes si lo desean.
house_rules: - Silencio entre las 23 horas y las 9 horas

host.host_about: Me encanta viajar y conocer gente nueva.
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

name: LARGE LUXURY 2bed,w/King,Queen & Full, TIMES SQ
summary: Oversized apartment in Prime Location! Typically in NYC, you need to compromise size or location, but this place you get the best of both!  HUGE living room, HUGE master bedroom & Kitchen with large granite serving island! Apt sleeps 6 and offers a King Bed, Queen Bed, a Full-size futon bed, plus a comfortable sectional sofa. Ideal location in Hells Kitchen only 1/2 a block from the subway and located near 50th & 9th in the heart of everything.
space: This cozy, low-floor apt is located just blocks from Times Square & Central Park and has luxurious area rugs throughout, in an open living room, perfect for eating & entertaining, with a granite serving island, breakfast nook stools, and a large sectional sofa with coffee table.  The living room is complete with a HUGE 60 inch HD TV with Surround Sound! There are also TVs in each bedroom, complete with Direct TV's Whole House DVR, with all the networks you have at home, as well as smart TV apps such as Netflix & HBO Go.  The apartment of course has free WiFi throughout.  The kitchen has a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, fridge, toaster oven, and plenty of dishware, pots and pans, and all the cookware & utensils you need to serve a nice meal at home.  We also have a Keurig coffee machine as well as a standard coffee maker for your morning coffee!  All rooms have quality air conditioning during summer months and central heat as well as backup electric space heaters during the winter.
description: Oversized apartment in Prime Location! Typically in NYC, you need to compromise size or location, but this place you get the best of both!  HUGE living room, HUGE master bedroom & Kitchen with large granite serving island! Apt sleeps 6 and offers a King Bed, Queen Bed, a Full-size futon bed, plus a comfortable sectional sofa. Ideal location in Hells Kitchen only 1/2 a block from the subway and located near 50th & 9th in the heart of everything. This cozy, low-floor apt is located just blocks from Times Square & Central Park and has luxurious area rugs throughout, in an open living room, perfect for eating & entertaining, with a granite serving island, breakfast nook stools, and a large sectional sofa with coffee table.  The living room is complete with a HUGE 60 inch HD TV with Surround Sound! There are also TVs in each bedroom, complete with Direct TV's Whole House DVR, with all the networks you have at home, as well as smart TV apps such as Netflix & HBO Go.  The apartment of course
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location with this one! Located near 50th Street & 9th Avenue, you'll be staying in the heart of trendy Hell's Kitchen!  You are only a short walk to Times Square, Central Park and the famous 42nd Street!  Walk to all the famous sites including Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, and all the Broadway shows!  Also, the subway stops right on our block!!  Plenty of nightlife, restaurants and bars located within walking distance in the best part of New York City!
notes: Don't worry about bringing towels nor linens.  We provide all of that for you!  Additionally we have an iron, ironing board, umbrellas, shampoo/body wash, & hair dryer available for your use.  No need to bring any of that stuff!
transit: The 50th Street subway station is right down the block!  From there you can take the C or E train up and down 8th Avenue, to Penn Station, or to either of the NYC airports.  Uber & yellow cabs are also easily available 24 hours a day.
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment as well as closet space & storage in the master bedroom.
house_rules: - - Must Recycle - - No Pets, No Smoking

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: From NJ originally, Live in Manhattan and have a home in South Florida.  I am a Real Estate Broker.

reviews.comments: Es un departamento que está ubicado en el corazón de New York ideal para acceder a todas las atracciones de esa increíble ciudad.
Comfortable, away from noise and convenient: the apartment was everything we needed for our stay in NYC. Check in was a breeze and Joe answered our questions promptly. We were very pleased.

Joe's Place was excellent for our mother/daughter trip to NYC! It was very centrally located to anything you could be looking for.  Joe checked on us and made sure we didn't need anything - he made the whole accommodation part great!
Confortable, cerca del metro y de puntos turísticos. Éramos 5 adultos y estuvimos muy cómodos.

Joe's place is comfortable, relatively quiet (given its location) and very convenient. It is close to the subway, restaurants and broadway. Our family of 5 were comfortably accommodated. We enjoyed being able to go out in Manhattan and then come back for a reprieve from the craziness of NY before heading out again. 
We felt a bit uncomfortable about having to hide our stay from the neighbours as we were told on arrival to never answer the door and to not go out into the stairwell if someone is out there. Coming from a friendly neighbourhood in Australia, this felt weird but in the end it was not a problem as the couple of people we passed were friendly and smiled, seeming completely unconcerned about us being there. Thank you Joe!

My family and I stayed at the apartment for about a week and everything was great. We were four adults and a baby of 9 month, one flight of stairs worked with a stroller. We were a bit late for the planed check-in but he patiently waited for us witch we really appreciated. The communication with Joe was very good and we always felt secure with our booking and stay. Overall a very nice apartment in the middle of NYC with a great owner. Thanks for the stay Joe!

Joe's apartment was exactly as described. Communication was excellent. Location could not have been better.  Easy walking distance to the subway, theater district, and more eateries than you can possibly imagine. Apartment was clean and well furnished. Beds were comfortable. We will most definitely be back!!

Joe's apartment is in a perfect location for exploring New York. Close to time square and public transport. 
Joe and Ruben where friendly and helpful before and throughout our stay. Great family accommodation. :-)
We really enjoyed our stay! Central location, great restaurants, and close to subway!
Joe place is near to time square. Joe and his partners are very nice. Their house had make us had good experience in Mahattan.

We loved our stay at Joe's. There was enough room for us - 3 adults and two kids. More than enough tvs and he was gracious enough to let us use his dvr.  The location is so close to everything. Comfy beds and great air conditioning. Thanks again Joe!

Joe's apartment is in the perfect location for walking to everything or taking the subway. Had a great stay. Loved the big screen TVs. Loved the king size bed! Very comfy. Bathroom needs a little attention.

This home is in a perfect location for getting around NYC.  It was a very safe neighborhood. There were 5 of us girls traveling and we had plenty of space for all of us. Joe was at the home waiting for us when we got there and  explained how everything worked. Everyone was pleased with how big the place was. There were air conditioners in every room and the kitchen was supplied with everything we needed.  We were able to walk to Times Square, Central Park, Broadway, and so many good restaurants.  The subways were just down the street and an easy ride to Penn Station and The WTC.  I would definitely stay here again.

Its been wonderful experience to stay at Joe's apartment. The apartment is very clean & in the prime area. The kitchenette is equipped with everything. The place is quite big in comparison with the other apartments I stayed in. To top it Joe is a very warm & wonderful host. We really enjoyed our stay Joe's apartment.

Great location, very nice apartment, building kind of old.
No elevator, but it's OK.
Nice apartment and excellent location. Good for families and small groups that would like to visit NY (very close to metro stations as well as to Times Square). Highly recommended!
Great place in a great location.  Would definitely stay here again.
The first bedroom had a lot of street noise especially from the outside air conditioners  The master bedroom very spacious

Joe’s place was great for our family of 4. Big...lots of room...even a king-size bed. Check-in was a breeze. It’s right smack in the middle of Hell’s Kitchen, but also just a few blocks away from Times Square and all the theaters. For being in the middle of the action, the apartment is surprisingly quiet. All in all, an excellent experience. We will be back.

Joe's place was exactly as advertised - roomy, comfortable and well-appointed.  The location is very central - there are many restaurants and attractions within walking distance.  The subway is also very close by.  Joe was an excellent host and resource.  He responded to our questions promptly and followed up to ensure all our needs were being met.  I would definitely stay here again!

Joe's apartment is exactly as described.  It was the perfect setup for 2 of us in town for a conference in Times Square, and less than a 10min walk away.  It was clean and quiet and I would highly recommend.

Joe was so accommodating considering we had our initial Air B and B cancel on us the day before our trip.  He was able to get us booked and all set before we left.  Communication was excellent, and we enjoyed our stay in his comfy place!

I can't thank Joe enough for making my first try with Airbnb a wonderful experience. I'm hooked! He was a thoughtful and attentive host - even came and replaced the router so the WiFi would work properly.  For our large family party of 5, this was so much more economical and comfortable than 2 hotel rooms. The location was perfect - safe, convenient, everything within walking distance. The apt was exactly as advertised - actually, it was much bigger than expected as far as NY apts go, and included all the amenities we needed for out stay over the Thanksgiving holiday (I loved the well-stocked, roomy kitchen). My kids (3 teenagers) especially appreciated the 3! large screen TVs and having enough room to spread out. They had such a great time that they want to make Thanksgiving in NYC a tradition now!
Happy Holidays!
Tracey H & family
Great place; will come again!

My girlfriends and I️ were in NYC for a girls trip and stayed overnight at Joe’s apartment. Everyone enjoyed our stay. We were greeted by Reuban who gave us a tour and went over some house rules. Everything was like it stated in the bio. The apartment was clean and spacious ( accommodated 5 of us perfectly) and felt like Home. Close to Times Square. Would recommend his place.

Flawless check in experience.  Great communication.  Apartment is as advertised and certainly fairly represented in pictures/description (older but well decorated and in good shape).  Plenty of restaurants and theaters within close walking distance.   Safe neighborhood.  I felt good from the second my Uber dropped us off - and we walked into the apartment.
Lots of great places to eat. Also close to 50th street Subway. The apartment is well stocked. I really appreciated the shampoo and conditioner in the shower because liquids weigh your bags down.

World class accommodations.  Impeccable service, right down the street from Times Square as well tucked into awesome neighborhood with grocery store steps away, restaurants, simply can’t say enough about Joes place.  Everything from clean towels, dishes, coffee filters, clear down to the cork screw wine glasses.  This was the New York City trip of a lifetime for my wife and daughters.  Half the time we wanted to just hang out in the apartment and cook meals from the local markets.  Can’t say enough this was world class comfort and my new place to stay when going to NYC.

Joe's place was great! Location is unbeatable.  Walking distance from most Broadway's shows and times square.  The apartment is really spacious with plenty of windows and amenities.  I would recommend this apartment.  Thanks Joe and Ivan.

Location of the place was super great! Everything was walkable distance. Theres a great dollar pizza place right around the corner. Kitchen was great to use! TVs in each room so you won’t have to fight for the remote. ;) 
Hell’s Kitchen area is perfect for tourists to experience nyc like a local. Joe is a super nice host too! :)

Really central location made it super easy to get around. We didn’t have any issues come up, and Joe was a great host. His apartment was just the right size for us and great for a long weekend in the city. There were TVs, fans, and space heaters in each room (since the building has radiator heat and hard to control like many older New York buildings), a fully furnished kitchen with a Keurig, hardwood floors throughout, and comfy beds.
Great host .. Fantastic communication, really helpful ..

A comfortable and cozy apartment! Joe's place is incredibly located, well-maintained, and a good size for an NYC apartment. Joe was an excellent communicator, and check-in was stress-free.

With that in mind, Joe's place is a classic NYC apartment, which it's in an older but renovated building, and unfortunately has nosy neighbors. I wouldn't recommend Joe's place if you're looking for a hotel-style stay, but if you want a real NYC/Airbnb experience, Joe's place will do nicely!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I can't say enough how easy it was working with Joe. His home is amazing! The size, comfort, amenities, and LOCATION were great. The first day, we didn't realize how close we really were to Time Square until we walked to the Gershwin Theater to watch Wicked. It was just around the corner. The perfect location to get wherever you want, whenever you want. The home itself was perfect for my family of 4. We could easily have added another 2 without issue. I highly recommend Joe and his home!

Location is the best.  Comfy beds in both rooms. Loved having a full kitchen. Communication couldn't have been better - seriously. My Mom, daughter and I would definitely stay there again and hope that can happen.

The  location is excellent, close to the theaters as well as to many bars and reastaurants, yet the neighborhood is quite and safe. The appartment is spacious and comfortable and Joe was very helpful and ready to meet all our needs promtly and with positive attitude. Highly recomended! Thank you for everything Joe
Great location. Comfortable houses a family of 6. TV in every room. Kitchen is a huge plus to make your own meals. Would stay here again.

The apartment is cozy and comfortable and surprisingly quiet.  We loved our brief stay there. It’s easy walking distance to Times Square and Broadway shows and our take out dinner from Uncle Mario’s on the corner was easy and yummy.
Large apartment in a great location. Would stay here again on a future visit.

Merci à Joe pour sa confiance,
Appartement très bien situé, spacieux pour une famille en couple avec trois enfants. Très bon point de départ pour découvrir New York. Joe est très réactif pour répondre à nos questions et son ami nous a très bien accueilli.
une excellente adresse donc.
Amazing location! Steps away from 9th for great eats. Across the street from New World Stages. Just blocks from Times Square.
Thank you Joe   It was a perfect place to stay.  Close to everything major subway stop one block away and walking distance to Broadway, restaurant row, and right in the heart of Hell's Kitchen
Joe and his friend are nice

The apartment fit our needs perfectly and was in a prime location for walking to most everything we wanted to see.  It was close to great food and shops and transit when needed.  Joe was an exceptional host who provided great local tips that enhanced our vacation!

We had a wonderful stay at Joe's place.  To start, communication with Joe from start to finish was quick and easy.  He is very on top of things.  The apartment was spacious and very comfortable.  We were there for a a week long stay and we loved it.  You can't beat the location being so close to Time's Square, Broadway, and the subway that takes you every where.  The beds were very comfortable which is so important after a day out.  We would definitely stay here again!

Great place to stay in New York with my wife and two kids

Great location to everything

Great location. 2 Large bedrooms. Our family was very comfortable and able to spread out. The building was under renovation and the hallways had wet paint, and the doorway was not labeled with the apt number. Everything else as listed. Joe was great/flexible as we checked in later than anticipated.
Joe was very accommodating with a slightly early check in for us. We loved being so close to our Broadway theaters. Very comfy beds, great A/C, compact but very well-equipped kitchen.
Great location.  Joe was super responsive to all my questions.
Excellent place to stay. Walking distance to almost everything, and the metro station is also 1 block away.
Great place to stay...centrally located for major attractions. Quiet and comfy location with all the amenities. A hidden gem that feels like home.

L’emplacement est absolument exceptionnel pour une ville comme New York reste vraiment calme
Le confort de l’appartement et son niveau d’équipement et bien au-delà de ce qu’on peut espérer
À recommander fortement même pour une famille de quatre personnes
Perfect place to stay especially in a city like NYC. Total comfort and fully equiped above what you usually expect 
Strongly recommended

Joe's place was awesome! You are steps away from all the great restaurants and shops in Hell's Kitchen and blocks away from Times Square and a short walk to Central Park. The apartment is top notch with all the amenities listed and my family of 4 felt right at home relaxing after a long day checking out Manhattan. Joe's apartment is 100 times better than  booking a small hotel room in the area for basically the same price per night in the Times Square area plus Joe's apartment has much more room as well! Great location and great communication from Joe if you have any questions before or during your stay. We will definitely stay with Joe again the next time we are in NYC!

We recently had a girls get-away to New York City. It was the first AirBNB experience for many of us, and the apartment exceeded our expectations! Joe was an awesome host, and we loved the apartment.  It  for the perfect location for Broadway shows, and was close to Times Square, restaurants, markets, and subway stations.  The apartment was very safe, quiet,  and comfortable, with  many amenities close by.  Plenty of room for all 5 of us, even the futon was comfortable!  Highly recommended!

Appartement magnifique et typique avec un emplacement  idéal pour visiter New-York ! Station de métro à 5 mn et ligne directe depuisJFK. Central Park et Times Square a 10 mn à pied...
Joe est un hôte très attentif à la qualité du séjour et très réactif dans les échanges. 
Je recommande !

First timer with Airbnb. Communication with the host was very clear and simple. Apartment was exactly as it appeared on the website. Location was nice and quiet, yet only 5 mins walk from Times Square;  a great location
 from which to explore the city with the family. I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment to anyone thinking of visiting NYC. We all had a great time!

If you want to be in the heart of time square this is your best bet. Nice comfortable space blocks away from restaurants, coffee shops & shopping! Easy to find. Nice neighborhood. 24 hour Rite Aid right at the corner. Paid parking lot right down the street. Great pizza restaurant right down the street. Great steak restaurant right across the street. Subway right at the corner. Street meter parking after 6pm. I would definitely stay here again. It was so convenient. Not far from the freeway to go into Brooklyn either. Joe was easy to get in touch with for anything that we needed.

The apartment offered us the opportunity to experience NYC as a local rather than a guest in a large corporate hotel. The location of the apartment is excellent. So well placed to get to Times Square, numerous restaurants,  and with a theatre and the subway on the same block, I’m not sure you could ask for much more from a holiday rental.  The apartment building is well looked after and secure. The apartment is clean, spacious and well equipped for relaxing when taking a rest from the tourist attractions of NYC. Would certainly recommend.
This was our first  Airbnb experience.Location is perfect and Joe is a nice host.Highly recomended!
Joe’s place was the perfect location and size for us! Check in and out was smooth and it was a wonderful weekend getaway.  I would definitely recommend!
Perfekt läge på Manhattan, nära till allt. Många restauranger och frukostaffär i närheten. Lägenheten fungerar bra för två par.

Great apartment in a fantastic location.  We were a quick 5 minute walk to Time Square and 15 minute walk to Central Park.  The subway is literally steps away which was very convenient.  The apartment was also close to 'Restaurant Row' so we had a hard time deciding where to eat there were so many options.  Joe met us at the apartment when we checked in and went over everything with us.  The apartment was perfect for my wife and I as well as our two teen aged daughters.  We plan on returning to New York city and will stay at this apartment again.  Highly recommended!

Our hosts were able to accommodate an early check in which was super helpful! The location was perfect, very centrally located. They provided everything we needed. Very comfortable king size bed with fluffy pillows, air conditioners and heaters. Will definitely stay again!

Amazing location, right on the edge of the theatre district and restaurant row. The flat is on a side street, got a bit loud on Fri/Sat nights but otherwise nice and quiet. The flat is well appointed, nice towels and all necessary kitchen equipment. The couch is large and comfortable, great for relaxing after a full day of walking the city. We had a wonderful time. The only downside was lack of ability to control the heat (older building).

Great communication with our stay.  Place was as billed, and the location was absolutely perfect - we walked up to Central Park and down to Theatre District with lots of great food nearby as well as markets for fresh fruit/goods.  The basic house rules were reasonable, simple and clear.  Our family (including teenagers) would certainly consider staying again.

Joe’s a wonderful host, very accommodating and responsive. The place is in a fantastic location, close to all of the NYC attractions. It’s stylish, comfy, and conveniently accessible. Highly recommend.

Tvs in each room, very comfortable bed and pillows and easy location to get to Rockefeller Center and Times Square - this was exactly what we needed.  This was our first Airbnb and I was concerned about staying at an Airbnb with my kids.  I would do it again.  The convenience of having a kitchen and enough space where we could spread out really made the difference for our trip.  Thanks Joe!

The apartment is close to everything that we wanted to see.  Subway stations are close by, restaurants galore.  The apartment is so cozy and Joe has thought of everything that people staying there could possibly need.  We will stay here again!
The most perfectly placed apartment.  Cozy and super comfortable.  Check in was personal and thorough.  Suited us perfectly being a family with two teenagers.  Would highly recommend

Location Location Location 
Neat tidy apartment 
Loved it

L'emplacement est très bien et Joe, non présent durant tout notre séjour, répond vite aux messages. Le logement est sale: filtre à eau du robinet dans une carafe moisi (nous nous en sommes rendu-compte après quelques jours et avons cessé d'avoir mal à la gorge après ça), des tonnes de poussière sous les meubles avec des objets qui traînaient (assiette,...), des tâches sur la couverture du canapé-lit où dormaient ma fille, beaucoup de poussière dans le meuble de la salle de bain. Un gros problème d'insonorisation, avec les enfants et le décalage horaire, ils se levaient tôt, marchaient pieds nus, mais on dérangeait une voisine (ce qui n'a pas plu à Joe puisque personne ne sait qu'il fait Airbnb), mais, nous aussi étions dérangé par les voisins du dessus, car nous nous couchions tôt, mais on ne s'en était pas plaint plus que ça, c'est normal de marcher dans son appartement après 19h30. À mon sens, appartement fonctionnel et bien situé, qui convient à 4 adultes sans enfants, pas trop regardant sur l'hygiène.

Our family recently stayed at Joe's condo and would highly recommend to others. The condo was clean and the amenities met our needs. You cannot beat the location with a wide array of restaurant options within walking distance in addition to Broadway theatres , Times Square, Rockafellar and Central park. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you Joe!
Joe goes above and beyond to make sure we had a comfortable stay.  Fantastic apartment and a GREAT location.  Close to everything you would need.

Great space super close to great food and night life. Less than a 10 minute walk to Times Square. Extremely clean and accurate to pictures. Beds were comfortable and 5 people stayed comfortably. We had left something behind right after we walked out and Joe made sure to do everything he could to make sure we got it back! Great host and place to stay!

Joe's place was ideal for us, 4 quiet adults. Great location close to restaurants, stores and the subway. Great place with everything we needed and comfortable beds.  Joe was very helpful with our questions and we would recommend his place to our friends.

Although we didn't get a chance to meet Joe in person (we were met by his friend Ivan, who was great), he was an extremely thoughtful host, in both senses of "thoughtful".  Communication ahead of time and during the visit was great, and his apartment was exactly the kind of experience (and deal) you'd hope to have when visiting Manhattan -- incredible location near 50th and 9th, and a really nice, clean, comfortable, secure, well-appointed apartment. We stayed there with our two kids (though I wouldn't recommend it for kids who younger than late elementary school) and it would also be an excellent place for a couple doing a get-away to NYC -- something we hope to do there ourselves before too long.

name: Spacious Contemporary Home with Pool
summary: This spacious and modern house epitomises Sydney coastal indoor/outdoor living. Conveniently located between the City and beaches. With two spectacular beaches - Maroubra and Coogee only a short 7min drive away, and excellent public transport to the City.
space: A light filled family home with contemporary interiors. Open plan kitchen, dining and living area brimming with natural light, that flows seamlessly to a private deck, garden and 9m lap pool. There is plenty of room for everyone with three bedrooms and two bathrooms upstairs. Downstairs there is a playroom with kids toys and board games. You will also find another bathroom and study.
description: This spacious and modern house epitomises Sydney coastal indoor/outdoor living. Conveniently located between the City and beaches. With two spectacular beaches - Maroubra and Coogee only a short 7min drive away, and excellent public transport to the City. A light filled family home with contemporary interiors. Open plan kitchen, dining and living area brimming with natural light, that flows seamlessly to a private deck, garden and 9m lap pool. There is plenty of room for everyone with three bedrooms and two bathrooms upstairs. Downstairs there is a playroom with kids toys and board games. You will also find another bathroom and study. - 3 x Bedrooms - 2 x Bathroom with bath and shower (upstairs) - 1 x Bathroom with double walk-in showers (downstairs)    - Open plan living - Dining table & chairs - Kitchen with coffee machine, 2x dishwashers, double fridge, microwave, gas stove and oven. - Outdoor Deck with seating for six and umbrella - Outdoor lounge under tree canopy. - 9 x 3m Lap Po
neighborhood_overview: Very conveniently located between the City and Beaches, offering easy access to both. In a quiet neighbourhood, only 4km from the Airport. Enjoy the beautiful beaches of Maroubra and Coogee only a short drive away. Try out the spectacular coastal walk from Maroubra to Malabar! Catch a bus into the city to explore Sydney Harbour. Excellent shopping at nearby Westfield Eastgardens, or Bondi Junction 20min drive.
notes: The contemporary style of this home, means there are several stairs, please take care with younger children.
transit: Two minute walk to a bus stop with routes heading to the City, Eastgardens (Shopping Centre), Bondi Junction and more. We provide complimentary Opal Cards!
access: - 3 x Bedrooms - 2 x Bathroom with bath and shower (upstairs) - 1 x Bathroom with double walk-in showers (downstairs)    - Open plan living - Dining table & chairs - Kitchen with coffee machine, 2x dishwashers, double fridge, microwave, gas stove and oven. - Outdoor Deck with seating for six and umbrella - Outdoor lounge under tree canopy. - 9 x 3m Lap Pool, fully enclosed. - Webber BBQ - Master bedroom with ensuite and cable TV. - Air conditioning (reverse cycle) upstairs - Gas Heater downstairs  - TV (foxtel) - Wifi - Washing machine & dryer - Kids play area - Fully fenced garden with tire swing
interaction: We will be available by email.
house_rules: - Guests must take full responsibility when using the swimming pool. Children must be fully supervised by an adult at all times.

reviews.comments:
Lovely house & well maintained. 

Everything you could need for a comfortable stay is provided. There were 4 adults & 2 children in our party, and there was more than enough space.
Pool is a very welcome addition- especially to escape the Sydney heat!
Wouldn’t think twice about rebooking if we’re ever fortunate to be in Sydney again!

name: Comfortable Flat in İstanbul
summary: Hi everyone. I'am staying with my girlfriend. We are looking for a girl who is intrested in a good and clean house. Our house is doublex. So we generally spend our  most of time at the second floor. The guest will stay at the first floor which included a saloon, kitchen, bathroom and a bedroom.
description: Hi everyone. I'am staying with my girlfriend. We are looking for a girl who is intrested in a good and clean house. Our house is doublex. So we generally spend our  most of time at the second floor. The guest will stay at the first floor which included a saloon, kitchen, bathroom and a bedroom.

name: Great location/ 1 min sub./ terrace
summary: Brand new condo in Montreal, 1 min from the subway, close to downtown. Everything is at walking distance (cafés, restaurants, grocery stores). A/C, elevator, queen size bed, private balcony and terrace on the roof. Washer and dryer, Wifi.
space: Brand new one bedroom condo (dec 2014), spacious and bright. At 1 min from the subway and from lots of services (restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, etc"). The St-Lawrence's River is 5 minutes from there (by walk) where you'll be able to enjoy the nature. Everything is included (Wi-Fi, Cable TV, all equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, A/C, etc.). There is a private balcony to enjoy a romantic drink at night, or a terrace on the roof (public) with tables, chairs and BBQ. The view is incredible from there (fireworks in the summer, Mount-Royal, etc). It is perfect for a small getaway or a longer stay. The place can accommodate 2 people perfectly, and also a baby (I have a small bed for babies).
description: Brand new condo in Montreal, 1 min from the subway, close to downtown. Everything is at walking distance (cafés, restaurants, grocery stores). A/C, elevator, queen size bed, private balcony and terrace on the roof. Washer and dryer, Wifi.  Brand new one bedroom condo (dec 2014), spacious and bright. At 1 min from the subway and from lots of services (restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, etc"). The St-Lawrence's River is 5 minutes from there (by walk) where you'll be able to enjoy the nature. Everything is included (Wi-Fi, Cable TV, all equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, A/C, etc.). There is a private balcony to enjoy a romantic drink at night, or a terrace on the roof (public) with tables, chairs and BBQ. The view is incredible from there (fireworks in the summer, Mount-Royal, etc). It is perfect for a small getaway or a longer stay. The place can accommodate 2 people perfectly, and also a baby (I have a small bed for babies).  You'll have access to everything in the apartment.  -A/C,
neighborhood_overview: The Verdun's neighbourhood is perfect for a Montreal's vacation. It is quiet and secure, and 8 minutes in subway from downtown. The subway is just one minute away. There are lots of really good restaurants nearby (I'll give you a map of the neighbourhood that I made to guide you with the nice places) , cafes, bar, and boutiques. The St-Lawrence river is about 5 minutes by walk from the condo, and it is really nice to walk there in the summer. There is a bicycle path that leads you directly to the old Montreal in 20 minutes (bike), you can swim, rent kayak, or just walk. It is really nice there, and during the winter some people do ski.
notes: I'll leave you maps of Montreal if you need it!
transit: It is around 20 minutes by car form the airport (around 35 CAD $ in cab) or 7$ by bus to the closest subway station (Lionel-Groulx). Then you'll have to take the subway for 3 stations. There is also free parking in the street if you are coming by car.
access: You'll have access to everything in the apartment.  -A/C, heating -Internet/ Wi fi -Cable tv, dvd player -       FREE PARKING  in the street -Fully equiped kitchen with dishwasher -Washer and dryer inside the unit (with detergent)  -Rooftop terrace/ Private balcony -Sheets and towels provided -Breakfast basket  for the first morning -Free coffee and coffee maker
interaction: I'll be happy to respond all your questions. During your stay I'll be really close from there  (10 minutes by walk) at my boyfriend's place and able to come in short notice. You can text me, email me or call me at any time.
house_rules: It is strictly forbidden to smoke inside the apartment (you may on the balcony). No pets or loud party inside. I'll leave you the place really clean, so I ask people to do the same  when you'll leave.

host.host_about:
Bonjour! je m'appelle Laurence et j'adore mon quartier et Montréal!! Je travaille dans le domaine de l'emploi   et j'ai fait des études en anthropologie et en commerce international.  Je  suis une passionnée des voyages, de la lecture  et du cinéma! J'adore rencontrer des gens d'ailleurs et en apprendre plus sur leur culture et coutumes.  J'ai d'ailleurs passé une année  en Argentine dans le cadre de mes études, expérience que  j'ai adoré !! Je reviens récemment de l'Inde et du Brésil  que j'ai adorés. J'ai également voyagé en Europe, Japon, Chine et Tunisie mais j'avoue que mon coup de coeur demeure l'Amérique du Sud! 
Je suis très accueillante et amicale, et j'adore faire plaisir aux gens et leur faire de petites attentions spéciales. Je vous laisserai toujours des brochures, cartes et livres sur la ville pour que vous puissiez plus facilement vous retrouver. Je serai tout près de l'appartement,  durant votre séjour si vous avez des questions ou autre.  
Je parle couramment le français, l'anglais et l'espagnol et je serais ravie de vous donner des conseils touristiques sur mon quartier et ma ville! Mon condo  est  très accueillant et je suis sûre que vous apprécierez votre séjour chez moi! 

----------
Hi! My name is Laurence and really love my neighbourhood and Montreal!! I am currently working in the employment field  and  I graduated in anthropology and international commerce.  I am   passionnate about travels, reading  and cinema!  I love to meet people from all over the world and learn more about the culture. I lived one year abroad in Argentina and just loved it! I just came back from India and Brazil   that I loved!! I also went to China, Japan, Europe and Tunisie, but my favorite place is South America, especially Bolivia!
You always will find in my house a little gift for you, flyers and maps of the town !
 I speak French, English and Spanish and I would be more than happy to give you more  information and tips about my city and  neighbourhood!
During your stay, I will live less than 15 minutes from the appartment if you have any doubt or questions. 
My appartment is really homy and I am pretty sure  that you will really enjoy it as much as I do!  I am looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments: L’appartement de Laurence était parfait! Exactement comme sur les photos! Il est à côté du métro, à 1 min du marche, et c’est vraiment super pratique pour aller en centre-ville. Tout était super propre!! Laurence m’avait même laissé un petit cadeau et du bon café pour mon séjour! L’appartement est spacieux, le lit confortable, j'y ai très bien dormi.  Laurence est un excellent guide.  Elle connait très bien son quartier, ou manger, ou prendre le meilleur café.  Il y a une connexion internet très rapide à l'appartement, mais il y a aussi des cafés très agréables tout près si vous sentez le besoin de sortir.  Laurence était disponible pour répondre à mes questions.  Je reviendrai très bientôt dans son appartement.

Excellent séjour à l'appartement de Laurence!
Très bel appartement, exactement comme sur les photos. Lumineux, bien décoré, grand garde-robe d'entrée très pratique. L'appartement est très bien situé, à côté du métro alors c'était très facile de se déplacer.
Laurence répond rapidement aux demandes et nous avait laissé des cartes de la ville et du métro ainsi qu'un petit cadeau de bienvenue.
Excellent séjour !
Nous y reviendrons lors de notre prochain séjour à Montréal. Merci Laurence

Martin et Anne-Marie

Nous avons reçu un accueil très chaleureux de la part de Laurence à notre arrivée! :) L'appartement est propre et confortable. Laurence était disponible en cas de problème et les communications étaient simple et facile. Je vous recommande fortement cette location si vous désirez vous rendre dans les environs de Montréal!

Bel accueil,
Appartement propre et comme décrit. À 2 pas du métro et de toutes les commodités. SAQ, épicerie, pharmacie, dépanneur, restaurants. Très recommandé pour 1 à 2 personnes pour un merveilleux séjour.

Au plaisir,

Laurence place was a dream home and is located at a perfect location. There are dozens of gem restaurants within walking distance and the subway was less than 5 mins away. There is also Shoppers(drug store) right at the doorstep if any misc. items was needed. Laurence place was amazingly comfortable; I would look forward to coming back home after a long day of exploring. There was a comfortable bed, supplied towels and hair dryer, TV with HDMI cable, variety of dishware and utensils. If we were to come back to Montreal, Laurence place would be the place to stay at!

Laurence is everything you could ask for in a host. My plane was delayed fairly late into the evening but she was at the flat to welcome me and get me oriented. She had prepared a super map of the area marking all the special places for shopping, cafes and so on AND she left a bunch of goodies for breakfast which was so appreciated. The flat is fabulous. Super clean, bright, and very well equipped. There is even a little balcony. It is kitty corner to the De L'eglise metro so you have easy access to public transit. I loved the neighbourhood which is an up and coming area with tons of cafes, quirky shops, grocery stores, fruit stands and more. A super bonus is that the river is just a couple of blocks away. I had a great time and highly recommend it.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a stunning apartment, in the heart of Verdun. A great space for a solo traveler or a couple, you'll have all you need to make your stay great! The place is modern, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. It's also very close to the metro and all the conveniences, making it super easy to get around Montreal! Fabulous with a kind and personable owner, ready to help with anything. Merci, Laurence!

Our host Laurence was wonderful! She gave us a tour of the condo unit and even created a little guide to Verdun. Me and my boyfriend ended up eating at most of the restaurants she recommended in the neighbourhood! The home is sleek, clean and a great space to spend a city vacation in. It's location is perfect sliver of a local Montreal lifestyle. Laurence was so kind and thoughtful and kept in contact with us when we had any questions. I would definitely spend time here again. :)

Laurence's home was beautiful, extremely clean, and in a great neighbourhood. Not only was this newly-built condo one block from a metro station that would bring you downtown within 10 minutes, pretty much all amenities were walking distance. Laurence was a lovely host who greeted us for our evening arrival and made sure we had everything we could need during our stay. I would recommend this home to anyone who wants to stay in Montreal!

Laurence's home was exceptionally kept and exactly as described. Verdun was very quiet area with free parking. Apartment was exceptionally clean, very cozy, and close to all the amenities and Metro. Laurence is an extremely seasoned Airbnb host that took care of all the necessities and even provided a list of recommended places to eat around the area and greeted us when we got in. Highly recommend this place.

My partner and I agree that this was our favourite airbnb experience. Laurence's apartment is absolutely perfect. Laurence made our check in experience hassle free and her attention to detail in this place is amazing. Could not fault this place in any way.

Laurence m'a accueilli avec le sourire, offrant son aide pour transporter mes mille et un sacs, et s'est montrée très flexible concernant l'horaire et ses disponibilités lors de la planification de mon séjour, ce que j'ai apprécié au plus haut point. L'appartement était magnifique, très propre, lumineux, bien équipé (de tout pour cuisiner!), exactement comme sur les photos et même mieux encore à mon avis! Le cadeau de bienvenu fût très apprécié et la carte avec les suggestions de restaurants nous a été fort utile. Un vrai moment de détente dans un espace absolument idéal pour les amoureux de la nature urbaine!

We had a great stay at Laurence's place, perfect location and the place is beautiful! We had an easy time finding the place and there is plenty of parking nearby, even though you can get downtown in no time.

We'd highly recommend a stay with Laurence if you're in Montreal!

I would live here if I could! Laurence's home is fantastic. It was very clean, well kept and had a lot of amenities. It has been my favorite airbnb experience to date. Laurence is very kind and left me wonderful breakfast foods to dine on.  The neighborhood is nice with good parking.  If you haven't been yet, you should definitely try it out.

We very much enjoyed staying at Laurence's condo. The place was amazing and we had everything we need for a great stay. It felt very much like home. Laurence had also left us some food for breakfast and was very patient with us regarding our arrival. Metro is very close to the condo and is a very quick drive away from the city centre. We recommend this place to others without hesitation.
Beautiful condo. Extremely clean. Laurence gave us some great recommendations that made our stay extremely memorable. We will definitely be back. Thank you so much Laurence.

Laurence's listing and photos were very accurate, portraying the apartment well. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, though there are a handful of nice restaurants and cafes nearby. The subway/metro is very close by to the apartment (perhaps a three minute walk) and allows for convenient travel to pretty much every aspect of Montreal.

Though I was not able to meet Laurence personally due to an emergency, she did make me feel welcomed by leaving fruit and bread in the apartment as a little snack for the next morning. In addition, there was a cute welcome note scrawled on a small chalkboard near the front door and a list of her favorite nearby hangout spots.

All in all, it was a great experience and I would stay here again the next time that I travel to Montreal!

Very nice apartment in a good location, close to most services that you need. Host was very welcoming and provided great information on everything related to the apartment and the Verdun area. 

Thanks Laurence, we enjoyed our stay.
Laurence has a great place. We had a Excellent stay, She made us feel very welcome and it is a great location.

Laurence was a great host! She generously provided us with various treats as well as detailed recommendations. The apartment was clean and quiet in a great and charming location with easy access to boutiques and the metro. We would love to be able to stay there again.

Super séjour chez Laurence. Appartement conforme à la description et accessible avec le metro qui est situé à 2 minutes. Nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Laurence et malgré notre arrivée tardive, elle nous a mis les clés à disposition. Nous avons fortement apprécié le pain et confiture pour le premier petit déjeuner ainsi que la mise à disposition plans de la ville de Montréal. Nous recommandons cet hôte avec qui nous réserverons à nouveau lors de notre prochaine venue.

Great Montréal experience! The appartment is as described and located nearby the metro (2 minutes walk distance). We did not get the oppprtunity to meet Laurence in person. Despite our late arrival in the evening, she made it possible for us to get the keys. Moreover, we appreciated the bread and jam provided for our first breakfast and the maps of the city. We will book with Laurence again should we have the opportunity to come to Montréal again.

This appartment was really amazing. Me and my boyfriend stayed there for 2 nights and immediately felt at home.
The apartment was very new, clean and beautifully furnished. It's only a 2 Minute walk to the subway station and parking was possible in front of the house. The key exchange was easy and Laurence very helpful. She even left us some fruit and bread for breakfast in her kitchen and made us a list/map with the best places around (supermarket, restaurants, bakerys etc.). I really would recommend this appartment to everybody who wants to visit Montreal.

We loved staying at Laurence's condo! It's exactly as pictured. The place is very clean and organized. Perfect location - metro station is right around the corner. We didn't get to meet Laurence on our trip but she was very helpful and kind! She left us breakfast for the first morning, maps and recommendations for our trip. Check in and check out was smooth and convenient. If we come back to Montreal we will definitely stay here again! 

We had a great time - thanks for everything Laurence!

My friend and I traveled Montreal and stayed at Laurence's place. I was shocked when we got there. This place was so fabulous and cozy over our imagining.  It was super clean and well decorated. Laurence also left us some food and drinks.We loved this place because it was like home.

Nous sommes très satisfaits de notre séjour à Montréal au mois de septembre 2015 . L'appartement situé à Verdun était ce que nous recherchions . 
( situation , confort  , Metro..)
Nous espérons pouvoir y retourner l'an prochain.

Laurence's place was absolutely lovely and perfect for our little family. It was very tastefully decorated and cozy, and we felt right at home immediately. Laurence was always readily available and easy to contact for any questions. We had issues with the WiFi the first day, but she had it fixed the next day for us. I highly recommend staying here, it's beautiful with great access to the subway.
She left us some fresh French bread and jelly for our breakfast, along with a welcoming message on the blackboard. Everything was immaculately clean and the apartment was quite trendy and new.
We had a great stay. The condo was very cozy and the pictures were accurate. We are hoping to stay here again in the future.

Laurence was extremely helpful, making my stay in Montréal absolutely wonderful. Check in was smooth and Laurence's condo was exactly as described; it was not hard to feel at home there. Overall, I rate Laurence a warm and accommodating host.

Laurence's apartment was one of the highlights of our trip. The apartment is exactly like the pictures on the listing, beautiful decor and very clean. It's located right of the main street where all the restaurants and stores are. The neighborhood is very quite and lovely. She left a lovely sign, fresh bread, orange juice, recommendations, and was quick on responses. I definitely recommend staying here!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Laurence. Nous nous sentions comme chez nous. Tout est prévu, nous ne manquions de rien. Très bien situé car en face du métro pour se rendre en quelques stations dans le centre ville de Montreal. Et tout sur place pour faire l'épicerie. Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse.
The apartment was well appointed and very clean. Great location in Verdun

Fantastic condo! Fantastic location! Fantastic host!!!! Everything was as described and super clean! Not only will I stay here again but I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a beautiful place minutes from downtown Montreal. Thanks Laurence!
Génial! Super appartement, accueil impeccable. Très beau séjour. Merci à Laurence.

This stay couldn't have been better.  The apartment was exactly as described -- bright, clean, comfortable and quiet.  It's a very attractive space with large windows, big closets, and perfect couch and chair to watch tv or curl up and read. We have long been a fan of Verdun, and this is perfectly located near the metro, several cafes, a couple of blocks to the IGA, organic produce around the corner, the fromagerie further down Wellington and the beautiful park (even in the snow and cold of April) that stretches for miles along the St. Lawrence.

5 stars!!!!! I cannot imagine how our stay could have been any better.

Laurence was an absolutely wonderful hostess. She left a few breakfast foods for us to enjoy on our first morning (bananas, a loaf of bread, yogurt, juice). Very thoughtful! She left guidebooks of Montreal for both of us and even printed a map of Verdun with personal suggestions of her favourite cafes, shops, and attractions. A local's input is invaluable. We did visit a few of her favourite spots and were very pleased. Thank you, Laurence! 

As for the apartment itself, it was modern, bright, spacious, and very clean. The photos posted do in fact reflect the reality. I loved waking up to this calming space and coming home there after a day of sightseeing. It was truly a place where we could relax. 

The neighbourhood was great, with many cafes and shops to explore on the main street (Wellington). For non-Quebec residents who are GoodLife members, you can use your membership to work out at Energie Cardio, which is a 10-min walk down the street. That was a nice bonus for me, since I was away from my regular gym for a whole week. The subway stop (A l'Eglise) was indeed just a minute's walk away. Sometimes, I travelled by myself, and I can assure you that I felt safe coming home at night all alone. 

One word of warning for those whose parallel parking is not up to snuff: parking can get tight on the street. I noticed this is typical of Montreal in general, not just this neighbourhood. Start practising now, folks!

Espectacular!! lo puedo resumir en una palabra.. nos encantó desde el momento de nuestra llegada Laurence (quien habla Franes, Ingles y Español) ya había hecho arreglos para hacernos sentir como en casa, nos tenia listas algunas cosas en la nevera, frutas y un letrero de bienvenida, así como una pequeña cuna para nuestro hijo de 2 años, estuvo muy atenta a nuestras inquietudes y nos aconsejó muy buenos sitios para conocer, nos entregó algunos mapas del metro, el sector es excelente para recién llegados (tiene tiendas muy económicas y excelentes restaurantes multiculturales), ademas el metro queda solo a 1 minuto a pie. La casa tenia absolutamente todo lo necesario para preparar cualquier comida, sus electrodomésticos están en muy buen estado, así como todo el interior. de verdad fue muy difícil decirle adiós al apartamento de Laurence, nuevamente gracias por todo..
We loved our visit to Verdun. It is a great neighborhood, with great bicycle trails. Laurence's condo is very pretty and cozy too.

Nous avons passé un magnifique mois dans l'appartement de Laurence qui est aussi beau en vrais que sur les photos. L'appartement est moderne, bien équipé et très lumineux. En plus de la terrasse privée, Il dispose notamment d'une très belle terrasse commune sur le toit. L'emplacement est très agréable car le quartier est vivant et il y fait bon vivre mais surtout à quelques minutes à pied du Saint Laurent. 

Laurence nous a très bien reçu et est très disponible.

Nous recommandons fortement ce logement.

Samuel & Alexandra

The apartment was absolutely perfect for our month long stay in Montreal. It had everything we could need and is steps away from the metro, connecting you to the rest of Montreal. Verdun is a charming neighborhood and was great to go for a run in the morning right on the St. Lawrence. 

Laurence went above and beyond during our stay. She was incredibly communicative and very helpful, even with the littlest things.
Comfortable stay!

This is great, relatively modern 1-bedroom unit, very clean and fully equipped in the Verdun neighborhood of Montreal. A couple minutes walk from the "de L'Eglise" metro stop and a Bixy bike share station. This is not a touristy neighborhood but more of a regular neighborhood for the Montrealais - and that is what I was looking for. Easy bike ride to a wonderful park and bike path along the St. Laurent river. The unit has everything you need for a nice stay in Montreal and the owner, Laurence, is very "sympa".

100% recomendable, el departamento de Laurence es exactamente igual a las fotos  y mucho mejor , totalmente equipado, funcional , limpio y moderno. La bienvenida que nos dio Laurence fué una grata sorpresa !  , Laurence tiene todo preparado para que te sientas muy bien . El departamento se ubica en un lindo barrio lleno de cafeterias, restaurantes , bares y mucho mas , a 2 calles se localiza el metro y a un par de pasos el Río San Lorenzo. No lo duden ni un segundo, éste lugar tiene una categoría AAA

몬트리올을 여행하실 분들께 강력추천하는 숙소입니다. 위치는 올드몬트리올 기준으로 중심지와는 조금 거리가 있는 한적한 주택가지만 숙소에서 지하철역이 말도 안되게 가까우며 대부분의 몬트리올의 번화가는 지하철타고 30분 이내로 갈 수 있기때문에 전혀 불편함을 못느꼈고 오히려 숙소 근처가 조용해서 편안하고 좋았습니다. 숙소 근처에 드럭스토어와 마트가 가까이 있다는 점도 매우 좋습니다. 숙소 내부는 정말 말그대로 없는게 없습니다. 세탁기와 건조기가 있어서 여행내내 너무 편하게 세탁했고, 식기도 정말 다양하게 이용했습니다. 집도 정말 깨끗하고 인테리어도 훌륭합니다. 정말 더할나위없이 좋은 숙소였고 다시 몬트리올에 온다면 또 예약하고 싶은 숙소입니다!

Laurence's place is lovely! Nice and clean, big windows allow space to feel open and bright. All the amenities you need in the apartment. Location is close to the train to the city, about 30 mins. She responded promptly to any inquiries and was pleasant to work with. We enjoyed our stay!

This was my second time staying at Laurence's place. My 5-week-long-stay was outstanding! The condo is very clean and modern, and had many amenities to make my stay very comfortable. Laurence is a very gracious host and she  checked up on me periodically to make sure everything was in order. The location is great...Wellington Street has everything you require including grocery stores, restaurants and shops which are all a short walk away. Bus stops and a metro station are also near by for easy access to explore everything Montreal has to offer.  I highly recommend Laurence's condo to anyone looking for a beautiful place minutes from downtown Montreal. Thanks Laurence!
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Laurence’s condo is absolutely amazing! Very spacious and stocked with everything you could possibly need. It’s perfectly located by rue Wellington, which has bakeries, cafés, bookshops, pharmacies and grocery stores. You don’t even have to leave the area to have an authentic Montreal experience, but if you want to the de l’église and Verdun metro stations on the green line are within walking distance, and so are local bus routes. Cannot recommend this gem of a place enough!
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My husband and I really enjoyed staying at Laurence’s condo. It feels very homy with all the personal touch- it’s almost like staying at our own apartment!  It is very clean and well-maintained. The facilities are complete, it has everything we need.  She even stocked the fridge for us! Location-wise it’s perfect, just 2 minutes from nearest metro station from where we can go anywhere across  Montreal. It has a nice balcony where had a quiet dinner with a good bottle of wine.  All in all it was a very enjoyable stay.

Laurence’s condo is perfectly located close to public transit, shops and restaurants. It is very clean and very well kept. Laurence was a prompt and helpful host. I would highly recommend her condo to anyone looking to head to Montreal. Merci!

Laurence's apt was great! She was super accommodating and responsive to inquiries. She checked in on us after the first day and left thoughtful touches like recs and food. The apt is very convenient to the metro and everything you would need. She let us store our luggage when our flight was leaving after check out time. The AC was a lifesaver during Montreal's heatwave! Highly recommend.

We loved our five night stay in this clean and quiet little condo. The location was perfect, just steps to the metro in a cool neighbourhood. 

Laurence was great! She was super organized and very thoughtful. She even provided a few things for breakfast or first morning which was really appreciated. 

After long days of sightseeing (during a heatwave), it was such a relief to walk in the doors of our air conditioned home away from home. We’d definitely stay here again.  Merci beaucoup!

A wonderful stay!! If you’re looking for somewhere outside the city but easy access to everything this is perfect! Just a short walk from train station, markets and much more! Laurence has the best hospitality and was easy to contact, she even gave wonderful suggestions on places to eat and much more!
We had an incredible time in Verdun. The apartment was everything we hoped for. Merci!

Nous avons réservé sur AirBn'B pour la 1ère fois avec l'appartement de Laurence cet été et avons été agréablement surpris  au-delà de nos attentes
Tout est dit sur le site (emplacement, accueil, conseils, propreté, hospitalité, confiance...)  nous donnons 5 étoiles sans hésiter !!!
Philippe et Sylvia

We appreciated Laurence's thoughtfulness of providing breakfast for the first day. Her home was very comfortable and clean. Her condo was in a convenient location near a metro station, and the neighborhood had many stores and restaurants. Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend and return in the future.

Great place! Laurence was a very informative host, we loved her space and the location. It was very bright and clean - great natural light and a lovely quiet balcony where we enjoyed lots of coffee.  The apartment comes with everything you need, is one block from the metro and just back less than half a block from Wellington St. which is full of life and shops. There was even a puppet festival and sidewalk sale while we were there. There are also great cycling and walking paths along the St. Laurence, just a block or so away. The only thing we'd note is we found the bed quite firm but we absolutely loved everything else.

Thanks Laurence for a great stay. We highly recommend staying here.
Very friendly host, charming place
So much better than I expect. Definitely one of the best airbnb experience in my life. Highly recommended!

Séjour parfait chez Laurence ! 
Emplacement idéal, proximité des restaurants ainsi que du métro...
Nous recommandons fortement !

Appartement très bien situé.Près du métro. Près des magasins.À 5 minutes d'un parc au bord du fleuve. Décoration très personnelle et chaleureuse. Parfois même de la musique d'orgue de la petite église tout près. J'y retournerais avec plaisir.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Sunny & Spacious 1 Bedroom in Central Harlem!
summary: Welcome to Sunny Harlem! My place is close to Apollo Theater, Columbia University, one block from the 2,3 train, Morningside Coffee Shop, Harlem Hospital, St. Nicholas Park, Red Rooster, Slyvia's, Tio's, Corner Social, Harlem Blue's Cafe, and more! My place is perfect for couple's, friend's, traveler's, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  My apartment is pet friendly! Feel free let your furry friend play with my dog's toys and dog treats!
space: Located in Central Harlem, my apartment is in Riverton Square, a gated community with 24/7 security, a beautifully landscaped courtyard with peaceful seating areas, playgrounds, a basketball court, and an open grassy area for lawn activities.  Apartment has Apple TV set up in the living room and a RoKu set up in the bedroom. Bose sound system allows for guests to hook up phone/ipod/mp3 player to listen to any music! Provided Ipod has access to Pandora for music options. Every window in the apartment (2 in bedroom, 1 in kitchen, 2 in living room, 1 in the bathroom) have beautiful views of the gated courtyard and have just been renovated. Bright new windows were installed in June, 2017.
description: Welcome to Sunny Harlem! My place is close to Apollo Theater, Columbia University, one block from the 2,3 train, Morningside Coffee Shop, Harlem Hospital, St. Nicholas Park, Red Rooster, Slyvia's, Tio's, Corner Social, Harlem Blue's Cafe, and more! My place is perfect for couple's, friend's, traveler's, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  My apartment is pet friendly! Feel free let your furry friend play with my dog's toys and dog treats! Located in Central Harlem, my apartment is in Riverton Square, a gated community with 24/7 security, a beautifully landscaped courtyard with peaceful seating areas, playgrounds, a basketball court, and an open grassy area for lawn activities.  Apartment has Apple TV set up in the living room and a RoKu set up in the bedroom. Bose sound system allows for guests to hook up phone/ipod/mp3 player to listen to any music! Provided Ipod has access to Pandora for music options. Every window in the apartment (2 in bedroom, 1 in kitchen, 2 in living room
neighborhood_overview: Historic Harlem is a wonderful place to visit! Very close proximity to many different shops, bars, restaurants and parks.
notes: Please help yourself to the variety of K-cups in my coffee tree! A wide variety of coffee's, decaffeinated included, teas, and hot chocolate. Laundry facilities are located in the ground floor of the building. Guests are welcome to use my laundry supplies (located under the sink) and will have access to the laundry cards that are provided.
transit: The 2/3 Subway line is 2 blocks away on 135 and Lenox. The 4/5/6 line is at 125th street (a 10 block walk) and the B/C line is located on 135th and St. Nicholas (4 avenues over).
access: Laundry cards will be available to be used. Guest's will need a $5, $10 or $20 to do laundry.
interaction: No guest interaction thanks to the lock box. Guests will please leave the keys at check out on the kitchen glass table.  Thanks!
house_rules: - Quiet hours usually start after 12 on weekends. Please be considerate of sound for my neighbors. - Please do not tell neighbors or security personnel that you are from Airbnb. If anyone asks just say we are friends/cousins/whatever. Thanks!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: We are in our early 30s and love to travel and explore new cities and areas. We have 2 dogs Darla and Swifty and try to bring them on every new adventure we go on. We are happy to share our home in NYC, a city we both love dearly. We have lived here for 13 years and have lived in multiple neighborhoods so please ask any questions you have about your trip! :)

reviews.comments: Could not have had a better experience with Kara! Her home was warm and inviting, and she even allowed us to have a late checkout due to a prior engagement. I would certainly stay at her place again :)

Kara is truly an outstanding host. From start to finish, she was quick to communicate and exceptionally thoughtful. She even went out of her way to save a great parking spot for us on the street, and left toys and treats for our dog to enjoy. 

The apartment itself is lovely. Kara keeps her home spotlessly clean and her taste in decoration makes the space feel both luxurious and welcoming. I really can't emphasize enough how amazingly clean and tidy the home was - as dog owners ourselves, we have no idea how she manages to keep her place so totally free of dog fur. Comfy leather furniture, high end appliances, lovely artwork, and soft linens give Kara's home a very upscale feel.

The neighborhood is lively and full of history; we found the street noise to be quieter than most other parts of NYC, and Kara's neighbors are very friendly. There's a subway stop just around the corner on the 2/3 line. Be sure to follow Kara's recommendation for her favorite breakfast spot when you're on the way to or from the subway - we are certainly very glad we did!

Kara, thank you once more for your hospitality and thoughtfulness! We hope to visit your home again soon, and would highly recommend it to others.
Kara is super nice and her place is wonderful too. Real bed for real sleep. Thanks Kara

Kara's place was great for our trip. It is a lovely, surprisingly spacious (for NY) and cozy apartment. We enjoyed the great big couch, color coded bookshelf, Apple TV, kind and pleasant building neighbors, nicely furnished and finished rooms- bath and kitchen are nice! Bed was very comfortable-  and more. Morningside was great for breakfast, as Kara recommended, and so was Pompette wine shop on 131st. She was very accommodating in every way and using her space was comfortable and felt natural. We loved being able to walk to the 135th st. Station to catch 2 & 3 trains to get around Manhattan easily. The only difficulty for us was parking- free parking on the street is ample but we had to do a little dance to get a spot on a busy holiday weekend. It was no problem, just a necessary challenge because we had our car.

Kara's apartment is exactly like the pics, it's a lovely place to stay, sometimes there are noise during the night but is not really bad. Kara is a good host, the communication was really easy. The neighborhood is well communicated, the metro stop is trhee blocks away.
Appartement super, emplacement parfait.

Kara was a FANTASTIC host. She went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable! She was super helpful and very responsive to questions! Looking forward to staying at her place again the next time we are in NY!!
My stay at Kara's place was pretty Comfortable it was everything I expected it to be ! Would recommend to a friend

Such an amazing stay! Nice place, very spacious, and Kara is incredible! She was out of town and still managed to help us whenever we had any questions or concerns. She answered all our messages right away and was incredibly helpful in every situation.

Kara was an amazing host. Quick to respond and always willing to help. Spent the weekend there with my son. Her place is great very clean and has everything you need to make it feel like your own home. Neighbourhood is great and lots of free parking available but patience is required. 20 min cab/Uber rides from her place to the city. As I told her already when I do come back I will definitely be looking for her place again. Thanks again Kara!
Kara's place is great , super clean , really easy contact with her , the neighborhood is close to everything.

Good sized quiet condo in a decent location. Kara was super communicative and a quick responder. Loved the memory foam pillow so much that I had to order two online. Thanks for a great Air B n B xperience.
Photos of the apartment were very accurate, safe neighborhood, parking was easy to find and Kara was very prompt with responses and support!
Convenient location to downtown Manhattan, very cozy, and clean! Kara provides detailed instructions on how to arrive at the apt as well as hot spots in the area. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
This place was awesome!! Checkin was very very easy and the place was divine!!!

I thought this was a great apartment to use as a home base to explore the city! Kara was so accommodating and made everything really easy for us! The space was clean and cozy! Perfect for our 4 night stay!

Having been my first time in NY, Kara helped in every way providing information on the places to visit and transportation to get around. Her apartment is very nice, clean and very stylish, she even has a welcome sign for you when you walk in. I would definitely recommend her place as to anyone who is interested in staying here, Kara will contact you and help you out in anyway possible and make sure your stay is a great one

We felt right at home in this stylish space. The location is great and quick walk to the subway. We’ve never been to the city before and we felt very safe in Kara’s building. Kara was easy to communicate with and everything was exactly as we expected.
Thank you Kara for the spotless apartment with everything i needed and some good tips on local food etc. I had a perfect stay

Kara’s home was the perfect spot for our weekend stay in New York. The apartment was close to both the bus and subway station so it was convenient to get around. Her apartment was clean and comfortable. Kara was helpful and responsive. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Kara’s apartment is in a great location, it was very easy to get anywhere in the city. This area of Harlem is up and coming and my boyfriend and I enjoyed exploring the area. Kara was quick to respond to all of my messages. She even left out her dogs toys and dog bed for our pup! We would definitely stay again.
Kara was an excellent host!  A cute apartment with everything we needed and a comfortable bed! Communication was excellent!

We stayed at Kara's place over 3 days during May while visiting NYC. The check in process way really easy and Kara made sure to contact us to let us know there was a lock being repaired before we arrived. Kara's place is in a gated community with a nice playground, park in the middle. The apartment was spacious and clean (towels, soap, shampoo all provided). The air-conditioning was very welcome as it was very warm out during our stay. The location is excellent, only a short walk to the 2 and 3 lines, with plenty of restaurants within a few blocks (Kara has a very helpful list of suggested places to try in the apartment) . Would highly recommend if you are planning on staying in the Harlem area. We found it to be a great base from which to explore the city. Thanks again Kara!
I loved Kara's place it was an easy walk to the subway and cool Harlem restaurants. Brought my dog and he felt right at home too!

Kara is a great hostess and her apartment is really cozy! Self check works for me well and Kara also gave us useful suggestions! Though the location of her apartment is not in the center of Manhattan, the transportation there is really convenient!

Charming apartment, Kara is very welcoming.  Nice touches in the apartment, and plenty of room for two.   

Building is undergoing some nice renovations which caused no issues in terms of noise but is not very sightly.  We had some issues walking on the street where we were made to feel uncomfortable and then did not feel safe to walk around at night.  If you are more city-comfortable, particularly in Harlem, this should not be a problem.

It was easy to catch an Uber or train to Central Park or Mid-Town.   Location is not a far drive from LaGuardia.
Great spot with great host. Kara was very responsive and even let us modify our check in times a bit to allow for our schedule. Great place to stay
Best place to stay.  I loved it.  Kara was gave easy instructions.  She was great to communicate with.  Hope I can stay there every time I go to New York.

Kara's place was perfect for our trip to see NYC. It was very close to the subway and the neighborhood had great restaurants with a variety of cuisines. She was very good at communicating and everything was as advertised with nice amenities, clean and comfortable. We wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

Kara and her home is the truth her home is everything and then some safe extremely clean and it makes you feel welcomed thanks so much and take care hope you allow me and my family a  chance to stay again there's no place like homr
This was a great experience to NYC, Kara's home made it feel even better & it was very much affordable, i will be visiting NYC again and staying here!!!!
Wonderful and very responsive host. Apartment was super clean and very spacious. She was very nice enough to let us check in extra early.
Great place and great location for our first visit to New York.  Would stay here again.
Nice spot in Harlem. It was everything we needed. Very clean and comfortable. Our flight was delayed and we had to check in late. Kara was very accommodating. I’d definitely stay here again.

Karas place was amazing! Pictures don't do it justice I mean it's cute in pictures but it was so much more in person. As soon as we walked in we had a note with rules and tips as well as places to go for food entertainment etc then in the room I had a personalized lit up note welcoming me to the city(absolutely adorable) and pretty much anything we could need during our stay was available there. There was a hiccup with check-out which was entirely my fault mixing up the date and she worked with me even got me help with Air BNB support and I found another place almost immediately... Will definitely be staying there next time i'm in the city ❤️
Very good location and great place.  Kara was a good host

We thought Kara’s place was very well appointed, clean and tidy.  It was a great base to explore Harlem, and Kara’s suggestions about things to do in the area were spot-on.
