We found access to other parts of Manhattan to be easy by either bus down 5th Ave or 2/3 subway.  Kara was delightful to communicate with, and very helpful.  The apartment itself is in a lovely complex with a tranquil feel to it.  We’d stay again without a moment’s hesitation.

Kara’s apartment was more than I could have expected. It’s very peaceful and quiet at night and lively during the day. You’ll definitely sleep well in her space. The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were perfect. I couldn’t help myself so I just had to take advantage of her amazing kitchen!! The stove/oven is perfect for those of us that feel the need to cook. The views were great as well. It’s easy access to the highway and there many places to eat and walk around. I HIGHLY recommend staying at Kara’s if you want a good value and a place that really feels like home.

name: Spacious private room close St. Barnabas Hospital
summary: Hello! This room is conveniently situated close to Saint Barnabas Hospital. There are many famous places within 3 miles, such as the Bronx Zoo, Botanical Garden and Yankee Stadium. There are many stores located/available 24hr within two blocks such as drugstores, restaurants, nail/beauty salon, club/bars, etc. Across the street from the 48th precinct and Crotona Park, which is excellent for jogging, walking or simply relaxing and enjoying the views with comfort/safety.  MTA services available!
space: This apartment is located in the heart of the Bronx! Across the street is Crotona park and not too far from several trains/buses services, hospitals and not far from Fordham University. This spacious room/home is equipped with all the amenities that the guests will need.
description: Hello! This room is conveniently situated close to Saint Barnabas Hospital. There are many famous places within 3 miles, such as the Bronx Zoo, Botanical Garden and Yankee Stadium. There are many stores located/available 24hr within two blocks such as drugstores, restaurants, nail/beauty salon, club/bars, etc. Across the street from the 48th precinct and Crotona Park, which is excellent for jogging, walking or simply relaxing and enjoying the views with comfort/safety.  MTA services available! This apartment is located in the heart of the Bronx! Across the street is Crotona park and not too far from several trains/buses services, hospitals and not far from Fordham University. This spacious room/home is equipped with all the amenities that the guests will need. The guest bedroom in the back is another Airbnb listing which makes this room private and unavailable unless you book this additional space. The bathroom (1 shared bathroom), living room and kitchen are shared with other Airbnb g
neighborhood_overview: We love living in NYC for the culture, music, and people. You will meet all kinds of people when you visit and that is a wonderful experience. As you explore any borough of NYC, you can see the culture change from street to street! It’s a great experience to have and tell.
notes: The apartment is on the fourth floor. The guest will have to walk up and down since there isn't an elevator in the building.  All guest should be aware/mindful that this is a city and that most apartments don't have elevators or an elevator that works. This means that neighbors can/ might make noise at random times throughout the day and night. The neighborhood is a safe location but for your satisfaction/comfort/ease of mind, the police station is across the street on the corner!
transit: You can catch a cab by simply stepping outside or ordering an Uber if you don't feel like walking to the MTA bus/train stop. depending on where you plan on going, you can walk and enjoy the sites of the Bronx!
access: The guest bedroom in the back is another Airbnb listing which makes this room private and unavailable unless you book this additional space. The bathroom (1 shared bathroom), living room and kitchen are shared with other Airbnb guest booked in the other room/listing. I may need to use the kitchen once in a blue if needed. Each guest/booked room will have a set copy of keys to come and go as they please. this will give you access to the main door downstairs, upstairs and your room only.
interaction: Emma will always socialize with the Airbnb guest when available or needed. She is friendly helpful and loves talking about education and life. She also gives the guest space to venture off on there own to enjoy NYC the Bronx!  She is available by phone or text if you have any questions. if you can't reach out to her, I'm also available to assist if needed!
house_rules: - No Smoking - No Loud music/TV - Be mindful of other Airbnb guest/others - No parties/events  - No additional guest - Check out by 10:00 AM - Clean up after yourselves/common areas after use - Take shoes off at the door  - All visitors must be approved before entering  - Notify if electronics stop functioning  - Turn off lights after use - Refrain from offensive/obscene language  - Wear clothing in common areas at all times  - Take out your garbage  - No pets (fish & service animals acceptable) - Laundry room detergent Not Included  - Leave house keys on your nightstand when checking out - Keep noise to a minimum as other guests may be sleeping. - Please treat the space, our neighbors, and other guests with respect. - Guest will be responsible for replacing the host items they have broken - PLEASE DO NOT LOCK THE BOTTOM LOCK  We're here to help! THANK YOU!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am an enthusiastic, energetic, gregarious elementary school teacher for the New York City Department of Education. I am a mother of three young adults who have left the nest. I am from the Dominican Republic. Who has assimilated herself into NYC culture since 1985. I speak both Spanish and English.

reviews.comments: Absolutely loved my stay!!!! Emma is a generous host and the place was very clean and comfortable.  Close to public transportation.  Highly recommended!!!

Emma is a wonderful host. I would definitely recommend her !
My time of arrival was very uncertain and yet she welcomed me the nicest way. She took the time to explain to me how to get around and reach Manhattan (bus and train) and she made sure that I spent a great time at her place.
Perfect place for everything
Quiet, clean room, at a good location.
Emma's place is very clean. She is very  nice person and very accommodating. Communication was great . Nice place to stay.

Hi! I stayed in private room 14 days and I really enjoy to stay here. Emma so friendly, generous and kind, she helped me for everything! Bus stop very close for home, many store and beautiful park it's near. I love this home with Emma and I miss.. Thank you!!!

Emma is one of the warmest and kindest persons we came across on Airbnb. She always went out of her way to make us feel comfortable and help us out. Her home is neat, well kept and Emma is always around for anything that we might have needed.

Emma was very nice to me, she came to pick me up because I was lost. She really take care about me. She's a incredible and a amazing person. The little studio was nice, very good for the price .. if I could I would stay longer

Emma is a such a nice person. She made my stay at her place very comfortable. She was always available and willing to help.  I stayed at her place for 2 weeks for my family medicine rotation. She has a very pleasant personality and the room was clean and cozy.

Emma is a lovely host who was more than friendly over our trip. She provided comforts like chilled bottles of water which were much appreciated. Check-in went smoothly and the room itself was also lovely and clean and contained two full sized double beds. Plenty of towels and toiletries were also provided.
    The location is a bit of a trek from the subway, with the two main lines serving the area (the D and the 2) being about 20 mins away from the house uphill part of the way.
Clean, quiet place.

Emma is a nice person and the rest of my stay was fine, there was just some difficulty entering the house on my first night and I had difficulty reaching her. also the private key to my room did not work so I could not lock it as I went out but I did not see her in the house to mention this. 

overall my stay was okay and the house was clean.

Emma's apartment is very tidy, clean and makes you feel like being home from the very first moment. Since I only stayed three nights and we were both quite busy I only chatted with her for a couple of minutes. However I experienced her as a very  kind and lovely host. Her apartment is located in the Bronx from where it takes a while to Manhattan. On the first view the area does not look very nice. However on the second view people are very nice and helpful. My impression was that the area is safe which was also confirmed by Emma.

I came as a medical student on residency interviews. Her place was comfortable and private, a nice sanctuary between interviews. I was also around over thanksgiving, and Emma kindly served me dinner as her son was over for the holiday. It was a thanksgiving to remember, and I’m very glad to have stayed with such a thoughtful and kind host.
One thing is certain.The place is nice.Emma is great and the room is very very clean. Do not heSitate to book it You will not regret it.

Great and cozy room with almost everything you need.  Emma was an awesome host who worked around my check in.  Around a 5-10 minute walk to St. Barnabas hospital for those who are visiting the hospital.
Good place. Good value. Emma provides alot of amenities and is very helpful!
Muy bien

Emma’s place is neat and suitable for my husband and myself. The location is one mile walking distance from where my daughter lives. The price is fair and we appreciate it.
The dresser in the bedroom seemed to block half of the entrance. 
here is my humble opinion: swab the dresser with the end table ( draw a picture on paper and see if that works .... ).     Lily

The host did what she could to make my stay better, but the mattress i slept on was a complete disaster, when she tried to offer me a Substitute the quality was still poor:(. i got back pain. The area is extremely unsafe the crime rate is high and the neighbors will play music loud! Be extremely cautious as satistics of crime in the area speaks for themselves. The building is dilapidated, and, The host told me the dryer wasn’t working. Breakfast was listed as an amenity and that was an unfortunate mistake but the host did provide some oatmeal tea coffee after i insisted a few times. Overall the host tries to be a nice person. But be careful we had an argument because she didn’t want to lock doors after pple checked out and i had to go to work... so i asked the guests to slide the key under the door on their way out. Also i had to do the checkout for her if i wanted to feel safe. Honestly who doesn’t lock their doors in the bronx?! The wall of my room is a room divider and therefore doesn’t reach  ceiling height, this limits your privacy allot. The aircon is broken and blows no cold air and it makes allot of noise, emma offered me a fan instead. i guess thats it.

Very reasonable price for a comfortable space with nice thoughtful touches. 
The space has everything you need.
The hosts were sweet and charming,  communicated swiftly and effectively, 
and went out of their way to ensure I was comfortable and satisfied

Good location for access to city , CT and Westchester via bus or commuter train

Emma is warm and friendly. She will provide you with everything you need. If you are visiting during summer months, please bring mosquito spray. Since the walls don't completely connect to the ceiling, this allows for mosquitos to come in. I was bitten pretty badly. Other than that, I greatly enjoyed my stay. And you will too.
Endroit propre en plein cœur du Bronx.

It’s a perfect place if you want stay in New York but don’t want to pay too much and still want comfort. The Bronx may be known as unsafe but I didn’t feel unsafe for a minute. All the people I met were very helpful!

My stay was great! Although it was a bit noisey at times, it was nothing too crazy. The room i stayed in was great for one person and the mini fridge was a great touch. I didn’t realize the room wouldn’t be fully closed up, so maybe add that to give others the heads up. But other than that, I enjoyed my stay and would love to come back!

Emma's place is really comfortable, cozy and tidy! The neighborhood is safe, we didn't feel insecure at any moment. Emma is more than a great host!!!!! She is such a lovely person. I highly recommend this place to future guests! You'll enjoy it.

You know. 
 
As my experience of 7 weeks, I move out from one place to another every week, a host is the most important for a guest to feel free to stay. 

This room is quite away from the train, but the best place in the 7 places. 

And the washing machine.

name: Bright, beautiful room for a comfortable stay
summary: This beautiful and airy room is perfect for two or for one person who likes ample space. With free WiFi and a desk the room is perfect for students and remote work. Shared Bathroom. No stove available but common area has microwave and refrigerator. 40 min to midtown Manhattan (Grand Central). No smoking or visitors permitted.  Hablamos Español!!!
space: Room is private and located in the family home. Share the floor with other guests. -View to the back of the home.    Lock and key for safety    Queen size bed   Towel and bedding (weekly)   Flat HDTV w/ local channels   Free highspeed WiFi   Mirror and closet space   Air conditioning in summer

No stove available but common area has microwave and refrigerator. 40 min to midtown Manhattan (Grand Central). No smoking or visitors permitted.  Hablamos Español!!! Room is private and located in the family home. Share the floor with other guests. -View to the back of the home. My mother Carmen is also available and c
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located on a quiet residential street in an ethnically diverse neighborhood. There isn't much in the way of entertainment  but there are lots of places to eat, a laundromat 1 block away and some historical stuff you can check out in the nearby college. Some nearby sights: Gould Library and Hall of Great Americans @ Bronx Community College High Bridge Edgar Allan Poe Cottage  Little Italy on Arthur Ave
notes: IMPORTANT:  Please do not use our address to receive mail (we cannot guarantee delivery). UPS delivers packages to a UPS Access point near our home: UPS Access Point El Economico 99 Cents Multi 137 W Burnside Ave, Bronx, NY 10453 Closes at 8:00 PM  We offer starter towels and bed sheets as a courtesy but we do not change them every day due to limited resources. If you will arrive before check-in or arrive really late please let us know since we are not always home and we want to make sure someone is around to receive you.
transit: The 4 train is about 10 min walking distance stop is BURNSIDE AVE. D train is about 17 min walking distance TREMONT AVE. The Bx3 which goes to Washington Heights is a couple blocks away. The walk from the train is generally not problematic but is somewhat uphill on way to house. Parking is on the street and can be difficult to find at night. Average distance from tourist destinations  (including 10 min walk).  Washington Heights- 15 min  MET Museum- 35 minutes (Train) Grand Central Terminal - 35-40 minutes (Train) Times Square- 45-50 minutes (Train) Union Square -14th St- 1 hour (Train)
access: Guests have access to common area and shared bathroom Refrigerator, toaster, microwave, free coffee/tea and hot and cold filtered water dispenser, plates and mugs        Iron and ironing board   Access to Garden area Shared bathroom w/ soap and shampoo
interaction: I, Rossy, live in the property and I am available most nights. My mother Carmen is also available and can handle any emergencies and check-ins. You may contact me through Airbnb, phone, email or multiple messaging apps.
house_rules: - 35-40 min to Midtown Manhattan - NO VISITORS are allowed (even If they are not staying over) -NO SHIPPING PACKAGES or MAIL is accepted at this address (we will not responsible for lost or damaged parcel) - For the safety and comfort of our guests NO smoking, illegal substances or small children  -Please keep common areas clean, throw out food garbage in main garbage can to prevent pests -Be considerate of others - Lock doors for safety of yourself and others.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello! We are Rossy, Carmen, (and Juan). Our nice family home in the Bronx allows you to enjoy the NYC without the NYC cost! We love to host and meet travelers from around the world (look at our welcome board). HABLAMOS  ESPAÑOL también. We live on the property but our rooms also give you some privacy so that you can relax and enjoy the city!

Rossy- I'm your main point of contact. A librarian and a backpacker that wants to hit all continents by the time am 40 and is serious about that. I LOVE to meet travelers and in fact, hosted travelers for free for several years before joining this community. 

David- my other half and co-host. Also pretty friendly and loves people.

Carmen is my mother. You will see her keeping the place clean or checking you in. She has lived abroad and loves to meet guests. 

Juan- My brother Juan has moved into his own place! However, he might be around if I'm not available. He is an energetic outgoing guy who has good advice about where to eat or dance. 

We believe in providing a comfortable and pleasant stay where you feel at home. Ask us about what to do in the city!

reviews.comments: Quit neighborhood and a secured home. I loved my stay and the host was friendly and available to offer assistance.
Very cozy!
Beautiful home, 10minute walk to train, close to everything you need, really accommodating, great communication, and very clean
I like the room, it's so sweet.

Everything was great! The area isn't bad to walk, lots of different cultures, and a pretty easy walk to the metro. 
I had an amazing stay, the hosts communicate very well and adjust to you needs. Thanks again! 

Best Travels,
Neisha
Lovely place! Bedroom was clean and I had a pleasant trip :-)

La comunicación es muy buena, te atienden re bien, Carmen nos daba tomates orgánicos de su huerta, no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. El único detalle son esas 5 cuadras de caminar hasta el metro desde la casa.

Best location in quiet oasis in the lively neighborhood of Bronx. Privacy, security, cleanness and all the comfort were so pleasant in this family house. We'd like come again. Thank you, dear Rossy, Carmen and Juan!
100% recomendado, un lugar cómodo, dentro de un vecindario tranquilo queda todo cerca y ni hablar de la hospitalidad de Rossy y Carmen, muchísimas gracias espero verlos pronto otra vez!

My stay at this place was very brief, but Since I live in the neighborhood, I’m already familiar with the area, place is conveniently located in a quiet space in the Bronx, very centric, with easy access to transportation, and Near by Hospitals(for students). I think  anyone would  love the space, very homey and spacious, theres lots of amazing restaurants and points-of-interest within walking distance.   Carmen was very welcoming, as well as Rossy and Juan, it was a pleasure meeting all of you.    I will definitely recommend this cute spot to anybody 

Best regards,
Nice place to stay at, everything is close by. Is a comfy welcoming home, if you have a question or concern they are there to answer any concerns.

Suite à une annulation, j'ai du trouver une nouvelle chambre, moins d'une semaine avant Noël et le hasard faisant bien les choses, je rois que je n'aurais pas pu mieux tomber.
Rossy et Juan (Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de vraiment voir Carmen) sont très attentionnés, agréables et tiennent parfaitement leurs chambres d'hôtes. 
Les chambres sont propres, le wifi excellent, la salle de bain assez spacieuse et entretenue etc. 
Bien qu'assez loin des points touristiques de New York, cela reste bien situé car le métro proche de la chambre dessert la majorité des points essentiels de manhattan et de brooklyn, ce qui permet un gain de temps très apprécié dans une si grande ville.
Je reviendrais sans hésiter si l'occasion se présente !
Nice room, no kitchen available but that’s already stated in the description. Over all a good stay:)
My guest and I stayed a week with Rossy. The room was pretty and the home was clean. We enjoyed our stay and recommend their place.
The place was great. The room is neat and clean, they clean the bathroom regularly, the neighborhood is quiet, and the hosts are welcoming and reply quickly. I would like to stay there again.

La habitación tiene un colchón muy cómodo y limpio, nos gustó la confianza que nos dieron. Cada cuarto tiene su llave y el baño muy limpio, la habitación tiene calefacción y la presión de agua es excelente tanto agua fría y caliente. Rosy y Carmen nos dejaron un pequeño botiquín con cosas de aseo personal como jabón, sanitizante de manos y espuma de afeitar. Agua fría caliente para tomar y una cafetera. Nos sentimos muy cómodos.

We loved to stay in this house. It's a quite neighborhood, full of stores, restaurants and markets, really close to the station and It's a stop that has express trains. We took just 20 minutes to the midtown.  We highly recommend it.  The restroom is clean every day and there is mineral water, cold and hot. The shower was the best that we have at Airbnb.  Thank you Carmen for all assistance and care.
The hosts were very kind and welcoming. The shower is great..refreshing! I had a quiet and restfull stay. I am grateful. Thank you.

Nice home to stay in New York City! 
Well communicated host. Whenever we asked something, Carmen And Juan’s answered right away.
Amazing house, great hosts.Juan helps us a lot. We had a wonderful stay there. Btw, Juan is a great Uber, he takes you to anywhere you want if you need. Recommend!
Colchão novo muito agradável

It was really nice staying. Room is bright, cozy and tidy. It’s easy to get to center by subway. Rossy was very kind, she answered all our questions, and gave us all phone contacts  in the case we need any help, and it was easy to check-in and check-out. Near the house there is a good supermarket, some small shops work till late night.

This place is a great deal if you’re on a budget looking to travel in NYC. It’s only an hour out from the city by sub, and the subway station is walking distance. For this price, you really can’t beat it. The place is clean and quiet. Although I wouldn’t walk alone at night.

Quaint and cozy home within a very vibrant yet safe Bronx neighborhood. Everything you could possibly need for the duration of your stay was within walking distance. Rossy was so welcoming and hospitable from the moment we checked in and always willing to guide us through some of the city’s many features if asked. I highly recommend this home for any one visiting the NYC area.
This house was incredible. The room was clean, the bathroom was clean. I got enough privacy. I loved this place and you’ll love it too.
I was very pleased to meet new people. I recommend accommodation:)
Good value, not so far from Manhattan. Thanks for hosting us !

It was a warm welcome at our arrival. All was arranged for a very wellness stay in the house, for example water for refill, koffee, refrigerator, mikrowave...
All is very well prepared for a self organized stay in the nice flowerfull dekorated room.
热情好客的房东,非常棒的纽约旅行住宿地

I truly left like I was home away from home for the days I spent at Rossy, Carmen and Juan’s place. I highly recommend this home to anyone visiting NYC! Perfect accommodation, ideal location close to train station, great communication with host, private room with a very comfortable bed, and overall lovely home!
100% recommended,  good place.

Nice and large house with extremely friendly hosts. The neighborhood turned to be worse than we expected first, but in the end it seemed ok. Having a coffee machine in the kitchen is really cool. Thanks for the place!
Good location, walking distance to the express subway station. Host is friendly and good-humoured. Good choice for this value.

Great communication from the host, easy to get into NYC and easy to find. We had some issues with locking doors which was resolved. Please note that there are four rooms rented out and only one bathroom and toilet, we found these facilities were not cleaned during our five day stay.
great place,  very clean, comfortable , Juan Carmen and rossy are very helpful, and positive people,  love the place,  really recommended

It was my first experience getting an Airbnb and I would like to say that I was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean and so was the bathroom, the locks on the doors gave us the security we needed for our first out of state trip alone, and the area holds many interesting places. It took us about 40 minutes to get to downtown with all the stops, but riding the subway was a pleasant experience especially because on the way there we rode past Yankee Stadium. 

To be quite honest, we had a pleasant stay here with no problems! We got a set of keys that held a key for the front door, the door to get into the upstairs of the home, and to get into our room so we had no difficulty with feeling safe. The hosts were so so helpful and kind which made us feel great considering we are just a couple of young people exploring a big city. 

I recommend this place if you are looking for an affordable place to rest your head at night!!

Place is good value considering the price & location.
Location is in a lively and safe neighbourhood with many shops near the subway station. Communication with host was good, Rossy is a very attentionate host.
The place is about 10mins from subway station on foot and about 30mins additional travel time to midtown, so location is quite good.

This place is awesome! The whole upstairs is private from the owners and it’s like a mini hotel. You share a bathroom with a few other guests but we never had any issues. Everyone was so nice and respectful. Check in and check out prices was so easy, the hosts were incredible and location was so nice and easy walk to the subway with tons of food options on the way. We are really happy with our stay there!
Great value, kind hosts and good communication. Recommended!

Las sábanas de la cama estaban limpias al igual que las toallas y tenían un olor muy rico, hubo mucha privacidad y se pudo descansar muy bien. 

El barrio no es muy bonito/seguro, sin embargo nunca tuvimos ningún problema,  se recomienda el tránsito rápido y precavido. 

El metro está cerca y se dura 45 min para llegar al centro de la ciudad. 

En general la pasamos muy bien. 

Gracias, ¡pura vida!
This was a really nice experience. The house was great and comfortable. And the hosts were more than welcoming.
Super logement pour visiter NY le temps d’un week-end, bon emplacement et hôtes accueillants. Seuls bémols : l’absence de cuisine et le bruit des colocataires car espace restreint.
Grateful for the receptivity and total availability in the service. We loved our stay, we indicated for sure.
I always have a great experience when staying at this location.Its in great proximity to the four train and in a very safe neighborhood.
The place was great !
Stayed at this location for an extended period of time and as always had a great experience.
Very nice

name: KS RESIDENCE - Apt Completo p/ 3 pessoas
summary: Ambiente clean - Com uma cesta de café da manhã incluso Limpeza do apartamento em dias alternados.
space: Sinta-se à vontade em nossos apartamentos completos! O KS Residence é um complexo de apartamentos para aluguel por diária ou temporada, em sua estadia está incluso uma cesta de café da manhã e limpeza do apartamento em dias alternados. Nosso objetivo é que você vivencie tudo o que o Rio de Janeiro tem a oferecer de melhor com todo o conforto da sua casa! Apartamentos contemplados com excelente rede de transportes públicos e metro, a uma quadra da movimentada Av. Érico Veríssimo famosa por seus bares restaurantes e toda vida noturna. Acesso total ao apartamento. Acesso a KS ACADEMIA, pertencente a Rede KS está a 3 quadras do KS Residence. O KS Residence possui recepção 24h, e serviço de limpeza em dias alternados. Na Barra da Tijuca o Rio é mais Miami. Imensos condomínios fechados, shoppings gigantescos e avenidas largas dão a cara do bairro. Sua praia é uma das melhores da cidade e, por isso mesmo, superconcorrida. Mesmo com inúmeras boates e restaurantes famosos dentro dos shoppings,

name: Bright & Airy Private Room near L/JMZ trains
summary: Sunny private room with A/C close to L & JMZ trains for easy access to Williamsburg and Manhattan. Trendy bars, incredible restaurants, and ~dancing~ all within walking distance! Two large windows overlooking courtyard and the roof has an incredible view of the Manhattan skyline.
space: Apartment has 1.5 bathrooms, and 3 lovely roommates (2 male 1 female) who are respectful and friendly. Very comfortable double bed, (sleeps two), as well as a small dresser and closet available for storing all your goodies.
description: Sunny private room with A/C close to L & JMZ trains for easy access to Williamsburg and Manhattan. Trendy bars, incredible restaurants, and ~dancing~ all within walking distance! Two large windows overlooking courtyard and the roof has an incredible view of the Manhattan skyline. Apartment has 1.5 bathrooms, and 3 lovely roommates (2 male 1 female) who are respectful and friendly. Very comfortable double bed, (sleeps two), as well as a small dresser and closet available for storing all your goodies. Rooftop access is available by a ladder in the hall, and the view is stunning. Bushwick is a very young and trendy neighborhood with lots of cool bars and restaurants. I'll leave a list with some of my favorite spots in case you'd like suggestions! The Morgan stop of the L train is a five minute walk from the front door, and the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ trains are a 12 minute walk. Both make it super easy to get into Williamsburg and Manhattan.
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is a very young and trendy neighborhood with lots of cool bars and restaurants. I'll leave a list with some of my favorite spots in case you'd like suggestions!
transit: The Morgan stop of the L train is a five minute walk from the front door, and the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ trains are a 12 minute walk. Both make it super easy to get into Williamsburg and Manhattan.
access: Rooftop access is available by a ladder in the hall, and the view is stunning.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a 25 year old originally from Colorado living in Bushwick, Brooklyn. I work as a butcher at The Meat Hook in Williamsburg and spend my weekends going to concerts, the beach, riding my bike, and obviously ~brunch~.

reviews.comments: El alojamiento de Leah fue muy cómodo, con una excelente ubicación y fácil acceso al metro de NY,  sin duda volveremos a alojarnos con Leah.
Good location, close to airport. Prompt responses to questions.
Coordinating our stay with Leah was super easy. Even though she was not there, she was easy to communicate with and our stay was great. The area is good too, lots of cafes, bars and subway close by.

name: Entire MASSIVE apt. for 4 ppl 1 Block from Subway
summary: 1,000 sq ft pre-war LARGE 1 bedroom apartment with a spacious living room, and both have queens beds. Our place sleeps 4  (Plus a sleeping bag for 5). 1 block from local (M, R) and express (E,F) trains to Manhattan in approx 30 min. This is to the first stop in Manhattan is 59th and Lexington AKA midtown Manhattan! Connections to N,W,R and 4,5,6 trains there.
space: Massive living room and bedroom. Main bedroom has a TEMPURPEDIC queen bed (sooooo comfy). Couch has queens size pull out as well. Very clean, filled with original art, antique furniture and all the basics for food, cooking, and pretty much anything else you need. We even have kettle bells, weights, yoga mats and other workout equipment. We often live there so it is well equipped in general. Coffee/espresso and tea + any snacks we leave out and condiments you are more than welcome to use. Sometimes we leave special treats, too =)
description: 1,000 sq ft pre-war LARGE 1 bedroom apartment with a spacious living room, and both have queens beds. Our place sleeps 4  (Plus a sleeping bag for 5). 1 block from local (M, R) and express (E,F) trains to Manhattan in approx 30 min. This is to the first stop in Manhattan is 59th and Lexington AKA midtown Manhattan! Connections to N,W,R and 4,5,6 trains there. Massive living room and bedroom. Main bedroom has a TEMPURPEDIC queen bed (sooooo comfy). Couch has queens size pull out as well. Very clean, filled with original art, antique furniture and all the basics for food, cooking, and pretty much anything else you need. We even have kettle bells, weights, yoga mats and other workout equipment. We often live there so it is well equipped in general. Coffee/espresso and tea + any snacks we leave out and condiments you are more than welcome to use. Sometimes we leave special treats, too =) You have access to the entire apartment, however please be mindful of drawers and doors that have been
neighborhood_overview: Near by: we have two super markets, a chase bank, a M&T bank, a Starbucks, a CVS, a gym and an adorable cafe with great food (Roast n' Co) app within two blocks!  The area is very safe, so is the building. Everyone is really friendly.
notes: We want to make sure you enjoy your stay as much as possible so please let me know if there is anything I can do to make it extra special.
transit: The subway is at the top of the hill on 67 drive which has the R and the M. You can also walk 9 minutes in the opposite direction to catch the express E and F trains. Either way you can be in midtown Manhattan in about 30 minutes.  To make sure you exit a block from the apartment, always get on the FIRST CAR of the subway train and get out on the NORTH SIDE (indicated). Then simply walk down the hill and turn right to find our place.
access: You have access to the entire apartment, however please be mindful of drawers and doors that have been taped to indicate no access. We will make sure to leave out anything that you need.  In the case that we absolutely cannot be there to greet you we have any easy system with a key in a lock box attached to the side gate. We can discuss details if that ends up being the case.
interaction: I LOVE TO RECOMMEND PLACES and give people tours. Interested? just let me know =)
house_rules: Please take special note: NO PETS and NO SMOKING is permitted. We will keep the $500 deposit if we feel you have broken this rule. Also, please be respectful of everything that you use. Anything that is broken will require replacement. Please let us know so that we can make it an easy process without involving Airbnb.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I was the first individual to stay in Eva's apartment which is very accommodating and spacious. Only issue we had was communication with entering the building and unlocking the door. Besides that, this was a very nice place with great location. Eva reached out for suggestions, so I have no doubt the next guest to stay in her home will not have an issue and enjoy the stay.
Great host, very friendly and sweet. Place was not too far from time square driving which is where we spent most of our time.
Everything about her house was very convenient. The subway was close by, grocery store as well. The house has all amenities. It was one of our best stays. Eva is a great host! :)

Eva was super nice and able to accommodate us arriving earlier than check-in time. Even though the place is a little far from Manhattan the 20 min subway ride was worth the time difference. I would stay here again.

Minus - Bathroom was very dirty and apartment not cleaned probably for quite long. No fresh bedding provided ( possibly by mistake).
Plus - Very good communication with host, apartment was spacious and uncluttered. Photos are quite accurate. It takes 10 minutes to metro station and with express train it is 30-40 minutes to midtown manhattan.
A great place to stay. Clean, comfy and awesome.

Apartment was very nice! It was easy to get into and find. It was also in a very nice & safe area and was very clean. Eva was very organized and communicated details excellently. I would highly recommend.
Great spot, close to the subway, close to Starbucks. Clean apartment. This was my first Airbnb and I loved it.

Pros: the apartment is large and bright. It is well furnished with all the necessary amenities. The area is quiet and safe. We liked how close it was to public transport (bus and subway to easily access downtown) as well as close to coffee shops and neighborhood markets. Eva was available to answer questions very quickly and was an agreeable host even though we did not meet. 
Cons: cleanliness. The apartment appears to not have been cleaned in a couple of days and the sheets were not fresh.
Strongly recommend you to stay Eva's place. Close to subway station and lots of stores near there! Easy to check in and out and quick communication! Great hospitality!!!

My stay at Eva's place was great. The building is in a safe neighborhood with many businesses and places to eat within a block or two. It's also within a 5-10 minute walk from two different subway stations. Manhattan was about 25-30 minute ride on the subway.
Greeaatttt would stay again
This is a really nice home. Great location. Neighborhood is quiet. Eva did a good job making us feel welcome. She was accommodating to our schedule. We plan to stay here again.

Super friendly host and great place to stay while in NYC. We were there for the US Open and it couldn't have been more convenient as the subway stop is a block away. Great value, plenty of room for us, can't wait to return and book again!
Amazing host!!!! So thoughtful, sweet and caring. this had to be the best experience I've had thus far. I highly recommend!

The apartment is located in a safe,  peaceful and convenient location. Easy access to all public transportation and express bus to Manhattan within 30 mins is a huge plus.  Eva has been really kind and helpful. She tried to accommodate all of our requests. Thank you so much.

Eva is very friendly. She let us check out later than expected, which was very generous of her. The neighborhood is safe and quaint, albeit a tad further than 25 mins from downtown. The apartment is big and spacious.
Wonderful apartment, close to subway, stores and coffee shops.  We had a great visit.

Eva was very helpful at all times and made sure we were going to feel comfortable in the apartment. She gave us precise instructions and tips for the arrival and for resolving any issue that might occur. She even allowed us to come back after the check-out to collect the luggage.

I would very much recommend this apartment to anyone interested in visiting NY, specially Queens.
Everything was exactly as described, lovely and quiet space, easy check in. Easy access to the subway and a near walk to restaurants and shopping. And really good communication with the host.

If you are going to rent this airbnb you will so satisfied!  Everything was so convenient!  I felt like I was staying at a friends or relatives home.  With great art, layout, beds so comfortable and everything in working order.  Love NYC, and we were three girls and felt so safe!  Great neighborhood, with stores, coffee shops and subway close by!  Eva was a wonderful host! Happy Travels!!

summary: i-Hotel is a self-service, modern, stylish, reasonably-priced hotel conveniently located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping and commercial district. We cater to single business travelers as well as friends or couples traveling together who want to stay in a friendly, safe, and clean environment. 我的酒店是一个自助形式,现代,时尚,价格合理的酒店,座落在香港尖沙咀购物和商业区的心脏｡我的酒店适合商务旅客,青年朋友或一起旅行的夫妇｡谁不想住在一个友好,安全,清洁的环境和留下一个美好的回忆.   i-Hotelは､香港のｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞとﾋﾞｼﾞﾈｽ地区尖沙咀の中心部に位置し､ｾﾙﾌｻｰﾋﾞｽ式､ﾓﾀﾞﾝでｽﾀｲﾘｯｼｭな､手頃な価格のﾎﾃﾙです｡ i-Hotelは､出張と旅行にも最適です｡

host.host_about: Hkgirl

reviews.comments: Nice place
位置挺好的,附近很多东西可以逛!方便用户出行,房东人也很好,很热情!
位置很好,尖沙咀地鐵C2出口直走三十米就到了,房間很精致很干净,虽然在闹市之中,晚上睡觉也不吵,后面一条街就有很多吃的,去天星码头和海港城走路就可以到,很方便｡
交通非常便利房間也乾淨
首先 房子的位子很方便 楼下有很多公交站,离地铁也很方便,周边吃的也很多,周边很多商场,离海港城很近,很方便｡另外我们订的房间有点小,嗯,大概就只有一个20寸的箱子可以放下,但是麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,里面该有的也都有,整洁度也算可以｡最后房东人很nice,会热心帮你解决一些问题,另外早上的阿姨也很热情,是一次很好的住宿体验｡
地点不错,尖沙咀地铁出来就能找到,不过房间真的很小,在香港繁华地段寸土寸金可以理解,是我自己没想到那么小,房东人很好,本来要给我们换大一点的,是我没注意信息所以没换到,房间挺干净的,适合一个人入住或者小情侣｡
good location,convinent transportation,dedicated services
Very accessible. Near MTR, shopping malls, 5 min. Walk to harbour city. There is ichiran near, easy to go everywhere. The room is small but I like it
交通超方便｡尖沙咀位置,而且30秒即到地鐵站
房子小些,不过相对这个价格,性价比挺好,楼下就是大型超市,各种买买买,交通便利绝对是此地的优势!
Definitely above expectations for  such a low price!
房間比想像中小,不過地理位置很方便,一出來地鐵口就是了｡
要问好房间大小
크기는 생각보다 좁았지만 호스트들이 친절하고 1~2명이 생활하기 나쁘지 않았습니다. 화장실이 안에있어서 편했지만 샤워할때 물이 조금 빨리 안빠지는것이 아쉬웠네요. 위치는 만족했습니다. 숙소1층 나갈때 바퀴벌레가 조금 보였지만 집안에서는 보지못했습니다.
住就對了,找不到更好的｡
Jane is nice!地理位置也很不错!唯一就是房间真的有点小｡台风来的那天,Jane跟他的丈夫提供了很多帮助｡谢谢了!
숙소 위치가 진짜 기깔나게 좋아요. 조금 흠이 있다면 그쪽길에 멘션이 많은데 찾기 아주조금힘들다는거? 좋아용 청소도 깨끗히 해주세용
下次再来哟
一次好的体验,交通非常方便,购物也十分便利,海港城步行6分钟即可到达,房东也非常好,给了很多建议
居住环境很安全 周边很热闹很方便 出地铁口就100米就能找到 ~除了房间小到不能再小以外 其他都OK 两个人住真的不能再多了!拿东西的时候得一个人在床上待着 不然空间不够 哈哈~窗子外的视野不咋的 不介意尝试打开往外望~

위치가 정말 좋았고,
아이가 없는 혼행 또는 커플이 잠만 자기에는 가성비가 매우 좋았습니다
체크인도 예정보다 일찍하게 해 주었고 방도 무료로 업그레이드 해주셨어요

방은 매우 작습니다만. 필요한 편의시설은 만족스러웠어요
욕실이 작은거가 단점이지만 다른 걸로 커버되고
전반적으로만족!!!
临近地铁口,非常喜欢｡房东姐姐很漂亮哦｡回复也非常及时｡下次还要来
位置真的非常棒,离地铁口一分钟,购物方便｡房间很小,该有的都有｡房东沟通也很及时,很温柔｡唯一的不足是床单不干净 上面有干了的血渍和毛发

房間極小
入住方式未說明明確
廁所極小
地點資訊不明確
性价比非常高

At first looking for a hostel in HK was a bit tricky. A lot of them offer the same stuff ( like close to mtr. Etc...]
What stands out is that this one is strategically located at TST and also the closest one at a MTR station. Just exit TST C2 exit and it there. 
I love the convinience that the check in was seamless. They give you a passcode for the door and room. Even if its the late hours of the night.
The place is very cheap and also has a nice design to it. 
It is clean and amenities are quite goodsuch as  toiletries (soap, shampoo, toothpaste, toothbrush, combs), it also has towel services which are included. 
You get free water per day.
The housekeeping is excellent as well.

What I would suggest is to have them include the following...
Water dispenser.
Common fridge
Microwave.

As a traveller this is quite useful for eating indoors or if you are in a budget.

Other than that my stay was safe, efficient and I enjoyed it. Thanks I hotel. Will come back with friends next year! :)

The room is exactly like in the picture. Located in a good spot, really close to the MTR. The building is a little bit hard to find. Only small sign in front of the building. But overall are good with budgeted trip.
离地铁站几步路就到了,去海港城也很近三五百米步行就到了,住宿环境很好!干净整洁,房东和阿姨的态度都很好｡就是提个小建议,空调吹风口应该清洗一下了哦,其他地方都很好｡下次来香港还是会住这里的!
房子位置真的很方便,而且价格在HK来说性价比非常高,房东小姐响应非常及时,入住时也非常nice,而且咨询问题也很热情地回答｡房间虽然不大,但在HK大部分旅馆都差不多的,而且有窗明亮设备物品一应俱全｡美中不足是进去的时候由于窗开着通风导致楼上从窗飘进来一点烟灰在床上,另外热水器的水不太够热,这个夏天就没问题,但天气冷的时候就不太好了｡
位置特别棒!出尖沙咀地铁口走几步就到 房东发的位置指示图也很清晰!前台阿姨也很友好 房间虽然超级小 感觉住进了小人国 不过基础设施一应俱全 一般酒店配套的用具也都有 空间设计非常巧妙 不放过一丝一毫 真的是要感叹一句 麻雀虽小 五脏俱全!
Great location if you wanna get around
酒店位置非常好,按照房东的地图出了尖沙咀地铁两分钟就可以走到酒店,步行到维多利亚港十分钟之内｡不过酒店真的好小,下了床一步可以跨到卫生间(不过好心的房东也在入住前提示房间很小,是否需要换房间),在香港寸土寸金也可以理解｡房间内很干净,性价比高,美中不足是浴巾上有大块黄色污渍,晚上睡觉时空调室外机声音有一点大｡打九十分哦~~~~

The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

ข้อดี
-ใกล้รถไฟฟ้า มากๆ
-สิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกครบตามที่ลงไว้
- WIFI แรงดีมาก
- น้ำแรงและร้อนดี
ข้อด้อย
-ห้องเล็กมาก แต่ก็สไตล์ห้องที่ฮ่องกง
-อาบน้ำลำบาก เพราะขนาดห้องที่เล็ก ทำให้ต้องระวังน้ำไหลออกนอกห้อง
地理位置很好,距离海港城很近~逛街很方便!
Nice quaint place. Perfect for what we needed. Just a place to rest when needed. Close to a lot of amenities.
房子的地理位置很優越 在尖沙嘴地鐵站附近 真的就1分鐘的路程 我們那天是晚上9點後上去的 前台已經沒有人 但是門口會有電話讓你可以聯絡到房東 真的很貼心 這兩天的旅程很完美 謝謝房東
房间很吵 基本一晚都没睡过 因为墙外面全是空调的排气扇 隔音不太好 地方很容易找很方便 刚好是圣诞节前三天去 老板准备了点小礼物
房東人非常nice,我們兩個女生本來訂的是小的雙人房,然後房東給我們升級成了一間大的房間,太感謝了,不然我們的行李都放不下⋯地理位置非常優秀,這個價格真的是性價比非常高了!

Toilet was extremely small, had to defecate at the toilets in the shopping mall nearby each time. Bedsheets had hair and crumbs, and felt extremely itchy and uncomfortable on the first night. Fortunately it became better after bedsheets were changed. Host was extremely nice and friendly, and was willing to do laundry for me after paying $100 HKD. Amenities provided were not replenished so do bring your own towels and toiletries. Location is good, only 40 steps away from the MTR. Overall, would have rather paid slightly more ($10 SGD each night) for a better and more value-for-money hotel.

Perfect room for travelers. Prior to the trip, my wife and I are searching for a lodging that’s both cheap and easily accessible. We can across this lodging and we are both satisfied with the service and cleanliness. We don’t use the room that much, only for sleeping and washing up. So this lodging is perfect for us.

Jane was very helpful. she could help you around the streets. i like the location because its just near the tsim sha tsui mtr b2 station. room was very neat. but if you have a lot of big luggage you might find the room too small for you. but for travelers like me, its a good place to stay for longer nights. i would like to stay longer but it seems like its already fully booked. if i visit hongkong again, i’d definetely book this hotel!
很好的一次住宿体验,房间虽小,但交通方便,设施齐全
Beliggenhed var perfekt! Meget tæt på shopping, restauranter og museer.
房间虽小但五脏俱全,个人感觉还是蛮好的,而且房东姐姐人很好,退房后把行李寄放在前台,小姐姐怕我们行李会丢还专门帮我们把行李放在一起锁起来免得被其他人拿走了,真的超级感谢
Nice place and closed to the mtr
交通非常便利｡就在尖沙咀C2出口｡步行可到九龙公园,星光大道,维多利亚港,海港城等地方｡
地理位置很好,周围购物方便｡房间环境很好｡房主热情,耐心解决各种问题｡
位置很好
服務態度超贊!超好!地理位置也超級無敵方便!發消息也是秒回的狀態!這次體驗超棒!期待下次!
Transportation was very convenient and located at a very strategic spot with foods, parks, convenient store, supermarket, and near to most of the tourism spot in Hong Kong
前两晚住的小房间,一个人住其实还是很划算的,虽然空间小了些,但是设备都很齐全｡后面两天朋友也到啦,所以换成了两张床的大房间,果然一下明亮了!!!哈哈 总体来说性价比超高了,地理位置简直100分
Jane is a friendly host, she helps us to solve all the problems!

Strategic location. Convenient as the mrt station is just right next to the building. The room itself is very tiny. Would be suitable for anyone on budget and want to be in a convenient/touristy location. There is a direct bus from the airport to tsim sha tsui and a short walk from the bus stop to the Jane's building.

Great location, and they give you a bottle of water every day. Very firm bed, extremely small room and bathroom, dirty window, dusty under the bed (where you need to put luggage), air-con kept making strange noises periodically, TV was fuzzy and had 4-5 channels. If you want a clean towel, you must leave the towel on the very tiny floor.  Overall, okay for the price.

Jane communicated with me well and was a good host, but unfortunately I did not have a positive experience in the i-hotel. The building and the room itself were dingy just didn't feel super safe as I got offered drugs multiple times from the short walk from the subway station to the entrance of the building. I know that might just be Hong Kong at night, but the area was a little unsettling. There were multiple pieces of random litter under the mattress (because we felt the need to do a bed-bug check) and there was a cockroach in the toilet in the morning. I hate to leave a bad review but I simply would not recommend this place to anyone unless you're desperate.
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,房间很干净｡楼下就是地铁口很方便

Jane as a host is really kind, so friendly, fast response, and speak english very well. As for the room, it fits 2 people, but will be much better if it's occupied only by 1 person. You can bring 1 big and 1 small luggage (extra effort to lay it on the floor tho, coz the room is extra small and the floor will only fit 1 big luggage. Another luggage should be stored under the bed and other people must sit on the bed for us to open the luggage on the floor. LOL). The apartment located at tsim sha shui station exit c2 (blink your eyes and there you are, in front of your room) soooo close to the MTR station. Jane will give you a pdf doc once you arrived at HK. Don't forget to download it as the map is so clearly explained in it. Easy access to everywhere. Lively neighborhoods and easy to find foods (minimarts are everywhere). Oh,the night bus N21 and the normal day bus A21 to the airport also pass in front of the building. Soooo convenient.

Our stay was good. Jane and other stuff was very accomodating and nice. The room was small than I expected but it’s okay. We had difficulty moving a bit but we managed. However on our 1st night, there was a cockroach. Maybe Jane and the staff should check cleanliness more moving forward. But for me, it was a good stay

The room is clean and neat, very strategic place with only less than 1min walk to MTR station and airport return bus stand. The host is also very kind to provide drinking water every morning and is very helpful whenever you need help via phone calls and messaging. Overall we have a great time spending in HK with Jane's accomodation.

It is actually my first time to try airbnb alone so I am kinda worried on what will I be experiencing. But the stay was okay and I’m satisfied with the room  It was a great value because the hotels nearby are really expensive. It is also very, very close to MTR Tsim Sha Tsui station and the Bus Stop to airport (A21 bus) so it’s really a hassle-free stay for me.  Lots of malls are nearby as well and you need to be prepared (and loaded!) so you can actually buy stuff that you want.  I will definitely try again next time I will go to Hong Kong. Thank you so much!
房子很小 隔音有点不太好 活动空间不大 只可以坐在床上 不过交通方便 也是值得的 挺好的 如果对住要求比较高 建议另选别家

Jane was easy to communicate with and was quick to reply to any enquiry we had. Great place if your staying for a short time or if your travelling alone as it's a bit small but still great for the price. My Partner and I liked the place especially because of how close it is to the train station and the ferry. They we're happy to look after our luggage as we were early for our check in. All in all I recommend this place .
Super host indeed! Jane surprised us with an upgraded room upon arrival. We’ll definitely book her place again. Very accessible to MTR Tsim Tsa Tsui Station C2 Exit.
地理位置很好 楼下就是地铁站 性价比高
很好的酒店,虽然非常小,但是五脏俱全,地理位置太棒了!dfs留在楼下几百米,超级赞,下次来还会住!真的很实惠了!!!
还好

很赞的地理位置,而且也很自由,安全
系数也高,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,真的很
赞,下次要来还会订这家!
地理位置非常好 周围有很多好吃的 购物也很方便  房间小但东西齐全 用来睡觉足够了~
很nice 关键是位置够好 出门就是尖沙咀站

name: Montréal en famille ou amis
summary: Dans un cartier calme de Hochelaga Maisonneuve, beacoup de restaurantdans les alentours
description: Dans un cartier calme de Hochelaga Maisonneuve, beacoup de restaurantdans les alentours Je serai toujours disponible avec les voyageurs pour des informations au besoin Vous êtes dans un cartier tranquille près de tout, il y a le beau marché Maisonneuve, vous ¸êtes à 9 minutes de marche de l'épicerie Métro et pharmacie Uniprix, beaucoup de petit resto et bistro. L'autobus 34 et 353 qui font la rue Ste-Catherine et Viau vous amène au métro Viau Pour le stationnement d'un véhicule il y a de l'espace non payant sur les deux rues de côté qui est la rue St-Clément à l'est de l'immeuble et la rue Théodore qui est à l'ouest de l'immeuble

reviews.comments:
Notre séjour s'est très bien passé, l'appartement était propre, tout en parfait état. Literie et mobilier neuf! 
Brigitte toujours présente si on avait besoin d'elle, d'une grande gentillesse.
Un grand merci à vous Brigitte pour avoir fait en sorte que notre séjour se passe au mieux bien.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
L'appartement est très agréable, spacieux, pratique et très bien décoré.
L'accueil de Brigitte a été très chaleureux, Brigitte a été très attentionnée.
Nous avons pu garer facilement (et gratuitement)  notre voiture de location dans la rue saint clément.
Nous y retournerons sans hésiter
David et sa tribu
Very nice flat and very clean. Few bars and restaurants around even if a bit far from the heart of the city
L'appartement est très chaleureux, pratique et grand! L'hôtesse est très accueillante et disponible, nous avons passé de belles vacances avec nos enfants!

This place is a gem! The apartment is bright and clean, with a two good-sized bedrooms. We loved sitting on the balcony in the mornings and enjoyed the quiet neighborhood. Brigitte made us feel welcome and even provided snacks and coffee. Public transportation is close as well as a grocery store. I highly recommend this place.

Le logement de Brigitte correspond exactement aux photos, c'est un logement propre et spacieux, Brigitte est une hôte formidable qui est toujours présente en cas de problème très sympa et à l'écoute, nous avons séjourner 3 semaines à 4 personnes et nous avons adorer notre voyage, nous recommandons à 100% cet appart !!!

This is a great place to stay. I stayed with my girlfriend and her 3year old daughter. Plenty of space and secure. Whole apartment was very clean and Brigitte had bought us food for breakfast for us arriving. Communication was excellent at every stage. There is a Smart TV which is amazing if you want a day to chill! There are plenty of parks, grocery stores and some fantastic local cafes. On street parking near the appartment. In all this is a great place to stay and can be booked with confidence! Thank-you!

Eine wunderschöne Wohnung in guter Lage in Montreal! Die Kommunikation mit Brigitte war schon im Vorfeld sehr gut und intensiv - somit waren wir gut vorbereitet auf die Tage in Montreal und den Aufenthalt in Brigittes Appartement. Das Appartement selber war unglaublich schön eingerichtet, sauber und es fehlte an nichts - bis hin zu Kaffee, Tee, Obst, Gebäck und Croissants. Ein Tipp: Wir haben uns über (Website hidden by Airbnb) Fahrräder ausgeliehen und somit eine gute Alternative und Ergänzung zur Metro und den Bussen gefunden. Es gibt mehrere Fahrradstationen in direkter Nähe zu Brigittes Appartement. 
Vielen Dank an Brigitte - eine tolle Wohnung: 10 von 10 Sterne! :-)
Logement très agréable, très propre, lumineux, décoration sobre et agréable. Brigitte est une hôtesse prévenante et soucieuse du bien-être de ses hôtes.
This place is beautiful! Conveniently loved to the old port of Montreal and highways. Brigitte was an outstanding host and I would highly recommend staying here.

L'appartement est aussi beau que sur les photos et fonctionnel. Brigitte est une hôte exceptionnelle: disponible et attentionnée. Elle a été aux petits soins pour nous. Le logement est un peu excentré du centre ville mais cela ne pose pas de soucis dans la mesure où le bus n°34 passe régulièrement.

Très bel appartement, grandes chambres, cuisine et salon confortables. Brigitte nous a gâté à notre arrivee: tout le nécessaire pour le petit déjeuner et le repas du soir. Vraiment très appreciable. Il y a un bon restaurant tout proche ainsi que des supérettes. Il faut environ 10 min en voiture pour aller au centre ville, 30 min en bus. Le stationnement est facile proche de l'appart.
Logement très bien pas très loin du centre métro es bus dans le cartier très bonne accueil de Brigitte toujours à l’écoute si nous en avons besoin.
Mi estadia fue bastante grata y con muy buena actitud de la anfitriona
Logement très confortable avec tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un excellent séjour.
Great place, very clean and roomy. Couldn’t gave asked for any better
The apartment was beautiful, we had a great stay!
Un excelente lugar! Limpio y con todas las comodidades de un hogar. La anfitriona super amable y siempre atenta.
Clean and nice, close to groceries and some restaurants.

Très bon séjour chez Brigitte, l'appartement est très spacieux et très agréable. Nous sommes situés à 10 minutes en bus n°34 du jardin botanique, site vraiment exceptionnel par sa taille et sa beauté. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Brigitte mais elle a été très réactive et très arrangeante. L'appartement est impeccable, décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Le quartier d'Hochelaga est un quartier défavorisé mais on s'y sent bien malgré tout. Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse.
The host canceled this reservation 123 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

summary: Casa acolhedora, com dois quartos, uma sala e um wc, com excelente espaço exterior que permite ótimos momentos de descanso.
space: Excelentes áreas exteriores, com exposição solar para quem gosta de calor =)

Excelentes áreas exteriores, com exposição solar para quem gosta de calor =) Os hóspedes têm acesso total à casa bem como a todos os jardins que a compõe. A única restrição é a interdição ao campo de cultivo ao lado da casa. Eu estarei disponível 24h para qualquer situação que seja necessária. Excelente localização: é só descer a rua e está de caras com uma vista deslumbrante para o Rio Douro, onde poderá fazer agradáveis caminhadas pelo passadiço de 2.5km de extensão, sempre com o Rio como companheiro, bem como praticar exercitar o corpo no campo de voleibol de areia e nas diversas máquinas de musculação presentes ao longo do passadiço. No mesmo local existem variados bares, onde se poderá deliciar numa esplanada e ver o pôr do sol. A 5 minutos a pé poderá encontrar diversas lojas de comércio o que permitirá que nada lhe falte. A forma mais fácil e cómoda de se d
neighborhood_overview: Excelente localização: é só descer a rua e está de caras com uma vista deslumbrante para o Rio Douro, onde poderá fazer agradáveis caminhadas pelo passadiço de 2.5km de extensão, sempre com o Rio como companheiro, bem como praticar exercitar o corpo no campo de voleibol de areia e nas diversas máquinas de musculação presentes ao longo do passadiço. No mesmo local existem variados bares, onde se poderá deliciar numa esplanada e ver o pôr do sol. A 5 minutos a pé poderá encontrar diversas lojas de comércio o que permitirá que nada lhe falte.
notes: Excelente localização: é só descer a rua e está de caras com uma vista deslumbrante para o Rio. A Marina do Freixo, bem como a Pousada do Porto situam-se a 1.7 Km da residência. A Estação de Campanhã a 3.5 km e o centro de Gondomar a 4.1 km.
transit: A forma mais fácil e cómoda de se deslocar será de carro, contudo existem camionetas que têm ligação com o Andante (metro e comboio) que facilitaram a deslocação para o centro do Porto , por exemplo.
access: Os hóspedes têm acesso total à casa bem como a todos os jardins que a compõe. A única restrição é a interdição ao campo de cultivo ao lado da casa.
interaction: Eu estarei disponível 24h para qualquer situação que seja necessária.

reviews.comments: Excelente relación calidad_ precio.

Le logement est parfaitement conforme à la description, propre et accueillant. Nos hôtes se sont montrés parfaits, tant sur les horaires que sur l'accueil, nous fournissant même des oranges du jardin, qui à elles seules valent le détour. Encore merci.
Great place close to Porto. I definitely recommend.
Très bon accueil. La maison Est confortable et calme. Elle est très proche de la vielle Ville de Porto. Tout Est là pour passer un bon séjour!

Excellent séjour à Valbom. La Maison est très agréable et le jardin est magnifique. Idéal pour se reposer pendant les vacances ou venir en famille. L'accueil a été extrêmement chaleureux. 2 min à pied du Douro pour de belles promenades. La location d'une voiture est conseillée. Semaine parfaite

Logement agréable, confortable, très bien entretenu, et un très joli jardin.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Sandra, mais sa mère qui nous a très bien accueillis et qui , ce n'est pas négligeable, parle couramment le Français.

Gostámos bastante da hospitalidade da Sandra e da sua mãe que deu muito suporte à estadia. Casa e lençóis super limpinhos e um pátio muito agradável. Os acessos são restritos mas a casa é muito perto e tudo! Gostámos bastante, Obrigada

Très bon accueil des propriétaires qui sont juste à côté si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit.
Situation géographique parfait pour porto. A moins de 5mn !!! Juste à traverser la ribeira en voiture.
Maison propre et accueillante; réception sympatique et chaleureuse de la maman de Sandra .Problème de bruit: penser à fermer les doubles fenetres

A nice small cosy house with good beds and patio to sit, but unfortunately spoiled a bit by antisocial neighbours whose dogs bark incessantly from an enclosed balcony.. Nights were reasonably quiet. Hopefully this problem is soon solved.

Sandra's house is in a city close-by Porto, it is a very quiet and safe area. Street parking was not necessary as you can park a large car in her driveway. The house was clean and everything was as expected from the pictures. Overall a very nice stay!

Sandra was great. Excellent communication and she made check-in very easy. The house is very comfortable and the neighborhood is nice and quiet. It's not centrally located near Porto but it's only a short Uber ride (roughly 4 Euros). Great place for a nights rest! Would very much recommend her place.

Estancia perfecta. Sandra muy simpática y vive al lado por lo que te puede ayudar con lo que necesites.
La casa cerca de Oporto y de la Riveira. Casa muy tranquila.
Foi ok.

Nous avons été accueillis par des personnes très gentille, Sandra et sa maman sont très aimable et adorable. La maman parle français, le logement est très propre à notre arrivée les lits ont été fait et vous avez à votre disposition des serviettes de toilettes. Le logement est très bien situé 5 min de la Ribiera do douro et 10 min du centre historique.
Je le recommande à 100%

This is a cute little house for up to 4 pro people. Let me start off by saying that considering what you get this is good value for the money and one of the cheaper and relatively central located houses (other locations at the same price offer a room or shared place). The house features all the basics and has a nice back garden with a small area where you can sit. Walking to the city center is a bit too far, but you can easily go by car. Parking is not too expensive and is usually around or below €1 per hour. However, of you look around you may be able to find some parking spaces where parking is free (we did). I'm not sure how easy it is to get to the city center by public transport, but it can't be too hard. I noticed some buses going off and on, so this should be fine. Do note however, that we have been informed that later in the day buses may not drove past the area/house. All in all a fine place to stay for a reasonable price. Some details that may be of interest to you: 1) Sandra speaks English so if you are received by her you should be fine, 2) the furniture and interior is dated so don't expect any super fancy interior (buy you can tell by the pictures), 3) out back there is a garden with a nice terrace where you can sit, 4) the beds are somewhat small / short and a bit hard so not super comfortable, finally 5) the power access points are at somewhat inconvenient places and there aren't too many of them free. So when staying at this house for more than a few days I would recommend to bring or ask Sandra for a power box. If you wish to sit in the garden for a long time using your laptop I would recommend a power box with a long cable. I think these are some minor points, but may be of significance to some. Thanks for staying at your place Sandra!
Logement propre et agréable proche de Porto et en accord avec la description. Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Nous recommandons. Merci pour votre gentillesse et votre disponibilité

Nuestra estancia con  nuestro hijo ha sido muy buena no nos ha faltado de nada y ha estado muy pendiente de nosotros agradecer a la propiedad el servicio y la hospitalidad que ha sido magnificaaaa....!!!!

Maison avec un charme ancien avec un petit jardin dans un petit village à côté de Porto.
Dans la rue principale  passent régulièrement des bus qui nous emmènent dans le centre de porto en 1/4 d'heure, ce qui permet aussi de s'y rendre sans voiture.
Nous avons apprécié notre séjour chez Sandra.
Nous avons été accueilli par la maman de Sandra qui parle très bien français Très bon accueil Maison très propre et tres bien placé Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour

Accueil très chaleureux de la maman de Sandra, qui parle très bien français. La maison est très bien située, le centre de porto est accessible à pied (en une heure de marche le long du Douro). La maison est conforme à la description et bien adaptée pour deux couples.
Le seul bémol est le bruit des voitures sur les pavés, même si la la circulation reste mesurée.
Bref une très bonne adresse
Très bien accueilli avec le sourire logement bien
Logement parfaitement situé pour visiter Porto et ses alentours ! ! Logement très propre bien équipé ! ! L'accueil impeccable ! !! Je recommande !!!

Logement tout a fait correct.très bien  situé avec une longue balade a faire le long du douro a 5 mn a pied.jardin très agréable au milieu des agrumes  ,c'est un regal.sandra parle très bien le français et ça aide....
La casa está fenomenal. Muy limpia y confortable. En coche a 15 min de la Ribeira. La dueña muy atenta a todas nuestras necesidades. Repetiremos seguro.
Exelente casa, muy acogedora, si tienes carro, muy bien ubicada. Te la recomendamos.
Casa perfetta, posizione strategica , ottimo rapporto qualità  prezzo....Sandra e la sua famiglia sono persone accoglienti gentili e super disponibili!! Consigliato
Fijn huis met een heerlijke tuin om 's avonds buiten te zitten. Sandra en haar moeder zijn erg vriendelijk en gastvrij.

Maison très propre et agréable (joliment décorée). Accueil super sympa. Cour très agréable pour l'apéritif. Pas loin de Porto où nous avons trouvé plusieurs sites à visiter. On a eu le coup d'coeur pour ce logement. Un grand merci à Marie Hélène(la mère de Sandra).
Alex et Marie Line (de la Réunion)
Nous avons apprécié d'être seuls dans la maison. C'était très propre... Nous avons trouvé que les lits étaient un peu durs.

Nous avons passé 4 nuits chez Sandra.
Nous avons trouvé facilement, les indications sont suffisamment claires.
Sa mère nous a gentiment accueilli (elle parle très bien Français) et a également récupéré les clés.
C'est très pratique de pouvoir rentrer la voiture (une citadine) par le portail et plus rassurant que de la laisser dans la rue.
La maison est très bien équipée de tout ce dont vous avez besoin : quelques brochures pour les touristes, sel, poivre, cafetière avec filtres et même un peu de café, serviettes, fer à repasser et planche à repasser, appareil à croque monsieur, tv, le wifi fonctionne bien dans la salle à manger avec le répétiteur wifi (prévoir une multi prise peut être pour brancher l'ordinateur à la même prise que le répétiteur), la cuisine est bien équipée (il y a un petit freezer dans le frigo), et c'est sympa de pouvoir aller sur la table dehors dans le jardin.
La maison est à 5-10 minutes en voiture du centre historique de Porto (on peut s'y garer gratuitement les samedi, dimanche et jour férié).
Il y a également un Continente à 5-10 minutes en voiture, pratique pour faire les courses.
La rue est calme, c'est appréciable.
Nous avons pu aussi visiter Braga et Guimaraes (les autoroutes sont accessibles à proximité).

Sandra's house was adorable and fit our family of 4 well! It had everything we needed and was a short walk to the bus stop where we would catch a connection into Porto. Valbom is a charming little place and Sandra and her mother were very attentive to our needs. Although we had an electrical issue at one point, she was quick to respond. We loved our stay here and would recommend it to someone with a family or looking to be just on the outskirts of Porto. Thanks again Sandra!
The house is perfect. With own garden and parking. Very clean and cozy. Sandra is a great host.
Sandra helpt je graag en reageert snel via de airbnb app. Ze is een hele fijne gastvrouw!

Casa muy limpia, recien pintada, en zona tranquila con aire de pueblecito. Mobiliario antiguo pero con estilo rustico. Por el precio dudo que se pueda encontrar algo mejor en la zona. Tiene un patio bonito y un huerto de uso de los dueños. La pega es que las almohadas no eran nada cómodas, pero al final no se lo dije a Sandra, que seguro habría encontrado una solución porque es muy atenta.
The  house is lovely and clean. Is a bit far  from  town, if you own  transport, here is the best choice.
Parfait ! A recommander

Petite maison très agréable, des oranges et clémentines à portées de main dans le jardin ! A proximité de Porto et du Douro, facile d'accès en voiture et possible en transports en commun. Marie-Hélène, la mère de Sandra, parle impeccablement français. Elle est très disponible (habite a coté), toujours prête à aider et à conseiller pour nous faire passer un agréable séjour. La maison était très propre et fonctionnelle. Rien à redire, nous recommandons cette bonne adresse.
La atención ha sido muy buena. Gran disponibilidad para aclarar cualquier duda y para cubrir cualquier necesidad.
Une famille en or qu’il faut rencontrer pour connaître l’hhos Des portugais du pays un vrai bonheur merci pour tous
Adoramos , tudo super limpo, a casa super acolhedora , maravilhoso mesmo
Casa limpa e acolhedora, perto de supermercado e lojinhas. Silenciosa à noite. Localizada em um ponto estratégico. Aconselho! !
Merci beaucoup à Sandra pour son accueil .

Sandra è un'ospite deliziosa, a causa del traffico siamo arrivati un po' in ritardo per il check-in, ma lei ci ha aspettati ed è stata gentile e disponibile. La casa è molto carina, arredata con gusto, solo il bagno è un po' datato e ci vuole un po' di pazienza con il boiler perché l'acqua calda finisce rapidamente, il giardino è bellissimo e ampio, la zona è decentrata e molto tranquilla, se si cerca relax è il posto ideale. La fermata del bus verso Porto si trova a circa 7 minuti di cammino (parzialmente in salita), devo dire che per noi con 3 bambini non è stato semplicissimo, inoltre purtroppo (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps non fornisce indicazioni per raggiungere la zona con i mezzi pubblici quindi per muoversi sono indispensabili le indicazioni di Sandra. E anche in questo caso lei è stata gentilissima e super disponibile, le siamo molto grati per questo. La casa non è caldissima, nei giorni del nostro soggiorno la temperatura era abbastanza bassa, ma Sandra è stata rapidissima nel procurarci una stufetta elettrica appena l'abbiamo chiesta. Nel complesso è una sistemazione che sicuramente consigliamo. Grazie Sandra dell'ospitalità!

Gracias por un trato maravilloso, por su amabilidad y una casita muy bonita, luminosa. Con muchas ganas de volver!
Дом прекрасный! 
Очень уютный, чистый всё необходимое есть. Как говорится...заезжай и живи! Ничего плохо не могу сказать. Подходит для всей семьи!
Excelente relação qualidade preço, A Sandra recebeu-nos muito bem e foi fácil de encontrar a casa. Tínhamos tudo o que era necessário para a estadia disponíveis para uso. Obrigada!
Jolie petite villa très bien situé entourée d'un beau jardin à 5 mn du fleuve, très pratique avec son parking privé fermé et pratique pour aller au centre ville. Très bon accueil convivial.

Maison individuelle conforme à la description et joliment décorée avec beaucoup de goût. Excellent accueil de Sandra. Extérieurs agréables et très fleuris. Les chambres sont équipées d’une très bonne literie. 
Bon rapport qualité prix. Le centre historique de Porto est situé (en voiture) à une distance relativement proche de cette maison. Seul petit inconvénient le bruit occasionné par le roulement des voitures sur une rue pavée très proche des fenêtres des chambres et ce malgré des doubles fenêtres dans chaque pièce.

We were 5 people and had a lovely stay. Sandra was always reachable and super kind. We even had barbecue one day, the backyard is very cosy.

Everything is 5 star, the only issue is that you need to have a car, in my opinion. If you have a car, hands down this is a great choice!

Adorable maison avec une allée pour stationner la voiture, terrasse avec barbecue et table de jardin. Cuisine équipée d'un four, d'un micro-onde, d'un petit frigo avec freezer, cafetière et appareil à croque-monsieur. Salle de bain avec baignoire. Dans les chambres: couvertures supplémentaires pour les soirées fraîches. La propriétaire parle couramment français et se tient à disposition: adorable!!
Séjour fait début mai: orange et citron dans le jardin!
muy buena casa, los anfitriones muy  atentos y agradables, atendieron cada duda y han estado ahi cada vez que neceaitamos, y la casa bonita y bien equipada

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour ensoleillé. Nous avons profité du barbecue et de la belle terrasse ombragée par les orangés, figuiers, vigne suspendue et citronniers. Le plus du séjour, la cueillette des oranges et citrons bien mûrs pour le petit déjeuner.
Hermosa casa, muy cómoda y llena de detalles muy bonitos. Sandra es muy atenta, tiene mucha información sobre los atractivos de la ciudad y está siempre disponible para consultas. La pasamos genial.
Muito bom, recomendo próximo de tudo, uma excelente casa!
le logement correspond bien à la publicité agreable  tres propre accuil tres sympatique bon rapport  qualité prix à conseiller avos amis

Très accueillante, parle très bien français, gîte très propre et très fonctionnel
Merci beaucoup

Maison très agréable, propriétaire accueillante, intérieur propre joliment décoré, bien équipé, voiture stationnée à l'intérieur de la propriété .
pour un séjour tranquille je recommande sans problème.
Casa en excelentes condiciones, cocina completa, rápida respuesta del anfitrión y hospitalidad. Muy recomendable.
La madre de Sandra, que vive al lado, es muy agradable y dispuesta a ayudar. Estuvimos muy a gusto.
Séjour très agréable chez SAndra, la maison est très bien située ( 5 mn du centre de Porto) jardin très agréable. Très bon rapport qualité / prix rien a redire je recommande sans hésiter.
Très bon accueil et d'une grande disponibilité. Nous avons apprécié ce séjour.
Location très agréable, joli petite maison, en dehors de Porto. Arrêt de bus et gare à proximité... Accueil très sympathique et une maman très serviable. Merci .
Recomendo.
Accueil très chaleureux ..très belle maison ,très propre ...bien située pour visiter porto .

Замечательный домик. Полностью соответствует описанию. Мы останавливались там на четыре ночи и очень хорошо провели время. Жаль что не успели искупаться в реке и пожарить барбекю :) Сандра всегда рядом и готова помочь.
Maison très agréable et accueil chaleureux a proximité de la ville de Porto.

Maison très jolie, avec tout le confort, intérieur et extérieur. On est chez nous, sans vis-à-vis, barbecue, terrasse, parking. Suffisamment de place, pour passer 2semaines de vacances, sans se sentir à l'étroit.
Fue una estancia estupenda. La casa es sencilla pero acogedora, muy limpia. La propietaria vive al lado, por lo que la comunicacion es muy fluida y rapida.

Дом Сандры оказался ещё лучше, чем на фото. Интерьер  декорирован с любовью и душой. Мы провели прекрасный вечер в очаровательной беседке с барбекю. Прекрасное место расположения позволяет вам находится в тишине и покое. Но всего 10 минут на машине и вы в самом центре Порту. Хотели бы вернуться снова. 

Sandra’s house is even better than on the photos. The interior is decorated with love and soul. We had a wonderful evening in a charming gazebo with a barbecue. Perfect location allows you to stay in relaxing quiet place But only 10 minutes by car and you are in the heart of Porto. We would like to return here.
Everything was great, very nice and tidy

Very nice small house - perfect for 4. Perfectly equipped. Nice garden. Great communication with Sandra. The only drawback was the lack of airconditioning. In September it was ok for us but perhaps in August might be different. Besides that all is great!
Maison très bien située et agréable à vivre, je vous la recommande.
Très agréable maison avec place pour voiture. un barbecue  à disposition.  A louer sans hésitation

Espaço muito acolhedor, tudo muito bem arrumado e limpo. Quartos com boas camas e roupas de cama bem limpas. Cozinha bem equipada e até mesmo uma pequena churrasqueira onde pudemos fazer dois churrascos. Banheiro muito limpo com diversas toalhas. Excelente casa!
Maison bien située. Disponibilité de la propriétaire et accueil sympathique.
Alojamiento muy coqueto y muy cerca de Oporto en un barrio muy tranquilo.Anfitriona muy servicial
Casa muito limpa, organizada, acolhedora e confortável. Espaço exterior agradável e grande. A anfitriã mostrou-se sempre disponível e preocupada com os hóspedes. Recomendo vivamente.
Pour y passer quelques jours c'est bien !

Casa indipendente in posizione tranquilla ma ideale per visitare Porto, facilmente raggiungibile con parcheggio privato interno.
Massima pulizia e il tutto arredato con gusto !!!
Massima disponibilità da parte di tutti !! Complimenti !!

name: Atico en Paseo de Gracia
summary: Piso reformado, precioso lavabo, situación céntrica encima de boutiques de lujo.
description: Piso reformado, precioso lavabo, situación céntrica encima de boutiques de lujo.

host.host_about: Suelo viajar en familia, somos muy tranquilos.

name: Garden Room: A Feast for the Senses Big Island,Hi.
summary: Charming intimate hideaway for 2-3; enjoyed by honeymooners,family, friends,writers, artists. Picture windows,private deck, spectacular views:Maui,pasture,horses, goats,birds,tropical foliage,sunsets,stars.New tiled shower,food prep area. E como mai!
space: MAY, JUNE, SEPTEMBER  SPECIAL PRICES!!!!10 % NIGHTLY,15% weekly! Our uniquely wonderful country-style guesthouse sits atop seven acres of pastures and tropical foliage in one of the most special corners of "old Hawaii". We offer 3 distinct guest units which can sleep 1-12 people between them, each with private baths and their own entrances, food prep and dining areas, wifi, satellite TV; weekly, monthly, military, senior discounts(seasonal);magnificent 360 degree views  of Maui across the sea, horses and goats grazing in our lush pastures and amazing tropical gardens. Wake up to birds singing. Walk or jog up our quiet street or down to the historic town of Kapaau and the famous statue of King Kamehameha, the uniter of our islands. Cafes, galleries, eclectic shops and excellent restaurants, a public park and pool are minutes away. Treat yourself to easy scenic drives over the Kohala Mountain Road to Waimea or along our gorgeous coastline, watch whales(December-April) ,hiking, horseback,
description: Charming intimate hideaway for 2-3; enjoyed by honeymooners,family, friends,writers, artists. Picture windows,private deck, spectacular views:Maui,pasture,horses, goats,birds,tropical foliage,sunsets,stars.New tiled shower,food prep area. E como mai!
