We offer 3 distinct guest units which can sleep 1-12 people between them, each with private baths and their own entrances, food prep and dining areas, wifi, satellite TV; weekly, monthly, military, senior discounts(seasonal);magnificent 360 degree views  of Maui across the sea, horses and goats grazing in our lush pastures and amazing tropical gardens. Wake up to birds singing. Walk or jog up our quiet street or down to the historic town of Kapaau and the famous statue of King Kamehameha, the uniter of our islands. Cafes, g
neighborhood_overview: We have loved living on Kapaau Road for over 44 years with friendly neighbors,just far enough away to feel very private  in our own "special corner of paradise". You can take a walk or a jog,or sit under our trees(not with coconuts),swing in our hammock,sit on our decks and relax. We are just a few minutes walk from the quaint historic town of Kapaau which holds an authentic paniolo "cowboy and pa' u riders " parade celebrating the birthday of King Kamehameha,whose famous statue is on our corner. North Kohala has a fabulous Country Fair in October,Chinese Lion dances in February and many musical and cultural events at nearby Kamehameha Park
notes: We will be adding a 14.25% Hawaii hotel tax to your bill which we will ask for when you arrive. We will let you know the tax amount when the bill is finalized. This can be paid to us by  check, money order, cash or credit card.  ******The standard $50 cleaning fee is valid for up to a one week rental.  ******Please note: additional cleaning fees at a rate of $30 to 50 per week will be added for longer stays and based on number of days and number of people.  This additional fee will be due with the Hawaii Tax and due on arrival.****** We are a Bed and Beauty but you can do some light cooking. The Sundeck Suite has a garden-view kitchenette, where you can prepare what you want to eat breakfast at home,prepare picnics, order "take out" from excellent cafes and watch a movie,or enjoy  magnificent sunsets on the fantastic deck. The Cozy and Garden have small appliances,food prep and dining areas. We do have a washing machine, clothesline, iron, available, and a dryer if necessary. All rooms
transit: You really do need a rental car to get the most out of North Kohala,though we have had several bicycling andy motorcycling guests. There is public transportation about 1/4 mile away,early in the morning and returning  late afternoon.(Waimea,Hilo,South Kohala resorts,Kailua Kona. Cabs are costly, but walking's a possibility to many nearby places of interest if one's without a car for part of the day while traveling partner is on business or has special interests needing the vehicle.
access: Guests can walk down our hill to eclectic shops,galleries,cafes, great public park with gym, swimming pool,tennis,golf and playground. Barbecue or picnic in our garden setting. Play basket ball,ping pong or volleyball or look through our telescope. Direct TV and usually adequate  wifi, soon to be upgraded to cable.(finally coming to our"neck of the woods"). Fix your own meals with small appliances or order from yummy nearby cafes. Play basketball,ping pong,ask us to schedule a massage, infrared sauna,ukulele,guitar, hula ,art  or culinary lesson; be creative, adventurous,listen to some of Hawaii's best local musicians, or just relax.
interaction: We enthusiastically help you plan your time in  our fantastic North Kohala and incredible  Big Island, as we have lived here for 40 awesome years. We try to be available at any time  should you have any concerns. We want guests to have all the "peace and relaxation" and privacy possible, but love to share moments as desired and time allows.
house_rules: Our usual policy is a 3 night minimum because there is so much to see and do here and within easy,scenic drives, but we will do our best to accommodate you for one or two nights. This is a smoke free guesthouse but there are lots of open spaces . It's usually pretty quiet here, especially after 10 or 11 pm,unless we're all having a good time together. We have had 95% wonderful experiences with fantastic guests from all over the world. It's Hawaii's custom to remove your shoes when entering. We ask that everyone be considerate,try to be quiet(no dancing on the Sundeck with loud shoes) after 10 pm and before 9 am, unless we all agree to have a party to watch the full moon!

host.host_about:
For 45years I've loved living in awesome North Kohala,fell in love with my special property when I first saw it in 1974,raised 3 children "roughing it" but loving adventures in a rural community,adopted 6 and fostered 7,taught school as a sub, K-12 ,painted landscapes in oil around the island before the family expanded to 9+ diverse kids,now want to resume my passion for creativity,hosted many musicians and folks interested in sustainable living,healthy choices,loving each other,God and country, and  appreciation for our uniquely wonderful treasures  here at the end of the rainbow.
I've really enjoyed meeting guests from all over the world and have made some lifetime friendships.Come visit,we hope you'll fall in love with the joys of North Kohala too,create wonderful memories with family and friends,(even business partners) and return for many visits!  My daughter reminds me to "always keep smiling"…it's catching!

reviews.comments:
We were lucky to get the 'honeymoon suite' at Bobis house, a very  nice studio, where we spend one night. Her garden is also very impressive.  Bobi was very helpful and nice and gave us many new informations for our further tour.
We hope we may come back again one day.
Heide and Dieter from Germany
My stay on the Big Island was an amazing adventure capped off the hospitality Bobi provided to me.  I stayed in the "honeymoon suite."  It was very clean and private.   Next time I'll stay longer!!

Bobi's place is an authentic piece of paradise in the coolest part of the island of Hawai'i.  I'm a repeat guest, and I will make it a point to stay here whenever I am on the island.  There are several lodgings on the property, they're all clean, cozy (in some cases luxurious,) and decorated with original art (Bobi is a talented painter and a gracious host.) Highly recommended!
We enjoyed the quiet setting and beautiful deck for stargazing and relaxing.  Bobi was available and helpful with suggestions for activities both local and other areas on the island.
I was late getting there, but Bobi was still up to show me to my retreat.

While Bobi is a community gem & great w early emails,  there's a probable phone reception issue up there which meant she didn't receive our calls or messages the night before or afternoon of our arrival.  Since she'd earlier indicated she had plans that day, the lack of contact left is unaware of check in procedures & thinking no one was around, thus we came late after a third call w/o answer.  Upon arrival she was there,  kind, apologetic and quick plus available if we wanted anything.

Our host Bobi was as a mother would be to her own returning to roost. My husband & I met the few full time residents and the other guests within days at a group BBQ and it just became one big family after that. Our privacy was never an issue but neither was joining in on whatever was going on. The property itself is peaceful as only pastures with rescue horses, goats, a kitty & two dogs can offer. Mother Nature has blessed the top tip (North) of the Big Island, with lush foliage of all sorts as it rains (mostly) by night. If you wake to rain and wanted a sun day just pack a bag for the beach and within 25 mins there's glorious blue skies. We stayed just over a month & those with dietary concerns may have a bit of an issue with cooking as there's just a hotplate but if you enjoy fresh fruits & avocados (right on property) salads, etc there's a fridge that you can fill from the market in Hawi (2 miles up the road) or the plentiful grocery store. Eats in the Kapaau hood are amazing - Chaba's (authentic & awesome) Thai restaurant (within walking distance) was one of our faves as was the little fish place right beside it that just opened during our stay. Great to order To Go & drive up the hill home and eat on your own deck. In Hawi (2 miles up the road) check out Sweet Potato Kitchen for Vegan offerings all 3 places Organic (something one needs to ask - not assume). On days you want to laze around and just feed the horses - work on your novel or poetry - but find yourself hankering for a swim as the day grows warmer - the ommunity center pool is also walk-able (about 1/2 mile) that also boasts a gym and tennis courts - all free. Bobi has an incredible life story that includes how her add on house became home to a dozen children - I'll let her tell it over a huge prawn dinner & tequila : ) but suffice to say it's no wonder the atmosphere of kindness permeates your stay. We were fortunate to live in the Garden Room as well as the Patio Room and both are lovely. The later worked better for us because of our longer stay with it's two floor spaciousness and big fridge. If you're going to stay a while and aren't out and about as much (like us : ) we highly recommend the extra $ for the space. Aloha to all of you who made our vacation one to truly cherish & special warm wishes to Pam for getting me hooked on snorkeling - Sarah for all her love and knowledge of herbal remedies (I miss you both) and of course dear Bobi - who is the matriarch of this peaceful yet active hub and who shared her wealth of knowledge and...

I stayed in Bobi's Garden View room or two nights. It was a wonderful stay! I love the gardens and the horses and goats. I especially liked the infrared sauna because it was raining and I hadn't packed well for the cool weather, since I was trying to lighten my load in my bike panniers. 
Bobi gave me really great advice on what and where to eat in the area and even drove me out to Palolu to see the end of the road, which I didn't bike to because of the torrential downpour of rain the day I had planned to bike and hike around there.
Bobi and I connected and I consider her my friend now. We had a lot in common and shared stories of our lives. Even so, I also had complete privacy and was able to rest well and enjoy my book.
I highly recommend staying here and will, for sure, come back as soon as I can.
-- from Alaska, a place as beautiful as Hawi, with the same lovely, intimate, small-town feel!

Of the numerous Airbnb's I have visited in both California and Hawaii, this one has been by far, my best experience of all.  Kai,  my 5 year-old, exclaimed, "I want to live here, forever!"  

Why?  It's simple:  Bobi and her extended family served up generous loving heaps of themselves and their beautiful, bountiful paradise to my son and daughter, and my self with so much grace and heart.

Yes...the beds, quilts, pillows, shower, bathroom, and kitchenette were all well-stocked, clean, and extremely comfortable for us.  

And emphatically yes, the colorful abundance of flowering gardens, green pasture, blue skies, flowing water, diversity of trees and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was well-tended and happily thriving all around us. 

But it all circles back to the wonderful energy of Bobi and her three-generations-deep extended Ohana.  A thousand thanks, Bobi, and David, Tim, Pam, and everyone else for all your giving, caring, playing, support and inspiration, and yes knowledge too.  

I absolutely love what you have created and are continuously re-creating together there in North Kohala.  With gratitude and respect, we look forward to returning soon!

From all the places we stayed at on Big Island, Bobi's place is the one we felt most confortable. We stayed in the beautiful Sundeck Suite, which was very nicely decorated, spotlessly clean and with a incredible terrace overlooking the surroundings, from where we could see all the stars. The room was well equipped with a small kitchen and hat all the necessities you would expect. 
But it was not just the nice room and the beautiful garden that made our stay so wonderful; Bobi and her extended family are such caring hosts that you feel welcome from the moment you get to their house. We would warmly recommend Bobi's house to anyone, and North Kohala is definitely worth the trip! Our only regret is that we did not stay longer...

Bobi was a gracious and thoughtful hostess, from providing bouquets of flowers from her amazing garden to providing repellant & treatment for mosquitos that I was unprepared for. A little piece of heaven with an incredible view of Maui from the room and of the pastoral views of the goats and garden. Small but perfect for a couple with everything you need.

We recently stayed in Bobi's Garden room. All in all, our stay was fantastic! 
Here are some specifics:
Location: easy to find, convenient, parking is easy, serene and relaxing.
Host: wonderful Aloha spirit!!
Room: More of a suite, with modern and clean bathroom, extra bed, large closet, kitchenette which we used for coffee making, and comfortable bed.
Other: cats and dogs are friendly, local restaurants are superb, avocado/fruit trees add to the experience.

Bobi provides so many intangibles to make your stay memorable!
Beautiful secluded cabin on the north coast. Great location for exploring this part of Hawaii.

The garden apartment at Bobi's place was a cozy, clean, comfortable place to lay our heads after long days packed with adventure. The location was convenient to some of the Big Island's most lovely towns--Hawi and Waimea.  Bobi was communicative and helpful from start to finish with great recommendations for whale watching, hiking, and getting to know this beautiful and fascinating place.  A great value for simple accommodations and a friendly welcome.

I couldn't have picked a better place to stay while visiting the Big Island! The Garden Room had everything I needed for the two week stay and Bobi gave me plenty of guidance on where to go to watch whales and sunsets, find groceries, and the many hidden gems of Kohala. Bobi is the best host I've ever had with Airbnb and I look forward to returning to the Garden Room when I go back next year.

Bobi's place is gorgeous and she is a wonderful host.  We wanted to stay someplace that was a little off the beaten path and this was perfect.  It's a short walk to Kapa'au which is a cute little town with a handful of shops and several restaurants.  Hawi town is a little further - about five miles - and has more shops, galleries, restaurants and a grocery store.  We upgraded to the "Sundeck Suite" which was beautiful and would be perfect for a family.  The large deck was great, with goats down below, the ocean in the distance, and, on a clear day, the mountains of Maui.  The house is surrounded by gardens and the Sundeck Suite is surrounded by windows - perfect!  Bobi provides everything you need in terms of dishes, pots and utensils.  There are even beach towels and a cooler if you want to go to the beach.  I have to say, I was surprised to find our time was up (we only stayed 3 nights) - I could have stayed longer.  You can use this location to explore a large portion of the island; it's less than an hour from the best beaches, hiking trails, cattle ranches, small towns, adventure sports, etc.

Staying with Bobi was fantastic.  The property is absolutely stunning and the rooms are quite comfortable.  Her home offers a sense of luxury and a sense of home at the same time.  She is extremely knowledgeable about the area and more than willing to give suggestions.  Through our interactions with Bobi, we discovered and visited places that we otherwise would have missed.

Bobi was very accommodating to our needs throughout our stay.    The property is very nicely gardened, with nice country and sky views.  I think the property captures much of what visitors would expect in nature with a visit to North Kohala.

On the unit:
- It has a relaxing view through the windows of fields and the sky, as well as the ocean and Maui in the distance on clear days.  The unit itself is also well decorated with paintings and flowers. 
- It was well equipped, with a cooking area for basic food, and had the basics we needed which saved us trips to the store.
- Parking is easy, plenty of space.
- The restaurants and shops of Kapaau are within walking distance.  We particularly enjoyed the BBQ truck (wish we had that back home!)

All in all, a nice relaxed place to stay.
Clean and friendly. Thank you.

Bobi is a wonderful host. She went an extra mile to help us prepare for the training camp stay. The property is beautiful and well kept. Too bad we couldn’t stay longer. Definitle will be back to Bobi if we are going to Kapaau again.

Bobi was an exquisite host and she and David helped us planning our stay with their knowledge of Kohala and its surroundings. Also our 3-year old son loved petting all the animals (4 cats, 2 dogs and a bunch of goats). The apartment is very bright, has big windows and a fantastic view of her big garden. I would highly recommend Bobi’s Place to anyone looking for a homely alternative to the big holiday resorts.
I loved being tucked away in the hills with a beautiful view.  The beds were very comfy and all was clean and orderly.  Enjoyed the tiny town.

This was the second time I've stayed in Bobi's Garden Room and it felt like coming home! The room is perfect for two people or two adults and a small child. It was very clean and the views are amazing. On a clear day, you can see Maui! The location of Bobi's place is perfect for exploring the Big Island.

We had a wonderful 2 night stay at Bobi's place in Kapa'au. The property and the foliage are beautiful. Our room had 2 picture windows that overlooked the gardens and the pasture where the goats live. The goats were quite entertaining to watch. It is a lovely place to bring a family, with plenty of room for the kids to play. Bobi was a wonderful host and very concerned about her guests having a great stay.

This little slice of paradise was a great place to spend time. I was there for more than 2 months, & never tired of the amazing views. The huge windows overlooking the pasture, watching the stars from the deck, the flowers everywhere, the lovely walks up the hills, the cute goats, the friendly dogs & cats. Thanks again!

name: Large room in a centennial house
summary: ROOM This room is a large room (18 m2) with two big windows. Bathroom is outside of the room.
space: OUR HOUSE Our house is known as “Canto da Carambola”. It is a special place for those who like nature, art and simplicity.  Fruit trees, flowers, birds and small monkeys are all around. Parrots, toucans and owls also visit us frequently. High ceiling (4m) and large windows opened to a small garden help keep room fresh with natural light and comfortable temperature. HOSTS We have two lovely dogs: Bebel and Olavo, and two nice cats: Maria and Tomzé. From terrace and backyard, we have a really wonderful view of downtown and Guanabara Bay.
description: ROOM This room is a large room (18 m2) with two big windows. Bathroom is outside of the room.  OUR HOUSE Our house is known as “Canto da Carambola”. It is a special place for those who like nature, art and simplicity.  Fruit trees, flowers, birds and small monkeys are all around. Parrots, toucans and owls also visit us frequently. High ceiling (4m) and large windows opened to a small garden help keep room fresh with natural light and comfortable temperature. HOSTS We have two lovely dogs: Bebel and Olavo, and two nice cats: Maria and Tomzé. From terrace and backyard, we have a really wonderful view of downtown and Guanabara Bay.   RESERVATION Reservation includes breakfast, wi-fi and laundry use. Scrambled eggs, fresh fruits, handmade cakes, yogurt and jellys, natural fruit juices and smoothies are served under a carambola (star fruit) tree in the backyard. Nice way to begin your day in Rio. On special dates (Carnival, New Eve, World Cup) rates are higher. Prices depend on dates and nu
neighborhood_overview: SANTA TERESA Santa Teresa, the most charming district of Rio, is a good option to persons who love simple lifestyle and nature. Walk around and enjoy its calm streets, historical buildings and lovely views of the city. After, choose one of the many famous bars and restaurants and taste delicious food and drinks. It will be a very special way to know Rio.
notes: OTHER ROOMS We have 3 other rooms in our house which are listed here on airbnb.  Search for: * Large suite in a centennial house * Suite with varanda and lovely view * Small room in a centennial house If you have difficult to find these rooms, ask me for its numbers.
transit: TRANSPORT Downtown and Lapa, bohemian district, are only 15-minutes walking from our house. Bus 14 and private vans pass in front of our house often. They are used to get Carioca and Gloria's metro station from where you can go anywhere.
access: RESERVATION Reservation includes breakfast, wi-fi and laundry use. Scrambled eggs, fresh fruits, handmade cakes, yogurt and jellys, natural fruit juices and smoothies are served under a carambola (star fruit) tree in the backyard. Nice way to begin your day in Rio. On special dates (Carnival, New Eve, World Cup) rates are higher. Prices depend on dates and number of days of staying, Please, contact us before booking on this period.
interaction: We love our city and we will do our best to make you enjoy the "Wonderful City". Here, you will feel as you are at home.
house_rules: Be respectful towards others guests, neighbours and nature.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I'm biologist and I love to host people in my house. I have a bed and breakfast called Canto da Carambola.

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful experience here.  Miro, our host was amazing.  He went above and beyond the duties of a host.  He gave us recommendations of places to go and even helped us figure out how to get there.  He made us a delicious breakfast every morning and it was fun to try different local juices and food.  We had a few people in our group staying in different rooms.  The suites were well worth it.  If you want to stay for a few days and get the feel for a local neighborhood it was great.  We would definitely stay here again next time.

We had a great experience during our time at Canto da Carambola in Rio. Their place is in a fantastic location, it is comfortable and they provide a delicious breakfast. Miro speaks English well and goes out of his way to assist his guests with travel tips and ideas and anything else that can make your stay an enjoyable one. I highly recommend this AirBnB.

Miro is great! The room was great and the communal environment of the house was really nice. Great outdoor space and views, as well as a great breakfast every morning...ask for the eggs!

The price was more than fair and there are a number of great areas to walk to.

Un logement aussi agréable et beau que Elmiro et Sergio sont accueillant et tout ça dans le meilleur quartier de Rio. 
100% satisfait. À conseiller

Miro is a superb host. He received us early in the day and was very helpful with good advices. His outdoor spaces are wonderful, green and nice with a good view to the city centre. His breakfast is also very good. All in all we felt very welcome and I really recomend staying in Miro´s place.

Estamos felices de haber elegido tan bonito hogar para pasar el Carnaval! Las descripciones son totalmente correctas, en todo momento recibimos amabilidad y cordialidad por parte de los anfitriones, ya sea en cuanto información turística de la ciudad, como en la atención de estar en aquellos pequeños detalles que nos hacían sentir como en casa: muchas gracias por todo!!! 
La habitación estaba súper limpia, como el resto de la casa. Una ambientación muy linda, se trata de una antigua casona remodelada. También disfrutamos de la grata compañía de sus dos perros y dos gatos! Incluso, algunos días tuvimos la suerte de recibir la visita de monitos en los árboles del patio. 
El desayuno era servido con dedicación, creo que no faltaba nada en la mesa de ese precioso patio lleno de plantas y árboles brasileros. Nos deleitaron con sus exquisiteces caseras: bolo (una especie de budín) especialmente el de laranja (obrigada de Sergio) y la mermelada de carambola de Miro, qué delicias!
El barrio es tranquilo y se siente seguro al caminar, tanto de día como de noche. Está muy bien ubicado en relación al Centro, Lapa, el Sambódromo. También es fácil moverse para ir a las playas de zona Sur. 
Con convicción creemos que habremos de volver a Santa Teresa y sin dudas será a Canto de Carambola. Hemos quedado encantados con la buena energia que circunda este hogar y a sus dueños, muito obrigado de corazón.
Raúl e Vani.

El miros place was amazing ..... located in a very good area winthin santa teresa. Miro was very kind and extreamly helpfull (going out of his way to accomadate us for new years eve) would highly recommend stay here

We loved staying at Miro's house. He is a wonderful host with a warm heart and always ready to help. The breakfast is great. There was never a breakfast as good as Miro's on our further trip through Brasilia :)

Hi Miro, thanks for making our stay in Rio such a pleasant one! We loved everything about the house, the breakfast, the house and all the pets! The Santa Theresa Neighbourhood is also really lovely and conveniently located. Our trip to Brazil has been nothing short of amazing and it wouldn't have been possible without your hospitality. Please do contact us when you visit Singapore, we look forward to meeting you in this part of the world!

logement situé dans le quartier de santa Teresa très sympa pour se balader à pied avec de supers points de vues sur Rio. Petit déjeuner au top, Elmiro est très accueillant et toujours près à renseigner ses hôtes.

name: relaxing in Porto
summary: A relaxing apartment just in the city center. It has a balcony very nice to take a coffee in the end of the day. A very quiet street, with old houses and nice people. There´s a big supermarket, a restaurant and several coffee shop near by.
description: A relaxing apartment just in the city center. It has a balcony very nice to take a coffee in the end of the day. A very quiet street, with old houses and nice people. There´s a big supermarket, a restaurant and several coffee shop near by.
house_rules: - please treat our house with respect. Respect the neigbours and don´t do noise after hours

host.host_about:
Vivo no Porto à 24 anos, não sou Portuense de gema mas de coração. Adoro passear pela cidade e mostrar aos outros o que tem de melhor. 
Gosto de viajar e conhecer outras culturas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment was clean, safe and had everything for a comfortable stay! The location was a bit far from the center of town, but it was only a 30 minute walk or quick Uber/taxi ride. It was a great stay!
Apparemment sympa grabd et bien équipé dans un quartier calme et tranquille. Accueil tres sympathique de isabel.

Buena estancia, el apartamento esta genial cuidado y con todas las necesidades cubiertas. A 10 minutos del transporte público (10 minutos de metro al centro). Isabel es muy agradable y atenta. Muy recomendable!!
Isabel is a nice, and easy to communicate with, host. The apartment is comfortable and like described.
El alojamiento estaba bien, lo único malo es que estaba algo lejos del centro (a 20-30 minutos andando)
Nous avons passé un bon séjour dans cet appartement au calme, mais à 10 minutes du métro et à 30 minutes à pieds du centre. Le patio est aussi super agréable !

Isabel is such a fine person and a very great host! She did everything for us, to feel great at her place.
Her apartment is about a 10 minute walk from the metro station (Carolina Michaelis) in a very quite area. The center (Sao Bento) is a 5 minute ride with the tram, where you can find everthing you need to have a great time in Porto!

El apartamento se encuentra tal cual se muestra en las fotos.
Es tranquilo, se puede descansar muy bien. Andando al centro hay un buen trecho, pero se encuentra bien comunicado por transporte público. (Sin duda, Uber recomendable)
ISabel flexible con nuestra salida, muy agradable.

We really enjoyed the appartment of Isabel! The place was bigger than we expected and Isabel welcomed us very friendly. The communication was great.
It was a pity that the appartment is quite far away from the city centre, around 30 minutes walk. Fortunately it is easy to reach by metro.
Also the shower is a little old. You have to controll your own temperature and the ray is quite small.

But in the end we really enjoyed our stay and we're happy about our choice!

Isabel's apartment was spacious and clean. She was extremely nice when showing us the flat and we could communicate smoothly. By the way, the flat's location is super, lots of supermarkets nearby and the closest subway station is only a 6-minute walk away.  We would love to stay there next time we visit Porto!

Great place in a walking distance of main Porto streets. Right across the street from a supermarket. The host was really friendly giving us plenty of great advice on sightseeing, transportation and eating spots. Would visit again.

Perfect for a short stay in Porto. Isabel went out of her way to ensure we found her place and were checked in promptly on arrival Easy walking access to the metro station and the city centre is an easy 15-20 min stroll Highly recommended
Apartamento confortável e bem localizado,com fácil acesso pro centro.Isabel sempre disponível e de fácil comunicação.

L'endroit est calme et tranquille.
Il y a un magasin alimentaire à quelques mètres, ainsi qu'un arrêt d'autobus just'à côté qui mène au centre en 20 minutes (un vendredi soir animé).
Isabel est venue nous voir le soir à l'appartement pour savoir s'il nous manquait quelque chose, ainsi que pour nous donner des infos précieuses.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour dans l'appartement de Isabel. Il est spacieux et bien équipé, la chambre est très agréable et le patio aussi pour prendre le petit-déjeuner. Il faut une trentaine de minutes à pied pour atteindre le centre mais le métro est juste à côté de l'appartement. Le quartier est très calme (parfait pour se reposer) et il y a un grand supermarché à 2 minutes. À conseiller pour découvrir Porto sur quelques jours !

Casa ótima para um fim de semana a dois ou uma estadia calma. Perto de supermercados, farmácias.
A estação de metro mais próxima fica a uns 10 minutos a pé, mas chega-se rápido a vários pontos do Porto.
A Isabel é muito simpática e prestável.
Lugar super silencioso, muito limpio, fácil acesso ao metrô, Isabel, uma persona super atenciosa, quando voltarmos a Porto me hospedarei ahi. Recomendo.

Appartement très bien équipé et dans un environnement tranquille. Petite terasse sympathique pour prendre son café et planifier sa journée. Il faut prévoir marcher beaucoup ou utiliser Uber pour aller au centre-ville (environ 4 euros). Malheureusement, il y avait de la moisissure dans la chambre. J'espère que le problème sera réglé rapidement, car l'appartement en vaut vraiment la peine.

Casa molto accogliente e ben attrezzata di tutto, Wi-Fi, cucinino per 2 persone ecc. pulizia direi ottima, un bel balcone da poter sfruttare per mangiar fuori o rilassarti prima di uscir la sera

Vicino a metro e mezzi di trasporto e ad un comodo centro commerciale, consigliato se si cerca una casa un po’ più tranquilla e lontana dal caos del centro

Communication with Isabel and Ricardo was excellent, they replied almost immediately after we sent them any message. The flat itself was nice and clean with very good location - there is a supermarket and restaurant around the corner. The neighbourhood is quiet and the city center is about 30 minutes of walking distance. I can fully recommend for your stay in Porto.
Muy bien

The host was very helpful and quickly responds. The appartment  is spacious. the kitchen is tiny but well aqiped. The location was good, few min from metro station. Supermarket near the appartmant. We recommend!
Really clean and nice place. Close to city center and metro. I recommend this place.
The communication with Isabel and Ricardo was really good. The apartment is quite big and clean. We recommend this place.
Maravilhoso apartamento muito tranquilo o local sem barulhos adorei super recomendo
Recomendo, localização excelente.

name: Lanikai Plantation - 4 bedrooms/3 baths
summary: Enjoy island living in this plantation style house in beautiful and peaceful Lanikai - home of the #1 rated beach in the world. This 4 bedroom/3 bath portion of our home has a maximum occupancy of 8 adults, or 6 adults with 3 children. Hawaii state taxes (14.42%) are not included in the listed price. we will send a second invoice charging these taxes. We will give 48 hours to be paid to hold reservation.
space: The space consists of the following 4 units: 1. The Palm Tree double bedroom unit: Great for families with up to 3 children. There is no additional person charge for the 3rd child. The two bedrooms are connected by a common door so it may not be suitable for two unrelated parties. The full bathroom is accessed from the first bedroom.  2. The Sunshine studio unit: has a private entry, a bedroom, a private bathroom, and kitchenette which is located on the 300 square foot covered patio/lanai for your private use. 3. The Bamboo studio unit Is upstairs with a private entry, a bedroom, a private bathroom, and kitchenette located outside on a wrap around deck and covered lanai facing the ocean. This area is for your private use. All units share an outdoor kitchen, outdoor shower, and a gazebo with table and 8 chairs for dining and lounging. There is also parking for up to 3 cars. Our property is gated with a combination lock gate making this a very secure place to stay. Dial e¡gh+ O e¡gh+ f|v

The Bamboo studio unit Is upstairs with a private entry, a bedroom, a pri
neighborhood_overview: Lanikai is a special private community in Kailua that offers a peaceful, naturally beautiful, and quieter alternative to Waikiki. Lanikai is nestled between a small mountain range and the #1 rated beach in the world. Kailua town is just 2 miles away and is a charming, vibrant, and great place to eat, shop, and hang out. Lanikai is the part of Oahu that everyone wants to live in.
notes: An additional bedroom is available on this property for larger parties:  • Lanikai Plantation - Ocean  bedroom unit: 1 bedroom with a queen size bed, French doors, covered lanai.
transit: A bus stop is just 100 yards away with service every hour or so into Kailua town.
interaction: We live in the same building and are almost always available for our guests. We love to share our local knowledge of Lanikai and the rest of the island is useful and will save you much by showing you where the locals go to eat, shop and have fun.
house_rules: - - Quiet hours: Sunday - Thursday is 9PM - 7AM. Fri - Sat is 10PM - 8AM - - No shoes in the house. Rinse off sand from legs and rest of body before entering unit. -- Taxes are not included in the price originally charged. A second charge will be sent to you after booking to cover the %14.92 Hawaii State Tax.

reviews.comments: The host is kind and humble. Though she lives in the property, she does not interfere with customers.

Lori is an amazing hostess and her property is lovely, styled in an old Hawaii mission house design.  We loved the outdoor patio space and grilled almost nightly on the large, well apportioned gas grill.  We sat in the gazebo in the comfortable arm chairs around the dining table.  During the day, we so appreciated the use of kayaks, surf boards and other amenities.  Lori warmly welcomed us and did everything she could to make sure we were comfortable and knew our way around the windward side of the island.  Lanikai and neighboring Kailua are truly special places in Oahu. Very safe and serene.  Beautiful white beaches and wonderful swimming and paddling areas.

name: Spacious 3 BR 12ppl Beside MTR :)
summary: The apartment is located at centre of Mongkok: temple street, Fa Yuen street and ladies street. We are on Fa Yuen street, just only 1 minutes walk from the closest subway Mong Kok MTR exit D with the airport the stop. Convenience stores, Bars, Supermarkets, grocery stores, pharmacy, massage salons.
space: The apartment is 700 square ft large with spacious three bedrooms and large bathroom. We provide Internet wifi (free of charge) , air conditioning, television, water heater, hairdryer , electric kettle, shower gel, shampoo, refrigerators and sofa , bottle water and towels are provide within any charge.
description: The apartment is located at centre of Mongkok: temple street, Fa Yuen street and ladies street. We are on Fa Yuen street, just only 1 minutes walk from the closest subway Mong Kok MTR exit D with the airport the stop. Convenience stores, Bars, Supermarkets, grocery stores, pharmacy, massage salons. The apartment is 700 square ft large with spacious three bedrooms and large bathroom. We provide Internet wifi (free of charge) , air conditioning, television, water heater, hairdryer , electric kettle, shower gel, shampoo, refrigerators and sofa , bottle water and towels are provide within any charge. The apartment is located in heart of Hong Kong - Mong Kong It's located on Nathan street, just beside Yau Ma Tei exit A2 with airport bus stop. Convenience stores, Bars, supermarkets, Grocery stores, Pharmacy, Massage salon, fruit shop, shopping mall, post office, cake, bakeries, bus stops, Easy access to everything you may need in the neighborhood.
transit: The apartment is located in heart of Hong Kong - Mong Kong It's located on Nathan street, just beside Yau Ma Tei exit A2 with airport bus stop. Convenience stores, Bars, supermarkets, Grocery stores, Pharmacy, Massage salon, fruit shop, shopping mall, post office, cake, bakeries, bus stops, Easy access to everything you may need in the neighborhood.

reviews.comments: 第一次到香港,第一次用Airbnb,非常满意的一次入住体验｡公寓就在油麻地地铁站A2出口附近,弥顿道上,走路1分钟以内｡公寓干净整洁温馨,还配备了很多生活用品(拖鞋,衣架,接头转换器,抽纸,卷筒纸,矿泉水,厨房用品)｡我们6大2小住得很舒服,卫生间相对来说还挺宽敞的,淋浴间是独立的,淋浴头出水很大,我们8个人轮流洗澡丝毫没有影响｡卫生间还配备了沐浴露,洗发水,护发素,干毛巾,非常周到｡与房东的联系很顺畅,有需要联系时房东很快回复,还亲自到地铁站接我们｡整个旅程体验非常棒!如果公寓能配洗衣机就更加完美啦｡
沒有親身去睇,但家人對住處評價很好,環境很靚,有事找屋主很快回覆,感謝
非常方便的地理位置 很干净 床位很多
Very near at mongkok... easy to go to airport and disneyland...
环境非常好,交通便利,屋内也整洁,正规的三间卧室,入住时间非常便利,关于住房需要注意的信息提示的也很醒目,非常好的一次入住体验

My family had a great time staying at Mr Rick's place. Furthermore, Mr Rick was very helpful and gave quick response to any of our inquiries. 

The only downside was that, it would have been better if some of the kitchen utensils provided (such as spoons/forks) are made of stainless steels instead of plastics. 

Other than that, everything was fine. The location was very strategic and easy for us to go to the main tourist attractions in Hong Kong. 

Thank you so much for being a wonderful host Mr Rick!
Great location and friendly host...

Rick is very responsive, his apartment is just one ride from the airport, very near to mtr, lots of restaurant and food shop in  the area, near to shopping area mongkok. So convenient. Highly recommended!

The owner Mr Rick was so kind. We really enjoy the place, it was so cozy, have complete facilities, great interior design & clean. Mr Rick also give us detail information before our trip so that we didn't find any difficulty in finding the place. Really awesome location, very close to MTR Station & there is 24/7 McD beside the place. Very easy to find local food with good price on this neighborhood.

name: House Of Hawaii Dreams
summary: Perfectly situated from everywhere! So convenient for any day trip you'd like to do on the Island. 10 minutes to Waikiki Beach & Diamond Head, 15 minutes to Ala Moana Shopping Mall, 10 minutes to Hanauma Bay and 20 minutes from the airport. The view from this beautiful hillside house is really stunning. You would be extremely lucky to get a hotel room with a view this spectacular. You have your own pool! Free in-door parking as well as a driveway. You are in Paradise!!
description: Perfectly situated from everywhere! So convenient for any day trip you'd like to do on the Island. 10 minutes to Waikiki Beach & Diamond Head, 15 minutes to Ala Moana Shopping Mall, 10 minutes to Hanauma Bay and 20 minutes from the airport. The view from this beautiful hillside house is really stunning. You would be extremely lucky to get a hotel room with a view this spectacular. You have your own pool! Free in-door parking as well as a driveway. You are in Paradise!!

host.host_about: Although living in Hawaii over 27 years has been such a blessing, I love to travel also. Staying in different hotels in many places has given me various ideas being a Airbnb host.

reviews.comments: Hannah was extremely lovely. Helpful. Caring and friendly. Made our stay feel very comfortable and has a beautiful home. Would definitely recommend and we would book again when in hawaii

Hannah is the best Host hands down. I've never met anyone so kind. The view to her place is breathe taken... I will be back.
The bonus her place was so clean. 20 mins from Airport, close to everything.
Great views and comfortable amenities!  Host was great and very welcoming!
Such an outstanding view from this place...and the hosts are super friendly and easy going. They also provide you full amenities even with floaters to the pool!

Hannah really made sure the guests have all we need for our stay. First of all, the view from the house for the ocean and the mountain was absolutely GORGEOUS. TRUE TO PHOTOS. Secondly, the kitchen, bathroom and pool are FULLY STOCKED. Not only was the pool clean with cute floaties in the garage (oh yea, really convenient for rental car), there was also a BBQ rack. We really FELT that the host thought of everything we would need. We appreciated all the towels, the mouthwash, the floaties, the ice-cold water, the bowl of ice, all the cooking utensils and dishware, kitchen towels and toilet paper, extra beddings, and so forth. We were able to take use of all of them and felt more than welcome at your home. This is the best vacation home we've all been to!

Hannah's place is fantastic and she has provided everything one would need for a great stay. The house is situated along a ridge with an amazing view of the valley and beach. The house is very clean and updated (new W/D, TV, breakfast bar, A/C in rooms) with excellent views from anywhere in the house. The house has everything you would need, from extra pillows, blankets, dishware, coffee maker, etc.  The pool is also very nice with deck chairs, table, and a variety of float toys provided.  With the combination of the great views and pool, one couldn't be blamed if they spent their time in Honolulu relaxing at the house! This house is the nicest house we have stayed at using AirBnB in Honolulu and we look forward to the opportunity to stay here every time we visit.

We throughly enjoyed our stay, the view from the house was great and the pool was of a decent size! First impressions were good as we were politely greeted. Would definitely recommend this as a place to stay.

The view from the room is gorgeous and everything was perfect!  Hannah was so kind to greet us and she had everything that we needed!
We will definitely come back.

The house is clean and organized. All the bathroom goods, kitchen goods are well prepared. The atmosphere ( sea view from the mountain and comfortable winds ) of the dining table where you will be everyday for breakfast and dinner is super. The pool is awesome. Owner prepared floating toys for kids.

Drive 10 min, there is a good supermarket and Mac.

Owner is a nice and kind person.

Hannah's home was wonderful! The view was beautiful and the stay was incredibly pleasant. She was very warm and her hospitality was made clear. The home is located in a quiet neighborhood not too far from the city's more festive and urban activities/places. It was a nice balance of genuine, tropical, and relaxing Hawaii while still remaining urban.

Location, View, Hospitality, Memories, everything was perfect.
We had a special night having BBQ along the pool side, which was awesome.
I wish to stay at the house again when I'm back to Hawaii.
Thanks for the wonderful stay Hannah!!

Me and my family stayed Hannah's dream house for 8 nights and 9 days. The location was wonderful and the view was amazing! The place was just the same as the pictures seen in the posting. We enjoyed our night swimming at the private pool and barbecue. Kitchen has all the utilities that we needed for this trip. Besides, there were plenty of towels, irons, BBQ tools and the flamingo tube, which made our vacation more pleasant! Definitely recommend this place for getaway to Hawaii!!

이보다 완벽할수가!!
가족여행을 했는데 너무 편안하고 좋은 숙소였습니다 특히 뷰는 와이키키 어떤 호텔보다 멋지고 야경부터 새벽바다까지 한 눈에 볼 수 있어요 수영장은 어떤 풀빌라보다 편안하고 우리집처럼 모든 집기와 시설을 갖추고 있어 누구에게나 추천 합니다

The view is incredible! Every window has a gorgeous view from it. Pool was the best for the kids to play in, especially after a beach day. House is close to everything and stocked with all the essentials. Had a wonderful time and Hannah is so kind and makes check in and check out so easy!
Great view! Hannah was always available if needed.

We really enjoyed our stay at Hannah’s place. The views from the living room were very nice (ocean and mountain view’s). We had lots of fresh air and breeze coming in so this was truly relaxing. Sitting outdoors in the evening was another nice aspect to living in her house and it enticed is to have dinner at the vacation home and not be at restaurants in the evening. The kids enjoyed the pool and vacation living. Hannah and her husband were very nice and she gave a wonderful art gifts that she made for our children to carry home as a parting gift. We will always have fond memories of this visit and look forward to staying again with Hannah when we visit next time. BTW the location is convenient to get to diamond head, Waikiki beach, Hanauma Bay as well.

If you want to feel like you live in Hawai‘i, this rental should be a top choice ! Centrally located in east O‘ahu neighborhood of Aina Haina, Hannah’s place is located on the ridge overlooking the beautiful Maunalua Bay.  Take advantage of cup of Kona coffee on the lanai and watch the sunrise, it is a truly magical experience ! My family and I spent two weeks here.  House was spacious and tastefully decorated. Hannah had everything we needed to cook up an scrumptious Thanksgiving feast.  Neighborhood is very safe as well. We took a nice walk after dinner to work off the food and enjoy the cool trade winds and fantastic views of the ocean. We also used the pool/patio area quite a bit to take refreshing dips after days at the beach and for happy hour/dinners.  Grocery stores are just minutes away either in Aina Haina or Kahala. Lots of options for restaurants also.  Couple of highlights - Hunakai Beach, a hidden gem of a beach, off the beaten path in the Kahala neighborhood. The Veranda at the Kahala Resort - great place for wine and appetizers. They have a fantastic jazz pianist most evenings. I loved the aloha vibe at the place !  All in all, I’m so happy that I found Hannah’s place. We will definitely stay here again !
We had a great time at our staycation! Hannah was a great host and was very responsive and accommodating

We enjoyed Fantastic panoramic views and very convenient location for downtown, airport and beaches. Hannah is a great host and very thoughtful and helpful ! My kids loved playing at the pool! We definitely recommend staying at her place!!

This is a great place to stay with an outstanding view. Hannah was awesome!! The house was stocked with everything you'd need and Hannah is available but never hovers unless you need her. Great hospitality! Thanks again!!

Wow! What a fantastic space! This home is beautiful and spacious. The view is better than in the pictures. 

I spent a week here working remotely while my boyfriend explored the island during the day. It was fantastic to sit on the porch with that view while working. My boyfriend loved the location, because it was so close to many great hikes. This was definitely my favorite Airbnb find to-date.

This place was the best place I have ever stayed.  views right outside the house were beautiful and everthing was set for us to use whenever, wherever I need. Hannah was very kind to us and tried to make sure that we are doing okay. Thank you so much and I really had a great family trip. I want to come back this lovely house again!

Hannah’s place is wonderful!  The view is even better than the pictures.  When we arrived, the pool filter had stopped working, but as soon as I messaged Hannah, she had the pool guy come right away and we were able to use the pool the next day!  Mahalo to Hannah and her family for the wonderful stay!
그냥 최고. 설명도 쓸게 없이 강추 합니다.

The location was great and the views were spectacular. Hannah was not at all intrusive, but right on the spot when we needed help (lightbulb replacement, nothing major!). We felt so safe in her neighborhood too. Was great having the garage! Highly recommend this place if you want a little space from crowds but want to be close to everything.

언덕 위에 위치해있어서 어디에 걸어가긴 힘들지만 차가 있으면 크게 상관 없고, 경치가 정말 좋았어요 ! 비치타월도 여러개 있고, 의자랑 튜브 등등도 편하게 쓰게 해주셔서 좋았습니다 :) 
전체적으로 만족스러웠어요 !

Hannah's house is situated on a hillside overlooking the ocean with a magical view. It is situated centrally, just a quick 15 minute drive to Waikiki. We stayed for a week and thoroughly enjoyed every moment. The shower could use an upgrade, but aside from that the house was very clean and well appointed with new appliances and a private pool! Highly recommended stay for a small family or couple.
We really enjoyed staying at Hannah’s place, amazing ocean view, a convenient location, and everything you need in a home.  We definitely like to come back again.

Fantastic house! If you are going to hawaii, i recommend honululu; in Honululu, i recommend Hannah House! The house is especially suitable for families with children, and the host are living close to you , warmly helpful for everything you need ! I have a good trip in honululu , never forget the refreshing mountain scenery and beautiful swimming pool.
Unbelievable view! Great location. Can't beat it.
Great location. Great view. Excellent host.
We had a wonderful time and really enjoyed the private pool and quiet neighborhood with amazing views from high up on the mountain. We highly recommend.

Our family had a wonderful stay at Hannah’s. It was nice to have a home that was within a 15-20 minute drive of all the sites we wished to visit in Honolulu. I particularly enjoyed the view from the deck!
The view is awesome

I really like Hannah’s house! Her family are very kind, friendly and nice. They were welcoming us so much! When we were playing in the pool, they gave us floats and swimming sets! And also, there are everything which we need in her house. The view from her house is really great! If you stay her house, you should rent a car. It’s a long distance from bus station.  I highly recommend her house. I definitely go back to her house!

Me & my friends had an amazing stay in Hannah's place. The view from our place was breathtaking (you could catch the sunrise from the balcony) everything we needed was there & hannah was really helpful if we need something in the house or just a small item from the kitchen. We got to used the private pool to ourselves. Location is great, easy access to the grocery stores (5mins) & Waikiki Area (10-15mins depending on traffic) All in all, it's a wonderful place to stay! Highly recommend:)
Great view and Hannah was very accommodating.
Amazing views of Koko Head. About 15 minutes to the Ala Moana center. Nice quiet location. Bedrooms are nice and big.

Beautiful view and great location to shops, beaches or downtown (you need a car though) - we loved the house. Nothing beats the breezes coming through the house all night. The kids loved winding down with a swim in the pool (is shared with other guests if both houses are rented though)...

Hannah was a great host and easily accessible. Check-in/check-out we’re simple with flexibility on time. We’d love to come back!

I stayed with  my wife, son(4 years old) , sister, mother and father.
It was memorable staying.
Nice ocean and mountain view. Good location. Clean rooms and towels. Comfortable pool. We had a great vacation, and all satisfied!

Hannah’s place is very charming. It has everything you need to feel right  at home. The views from the house are amazing and the private pool is such a treat. Hannah is a wonderful host and goes out of her way to make sure you enjoy your stay. I definitely recommend this beautiful place.

The home of Hannah was very splendid as everybody wrote it.
Refreshing wind, splendid scenery, clean room, all were the best.
Thank you  very much  Hannah!

This is a great place to stay! It has incredible views of the ocean and surrounding area. We had everything we needed and Hannah showed great hospitality and was very responsive. The location is really convenient to Honolulu and to the east side of the island including Hanauma Bay.  It's just east of Honolulu so you're away from the crowd but still close to everything going on. We highly recommend Hannah's place!
Hannah always reply quickly whenever I needed to ask. The house is very comfortable with the stanning ocean view! I would recommend it!

Hannah's home on the hill offers amazing views and wonderful accommodations.  The view that you are able to take in over coffee each morning is simply breathtaking.  Her home is centrally located to almost anything you would want to do and see in Oahu.  Hannah is a great host who responded promptly and was very helpful with any question we had.  If you're looking for a great place to stay while on vacation you need not look any further than this wonderful property.
The views are outstanding and the host is very friendly. I’d highly recommend staying  here if you ever get the chance.
This house is very as if at my own home.

My family stayed here for 20 days and I can definitely recommend this house only with the fact that it has the amazing ocean view. You can simply enjoy it by sitting on a couch in the living room or lying on the bed.  It's an annex house right beside the host's house and you'll share the main gate with the hosts. It's quite convenient to communicate with the host (it was another co-host who always responded to my messages and came, but I do not know his name), since they live right next to the house. The host has been supportive at all times and made appropriate actions on my inquires and requests. I also liked the pool even though there should be special caution for the kids. It's very deep but clean and spacious!

Had to book a last minute place in Honolulu to see my dad after sudden major heart surgery. We stayed here because it was close to my parent’s house in Hawaii Kai. But turned out it was great being away from downtown HNL. We were 12 mins away from Hanauma Bay and Waipanalo State Park. The views were amazing and we got a lot of use out of the private pool. It was very helpful to have kids beach toys, folding chairs, towels, and inflatables included. The guest house was great for 2 adults and a toddler. Hannah was so gracious, present but never intrusive. We would totally stay here again.

Hannah’s place is everything plus more than the description, and reviews. The VIEW is unbelievable, the pool is fantastic, the house is spacious, everything that you need is there, and if missing something you are 10 minutes from Whole Foods, and 5 minutes from Foodland for more Hawaiian items. 

Would recommend anyone to stay here.

아버지님 생일과 와이프와의 결혼 기념 10주년을 좋은 공간에서 너무 잘 보냈습니다. 아이들도 너무너무 좋아했구요. 부모님들 모시고 오실 분들이나, 아이들 데리고 오실 분들에겐 특별히 추천 드립니다. 교통상으로는 동부 해변과 와이키키 중간 사이에 있어 렌트하시는 분들에게는 교통편이 최적이라고 말씀 드릴수 있습니다. 주변에 식음료,쇼핑 시설도 차로 5~10분 거리에 있어 전혀 불편함이 없구요, 아이들을 위한 수영장은 정말 최고의 휴식을 제공합니다.

Had a wonderful stay at Hannah’s house! Views are magnificent, so peaceful! A real home away from home! Thoughtful touches of washing pods and extra towels were such a nice touch. If you have a car to get around I highly recommend staying at this beautiful location. Very spacious  for the 4 of us.
Great host! She met us upon arrival and gave us a tour of the property. The unit was in a great location and had amazing views.

Our family of four (Mom, Dad, and two sons ages 17 & 19) arrived on Christmas Day. Our host, Hannah, gave us the gate and door code ahead of time, however, she still took the time to meet us there in person to go through everything. “House of Hawaii Dreams” offers great ocean and sunrise views from the small balcony, living area, and king bedroom and the kitchen offers great ocean views as well as lush green mountain views. The king BR does not have direct access to the bathroom but the queen bedroom does adjoin to the one bathroom and you can also access the bath from the living area. Plenty of closet and drawers for storage. There was enough floor space in the queen BR for our younger son to sleep on the air mattress provided (not super-comfortable but it worked OK for our 4 night stay - there is also a sleeper sofa in the living area but he chose the air mattress to be in the BR.) There were plenty of beach and bath towels and beach chairs, umbrellas (and toys for young children) available for guest use in the garage and we appreciated the gas grill. The location is good for accessing most areas of the island and Waikiki was about a 20 minute drive with traffic. Highly recommend beautiful Kailua Beach Park (about 35-40 minutes) A Foodland grocery store and good pizza at Pieology are located about 5 minutes away in a shopping center down the hill and to the left on the main highway. We had rain one day and it was nice to find a movie theater in a shopping mall just a few miles away.  Communication with Hannah was great from start to finish.

One thing to note: I didn’t realize when I booked in early June that there is another rental home on the same property and the pool, garage/supplies, and driveway are shared between the two units. This 2 BR unit is situated above the 3-car garage and the main home sits below and to the left side of the apartment. Other than the pool area, the balconies and outdoor spaces at both units are very private. The main home was occupied by other renters during the entirety of our stay by two different families, however, they were out most every day and quiet at night (as was our family.) The pool was too cold to use during our stay so we never had any shared time at the pool or any issues whatsoever but just wanted to mention to set expectations for future rentals. 

We had a nice stay and we hope to return some day and stay longer on Oahu next time. Mahalo Hannah!
写真以上の素晴らしい景色､どこに行くにも便利な場所､ｾﾝｽの良いｲﾝﾃﾘｱ､そしてﾎｽﾄの細やかな気配で最高の時間を過ごせます｡ﾌﾟｰﾙで備え付けの浮輪で水遊びしたり､ﾌﾟｰﾙｻｲﾄﾞのｸﾞﾘﾙでﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰを楽しみました｡
The house itself is ok. Everything that you need is there. Location is great. Close to everything. The views from the porch are absolutely breathtaking! Highly recommended!

Absolutely recommend this Airbnb! The  view from the house is beautiful. The house has the right amount of space and feeling of coziness that we wanted. The pool was also amazing to dip into when the weather was hot. Hannah responded quickly to everything we needed. We loved everything about this place!

Fabulous! exactly as pictured. Everything you need and so much more. We felt so comfortable staying here. We love the pool and the availability of beach supplies (sand toys, chairs, umbrella, mat, etc) were very handy. What a wonderful spot. We will definitely stay here again.
Hannah is a very responsive host. Her place is close to every place, super convenient!

Highly recommend staying here. Hannah was a wonderful host and the house is exactly as described with amazing views. Pool at house, beaches 10mins, Waikiki + shopping only 15mins. Great if you have a rental car. Can't wait to come back!
