reviews.comments: It was my first time that visit saikung, but defenetly will not be the last one, and i will choose kaz's home again! She did everything to make myself confortable in her home. Since the first day until the last day she was very good anfitrión! The area is perfect to disconect from our busy works! The views from the balcony are amazing!! Defenetly i will choose again Kaz's home!
a really nice stay with Kaz｡beautiful view from the appartment,beautiful mind from the host. :)

Definitely a hidden gem in Hong Kong, I woke up with the stunning view every morning. The flat is in a quiet village but transportation is fairly easy with the buses and taxi. I would recommend people who love nature and want to explore the natural environment in Hong Kong. Kaz is very friendly and caring. Thank you for your hospitality.
非常有责任心的房东,非常详尽的指引,非常静谧舒服的环境,非常愉快的住宿体验｡
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was the 3rd time i stayed in Kaz's apartment. As good as before, just like being with an old friend. Very convinient to check in even before Kaz was back home. Sure to come back next January. Thank you Kaz! Best wishes!

name: Oporto Center Spot
summary: Oporto Center Spot, brand New Apartment, nicely decorated where confort is a must. Situated in a quiet street in the heart of the city, close to Praça da Batalha, walking distance from Rua Santa Catarina and public transports as well as several restaurants, supermarkets, shops and major touristic attractions.
description: Oporto Center Spot, brand New Apartment, nicely decorated where confort is a must. Situated in a quiet street in the heart of the city, close to Praça da Batalha, walking distance from Rua Santa Catarina and public transports as well as several restaurants, supermarkets, shops and major touristic attractions.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Lovely airy apartment with high ceilings. Washing machine but only air drying. Internet is good (14Mbps down, 0.8 up). Bed very comfortable. Entire apartment is very clean and well furnished.

Dulce's apartment was everything we were looking for to stay 2 nights in Porto to visit the city for the first time : extremely well located, quiet, clean, comfortable. Dulce was flexible on the check in time which avoided us a lot of stress coming in from the airport. The apartment was spacious and had all we needed for the stay, and we were very happy to see that the room temperature was nice and cool compared to the. Blazing 35C degrees outside. 
The neighbourhood was safe, I can only highly recommend this apartment !!

Je ne peux que recommander très chaudement cet appartement très propre et très fonctionnel. De plus, il est situé dans un emplacement central d'où l'on peut accéder aux sites et commerces les plus intéressants de Porto.

Perfectly located to discover the city. Very clean, everything is new and nicely equipped. Perfect for 1-2 persons. I didn't have personal contact with Dulce, the cleaning lady Christina let me in and out. The communication was fine. Just a bit a pity, that I couldn't checkin before 18.00 cause other guests didn't check out in-time.
I would highly recommend that place!

The flat is beautiful & clean. It's in the center of the city near one of the marchand street (Santa Catarina) and 5 to 10 mn to historical monuments and around 15mn from Luiz I bridge and Ribeira. The metro station is around 10mn to get from and to the airport. I'll definitely stay in this flat again next time.

Dulce's flat is very central but still in a quiet road. There's everything you need. The bed is large and comfortable. I would stay there again if I came back to Porto. Dulce is very accommodating and helps you out if there's a problem. We really enjoyed our stay!

Nous ne pouvons que recommander cet appartement : propre, fonctionnel et joliment décoré. De plus, il est situé dans le centre-ville et à proximité de lieux d'intérêts (Igreja de Santo Ildefonso, Cathédrale Sé, Pont Dom-Luìs...). On peut également apprécier le fait qu'il soit localisé proche de la gare São Bento et du métro Bolhão, ce qui permet d'explorer aisément les environs de Porto (Espinho, Guimaraes..) et d'avoir accès facilement à l'aéroport.

Very nice, modern, bright, clean and airy apartment. Great location near restaurants and easy walking to the river front and city centre. Street was relatively quiet other than the pesky seagulls that squark really loud in the morning  but I'm not sure you can escape them in Porto. No windows in the bedroom so I got a bit hot at night but that's the only downside. Would recommend :)
L'appartement correspond aux photos et idéalement situé ! Spacieux et confortable, je recommande cet appartement à toute personne souhaitant visiter Porto !

Nice flat. Nice city. This appartment is well located in the city center.

It was easy to communicate with the host. The host gave us good advises and places to visit.

I recomend this flat to anyone that want to discover this amazing town.
Very modern, quiet and well located flat.

La casa de Dulce es encantadora, limpia, bien cuidada y con tantos detalles que parece que te alojas en un hotel. No pudimos estar mas a gusto, habían toallas de sobra perfectamente dobladas con caramelitos encima, una bandejita con infusiones, galletas y azucarillos, que me pareció un bonito detalle. Todo limpisimo y una casa preciosa. Como sugerencia le diria que si puede ser ponga plancha para la ropa, ya que la ropa en las maletas se suele arrugar mucho y estaría bien tenerla. Por lo demás todo perfecto, y sin duda volveremos cuando vayamos a Oporto de nuevo. Gracias por todo Dulce!!

L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel : parfait pour in séjour à deux a la découverte de Porto.
Bien situé, dans un quartier agréable et à proximité de bars, de restaurants et de petits supermarchés.
Le centre ville est accessible à pieds ou en transports très facilement.

A casa da Dulce é maravilhosa! Tudo exatamente como nas fotos! Perto do metro, bonde, rua principal de Santa Catarina! Muito próximo da Ribeira! Eu amei Porto e com toda certeza a residência da Dulce e toda a sua atenção e conforto oferecido foi o grande diferencial.

Recomendo e quando retornar, ficarei lá novamente. 

Obrigada Dulce! 

Isabel

Dulce's apartment was exceptional! It's in a great neighborhood close to everything but on a quiet street. The apartment itself is very clean and has everything you need. Lastly, Dulce and Christina were both lovely to work with- very friendly and welcoming. I'd definitely stay here again.
Very nice place !
Très bel appartement trés bien situé. Accès facile à pied à l'ensemble des points touristiques. À recommander pour un séjour à Porto!

The apartment was very comfortable and had everything we needed during our short stay. The location is perfect with most of the city centre sights only a short walking distance away.
We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend Dulce as a host.

Appartement comme sur les photos. Très propre, fonctionnel, assez bien situé. Rien à dire de mal. Nous avons perdu l'electricité à une reprise. Après un appel à Dulce, le problème c'est reglé en 10 minutes. À recommander!

Gorgeously decorated, spacious appartment in the heart of the old town. Ribeira quarter and bar districts only a few minutes walk away as well as several metro station and the São Bento train station. All photos and descriptions acurate. I really enjoyed the stay there.
Dulce and her appartment manager Cristina are very professional hosts - communication was always easy, rapid and friendly. Due to flight cancellations, I arrived very late, even that was no problem at all. Thanks again for a great week in Porto!
Es una casa recién reformada. Muy bien ubicada justo al lado De la Iglesia de san  ildefonso. Dulce ha sido muy amable. Si volviésemos repetiríamos la misma casa.

Amazing location and our hosts were very good at communicating and welcoming us. Apartment was as described and facilities provided were excellent. As is common in Portugal, there was no air conditioning. Parking nearby was easy and about 9eu for 24 hours. Would highly recommend.
Clean comfortable apartment in a Great location in the heart of Porto with easy access to all the tourist. Lots of restaurants and cafes in just a few seconds away. Perfect location to visit Porto.

Espaço muito bonito, arrumado, limpo e bem central. No coração da parte alta do Porto, próximo da estação São Bento. Local tranquilo, sem barulhos, cama e travesseiros confortáveis, chuveiro funciona perfeitamente com água quente e fria. Não tivemos nenhum contratempo, a Dulce respondeu rapidamente aos meus contatos. Super recomendo!
Awesome Airbnb, would highly recommend it, very clean and very comfortable.

Everything was great, the appartements exactly the same as you can see on the pictures. Location is very comfortably and the owner is great, we arrived a bit lite, but there was any problem to make check-in

Die Wohnung entspricht den Fotos. Sie befindet sich in einem durchrenovierten Haus, ist hell, modern und zweckmässig im Airbnb-üblichen Ikeastil eingerichtet. Alles ist sehr sauber. Eine Wohnung zum Wohlfühlen.
Wegen der guten Schallisolierung und der Lage in dem Strassenabschnitt mit wenigem Autoverkehr ist es sehr ruhig. Die benachbarte Kirche stört nicht.
In weniger als 100Metern Entfernung gibt es zwei Supermärkte und Restaurants. Die U-Bahn zum Flughafen und an die Küste ist sieben Gehminuten entfernt. 
Der Kontakt zu Dulce war problemlos. Die Übergaben hat Christina gemacht, die mir auch gute Tipps gab.
Fazit: jederzeit wieder.

Super appartement. Magnifique! Chaleureux! C'est encore plus beau que sur les photos. Moderne, grand, à air ouverte! Il fut très agréable de profiter de l'appartement! Tout y est! Toutefois, pour moi, le lit était beaucoup trop dur. J'ai opté pour le divan, qui était très confortable quant à lui. Il s'agit ici vraiment de préférence personnelle. Je recommande! L'emplacement est idéal.

La casa es idéntica a las fotos. Limpísima y acogedora. Tiene todas las comodidades básicas. Si bien puede ser un poco fría, aunque tiene radiador en baño y pasillo, además de un edredón para la habitación. La zona es tranquila y se duerme muy bien. Está muy céntrica y muy buen comunicada con el metro Bolhao, que te deja en el aeropuerto. Repetiríamos.

Preciosa casa totalmente nueva. Bien situada para conocer cualquier zona la ciudad. Calle tranquila. Aparcamiento de pago muy cerquita. Nos recibió Cristina y fenomenal, nos recomendó algún sitio para cenar y genial!!!! Tuvimos algún problema con el wifi y tanto Dulce como Cristina estuvieron disponibles a cualquier hora. La casa en pleno invierno es un poco fría, necesitaría otro radiador, pero es muy acogedora y se está genial. Muchísimas gracias por todo!!!! Totalmente recomendable.
Todo muy bien. Pero si fuera en invierno pediría algún radiador a la propietaria para poder descansar en la casa.
The flat is great and comfy, clean and well communicated in Porto City Center! I recommend it !
La casa è stupenda pulita e accogliente la posizione è centrale è vicina a tutti mezzi di trasporto la padrona di casa è stata gentilissima. Appartamento nuovissimo e dotato di tutti i comfort
Perfect location for exploring city.

Thanks Dulce for this trip, all are good in this apartment!
Take care

A proximité de la station de métro Bohlao , l'appartement que propose DULCE  est entièrement refais à neuf . Situé dans une rue calme prés du centre du quartier RIBEIRA  , de ce point de départ la visite de PORTO peut se faire facilement à pied . Le choix de l'appartement de DULCE est à conseiller .
The apartment is ideally situated and confortable. Dulce answers to all of my questions and is really kind. Thanls

Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Dulce. 
Réactif, disponible et très attentionné tout s'est parfaitement passé, appartement Bien placé à 10-15 Minutes Du Douro, restaurants très sympas quasiment en face bref tout était super.

Appartement fonctionnel et très propre. Un problème de puissance électrique qui devrait bientôt être réparé. Quelques victuailles payantes dans le placard: étonnant. Pas de victuailles de base.
Mais très bonne localisation dans Porto: nous avons tout fait à pied. Bonne réactivité de Dulce que nous n’avons pas rencontrée mais grande gentillesse de Christina qui prépare l’appartement.
Je le conseille.

Alles war bestens und zu unserer Zufriedenheit! Appartment ist gut ausgestattet, top Lage und Christina, die uns hineingelassen hat, konnte uns sogar noch einige Empfehlungen geben für unseren Aufenthalt in Porto. Auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert!
Super tolles Appartement in zentraler Lage. Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind per Fuß und öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln super zu erreichen. Ich würde jeder Zeit wieder buchen.
Tout était parfait chez Dulce
Great apartment and great host! Recommend it to everyone traveling to Porto!

We liked the location of the place as it is very central, but still in a street with almost no cars. Everything's very easy to reach in short walking distance. 
Overall, you get all pros and cons of an apartment in an old building. The ceiling is high and the main room has huge windows, which is beautiful. If you're travelling when it is 15C outside, consider that the apartment is not very well heated and you should have warm clothes at home. You can basically hear every movement in the hallway / staircase. When we were there (March 2018), there was a construction work in the street starting quite early. 
We had a big problem with the shower drain as the water was not running down (apparently it did but very slowly), nevertheless Dulce tried her best to solve the issue - thanks for that!
Alles top gerne wieder! Super Lage!
Wir waren mit der Unterkunft sehr zufrieden.
Everything was fine. Appartement is conviniently located. You can walk to every attraction within the city (if you don’t mind walking)
Los anfitriones genial ..El apartamento estupendo e inmejorable en todos los sentidos y la ubicación perfecta ..

We absolutely loved this Airbnb!! Dulce was a fantastic host who made the apartment feel very welcoming. Although we didn’t meet her, she made check in super easy and had excellent communication. I would definitely recommend staying here, it’s the perfect base to explore Porto! Super comfortable and stylish :)
We really enjoyed dulces apartment! Spacious, beautifull, clean and perfect location! Dulce responded quickly to all our messages, we would definitely recommend this for anyone visiting Porto!

Appart à recommander les yeux fermés. Super bien situé, super beau, super propre et pour un séjour en avril très abordable.
Toutes les visites et découvertes se font à pied, beaucoup de restos à deux pas de l'appart.
Je n'ai pas rencontré Dulce, mais elle a toujours été très disponible et réactive lorsque j'ai eu besoin de son aide et/ou conseil (sms, messages via airbnb et appels téléphoniques)
Un ENORME merci pour ce séjour, lorsque je retournerai à Porto, car sous le charme j'y retournerai, je louerai cet appart sans aucun doute
N'hésitez pas !

Great place to stay in Porto. Dulce's apartment is well-equipped and clean, with a very good location, close to main attractions, shops and São Bento railway station (if you want to explore other cities) it is a fantastic place for holiday. 
Very good contact with Dulce what I really appreciate. 
Highly recommended.

Super location en hyper centre de Porto. Propre, joli, confortable, très bien insonorisé, à proximité immédiate de tous les sites que l’on souhaitait visiter, cet appartement est idéal pour un séjour en amoureux à Porto.

Dulce’s apartment is very centrally located, a beautiful place that looks exactly in real life as it does in her photos, and she was really good at communicating (and patient when we had WiFi problems!). We had a lovely visit to Oporto thanks to being able to stay at her place.
The apartment is great. We really enjoyed our stay there. The self check-in was really easy. The apartment is well located so you can walk everywhere and there are many restaurants around.
Great location, great restaurants nearby. Nice and clean place with lots of sunlight in the living room.

Die Wohnung ist schön eingerichtet, sauber und entspricht den Fotos.
Die Lage ist sehr gut, und die umliegenden Bars und Restaurants sind auch Top.
Die Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin  funktionierte über (Hidden by Airbnb) einwandfrei und man bekam  schnell Antwort. 
Besonders freundlich war, dass uns Dulce frühmorgens ein Taxi zum Flughafen organisiert hat. 
Wir verbrachten schöne Tage in Porto!

The apt is in a central area, on a hill, it is new and elegant and quiet. Just loved it.
Dulce was very helpful for any request we had.
I highly recommend this apt and the super host Dulce.
Greatings from Italy ;D
This place is a great place to stay in Porto!  A short walk to sites and restaurants.  Great communication from Dulce.  A welcoming place to stay!
We stayed for 3 nights and had a wonderful stay. The flat is very well located, clean, spacious for 2, modern. Our host was great too. Thank you
Really nice place in a good location!

L'appartement de Dulce est très agréable à vivre et parfaitement situé pour visiter Porto sans transport en commun.
Commerces, bars, restaurants, tout est à proximité.
Dulce a été très réactive à nos questions, tout s'est très bien passé.
Merci Dulce.
Renée et Jacques

Dulce apartment is stylish and has all the facilities you need. It is very central and there many shops and restaurants around. Check in and check out were super easy even if Dulce wasn’t there. Absolutely recommended!

Wonderful apartment and hospitality. Awesome location. The host was very kind and helpful to us. Very clean and new. Stylish and clever design in everything. Nice house.
Great place to stay in Porto. Highly recommended!
I enjoyed staying in Dulce's apartment. It was clean and spacious and in a good location. Though we never met in person, Dulce was nice and her communication via email/text was prompt.
The location is ideal, we were really happy with the location. The windows are double-paned which meant really quiet, peaceful sleep. Great spot and Dulce was very responsive to any questions.
Unser Aufenthalt im Apartment von Dulce war hervorragend. Die Wohnung ist schön eingerichtet, sauber & alles Notwendige ist vorhanden. Die Lage war kaum zu übertreffen! Zum weiterempfehlen :)
Great spot close to all the sites of Porto! Dulce was prompt host who was able to answer all of our questions - recommend to all!
Clean and spacious. Convenient location on a walking street a couple blocks from the train station and the historical center of Porto.
WoW!  Superbe emplacement, magnifique appartement près de tout.  Épiceries proches.  Cette expérience nous a réconcilié avec le principe.  Merci!

We had a lovely time in Porto and the apartment was really nice and clean and easy to find. We checked in around midnight and Dulce stayed up to allow us access to the building by using her phone. We were given the code to the apartment well in advance so had no problems getting in. Thank you very much for having us we had a great holiday!

Un Apartamento excelente!
Céntrico, límpio, moderno, y a un paso del centro de Oporto.
Sin duda 100% recomendable!

Dulce’s Place is really nice and actually more spacious than the photos. 

Really enjoyed our stay and in addition Dulce communicated extremely well with questions and tips on local areas, and she was flexible with our movements and travels.

Great apartment, exactly as described on the pictures. Dulce is really nice and easy to communicante with. 
Great location, at the centre of Porto. Perfect for a couple!

This is the perfect place for staying a couple of days in Oporto. Right in the city center, and close to a lot of shops and restaurants. 
The apartment is very modern, everything is new and clean. The bed is super big and comfortable. 
I would definitely recommend to stay at Dulce's place.

Dulce was a wonderful host. She was very quick with responding to messages and made finding the residence very easy. The location was perfect for us. Very central, near cafes, restaurants, bars and all the sights. But the street was quiet which meant it was easy to sleep! 

The place is just as pictured. Very clean with all the amenities you need. Our favorite part was to open the windows in the evening and have a glass of wine before heading to dinner at night. 

We would not hesitate to stay here again! Thank you Dulce!

Appartement plein de charme, bien équipé, très propre et idéalement situé pour découvrir Porto à pied tout en étant à l'écart de la foule. On est partout en 5 à 10 minutes. Dulce est une hôte parfaitement attentive qui a su répondre à toutes nos demandes avant et pendant notre séjour. L'arrivée est facilité par un checkin qui peut se faire à distance : bien pratique !

een mooi,modern ingericht appartement. Goed gelegen, dicht bij de meeste bezienswaardigheden in Porto.  Ook nabijheid van warenhuizen is pluspunt.  Dulce reageert ook heel snel indien je haar nodig hebt.
Great stay! Great host and super quick to responding to emails and texts which made it very easy for us
Emplacement parfait, appart super propre et accueillant! On recommande!
Wir kommen jederzeit wieder. Die Wohnung liegt ausgezeichnet, um Porto zu Fuss zu entdecken und enthält alles, was man braucht. Dulce war eine ausgezeichnete Gastgeberin .
Typique - extrêmement bien situé - calme .. a n’en pas douter votre choix ici est le meilleure... je vous recommande..

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans ce bel appartement. Situé en plein centre ville de Porto, le logement était propre, confortable et calme. Dulce a été réactive, disponible et très arrangeante. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

The apartment was beautiful, clean, and centrally located! It gets a little loud in the morning with construction outside, but if you sleep in the bedroom, it should not be an issue (we slept on the pull out bed/couch near windows). Dulce was incredibly responsive and we really appreciated this when we had questions. Would definitely stay here again!
Muito bom apartamento decorado com bom gosto e limpo. Proprietário pontual e ágil, muito obrigado pelo serviço que nos deu.
Wonderful location, very easy check in. Be wary when using uber and taxi services with the location however since (Hidden by Airbnb) maps places pickup on the wrong street.
The apartment is very good, the location is extremely good, every corner in the apartment is clean, very stylish. We had a warm and great time there, definitely recommend!

name: Charming Studio with Balcony + Garden (4 guests) 1
summary: Welcome to Ayres Gouvea House! Our lovely, recently refurbished family home from XIX century, located in a prime area, just up the street from Fountain of the Virtues and walking distance to hundreds of restaurants and bars! This elegant and bright apartment for 4 guests features a cosy living space, full kitchen, a lovely balcony and a common garden.This home is complete with hotel quality linen, fresh towels and complimentary toiletries to make your stay all the more comfortable and enjoyable!
space: This studio named " Salon", has a balcony , high ceiling, creative lighting,  and a modern interior that keeps the studio bright, spacious and airy. Featuring a TV, Wi-fi, dining table, double bed, sofa (extends into a bed), the living space is perfect for 4 guests to lounge and relax after a day of exploring Porto. The modern bathroom features a shower and hairdryer for your use. The building has a exclusive garden prepared for children's, animals and even a barbecue spot!  The kitchen space is fully equipped and perfect for meal preparation. Including a stove, microwave, oven and fridge you have everything you need to cook up a delicious home cooked meal.
description: Welcome to Ayres Gouvea House! Our lovely, recently refurbished family home from XIX century, located in a prime area, just up the street from Fountain of the Virtues and walking distance to hundreds of restaurants and bars! This elegant and bright apartment for 4 guests features a cosy living space, full kitchen, a lovely balcony and a common garden.This home is complete with hotel quality linen, fresh towels and complimentary toiletries to make your stay all the more comfortable and enjoyable! This studio named " Salon", has a balcony , high ceiling, creative lighting,  and a modern interior that keeps the studio bright, spacious and airy. Featuring a TV, Wi-fi, dining table, double bed, sofa (extends into a bed), the living space is perfect for 4 guests to lounge and relax after a day of exploring Porto. The modern bathroom features a shower and hairdryer for your use. The building has a exclusive garden prepared for children's, animals and even a barbecue spot!  The kitchen space i
neighborhood_overview: Porto is an amazing city to explore by foot, with many attractions within walking distance. There are a row of restaurants down the street from the home, including an Italian, Portuguese and pastry store. If you prefer a home cooked meal, there are a variety of grocery stores and markets within a 10 minute walk. There are 2 lovely parks within a 6 minute walk from the home. You will also find a museum, gallery and historic landmarks in the area.
transit: Porto is easily accessible by foot, but if you prefer public transportation there is a bus and tram stop just 1 minute from the home.
access: This home is located on the 1 floor of a charming renovated building. The whole apartment is only for you! You’re welcome to relax in the common garden space.
interaction: Our dedicated team is available,  Monday to Friday from 10 am to 7pm and Saturday to Sunday from 10am to 5pm at our reception located at Almada street. In case of any emergency we are available 24/7 by phone. Additionally you are able to leave your luggages at our reception before check-in or after check-out.
house_rules: Pets are welcome to stay, but please let me know in advance :) I just ask for an extra fee of 25,00 euros for the cleaning.

host.host_about:
We manage several apartments in Oporto's Historic centre. If you are searching for the best place to rest after exploring this amazing city, we can help you with that :)

The apartments can provide you with a real native experience! They are all furnished and well equipped for a pleasant, yet alternative, stay compared to a traditional hotel room. They are all located near most of the main attractions in the city.

If you have any questions our staff can give you all the information.

Hope to see you here! :D

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The Apartment is very beautiful and well located! Thanks for the nice stay!
Um bom espaço para passar uns dias no Porto
Nice flat in a beautiful old Building.

name: Auwailani Garden Apartment
summary: Nestled at the base of the beautiful Koolau Mountain Range is the town of Kaneohe and our cozy 1 bedroom AirBnB named Auwailani. Our property is unique with a small stream bubbling through our 2 homes. It is lushly landscaped with primarily native plants. I highly recommend getting a rental car to navigate the island. By car, our listing is close to the H3 and 20 mins to the airport, 15 mins to Kailua, 30 mins to Oahu's famed North Shore and the big waves. E Komo Mai...We welcome you
space: We offer you and your families a beautiful, cozy one bedroom apartment with a private entrance. We are centrally located in Kaneohe, close to beaches, mountain hikes, botanical gardens, grocery stores and even our own Windward Mall.
description: Nestled at the base of the beautiful Koolau Mountain Range is the town of Kaneohe and our cozy 1 bedroom AirBnB named Auwailani. Our property is unique with a small stream bubbling through our 2 homes. It is lushly landscaped with primarily native plants. I highly recommend getting a rental car to navigate the island. By car, our listing is close to the H3 and 20 mins to the airport, 15 mins to Kailua, 30 mins to Oahu's famed North Shore and the big waves. E Komo Mai...We welcome you We offer you and your families a beautiful, cozy one bedroom apartment with a private entrance. We are centrally located in Kaneohe, close to beaches, mountain hikes, botanical gardens, grocery stores and even our own Windward Mall.
house_rules: We ask that no laundry be started after 8 pm. in consideration of all guests. I will consider small indoor pets....on a dog to dog basis.  We must talk about this in advance. Thank you.

host.host_about: Aloha All, My name is Susie and I have lived on the windward side of Oahu my entire life.  I was blessed to grow up in Kailua, which was a small beachside town in the 50's, 60's and 70's.  It has developed into a major tourist destination which besides bringing people and traffic....the monetary influx that comes along with it. In 1990 my husband Matt and I decided to buy property in Kaneohe, which we developed into 2 homes to accommodate our growing family.  We love Kaneohe and hope if you decide to stay with us, you will too. E Komo Mai (Welcome) Susie

reviews.comments: Welcoming, accommodating hosts; pleasant, peaceful stay.  We were Susie's first guests, and were honored to be so.  She was an accommodating host, going above and beyond in supporting us, giving us local recommendations, and dealing with some difficult government requirements for our stay.  Our room looked like it was newly built, with quaint decorations.  Also, we enjoyed the lush, tropical garden behind us.  Very easy trip to downtown Kaneohe, and centrally located for easy access to nearby Kailua, and the H3 and Kamehameha Hwy for trips to Waikiki.  Highly recommended!!!

Great price compared to others. We had a very enjoyable time. The space was cozy and comfy enough for three people easily and was a comfortable spot to come back to after a long day at the beach or hiking. Susie was friendly and considerate. Thanks!

Excellent host. Went to great lengths to make our stay enjoyable and comfortable. Clean apartment with a beautiful garden in the back. Loved to sit on the deck and eat breakfast in the morning looking at the plants.

HIGHLY recommend staying here at Susie's beautiful airbnb nestled in a lovely residential neighborhood in Kaneohe. On the day we arrived to check in, Susie personally greeted us and showed us around the property, and even went out of her way to prepare Hawaiian snacks to welcome us! The airbnb itself is tastefully decorated, comfortable and clean, and is spacious enough for a family of 3-4. Location is great, with short distances to both the Waikiki area as well as the north shore. Best airbnb experience we have had so far, and if we are ever back in Oahu we will definitely be back!!

Susie was a great host with a beautiful place. It felt like you were in a secluded garden while you were sitting on the deck. We had everything we needed and Susie was helpful. Will recommend this to anyone looking to come to Oahu!

La casa di Susie è molto bella, comoda spaziosa e con un giardino privato bellissimo! 
Noi eravamo due e per due è grande ci si può stare comodamente in 3/4
Non è sul mare ma in una posizione strategica per visitare le bellissime spiaggia e girare l'isola
Susie è molto disponibile e ci è venuta incontro con il check in 
Grazie ancora 
Lorenza

This home was great and can accommodate 3-4 people comfortably. Susie is very accommodating and communication is great if anything is needed. Only warning I have is of course it's a BEAUTIFUL tropical area so if you drop anything that needs to be cleaned up do it right then. I would definitely recommend staying here for an amazing view and to be away from the Waikiki crowd and traffic. I'm very appreciative to Susie for her hospitality to my family and I during our visit.

It was so nice to arrive at this reservation to see a smiling and friendly host. From check-in to check-out, everything about our stay was amazing. Looking forward to staying again the next time we make it out to this beautiful island.
Susie was the most wonderful host and her place was perfect, tropical and beautiful.  Exactly what I was hoping for. Would definitely stay here again and recommend it without reservation.
Couldn't believe how pretty it all was! The property is beautiful and the room itself was perfect! Susie is great and responds quickly! Would stay again!

We stayed at Susie's place for three nights.  She is a wonderful host who is kind, warm and responsive! When we arrived in her neighborhood, we couldn't locate her place. She came out to meet us near by to guide us to her place. Her place is clean, peaceful and has an amazing tropical garden we enjoyed viewing while sitting on the dec.  Highly recommended!!

We had a wonderfull 3 days stay. Appartment was perfectly clean and comfortable, with everything you might need. The kitchen equipment and dishes were new. It was very kozy, like at home feeling. We had our breakfasts and dinners outside at the nice terrasse with tropical garden view. We liked traditional hawaiian decoration. Susie was a perfect host. She always answered our questions within 5 minutes. Susie and her husband were very friendly and helpfull. We would absolutely recommend this place.
We recommend it.  A hidden gem, Comfortable and close to all amenities.

This home is everything I hope for when traveling. It is beautifully decorated, homey, clean and very comfortable. The deck is private and surrounded by a gorgeous garden. Everything worked well and was exactly as advertised. The bed is incredibly comfortable and Susie provided pillows of every kind. 

Susie is a lovely and generous host, quick to be of service. If we ever get back to Hawaii, this is where we want to stay!

The owners were friendly and met all expectations.  The location in Kaneohe is about ten minutes away from beautiful Kailua Beach and twenty minutes from Waimanalo.  If you are seeking a location on the windward side of Oahu, this is a great getaway.  The garden outside the lanai is lovely.

Lovely unit, private, well appointed, extremely clean and a very thoughtful and hospitable host! Terrific bed, well equipped kitchen, abundance of linens and even picnic container and beach towels. Just a delightful stay.

We could live there!  Great layout that is ideal for 2 or 3 people.  Beautiful lush gardens.  Convenient location near grocery store to stock up on groceries as the kitchen is perfect!  Everything you need is here.  Comfortable bed.  Easy living with a gorgeous tropical view.  Easy to get to and centrally located.
We plan to stay at Susie's place again as we were very happy with our experience.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The place had all the amenities we needed, including a terrific shower, a comfortable king-sized bed, air conditioning in the bedroom, basic kitchen supplies, and beach towels & a beach chair for us to use. There is a grocery store about a 4min walk away and some wonderful beaches within a short drive, and the apartment comes with maps and books of the surrounding area. The apartment is set up so you have to walk through the bathroom to get from the living room to the bedroom, which wasn't a problem for us but is something to note. We loved staying in Kaneohe and appreciated Susie's hospitality – we would definitely stay again!
The house was clean and worked great for our stay.  The towels, beach chairs and cooler were a plus.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Susie's AirBnB.  Susie is the type of host who meets you in the driveway in the pouring rain with an umbrella so you can get inside without getting soaked. :)  I appreciated how both quick to respond Susie was as well as how helpful she was.  The apartment was cute, cozy, convenient, and very clean...the all-around perfect AirBnB experience. We felt at home right away, and would definitely stay again! Thank you for a great five nights!
This place was great and Susie was a wonderful host! We highly recommend staying here!

Susie is amazing. Me and my fiancé stayed at the apartment and she knew we were getting married, asked if there was anything she could get us. The place was very clean and super cute and cozy. Just like the pictures! The kind size bed is so super comfy! She even has beach chairs and towel Incase you want to make a trip to the beautiful beaches. This place is perfect for a couple and maybe one other person. The parking can be a little tight. Only room for 1 car ( at least when we were there during thanksgiving- she may have had guests staying with her). DO NOT leave food out on the counter. Sugar ants will find their way in. I was not aware of this and left my donuts on the counter and found a surprise in the morning. This doesn’t happen to this extreme when I’m from. Other then that very minor thing, Our experience was absolutely amazing and I’m going to be recomming this place to my parents to stay after i move out here.

It was a nice place to stay, Susie and Matt were great hosts! We stayed there with two small kids, and we had enough place for everyone. Linens, floors, everything was clean, and even though it is attached to the main house, we had privacy. Would be happy to return!

Susie's place is wonderful!  Easy to get to from Honolulu side, quieter and more relaxing after a day in the "big city".  The living quarters are very nice, with all the amenities you'll need.  The king size (!) bed is super comfortable.  Note: if you use the Roku TV remote, the volume control is on the *side* of it.  We wondered, but didn't watch much TV except for the weather report --  many more interesting things to do in Hawaii!  As noted in other reviews, parking is tight but manageable.  We would definitely stay here again and are recommending Susie's place to our friends who are about to travel to Oahu.

We loved this little place.  It was plenty big enough for us, had a full kitchen and everything we needed to cook the groceries we bought.  The bed was so, so comfortable - we slept really well!  Very updated bathroom with a great shower and a  Smart TV in both the bedroom and living area.  Super cute and Susie was a great host!

Wonderful and secluded space, also very nicely priced! Ms. Susie was extremely helpful and very kind! My fiancé and I really enjoyed staying at her cute little home and would not hesitate to stay here again!

Loved the privacy and cleanliness of this location.
Not to far from beaches.  but a car is needed.

This place was great. It was out of the hustle and bustle of the city, but not too far from it if you wanted to make a day trip. It was about a 20 minute drive from most tourist attractions. Susie was great as a host and accommodated for everything.

If you are looking for a quaint and private place to stay with pretty much EVERYTHING you will need to be comfortable away from home, then this is the place for you. Top it off with a wonderful host and you are set for a great stay. The FREE washer & dryer were my favorite :) Thank you, Susie!

The apartment was clean and perfect for 1-3 people. It was quiet and close to major highways to get us around the island. Would recommend Susie’s place to others visiting with interest in staying away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki :)

Susie and Jeff were very helpful and friendly.  We particularly felt comfortable in the big bed and enjoyed movies on the tv.  Another special thing was the small grill on the porch.  We had 3 or 4 cookouts. Everything was clean and well supplied.
The place was well adorned with anything we could need with extra towels and cooking equipment. It was a very beautiful and restful place. I would love to stay there again.

Loved staying here, it is pretty quiet and Susie's dogs are the cutest, I highly recommend meeting them when you arrive. 

The kitchen and living  area are great, and the residence is in good proximity to activities around the island.

We had a pleasant stay at Susie's. It was very clean, cozy, and beautifully decorated. The king size bed was super comfortable. Many stores in 5 minutes, 10 minutes to Kailua Beach and Whole Foods Market, 20 min to Pearl Harbor, 30-35 min to the North Shore. Susie is a wonderful host, very kind and sweet. I would definitely stay at Susie's again!

We had a great time at the apartment, it was really pretty and everything you need for a pleasant stay was provided. 
Also the hosts were really friendly.
The apartment has everything you need. Good location. Thx
Susie’s place was convenient and close to everything we needed. We will definitely be coming back on our next Oahu vacation!
It was a very great experience. Wonderful hosts, beautiful place. The scenery from the front door was amazing and the inside was spectacular.

Susie has a great place! The location was perfect for us. I think it was better than advertised. It was clean and everything you would need and expect. Some of the extras were a nice touch, such as beach towels, chairs and ice chest. Susie and family were nice and accommodating. We will gladly stay here again on our next visit!

Das appartment von susie ist klein, aber sehr gemütlich und hübsch eingerichtet und es hat alles, was man braucht. Süsser balkon mit sicht ins grüne, allerdings hört man dort den strassenlärm (nachts waren wir aber nicht gesört durch verkehslärm).

Wonderful place to stay when you are in Oahu! Kaneohe is the perfect town to live for all the trips around the island, not too far away from the airport as well . Susie is such a friendly, warm and welcoming host! We really enjoyed our stay. Check-in and Check-out went perfectly and all the other questions I had were answered immediately. A cozy place where you’ll feel like home. Thanks again for having us, happy I chose this place!

My husband and I were visiting O'ahu for a wedding and Susie's place was perfect.  She has included so many extra ammenities that we really appreciated.  There were beach tools, a cooler and beach chairs available.  She had cold water in the fridge when we arrived.  There is an iron and ironing board and a hair dryer available.  The bed was really comfortable and the AC in the bedroom makes for a wonderful nights sleep.  The kitchen is fully stocked.  The private entry way has a patio table and a wonderful view of the tropical garden.  The place is immaculate and well decorated.  I would highly ecommend this place and will stay here again if we return to O'ahu.

The house was lovely! A very comfortable large bed and quite nice fold out couch/futon. We had everything we needed and more as far as kitchen amenities and even beach gear available for use! I loved the garden out front, very peaceful for morning coffees. Thanks Susie!
Susie graciously offers up her fantastic home tucked in the heart of Kaneohe to travelers looking for an experience that embodies the spirit of Aloha much more than any hotel could.
Very comfortable and clean.  Like the location. Despite being near a busy street it is not noisy and the grounds like a botanical garden.  This was my second stay.

We had such a nice stay at Susie’s place, there is a private entrance around the side with a lovely patio and chairs. The bed was very comfortable , kitchen well stocked and the little extras were a perfect touch (beach chairs, towels and cooler).  A/c was much appreciated, bathroom clean. Easy communication and great location for day trips around the island away from the busy side of Oahu. Would recommend!!
Our stay was wonderful. My husband and I throughly enjoyed our time. Susie was so sweet and so accommodating. I couldn’t have asked for a better set up.
Suzie is a thoughtful and considerate host. The unit is clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!

A welcoming host who will probably insist on a hug when you leave.  Very pretty little place that seems to be a walled off section of her own house.  Pretty porch area.  AC that is really just for the bedroom area though our son slept fine on the fold out futon with the windows and a fan.  Very close to the supermarket.  Parking provided.  Just a good little place.

Susie was very hospitable and had great communication. The place was as advertised and definitely a great place to call home for your vacation if you are planning to entertain yourself mostly on the east and north side of the island.

Susie's apartment is perfect to spend a few days in Oahu in a quiet place and not far from the main things to see on the island, including the most beautiful beaches of Oahu.
Susie and her family are extremely welcoming and helped us a lot during our stay. The apartment is very clean and consistent with the photos of the site.
We will not hesitate to come back to Susie's home if we ever return to Hawaii.

I came with my two daughters to drop my youngest off at college at HPU. Suzi‘s apartment is 2 miles away. We had fun driving to North Shore which was only 20 minutes. She was great at helping with local restaurants. The apartment was very comfortable for 3. It was nice to have a full kitchen enabling us to make coffee and breakfast each morning. I would definitely stay with Suzi again in the future.

Susie’s place was perfect for me and my husband. We spent 9 nights on her apartment and we had everything that we needed.  Susie was very welcoming and accommodating to our request as well as the arrival and departure time.
The location was perfect for us, 15 minutes to Kailua beach, shops and restaurants nearby. I would definitely recommend her place to everyone.

Expect to be in luscious greenery, home away from home, perfect for a couple of people. Very clean apt with parking, a/c in bedroom, amenities as advertised, and Ms. Susie who is very accommodating and informative of the island. I personally loved her place, it exceeded any hotel or crowded town stress.

I could not have asked for a better place to stay while in Hawaii. The apartment was very nice and clean. It had all of the necessities to make it feel like a home away from home. The beds were very comfortable. The air conditioner in the bedroom worked great. There is a fan in the living room where the other bed is. The garden in the back yard was absolutely gorgeous and was a very nice sight to wake up to. Susie was so welcoming and informative. She is one of the kindest people I have ever met. I would recommend this place to anyone needing a place to stay while on the island. Thank you, Susie!

Susie was a very warm host, and we especially appreciated her accommodating our extra late arrival (we took a wrong highway exit). Her place had all the essential utensils and dishes for the kitchen, and included beach towels and chairs. The bedroom A/C was also essential for a comfortable sleep with hot/humid weather.  The place was exactly as advertised and we really enjoyed our stay!
Great for the costs, I will probably rent again b/c it's a nice price point

Susie was tremendously accommodating! She made herself available regularly through text and her space was exactly what my group of 3 needed. We felt at home in this clean and convenient little apartment.
Clean, neat place to stay for vacation.

車があれば非常に便利な場所｡山や庭の景色が楽しめ､部屋も清潔｡となりにSusie さんが住んでいらっしゃるので安心感がある｡ﾋﾞｰﾁに必要なｲｽ､ﾀｵﾙ､ｸｰﾗﾎﾞｯｸｽを準備してくれていて､非常に助かった｡ｷｯﾁﾝの包丁が切れにくいこと､ﾄｲﾚが部屋と部屋の間にあること以外は素晴らしく､素敵なお部屋でした｡ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄを12時と勘違いしてしまい､少し遅れてのﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄになり､最後の最後にSusie さんに迷惑をかけてしまい申し訳なかったです｡
Thoughtful amenities during your stay and also for trips to the beach. Very clean and cozy apartment.
Susie is a great host.

Susie's place is great, very comfortable, clean, and good location.  The place is wonderful,  and Susie is a fantastic host. Definitely recommend her place.
Diane and Jay 
Pennsylvania

We would definitely stay again at Susie‘s place when returning to Oahu, everything exactly as described, very comfortable bed and very clean apartment. The location is perfect, all sights in very good reach for tourists!
We greatly enjoyed our stay. Susie is an amazing host, very kind and quick to respond. The place was clean and comfortable and had everything we needed to explore north shore!
Conveniently located great place to stay

A lovely little apartment in a residential area of Kaneohe, that is attached to the owners home.  It was very clean and had all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay.  The bed and linen was super comfortable, and there was a lovely bathroom with everything needed.  The kitchen was well appointed, and had a full size gas stove.  The A/C in the bedroom was also a plus.  Great Wi/Fi and a designated parking spot was included.

Susie's Place is in  the back of a 2 story host house, just a simple/medium size/ one bedroom with a king size bed and a TV in it. A  locked door separates the bedroom from the rest of the host home.Access in the bedroom is through a  bathroom, which serves as a connection with a small kitchenette/living area  wit a modest futon (for 2 people). There is no backyard or access to the advertised stream of bubbling water or anywhere else. The washer and dryers are under a porch in the front of the  host home ( not the rental place). No BBQ, or the recreational area.The entire place do not exceed 350 Sq Ft. and its furniture very limited /old and smelly ( roach repellent)

수지는 명랑하고 열정적인 사람입니다.
집은 사진대로 아름답고 수지의 인테리어감각은 훌륭합니다.
그러나 하와이에 있는 집이지만 햇빛이 잘 드는 위치는 아닙니다.
비가오면 난방이 필요할 정도로 서늘합니다. 그것이 장점일수 있겠네요.

3분안에 타임즈 마켓이있고 유명한 포케집도 가깝습니다. 훌륭한 할레이바조스도 5분거리입니다.

카네오헤에서 또 만나길...

name: 3 BDR APT AND ROOFTOP ONE TRAIN STOP TO MANHATAN
summary: ONE TRAIN STOP TO MANHATAN!!! Experienced Superhosts. Relax in our brand new 3 bedroom with rooftop apartment. Unbeatable location, one block away from J,M,Z trains + BUS STATION + CITY BIKES + BEDFORD AV., it is the BEST place to get transport to Manhatan. Make your next visit to NYC very easy and confortable in our luxurios penthouse located also in the hottest and safest neighborwood in New York. If you land at JFK you have direct transport to our apt, just take J train and come down home!!!
space: Recommended for big families or group of friends!!!. Get the real Old School NYC feeling in our modern apartment. Relax in our spacious fully furnished home, BRAND NEW BUILDING, presenting  central heating control, a/c and awesome daylight illumination. Double glassed + sound isolation windows in each room, complete kitchen, bar and bar stools plus our electrical grill will make it hard to hit the street, enjoy a sunny afternoon in our furnished rooftop, grill whatever you feel to eat with some music or a good read and heart stoppin views. And of course, feel Williamsburg upgrowing vibe, restorants from all over the world, art galleries, most famous flea markets, beautiful parks and an amazing night life. One train stop away from Manhattan will get you in the city in less than five minutes, but for those warm afternoons grab a city bike also at our door and cross Williamsburg bridge to Manhattan trough its bikes way, trust me, it worths the pics. As i said, our location its unbeatable.
description: ONE TRAIN STOP TO MANHATAN!!! Experienced Superhosts. Relax in our brand new 3 bedroom with rooftop apartment. Unbeatable location, one block away from J,M,Z trains + BUS STATION + CITY BIKES + BEDFORD AV., it is the BEST place to get transport to Manhatan. Make your next visit to NYC very easy and confortable in our luxurios penthouse located also in the hottest and safest neighborwood in New York. If you land at JFK you have direct transport to our apt, just take J train and come down home!!! Recommended for big families or group of friends!!!. Get the real Old School NYC feeling in our modern apartment. Relax in our spacious fully furnished home, BRAND NEW BUILDING, presenting  central heating control, a/c and awesome daylight illumination. Double glassed + sound isolation windows in each room, complete kitchen, bar and bar stools plus our electrical grill will make it hard to hit the street, enjoy a sunny afternoon in our furnished rooftop, grill whatever you feel to eat with some
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg its considered the best, coolest and safest neighborwood in New York. Our apartment its located right in the heart of it. You can visit Manhatan in only 5 minutes, no need of taxis!! Be prepared for a great experience in your next visit to Nyc.
transit: Either you arrive to the city trough Jfk airport or by train at Penn Station or bus at Port authority, train lines are the fastest and easiest.  From JFK airport forget about taxis or Uber, just take J train, come down at Marcy stop walk one block you are home. From Manhattan J,M,Z trains will do same dropping you at same Marcy stop.
interaction: As experienced superhosts, we will make sure you have everythng
house_rules: - Absolutely forbidden to smoke inside the house. Only low noises after 11pm. Note: christmas and new years eve we take minimum 4 nights reservation. Pls contact us for that period.

reviews.comments: Victor and his girlfriend Ana were super kind, the apartment is awesome, clean, comfortable, and the views OMG!! Super accesible, trains and bikes are right there, I did not take any taxis.. I just loved this experience,  its really the heart of williamsburg. Im looking forward to come back again, cheers!!
Todo muy lindo . Muy bien ubicado a  5 min de NY por subte. Habitaciones amplias .Muy amable victor y ana . Volveremos . Abz

Perfect airbnb experience. Place was exactly as advertised, if not even better. Spectacular roof terrace with view of Manhattan skyline. Immediate proximity to great restaurants, shops and bars. 2 stops on the very close subway to Manhattan. Friendly and immediate contact with Victor. Lovely apartment with plenty of room. Really fair price and excellent value. Will stay here again when in New York for sure. Totally recommended.

Ana and Victor were gracious hosts. Perfect apartment for a group of friends or family! Close walk to the subway for a very short ride to Manhattan or a few blocks away from the arts and music scene on Bedford Ave in Williamsburg. Highly recommend.

Fabulous location. Very easy subway transfer into Manhattan. Lots to do in Williamsburg. Victor & Ana were very friendly and accommodating. The apartment was well decorated & clean. Perfect for our needs!

Ana and Victor were fantastic hosts and were very friendly. The apartment is very accurately advertised. Much better than staying in a hotel. Nice and clean. Great views. Nice location with easy access to public transportation. Very fun and active area. Highly recommend and would gladly stay again.

Ana & Victor are a very hospitable and friendly couple. Their apartment was as expected if not better(Clean, quiet, spacious) & very convenient with regards to location (close to the subway & Brooklyn Bridge), space, Rooftop. Neighborhood seems friendly and in the heart of williamsburg. I was also delighted by the views from your balcony & rooftop (my favorite!) I look forward to coming back again!
Great location!

Convenient location and  close to great  areas in Williamsburg and one block from the train that can take you anywhere you'd like. Their place was very clean with a great balcony and fun rooftop! I'd definitely stay there again! Thanks
Great location, super close to the train! The hosts were friendly and communicated well with us before and during our stay. Highly recommend this location!
The place was as described. Ana was very lovely to deal with. We had heaps of fun!

Starting a family coast to coast road trip with 3 young adults with NYC this Summer, we couldn't have found a better place than Ana y Victor's one. Ideally located in the heart of Williamsburg, a few hundred meters away from Marcy Av. station, with a beautiful view on Williamsburg bridge (especially from the roof top, a bike station just at your doorstep, their place can comfortably accommodate a family of 5. Convenience stores are less than a block away. Make sure you reserve time enough to walk the streets around and the Metro line up to Bushwick, whose atmosphere is worth discovering. We didn't meet with Ana y Victor but every thing was ready for our (late) arrival, access was easy and we didn't encounter any issue during our stay. Thanks again for this great stay! We will be back.
Perfect place in Williamsburg. Easy to get to and easy to get around. I was impressed with how quiet it was and that there was ac! All six of us fit comfortably.
Great location, comfy beds. Communication could have been a little more timely at check-in. 4rd bedroom doesn't have air-conditioning so hot! Close to Train.  Great rooftop terrace!!
Muy buena ubicación
We had a terrific stay. The apartment was very clean and very well located. Amazing restaurants in walking distance and steps from the subway too. Thank you!

Perfect location, if you want that authentic old school NYC feel. Easy access to the train, and never waited more than a minute for Uber. Apartment was as advertised, and has everything needed for comfort and convenience. Great view of the Empire State Building from the balcony! Cool, eclectic neighborhood as well. Recommend!

Ana and Victor's is clean, neat and in a good location to visit NYC. The arrangements were done effortlessly on arrival and departure. We had a perfect stay with them. We had our three little kids with us so safety and cleanliness was something we were looking for. We found that at Ana and Victors place!
Ana and Victor's place is lovely, clean and stylish. My dad and the family member had a great time staying here. They loved it! It feels like at their own home. And it's very close to the subway.
Great location. Lovely apartment full of character. Sweet rooftop patio. Easy to check in and out

Ana and Victor were great hosts! Their apartment was beautiful and clean and in a great location! The apartment comfortably slept 5 people. We spent a hot few days in New York so the air conditioners in each room were wonderful to come back to. The only negative was being able to hear the metro from the apartment, so if you're a light sleeper it might be an issue. Overall, it was a great stay with a beautiful view. Thank you Ana and Victor !

We stayed here for 3 nights with a family of four.  The three beds easily slept all of us, although not spacious,  but very comfortable.  Location is unbeatable if you are looking to spend time in Brooklyn and Manhattan.  Many restaurants, cafes, grocery stores within minutes of walk and metro station is just a block away.  Ana Y Victor were very responsive, easy to communicate and looked after us very carefully.  It was nice of them to check in on us a few times during our stay to make sure everything was ok.  Highly recommend.

Nous avons passé une très belle semaine dans cet appartement. Il est pratique avec ses 3 chambres indépendantes disposant chacune d'une climatisation ou ventilation.
La proximité de la voie de chemin de fer aérienne est surprenante et peu perturber les accros des nuits avec un calme olympien mais on s'y fait très bien.
L'appartement est idéalement situé dans le quartier de Williamsburg ( Brooklyn ), quartiers avec commerces, restaurants et bars. Nous sommes aux portes de Manhattan. La station de Métro MARCY AVENUE est à 100 mètres de l'appartement et est la derniere gare sur les ligne J et M avant de rentrer sur Manhattan.
Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

Muy buena localización, a dos paradas de Manhattan pero a la vez en Brooklyn. El apartamento estaba limpio y las camas eran muy cómodas. Cerca de las vías de metro por lo que si eres de sueño ligero deberás ponerte tapones pero si como nosotros llegas cansado no lo notarás. Repetiría sin duda!!
Great spot in Brooklyn!
Great place to stay. Comfortable, clean, close to a station and the host is really responsible for everything. We had a wonderful time for staying here.

Ana and Victors place was amazing. The description was spot on and they were very helpful. Check in and check out went smoothly. Brilliant location and handy transport links. They went the extra mile to ensure me and my mother had a great birthday. Everything I wanted and more.
Great Host!  I would recommend to other travelers!

All was good and as described. Getting and leaving the key was easy. The subway station was close and easy to navigate into Manhattan. However,  it was quite noisy at night due to the close proximity of the train line.  Overall a good experience and a lovely although compact apartment.

L'appartement de Anna et Victor à été un bon choix :
- sa localisation : métro et aussi ferry agréable et rapide pour rejoindre Manhattan 
- son confort et ses équipements
- la réactivité de Anna et Victor : réponses très rapides et cordiales
- le quartier qui fait connaître la diversité de New York

We stayed 4 nights in October, 4 adults and two teenagers. The apartment was as described, one room is a little small but we didn’t mind. The two others were of good size. Perfect location and convenient location for visiting Manhattan and Williamsburg. A little noisy at nighttime, however Ana provided the light sleepers with earplugs, the rest slept through it. The experience would’ve been even better if information about nearby grocery stores and restaurants were provided as we spent some time searching the first night, jet lagged and all. All in all we had a very nice stay.
Ana的公寓是一间典型的纽约公寓｡虽然在Brooklyn,但是交通很方便(过了Williamsburg Bridge就到了),周边生活也很便利(有一个非常棒的亚洲超市)｡公寓虽然不大,但布置地非常温暖和舒适,小小的空间里有三个房间,是一个性价比非常高的选择｡当我们需要帮助的时候,Ana也一直及时地提供各种解决方案,非常热情｡
We had great weather for a weekend wedding, so we thoroughly enjoyed the rooftop patio.  Convenient to metro & even walking across Williamsburg Bridge.

Victor was very informative,  apartment was extremely nice and convenient to public transportation.  Noise from metro was not a huge deal. It is a 4 flight walk up stairs and not a huge deal except when arriving with luggage.  Would most defiantly stay with Victor and Ana again.  We was able to see almost everything via public transportation and had a 7 day unlimited pass so it was very affordable. Only recommendation is bring a shower loofah. Great hosts/ friends.
Prima plek, goede communivatie

Victor und Ana sind unglaublich nette und hilfsbereite Menschen und es war ein toller Empfang vor Ort und eine super Kommunikation wärend des Aufenthaltes. Die Wohnung ist gemütlich und nett eingerichtet und wir haben uns dort wohl gefühlt. Wegen der Nähe zur Bahn, kommt man von dort sehr schnell und gut überall hin. Die Dachterasse ist ebenfalls toll und bietet einen schönen Blick.

This apartment was a fantastic "home away from home" for my family. The location is great - bagels and pizza close by, natural grocery stores only a couple blocks away, and being only one block from the M,J,Z trains, getting anywhere in the city was easy! For being a NYC apartment, it is quite sizable with plenty of room for our group of 5 (2 couples and a singleton). The views from the balcony are great and even though the train goes by right outside, the apartment was surprisingly quiet. Victor was a great host - easy to contact and very helpful. The only thing to note is that it is a 4th floor walk-up, so if you have issues with stairs, it may be a little difficult to access (this wasn't an issue for us). We will certainly stay in this apartment again if we find ourselves staying in NYC again!
Very comfortable.    Hosts are great.

The location is great! Very close to the L train which made things very convenient to get into and out of Manhattan. It is also very close to some great areas of Brooklyn. Ana and Victor were also very communicative and checked in several times to make sure everything was okay. The check-in/ check-out process was very easy and straight-forward. We had a great stay!
Ana and Victor’s place is awesome. Convenient location super close to the ever-hip part of Williamsburg. The apartment is stylish and comfortable. They are great hosts. Recommended!
Everything was great. Tons of restaurants within walking distance, easy access in and out of the building, subway right down the street. Everything was exactly as described.
Great host!
Cute apt and great location
Wonderful place, absolutely no issues : )

This is an outstanding value for an apartment within a few minutes walk and/or transit from the hip Brooklyn nightlife and the Lower East Side. It was immaculately maintained and access was easy. I’ve done many visits to the city, but this was one of the best. Thanks to Ana and Victor for a fantastic experience.
this is a great apartment if you want to visit new york! great location and great communication! definitely would stay here again!
Great apt, easy going and quick responding hosts. A+!
Good location. Short walking distance to train stop.  Unit is comfortable, Clean, uncluttered

Situation pratique proche de Manhattan et du métro direction aéroport direct (JFK)
Propreté impeccable

Great comfortable space and amazingly convenient location! We stayed during an extremely cold holiday week with lots of plans in Manhattan so did not spend much time in the neighborhood, but cannot praise the accommodations and location enough! We are a family of five, including three teenagers, and were able to find adequate personal space in this clean, bright dwelling. And the three-minute walk to the subway/one-stop into Manhattan location was fantastic. Highly recommend and would stay there again.

We enjoyed our stay at Ana and Victor's - it is small (as should be expected), but comfortable for a group of 5 for the four nights we stayed. The apartment is a quick walk - which was a extra plus during the cold winter - to the subway that goes to Manhattan. Williamsburg is another interesting area to explore. Ana was a great host - quick to respond and considerate.

You can’t beat the location! Bedford ave is walking distance, the JMZ line is a block away and one stop to the city. Everything went smoothly with our host. Could not have asked for a better place to stay for our friends birthday.
Great view!

Ana and Victor's place was great!  Good location with easy subway access, great and well appointed space, everything we needed.  Everyone in our group really enjoyed staying here.  Also, Victor was super fantastic as a host, and helped make everything easy and ensure a great experience.  Highly recommended!
This is a great spot! Super convienent to places in Brooklyn and Manhattan. Ana was communicative and check in/our was super easy. Place was clean and had everything we needed.
For a family of 6 the place was perfect. Spacious and cozy. We felt home!
Been to NYC a few times now, but this was probably my favorite place I have stayed. Great location and very comfortable!
Great location and place! Six of us stayed comfortably and had a great time - Victor was incredibly responsive. Thank you!
clean. great location.  3rd bedroom is very small.

Victor met us when we arrived, answered all of our questions and made us feel welcome. I was traveling with another adult and two teens. We loved the layout of the apartment and the proximity to the train couldn’t be better. We also liked hanging around close to the apartment — great coffee, a movie theater and lots of restaurants. Our favorite breakfast joint was the Rabbithole! Thanks for a lovely visit, Victor — I hope to come back soon!

El departamento es muy lindo y cómodo. Además la zona es segura, está a una cuadra del subte. 
La atencion fue muy buena. 
Lo recomiendo!!!
We loved our stay in this beautifully-decorated apartment. One subway stop to Manhattan, with friendly, flexible hosts who went the extra mile to make our stay a good one.
Thank you Victor and Ana for your hospitality. The apartment perfectly fit our expectations. This was the ideal location to visit Manhattan and Brooklyn.
Great location, great apartment. Close to everything.

Victor and Ana’s place was clean and comfortable. Check in and out was seamless. The beds were comfortable. The location is close to the best of what Williamsburg has to offer and to the train to Manhattan. A citi bike dock is right outside the door. The area directly outside the unit is a bit seedy but we always felt safe and as I said it is a short walk to the hip parts of Williamsburg. The view from the two bedrooms is spectacular as you can see the Manhattan skyline and the hustle bustle of the city on the street below. We thought the trains going by were a big plus. If you need a place to stay that is clean, comfy and conveniently located Victor and Ana’s  place is a good choice. Finally Victor was easy to communicate with and a great host.
Nice place to stay in and Victor made the say feel like home.
Great location, beautiful terrace and views from the balcony- super efficient hosts and smooth communication! Place is well stocked and clean.
Had a great time at this apartment! It’s very convenient and close to everything. The view from the master bedroom is incredible. Victor was so easy to communicate with. Thanks again!
The flat is nicely decorated and well located. We enjoyed coming “home” to Brooklyn after spending a long walking day in Manhattan. Victor was easily available on his phone.
Very well located.
This is a lovely, comfortable apartment in a great location. It’s very convenient to Manhattan as well as Brooklyn.  We would happily stay there again.

What a terrific space! Lovely apartment, good amenities, clean, and excellent location. It was so easy to get to and from everywhere we needed to be for the wedding we were in town for. Would absolutely rent again.

This is a fantastically located apartment in Brooklyn. Our family of four stayed 8 days and enjoyed it. The only downsides are: 4 stories with no elevator and the heat! Not even the air conditioners were capable of fighting it in summer. Also, may be noisy to some (we didn’t mind).

Great location, bit seedy outside, right on edge of hip Williamsburg, cool roof terrace, was scorching hot when we stayed and the apartment was ALWAYS nice and cool, lovely friendly hosts. Great shower!

God vært med  hurtige og imødekommende svar
Rigtig god lejlighed. Tæt ved Subway og især kan tagterrassen anbefales en sommeraften med udsigt i NYC skyline
Nice hosts and a great little place for exploring NYC and Brooklyn , location is perfect

Great location, just across the Willaimsburg Bridge from Manhattan.
It is a walk-up but worth the effort!
Excellent location, lots to do. Hosts were easy to communicate with and got right back to you with any questions.
Great situation and very nice flat.

Stay 18th September for 3 nights with my wife, kids and there partners. Brooklyn is an amazing place to visit with lots to see and do. Ana & Victor’s  place was just what we were looking for, ideally situated for Brooklyn and Manhattan, it was very clean and welcoming, they are great hosts and would highly recommend

Fijn en gezellig appartement met geweldige ligging direct bij metro/bus. Williamsburg is een hele leuke en hippe buurt.
Veel restaurantjes, (vintage) winkeltjes op loopafstand. Je bent ook zo in Manhattan. Wij waren er met zijn vijven en hebben er een super tijd gehad!
Great location for trains and other transport and the cafes and amenities of the Williamsburg area.

Great home 1 stop away from Essex which is I would say the hub to the rest of the trains, I ended up taking Uber n Lyft to avoid the whole subway mission. Overall the spot was great and as advertised would stay here again!

A perfect apartment for our holiday.  Compact, but fitted the 5 of us nicely.  It is very clean, has the amenities you would want, and has some nice 'homey' touches. 

Immediate neighbourhood is fine - doesn't look amazing , but seems safe and is extremely handy for Manhattan (Marcy Avenue subway 5 minutes away).  3 best things we did (sorry, not about flat!) - Liberty/Ellis Island trip; Juliana's pizza in Brooklyn; the High Line.  Top tip - the Mr Pina grocery 3 minutes from the apartment.
this a great place. very convinient to travel in NYC. only one thing to remember is no elevator for the apt. so you had better take less or light luggages.

Location was great, v convenient for JFK airport and shops/cafes/bars around Bedford Ave. It was a good base for our group of 6, although the third bedroom was v small. The apartment overlooks the train line and a busy road but it wasn’t too noisy in the end, and ear plugs were provided.
Nice place with great view right on a subway line.  Much better value than a hotel.

This is an amazing apartment for the price in a fantastic location for exploring NYC and Williamsburg. The immediate local area is a little edgy, but not unsafe and very much a community vibe.

The hosts are very responsive and include lots of little homely touches.

Would easily recommended.
Location is perfect. Ana Y Victor were super quick to respond to any question or issue we had.

Our visit to NYC was just wonderful. The convenient location to the subway and ride hailing services made it so easy to get around Brooklyn and Manhattan. The place was just lovey and had a wonderful view. How many places can you wake up and see the Empire State Building from bed?
Great Brooklyn location. Easy access to Manhattan. Easy walking to Williamsburg.

As expected - cosy and central - close to transport and walking distance to lots of great restaurants and cafes in Williamsburg. Beds were comfortable. Small living/ common space which was fine for a family but might be a bit tight for a group of adults. Dishwasher was broken and we weren’t advised in advanced, which was unfortunate. Otherwise, pretty good.
apartamento agradable en un barrio que merce la pena visitar
Beautiful spacious apartment. Excellent in terms of cleanliness and location. Host was quick to respond to any questions.
Great location and amazing views!
Está muy bien situado, decorado con cariño y con todos los servicios necesarios muy cerca. Hemos disfrutado mucho del alojamiento.

Ana and Victor's place was spectacular! Their home was big enough for 6 people to fit comfortably. The decor created such a quaint and welcoming feel. It was also very convenient to many locations in Williamsburg.
Very clean apartment with a central location!
Brooklyn is hopping!  We spent the entire weekend walking through the neighborhoods including DUMBO and Domino park.  Great restaurants! Great Bars! and Brooklyn Museum on First Saturday was awesome!

Appartement très bien situé juste à côté du cœur du quartier de williamsburg. Vue magnifique depuis les quais aménagés, metro tout proche et plein de commodites pour faire des courses. Convient pour 6 personnes ( 3 chambres avec lit double) meme si peut être un peu juste pour 6 adultes . Nous étions 2 adultes et 4 enfants et nous étions très bien !  Immeuble de 3 étages très calme avec une superbe vue sur Manhattan, un petit paradis !
